Summary: I typically stay at the Hilton for business. I have stayed and had dinner and breakfast. I will say the breakfast is exceptional. I give kudos to Marla for a great job! She is outstanding and delivered great service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Brand new hotel by John Wayne Airport. Stayed here for a couple of nights and didn’t hear a single airplane. Nicely decorated property inside and out, very welcoming. The rooms are very nice with a modern feel. The best thing of this place is the staff. Super professional from check in, to the bar, to breakfast to cleaning. Awesome job and thank you!
Manager Response: Greetings Reslimpan,  Thank you so much for the super awesome review and for sharing your experience with us.  We're so delighted to hear of you had a wonderful stay and we can't wait to make more awesome experiences for you.  Thank you!  Warmest regards,

Summary: Marla, Lavelle, Israel & Shann provided excellent breakfast service. They were attentive and friendly. Their happy smiles were a great way to start the day. I can't remember the last time I had such good service.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. I am happy to hear you found the Hilton Garden Inn and our breakfast staff to your liking. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future. Our goal is to make your stay better and brighter. If something isn't just the way you like it, simply let any Team Member know, and we will make it right.

Summary: Breakfast was great, love the variety of the continental breakfast, and the waffle maker was a great hit with my 5 year old. Raymond was awesome! He was great and accommodating with the kids! Terrific!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. I am happy to hear you found the the breakfast staff and buffet variety to your liking. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future. Our goal is to make your stay better and brighter. If something isn't just the way you like it, simply let any Team Member know, and we will make it right.

Summary: Our group held a conference at HGI Irvine on February 18th, which was a great success in large part due to the hard work of the HGI team.   After flying in to SNA, I was a bit disappointed that my flight was later than the shuttle, but the 20 minute walk wasn't bad with a carry-on and the safe business / office district.   Noah was particularly helpful on my first night, when I arrived jet lagged and wasn't able to log in to wifi. He personally delivered water to my room on what appeared to be his way out, as I hadn't received it at check-in.   Patricia and Francisco did a fabulous job preparing the space for our event, and ensured everything was set up wonderfully, that details were taken care of, and offered suggestions to make it a great experience.  Our group has had bad
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. I am happy to hear you found the Hilton Garden Inn, Noah, Patricia, and Francisco to your liking. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future. Our goal is to make your stay better and brighter. If something isn't just the way you like it, simply let any Team Member know, and we will make it right. If I may bother you to take a few moments to reply with this email with how we could have made your stay a perfect 10?

Summary: Best service by Marla, Lavell, Israel, Raymond and Sebastian. Kind, respectful and professional! Hire more like them. Too bad im only here for one night. Also the check workers far exceeded my expectations
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. I am happy to hear you found the breakfast staff accommodating and to your liking. I appreciate you taking the time to also review us on google. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future. Our goal is to make your stay better and brighter. If something isn't just the way you like it, simply let any Team Member know, and we will make it right.

Summary Heading: Kind staff, great place to host meetings
Summary: We held a meeting for about 15-20 people recently and needed meeting space, food, and a couple of rooms.  The meeting space exceeded our expectations - it was prepared exactly how we wanted it.  The staff was very good at communicating in the days leading up to our event.  On the day of, we were greeted by Patricia and Otto who were very helpful and throughout the day Otto's co-worker made sure that we had sufficient refreshments.  The food was quite delicious (mediterranean cuisine) and was better than what I had expected at a hotel.  A special thanks to Alex and Aloha as well for helping us run a smooth event. Be sure to consider the Hilton Garden Inn for your future meetings. You won't be disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. I am happy to hear you found the banquet staff accommodating and to your liking. I appreciate you taking the time to also review us on google. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future. Our goal is to make your stay better and brighter. If something isn't just the way you like it, simply let any Team Member know, and we will make it right.

Summary Heading: Great wait staff, bar, and restaurant
Summary: My husband and I love this hotel.  We stay here every time we go to OC which is 3-4 times per year.   Very clean and easy in and out.  Best part is the staff in the restaurant and bar.  Food is better than most and I must thank the wait staff for breakfast - Lavell, Marla, and Danna.  Always super friendly and attentive.  They are there every visit so the staff is stable which is a very good sign.  Angela the bartender is a hoot and makes a great Old Fashioned at the end of a long day. Really a good experience all around.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great and friendly service in restaurant and bar with Marla, Lavell and Danna. Food is good and fresh, cooked to order. Good selection of fruit and pastries. Pleasant ambience, relaxing, dont feel rushed. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The hotel is not bad, the service is excellent, and the food is ok.
Summary: I stopped here for a business trip for 1 week. The room was not too bad, a little outdated but it had everything I needed. The breakfast was alright, but the only real protein (other than eggs) was meat based, so not great for vegetarians. I had food here once at the evening and the food was great. The service was excellent, and the staff went out of their way to make sure I had everything I needed, both at reception, but also Lavell and Marla for breakfast. I would stop here again.
Manager Response: Dear Matt,  Thank you for your feedback.  We appreciate that your company trusted us to lodge your group for those 7 days.  Please let us know next time about your dietary restrictions so we can make sure that you have what you need.  Thank you for taking the time to recognize Lavell, Marla and the front desk staff.  If you see yourself here again as you stated, please feel free to contact me directly.  We'll make sure that you get the necessary protein in your diet and make your next stay a great stay.  Thank you again for your feedback and we'll hopefully see you again in the near future.

Summary: Marla Lavell was very welcoming when I went to get breakfast.  She helped me make the waffles and was eager to assist me with anything I needed.  She was very jovial and we shared some good laughs.  Definitely a 5 star experience.
Manager Response: Dear ezraw57,   Thank you for this 5 star review!  We're so happy that you had a wonderful stay and thank you for taking the time to recognizing Marla!  We're lucky to have her and I'm so glad that she made a lasting impression on you as she does with so many of our other guests.  Thank you again for your review and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The room was pretty much what you'd expect, but what got me to come on here was the surprising excellent of the breakfast experience. I pulled Marla (she runs the breakfast situation, it seems) aside to comment on the attentiveness, kindness, and thoroughness of her team. It was clear they enjoy working together. Danna and Raymond were cheerful and helpful, and the food was great. Honestly, it's pretty easy to make hotel breakfast bland and depressing - not here at the Hilton garden inn Irvine, thanks to this team.
Manager Response: Greetings wrussell1984,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  I'm so glad that we were able to surprise you with our quality of food and service and made you a believer.  Marla, Danna and Raymond are our foundations for our front of house as is Julio and Sebastian for back of the house cooking the food.  Thank you for your positive comments and review and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We brought our kids with us on this vacation. Breakfast was delicious and the service was amazing!  THANK YOU, Danna ,Marla, Raymond for helping us manage our chaos and for helping our kids get their fill of eggs and apple juice.
Manager Response: Dear Maryannh,  Thank you for this awesome review and for the wonderful recognition of Marla, Raymond and Danna.  We pride ourselves on the level of service that we provide along with the quality of food so I'm so glad that you and your kids were able to experience it.  We'll have some eggs and apple juice ready for you and your kids on your next trip.  Hope that you try the waffles next time.  They're delicious!  Until then, have a wonderful day and thank you again for this awesome review.

Summary: I’ve stayed at this hotel with my volleyball team multiple times in the past few months. Every time has been a great experience. They have friendly staff, especially Marla, Danna and Raymond, who are always generous and kind. The rooms are great (comfiest pillows I’ve ever slept on) and the breakfast buffet is incredible (bacon, eggs, waffles, potatoes, cereal, yoghurt, fruit). Would recommend staying here to anyone and everyone.
Manager Response: Hi Tom!    Thank you for submitting this excellent review and for recognizing Danna, Marla, Raymond and what we provide our guests in a daily basis.  We love hosting your team and I hope that we get to see you all again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Best Hotel on the West Coast
Summary: The team here is incredible. Have been here 3 times in the past 6 months and have loved every moment. They have the best breakfast spread I’ve seen in my life. Danna, Marla, and Raymond or extremely kind and helpful. If you are looking for a hotel in Irvine and you don’t choose this you’re a fool.
Manager Response: Hi Trevor,  Thank you so much for this incredible review!  We love hosting your team and we're so delighted that you've been here 3 times already.  As you can read from the other reviews, Danna, Marla and Raymond are awesome ambassadors to this hotel and Hilton.  Thank you so much for recognizing them and we hope to keep seeing you and your team for a 4th time.

Summary: Best hotel we have gone to. Breakfast is always great and the service is even better. In particular Marla, Danna, and Raymond have had the most efficient customer service and help out serving drinks and making sure the food is all out on time and displayed to perfection. I love when we stay here because it’s the best hotel on the west coast.
Manager Response: Dear Daxtont2023,  What an incredible review and to say we're your best hotel in the west coast is very humbling.  Thank you for taking the time to recognize our three superstars in Danna, Marla and Raymond and we hope to host your team again soon.  Thank you for this incredible review!

Summary: The service at the breakfast Buffett was friendly, professional, and efficient. Kudus to Marla, Danna, and Raymond! There was a wonderful variety of hot and cold food and beverages. I’m looking forward to having breakfast here again tomorrow morning!
Manager Response: Dear B8354LZgloriac,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  I'm so delighted to hear that you had an excellent stay and thank you for recognizing Marla, Danna and Raymond!  We have a great team and I'm so glad that they made a lasting impression on you.  Thank you again for your amazing comments and we look forward to seeing you at breakfast.

Summary: I wanted to say I am on day two at the Hilton Garden Inn. It has been a pleasurable experience thus far. Marla was very helpful to me throughout breakfast assisting me with any of my needs. Danna did awesome with the table experience.  The customer service when I checked in was great on yesterday, .Thanks Nonna! Danna did a great job with table set up, etc.  Thanks Hilton Garden Inn.   Lisa
Manager Response: Truetravelgal,  Thank you so much for this amazing review and thank you for recognizing not only one but three of our hard working team members.  Marla, Danna and Nonna will be delighted to read this and thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  We love hosting your group every year and we hope to see you again in August.  Thank you.

Summary: This is one of the more friendly staffs of hotels I’ve stayed at. Very good customer service. Marla was very pleasant at the restaurant for breakfast. Customer service may be a dying breed in some places but not here.
Manager Response: Hello Susied154,  We loved reading this review and thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  Marla and our entire staff are focused on service and what they can control so it's great to hear that you felt the sense of pride they exude day in and day out.  Thank you for your wonderful review and we hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: I'm staying for a conference for several days. My room was clean and well stocked with essentials. The free breakfast was better than I expected. I especially liked the waffle station. The staff are very attentive and friendly, especially Marla. She provided excellent service and was very helpful!
Manager Response: Dear Happiness01041504781,  Wow!  Thank you for the wonderful review!  Reading your review makes my heart happy and we're so glad that you had a great stay.  Marla will be overjoyed reading this review and thank you for taking the time to recognize her and our staff.  We hope to see you again in the near future and thank you again for a wonderful review.

Summary: The food was the best hotel breakfast I’ve ever had.  Marla was a wonderful host, and incredibly friendly.  I highly recommend.   Marla greeted me when I first arrived, and was very helpful throughout the meal. I am not used to getting this level of service at a hotel buffet style breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear KarlsK8864XT,  Thank you for the incredible review!  We're so happy that Marla was able to make a positive impression on you as she does to a lot of our guests.  I agree with you regarding the food and of course Marla.  We've got an outstanding team and great offerings for breakfast.  Thank you again for an excellent review and we hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: Very nice hotel, near John Wayne airport. Clean and comfortable room. Tasty breakfast buffet and a helpful server, Marla. In Irvine to begin graduate school - close to Concordia University, Irvine. I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear T5774NNjasonr,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and we're so happy that you had a great stay.  Marla has a spirit about her that lights up the room and we're lucky to have her.  Thank you again for your positive feedback and congratulations on starting graduate school!

Summary: While I had an amazing service experience from hostess Marla, whose smile could light up a room, and who obviously is an asset to the organization with her kind demeaner, I have two complaints that I have not yet shared with the management staff. If they monitor the reviews here, please note: Room 514 the float in the toilet gets stuck and required that I remove the lid and reset it with every use.  I left the lid off to alert the staff.  If left unchecked, this will be annoying to the next guest if not addressed. Additionally, the shower head is in need of replacement as it has jets that shoot off in other directions that spray water outside the shower. The coffee service in the room did not have coffee cups, so I used the water cups. This meant that the coffee cup lids did not
Manager Response: Dear, G1901GProbertm,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  I'm sorry that we weren't able to make this stay a perfect stay, but your feedback help us go back and manage those deficiencies like the toilet and verbiage during check in.  I'm so glad that Marla, Sebastian, Raymond, Lavell and the entire staff made an impression on you.  Service is definitely something that we can control and I'm so glad that the pride the team shows day in and day out was felt by you.  Thank you again for a wonderful review and we hope to make your next stay a perfect stay.  Thank you.

Summary: Angela was a great host at the bar.  Able to take care of a lot of people while still making all guests feel special.  Soft skills like this are very hard to observe in the world we live in…..  I hope leadership values employees like Angela.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. I am happy to hear you found Angela at the bar to your liking. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future. Our goal is to make your stay better and brighter. If something isn't just the way you like it, simply let any Team Member know, and we will make it right.  PS. Angela thanks you for your kind comments.

Summary: The stay was amazing, great hotel. But I had a shuttle with a man named chase. He was so cool and so fun to talk too. I felt like I was riding with a long time family member! I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. I am happy to hear you found your shuttle ride with Chase to your liking. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the future. Our goal is to make your stay better and brighter. If something isn't just the way you like it, simply let any Team Member know, and we will make it right.

Summary: Everyone from the front desk Kuo and Michael to the staff for breakfast Marla, Lovell and Danna made my stay the best I have had at any Hilton hotel. I have been in 13 hotels over the last 2 months some being beautiful resorts but the welcoming helpful kind nature of the staff made this the best stay! The cleanliness help and kindness is unsurpassed. Had 1 bad interaction with an employee that should not be a part of this wonderful staff Raymond, stay as far away from him as you can, ask for a different server if he comes to you. Your experience will not be good if you’re stuck with him. Everyone else is an absolute pleasure!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed in this property since COVID began since I’m a doctor. THE FRONT STAFF HAS ALWAYS TREATED ME personally professionally and kindly. My room has always been consistent and clean. But best of all are my breakfast staff. Each one of them make my breakfast experience like I’m home. They are Lavell, Marla, Danna, Ramon, Julio, Sebastian!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Breakfast at The Garden Grille & Bar
Summary: I would like to say thank you to Marla, Danna, Raymond, and Lavell, for their continuous wonderful service. As a regular at the Hilton Garden Inn, I eat at the restaurant frequently. All of these staff members are kind and demonstrate a positive attitude in providing a quality breakfast experience. They call me by name, and remember what my favorite breakfast foods are, and I don't even have to order. They automatically order for me and provide my coffee without me even asking. In addition, they treat me with great respect and engage in conversation regularly. And, since I took on the task of learning Spanish, they all have been willing to let me practice with them, and they offer me help with learning how to say certain phrases. In short, I appreciate greatly the wonderful
Manager Response: none

Summary: When I started traveling to Irvine for work, I stayed at several different hotels, I prefer Hilton properties, so I tried to stay within that chain, and most of them were just “OK” but this little gem is better than the rest.  It’s clean, comfortable and a great location near some really good restaurants and other activities.  The staff is super friendly and they’ve become familiar faces.  The on-site restaurant/bar has good food and a nice cocktail selection and they even have happy hour, with friendly servers - Angela, Stefanie and Austin are a few of my faves.    If you can’t be “home” this is a good alternative.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel stay was superb, being innovative and technically advanced enough to never use an actual physical card. Also, Angela, the bartender at the Hilton Garden Inn hotel, was great and has came in clutch multiple times and is just flat out awsm. Thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Terrific location near John Wayne and very clean
Summary: All aspects of our visit were terrific, HOWEVER, the hotel charges for overnight parking which I don't believe was indicated to me before I made the reservation. $25/night is a bit steep too. Overall, I would still choose to stay here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I’d like to thank the breakfast crew who really made me feel so comfortable and cared for during my recovery stay here. Marla, Lavell, Danna and Raymond are amazing staff members of the lobby restaurant and extremely and caring. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have to go to Santa Ana for business frequently and this property is my go to place.  It is located so conveniently to John Wayne Airport has awesome service , top notch rooms and parking . Chase at the front desk has always been very accommodating with my needs. The small convenience store had a good mix of product along with the lounge and restaurant.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I am a Hilton Rewards Member. I stay at Hilton when ever I can but this trip was disappointing.  First we were told we had a two queen room. I have a queen bed at home but his was not queen beds. Also the pandemic may be over by some business perspective but not having hand sanitizer at the buffet breakfast is just creating additional germ spreading event. Even asked if multiple times to have the hand sanitizer station filled, they were empty, my wife and I were ignored. I know it is tough to get help these days but when the servers asked for a tip when I acquired my own food was shocking. Corporate if you get this rating please work with your team here at the Irvine Garden Hilton on the proper customer service. Thank you for your attention to this situation.
Manager Response: Dear Iceman337,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  We're sorry that we weren't able to exceed your expectations and the bed size wasn't as big as the one you have at home.  Our queen beds measure 60"W X 80"L which is a standard Queen bed.  A full size bed would be 54"W X 75"L which we do not have in our queen rooms or in our hotel.  We appreciate your feedback and I hope that this has not deterred you from staying with us again.  Thank you.

Summary: Do not stay here, bad bar/restaurant experience. Angela was awful, and unprofessional! She was so rude and mixed bad drinks. Stay somewhere else and enjoy exceptional service not horrible unprofessional service like Angela gives at this hotel. I can't believe Hilton would allow such incompetence to work there.
Manager Response: Mr. Mcdonald,  Thank you for your feedback.  We're sorry that we couldn't serve you during your visit and your experience was less than expected.  We hope that your next experience is a better one.  Thank you.  Best,

Summary: Alexander provided a fresh, natural charm supported by exceptional customer service skills. I visit this Hilton often. It's clear, management is excellent and Chase is a great trainer. Hats off to the General Manager who may still be Alex Y??
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the awesome review!  Alexander just started with us and he's been a great add to our amazing team.  Thank you for recognizing Chase along with Alexander and I hope I get to see you on your next visit.  Happy holidays!  Best,

Summary: Great experience, especially with Luis the AV/Tech support representative. He assisted the Board with setting up Zoom conference and was attentive to any discrepancies that could have transpired. Also, Aloha is amazing in facilitating the coordination of the meeting. Great team!
Manager Response: Hello TradingPlacesTPI!  Thank you for the wonderful review and for the wonderful comments about Luis and Aloha.  We're so glad that you had a successful meeting and we hope that this is the first of many.  Thank you again for the incredible review!  Best,

Summary: Excellent customer service upon arrival. The gentleman who checked us in was extremely professional, knowledgeable and patient with all of our questions and concerns.  He kindly reminded us all of Hilton Honors benefits and provided us with all of our toiletries due to an unexpected overnight. First interaction with the staff and he made it great!! Spotlessly clean room!!
Manager Response: Greetings Relax48422321352,  Amazing review!  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your feedback and for recognizing Chase who checked you in and the housekeeping team.  We're glad that we could accommodate your unexpected overnight and hope your travels brings you back to us in the near future.  Thank you again for this amazing review!  Best,

Summary Heading: Will avoid returning to this location at all costs
Summary: No hot water for a shower in my room for three days. A/C not functioning. Overwhelmed staff and breakfast service. Maintenance issues, including a noisy refrigerator. Dismissive with finding solutions or moving to a new room. Shortcuts on cleaning.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Thank you Aloha (Regional Director of Catering ) for your great hospitality and making our first event very successful. Thank you Aloha and Sabrina for the great rooms to stay for our guests.  Thank you Francisco, Esteban and Ashley for helping with ur services when ever we needed it. Great team work and very helpful when ever we needed.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Ok,  continued lack of maid service,  $24/day parking and poor restaurant
Summary: The good: Reasonably nice room  The not good: 1) Didn't find out until checkout there was a $24/day parking  which is unexpected in this kind of hotel (garden inn, courtyard etc)..  For this reason alone I'll find somewhere else next time as this is not typical even in this area 2) No maid service (lets just say unreliable as they skipped my room 3 days in a row).  Enough of the lack of maid service, the pandemic is over.. 3) Restaurant (specifically breakfast) is poor..  Limited menu and very slow (lazy?) staff. Stand and chat for 20 minutes with each other before they decide to take order.  Same thing every day... If you go in a peak hour you are in for a terrible experience 4) As an honors status, I wasn't supposed to be charged for faster internet. You got it.. I was and
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hotel OK - Gym and Pool Unavailable Summer 2022 - Website is Wrong
Summary: I travel to the area frequently and usually stay at another Hilton property nearby.  I gave this hotel a try as is a bit closer to where I was working, and was only slightly higher in price.   I cannot currently recommend this hotel if you need to use the gym or pool until the renovations are complete.  When I asked, staff did not know the timeline, and this is not posted on the hotel's website. The amenities that are reported as unavailable are room service and valet and airport shuttle may have modified service.  The website reports that the gym and pool are available. As a frequent traveler I am used to hotel renovations, I would just like to know what I am getting into.   At check-in there are paper signs posted at the front stating that the pool and gym are closed, and you
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed in many hotels in many different places all around the world and never did I need to beg the hotel staff to clean our room. After spending more than $400.00 a night for a suite we assumed light cleaning would be vacuuming up the leftover  crumbs from the crackers that our toddlers ate. Little did we know that this service was at their discretion. Only after 3 calls and begging was it finally vacuumed. This was the final straw for me writing a bad review, which I have never done before. But after finding out they had no luggage carts available and carrying all our luggage up the one elevator that still worked three times and after finding out that breakfast was not available to us because we were not a part of the college sports teams that were staying in the hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Average hotel in business park area
Summary: An average hotel, okay for a short stay. Rooms are clean and staff is friendly. Hotel is currently undergoing some renovations. The shower doors don't seal, leading to a flooded floor every time the shower is used. The fitness center and guest laundry are closed indefinitely and only one elevator is operational, leading to some long wait times. Breakfast is standard for a HGI, but they charge $18.95. Parking is available on-site ($24/night). Few restaurants/stores within walking distance as the area is a business park. Huntington Beach is a 25 minute drive. There are better options in the area for a similar price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel is just ok - nothing special. People who work here nice and trying but worn property, paint off walls and could use a refresh and touch up. Bed and shower good and restaurant downstairs nice addition. Work out area closed and had water shut off entire day for maintenance with no courtesy to give discount or even offer anything for compensation - kind of a hot mess.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Stayed here for a week and elevator was broken so for three days had to walk up and down four floors.
Summary: Also pool was out of service the whole week I was there. Paid good money to use an elevator and pool but got to use none and trust me they didn’t refund much. They also had big machines making noise all night long.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Hilton is conveniently located. It’s just a little over a mile from the airport, has good food choices and amenities. The customer service is friendly and helpful. I would recommended this hotel for business or personal trips.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Cons: pillows were a bit too soft. curtains don't fully reach the middle to blackout the room. the handles on the sink in the bathroom were stiff. one treadmill in the fitness center seems to be malfunctioning. TV remote requires some precision. honestly, these cons aren't even that bad (except maybe the curtains)! I'm just trying to nitpick cuz most of these you can easily overlook  Pros: A/C blew cold and quiet. the LG A/C interface was also very clean and easy to use. very generous amount of outlets in the room! each bedside lamp supports USB. one of the front desk men was extremely nice and professional. hair dryer was good. check-out was very easily handled on the Hilton Honors app. the roads around and leading to the hotel also didn't have a lot of traffic and were very
Manager Response: none

Summary: Facility and rooms are very nice. Restaurant food is better than expected. Nice options at the Pantry (food, drinks, & liquor). Easy parking. Good access to airport and places to eat.   But it seems like there are always a lot of families here, so  there’s kids jumping off beds, running in the halls, and just being kids. But as a biz traveler, I prefer someplace a little tamer and quieter, just my preference.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Don't stay anywhere else but here
Summary: This place blew my mind. I stayed there to be close to the Airport even though I was working each day 30 minutes away in Mira Loma. Jaime at the Front Desk is awesome, as was everyone else. The food was the best I have eaten at a Hotel in 15 years, including high end ones in New York. I ate the Salmon, Steak and Chicken and it was Michelin 5 Star quality. I have no idea how they found the chefs to work there but everything had a unique flavor like I have never experienced - even the Jerk chicken wings at the bar. trust me, there is no restaurant within 25 miles that has food that comes close.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nonna was absolutely amazing. I travel a lot for work and during this trip, my luggage did not make it on time with all of my chargers in it. The front desk worker, Nonna, without my knowledge, went to her car and later offered her charger to me. I was soooo grateful. That is what I call OUTSTANDING service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: When we checked in the front desk couldn’t find our booking.com reservation despite us receiving numerous confirmations from the hotel. The front desk supervisor was very unhelpful and unprofessional. He told us we should not have used Booking.com. His solution after 1 hour discussion was to upgrade us to a “suite” for extra $200. We finally asked to speak to manager and they agreed to honour booking. Suite was regular room with threadbare sheets looking at a wall. It was very unpleasant experience dealing with this individual  We have never had any issues with booking.com in past  I will not stay here again
Manager Response: Hello Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations. Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience. Please contact me direct at the email or phone number below if there is anything else we can do for you at this time. If you could also provide a confirmation number and name on the reservation so that I may look into this.  949 224 3900

Summary: It was so bad, I want to give it a 0 but that’s not possible so I give it a 1.  The only reason I decided to make a reservation at this hotel was because customer service said that they’d be able to give me a room at 8am. They guaranteed it! Once I arrived they had no rooms available, and I called every 30 minutes from 8am to see if they had a room available. I took short naps in my car while I waited since I was exhausted from my trip. They didn’t have a room ready till 2pm but it was on a “first come first serve” basis even though I had a reservation. Most of the people at front desk were rude. They charged me more than what they said on the phone but at that point I was just exhausted and payed it.  The room itself is nice but the whole process in getting a room is
Manager Response: Hello Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we are very sorry we did not exceed your expectations.  Your comments will help us as we continually work to improve our guest experience. Please contact me direct at the email or phone number below if there is anything else we can do for you at this time.  If you could also provide a confirmation number and name on the reservation so that I may look into this.  949 224 3900

Summary Heading: Manager committed Fraud with my Credit card
Summary: So apparently this Manager Joe had an issue with me from a previous stay cause I questioned his customer service. I had asked if he had a room for early arrival seeing how I’m a Diamond member (4 years) and have stayed at this property quite a bit. I asked if I could get the first room when it was ready but his lack in customer service skills he did not offer anything instead offered the basic checkin at 3pm. He was obviously had an attitude so I asked him to cancel my reservation an id go to another hotel that had better customer service. He charged me an marked it as a no show when I clearly was infront of him. This guy is a liability to Hilton. Basically committed fraud. An another manager a Filipino guy said it would be credited to my account in three business days. An
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great experience! Tyler at the front desk was so helpful and so kind, he made my check-in so pleasant and easy.  Very clean hotel and room! Thank you housekeeping!  Only downside is the Pool not warm enough.
Manager Response: Hello Hikingaddict_79!  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  We're so happy that you had an enjoyable stay and Tyler was able to make it a great experience!  Thank you for recognizing Tyler for being the terrific team member that he is and also our Housekeeping team!  We'll make sure the pool is warm enough for on your next visit.  Thank you again for the excellent review!   Warmest regards,

Summary: Computer center not working for 4 days of Business center computer and printer not working during 4 day stay. No pool service, laundry service,no gym service available during 4 days of stay! Will not be staying at this hotel in the future 😫
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at the Hilton because of my wife taking me out of town. I was kinda skeptical about the place only because of the location but I ended up being very pleased with the place.The room was very clean and surprisingly quiet. During my stay I don’t have any complaints about this hotel and will definitely come back when work requires me that way. The staff was really friendly and knowledgeable about the area. And I have to say that the housekeeping has done a remarkable job keeping the rooms,pool,parking area clean.
Manager Response: Hello Keith!  Wow!  Thank you so much for the excellent review!  We can't thank you enough for taking the time to give us your feedback and trusting us to host you during your little getaway.  Thank you to your wife as well for choosing our hotel when there are so many options to choose from.  We can't wait to see you again and whether it's work related or just a staycation, we look forward to your next visit.  Thank you!  Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: Quiet, Good Location, Terrific Customer Service
Summary: When we travel to Irvine, we have found that the Hilton Garden Inn is not only centrally located, but the Customer Service has been consistently excellent.  It is a quiet Hotel (which we prefer), and although food is available and cooked to order, the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine is close to many fine restaurants, shopping centers, medical facilities, and tourist attractions.     Angel has always been remarkably helpful when we make reservations.  She is the best!  Thank you and Kudos to Angel!
Manager Response: Hello martham61!  Thank you for the perfect review!  We appreciate your feedback and acknowledgement of Angel! She's as you say "remarkable" and I'm so glad that she was able to enhance your experience.   We hope that your travels brings you back to us again and thank you again for this perfect review!  Warmest regards,

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Hilton Garden Inn in Irvine for a quick trip to the Rose Bowl 2022. We chose this hotel based on the location near the SNA airport and convenience of access to freeway. We were happy with the comfort and cleanliness of this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Cheap, shoddy construction & pool training for team
Summary: Upon check in, the young lady with purple hair followed VERY few of Hilton's training rules.  They are trained to recognize and verbally acknowledge your Hilton Honor status and say something like "thank you for your loyalty."  She did not.  She also broke one of the most common safety rules of hotel operations.  NEVER say a guests room number out lout in the presence of other guests.  She handed me my key and called out my room number with people standing behind me.  Also, if you value peaceful and quiet rooms, you'll need to find another hotel.  The developer didn't put any insulation into the walls here, so I literally heard my neighbor snoring loudly for my 2 night stay.  People simply walking around in their rooms sounds like a herd of elephants, which is also a testament
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were spending Thanksgiving on the beach , but didn’t want beach prices. This location was 15 minutes to Newport Beach. We got the King suite and we loved the 2 bathrooms! The gym was under construction, but the pool was lovely! We will be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Currently staying at this hotel and just wanted to hop on here to say Angel M. at the front desk is amazing. Her attention to detail and her desire to help the hotel guests goes above and beyond what I’ve seen at hotels of the same level and even higher. This hotel is very fortunate to have her in their employ. Well done Angel thank you for making us feel like we aren’t just a number and for your personalized service!
Manager Response: Hello Lisa!    Thank you for the excellent review!  Angel definitely is amazing and we're so glad that she was able to make such a great impression on you.  We're definitely lucky to have her and I've shared this review with her and the entire team. Thank you again for sharing your feedback and we hope to see you again in the near future.    Warmest regards,

Summary: Truly enjoy this property a d it’s employees! Joe is an outstanding manager!! The breakfast is very good!! And this properties location is great! I look forward to my next visit!! Thank you!! Happy Thanksgiving
Manager Response: Hello Imbastian!  Thank you for the wonderful review and the great comments about Joe!  We feel the same about him and we're so glad that Joe was able to make your experience and outstanding one at that.  Thank you for spending the holidays with us and we hope to see you again in the near future.  Thank you!  Warmest regards,

Summary: Our stay was very nice! Thank you! The option for online check-in was great! The hotel suite was very nice. Very spacious perfect for my family. Very clean. Very accommodating. Front desk was very nice and friendly.
Manager Response: Hello Carsongarage,  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your feedback.  We love to hear that you had an excellent time and we can't thank you enough for being awesome guests!  Thanks for the wonderful review and we hope to see you again.    Warmest regards,

Summary: Sabrina Arace was o it contact, and made our wedding block amazing. Rooms were clean, beds comfy and suite was perfect! Everyone had a great time and location was perfect. Oh, and the little snack shop was clutch. Thank you!!
Manager Response: Hi Sharonchocho,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us and for recognizing Sabina, Director of Sales.  She's amazing and I'm sure that you're fast friends now since she has the uncanny ability to welcome everyone in and make you feel at home.  Thank you again for the amazing review and we hope to see you soon.  Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: Warning - the website for the property says they offer “Airport Shuttle”. They DON’T.
Summary: As of 8/23, despite the website clearly showing “Airport Shuttle” this property DOES NOT. I was told by whoever answered the phone (after three attempts with NO answer), “we stopped doing that during COVID.” Well, we’re more than a year and a half into that, so if true, it hasn’t been offered for a long time - long enough to modify the website. Oh, there’s a much smaller “Hotel Travel Guidelines” you can click - which on page TWO says hotel shuttle is “temporarily not available”. There was another Hilton hotel airport shuttle at the airport; I talked to the driver! So it’s not as if it’s impossible to offer the service. It’s not the cost that bothered me; it was the inconvenience of relying on the information FROM THE HOTEL. FIX THE WEBSITE!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Alex and the staff were friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and quiet. The location was in a business district and close to many restaurants but quiet. We will definitely stay here again!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The breakfast when they had enough food was good. My requests to have my room cleaned while staying there for 8 nights went unanswered until day 6. The prices of the food and drinks were outrageous! Parking price outrageous.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everyone on staff was so helpful. They were very accommodating to our large sports team of kids and their families. Buffet breakfast was perfect for our athletes, with hot options.  The hotel parking was easy, convenient location to freeway and airport. Very clean hotel. We enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Fantastic customer service from Sabina for our group that needed a block of rooms.  We were given a good rate and discounted parking.  If we had to pay the full daily parking rate ($24!), I would not have been happy.  Located in a quiet area just off the 405, super duper clean and modern.  I am really picky/creeped out by hotels and I was VERY happy with this one.  Found it to be super quiet except for some little feet running above us from time to time.  Breakfast was disappointing so don't get too excited about it, but at least it's there for a quick bite so you can get on with your day.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed 2 nights after our wedding and Samy was unbelievably nice and helpful. He deserves a ton of credit for our stay. Other than that the room was clean, the bed comfy, and we were thrilled to get a night comped. Thanks again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hilton never disappoints.   Beds are always comfortable,  spacious rooms, clean & all your basic amenities.  The gym was clean & had proper sanitation protocols in place.   The food & bar were out of a lot of things & had a few double charges at the bar.   Beware of HIGH parking fees but fairly standard in this area.   I always recommend Hilton.
Manager Response: Hi Katrinajohnson1!  Thank you for the 5 star review!  We're so glad to hear that you had a wonderful stay and were able to enjoy the amenities offered during your stay.  We hope that you'll visit us again sooner than later and thank you again for the excellent review!

Summary: Hotel was noisy until about 2:00 am. Several your sports teams were staying at the hotel. The had no consideration for other guests. They played loud music and were extremely noisy. Don’t expect any housekeeping services.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not sanitary at all, from uncleanliness to mattress being poorly maintenance. Prior guests dna was all over one of the b
Summary: Not sanitary at all, from uncleanliness to mattress being poorly maintenance. Prior guests dna was all over one of the bathrooms. My digital room key didn’t work at all. We woke up like we slept on the ground.
Manager Response: Dear Rp3589,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  I am sorry you found your stay to be less than perfect.  Our team works very hard to keep every room and bathroom clean; we strive to exceed expectations every day.  Please accept my sincere apologies for not meeting your expectations and know I will address your feedback directly with our team.  Thank you again for your feedback and bringing this to my attention.  Thank you.

Summary: Rooms were clean, staff was always friendly but the main areas were dirty. Full garbages, dirty rugs, and dirty parking lot. The gym was also very dirty and no AC which was awful. good location, close to freeways and a couple of good restaurants.
Manager Response: Hello adene926,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  I'm so sorry that the condition of the public spaces were not up to par.  This is not indicative of the level of cleanliness that we pride ourselves on.  If you see yourself back in Irvine, I hope you'll consider staying with us again.  I'll make sure that we make your decent experience into a great experience.  Thank you again for your feedback and thank you for choosing Hilton.    Warmest regards,

Summary: Made sure my stay was amazing and special. Very professional and attentive. Will definitely stay here every time I come to California. Parking is perfect.  Everything is very clean.  Pool was awesome. Perfect
Manager Response: Hello Ccas915!  Thank you for the perfect review!  We appreciate your feedback and acknowledgement of Hunter and PJ.  They're our dynamic duo and they're going to be thrilled to hear/read this and we cannot wait for you to come back to stay with us.  Thank you for the perfect review!  Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: Best hotel in the area in all aspects.
Summary: People, facility, food, super clean, safe area, near my favorite airport, everything about this hotel makes it the best choice for a personal or family stay. My experience with the managers, front desk and restaurant individuals at this locations have always been some fo the best during my travel for business,
Manager Response: Mr. Alfredo,  Thank you so much for the amazing review!  We appreciate your loyalty to Hilton and our hotel.  Hope you had a great Memorial weekend and we'll see you again soon.    Warmest regards,

Summary: Fresh rooms and layout, outstanding restaurant and service. The location is close to freeways, yet in within high-end business/building surroundings established an unintended calm from the hustle & bustle of traffic and humanity.
Manager Response: Hello deliradevice,  Thank you for the unexpected excellent review!  We appreciate that you took the time to give us your feedback and I'm so glad that you had a great stay.  We hope to see you again and thank you again for the amazing review!  Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: Modern Updated Property with great service
Summary: We had a one night stay at this property and found it very modern and updated.  The check in experience was excellent and the agent provided very good service.  The room was modern and comfortable, very quiet.  The price was reasonable, but there was a $24 fee for self-parking.  The rooms were clean but there were a few spots that were unclean that were missed, but not a huge deal.
Manager Response: AKDan,  Thank you for the excellent review!  We appreciate that you took the time to give us your feedback and I'm glad that you had an enjoyable night.  Please contact me directly regarding some of the cleanliness issues that you saw so we can address that with the team.  Thank you again for the excellent review and we hope your future travels brings you back to Hilton Garden Inn Irvine.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: Nice area to visit, indoor pool is such a vibe during sunset. Will definitely come back soon the king suite was so beautiful and spacious . Bathroom has huge nice deep bathtub and also a walk-in shower.
Manager Response: dijonwilson25,   Thank you for the excellent review!  I'm so glad that you got to experience the king suite and even more glad that you had a great experience.  Thanks for taking the time to write this review and we can't wait to see you again.  Warmest regards,

Summary: Only thing left to question about this place is why do residents have to pay $25 to park if we pay for room? Outside of that the room was really nice, the staff was friendly .. I wish the hotel would serve breakfast for free
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for staycation
Summary: I had wanted to get away from the noise by me for a night locally, but needed a place that offered a room that had plenty of space and enough area to work the next morning before I left. I decided then to book a 1 king bed 1 bedroom suite. When I arrived later in the evening, the gentleman helping me got me checked in quickly. The room itself is very spacious, and the particular suite I got on the 5th floor even had a second bathroom ( half bath, sink and toilet). Very nice separate shower and tub right next to each other, and having 2 TVs, one in the bedroom area and the living room area was a nice touch as well. These rooms, like others come with a small fridge and microwave, and this one had a wet bar area with a small sink near the fridge. There were a few issues I had with
Manager Response: Hi John,  Thank you for putting in an excellent review.  We appreciate your feedback and we're so glad that you had an enjoyable time away from the noise.  Thank you for thinking of us and we hope to see you again to give you that peace and quiet.  Thank you.

Summary: I hope they welcome Members and give the possible solution for request and try harder. When I called to ask if we can extend or di late check out she didnt even try or look just said that its not possible rigjt away. I encountered a lot of problems but out of respect and prefer contacless stay I just chose to be nice
Manager Response: Hello iamyoursutiesheryl,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  I must apologize that you were dismissed in that manner instead of looking at what we could have done for you in terms of a late checkout.  I'm a little surprised that you experienced that type of service and thank you for bringing that to our attention.  I'll make sure to address this to the team and I hope this experience hasn't deterred you from staying with us again.  Thank you.

Summary: Very clean, sink in room a plus.  Bathroom very clean.  Lobby personnel efficient.   Hotel is clean and  quiet.  Breakfast is in -dining provided for $12.95.  Be prepared to pay for parking, as with most hotels in area.        ..............
Manager Response: Hi Gonnahavefun4!  Thanks for the great review and the wonderful comments!  We hope to make your next stay a 5 out of 5.  Thanks again!

Summary: I’m guessing it’s due to “Covid” somehow, but the restaurant/bar was out of stock of a lot of items for nearly a month. But the staff saw to it that I was taken care of and completely satisfied, nonetheless.   Joe, Robert, Kat and Nona all go above and beyond. Great crew! Thanks guys and gals!
Manager Response: Thanks for the awesome review!  I'm glad Joe, Nonna, Robert and Kat took great care of you during your many visits.  We'll make sure that we have the bar stocked including Budweiser just for you.  We'll see you hopefully sooner than later.  Take care and thanks again for the awesome review!

Summary Heading: Awesome Front Staff and Clean Accommodations 🌹❤️
Summary: I booked my trip through Hotels.com and had issues with my reservation. I was beyond frustrated, However, The young lady Devin in the front was incredibly patient, informative, and helpful when resolving my issue. She definitely aided on making my trip to Orange County a pleasant one, and I applaud the brand for hiring a truly amazing staff. From the beautiful suite, fast housekeeping responses, to location I absolutely Will be returning soon 🥰
Manager Response: Greetings CaribbeanDelite,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and we're so glad that you had an awesome experience.  Sometimes, things don't go as planned, but I'm glad Devin was there to make sure that you still had an awesome experience.  Thank you for the wonderful comments about the service of staff and we look forward to your return visit.    Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: the staff is outstanding  Kat and Alex were perfect.  The only place I will stay.
Summary: best property I've been to in SoCal since Covid started.  The staff is impeccable.  Kat at the bar/restaurant was amazing, And Alex at the front desk was outstanding. Make sure you don't lose them.  I will stay here every visit.
Manager Response: Dear E6159Fltimg,  It's always great to see you and thanks again for the outstanding review!  My apologies that it took me so long to respond to this, but I just wanted to let you know that we appreciate you and for being a loyal guest with Hilton.  We'll have the bar chair reserved for you and we'll see you next time.    Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: Great staff and breakfasts, excellent value.
Summary: It looks like a newer property or recent remodel.  Very clean, open and all the COVID policies in effect.  I've been coming here for a few months, and know the staff by name or face and always friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Hello Mark,  My apologies for the delayed response, but I just wanted to thank you for the amazing review that you took time to put in.  I hope your travels brings you back to staying with us again, but until then, please stay safe and warm and best of luck with the weather coming your way.    Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, recently renovated, friendly staff, great location!
Summary: Devon and Brittney were extremely helpful. The rest of the staff was also extremely friendly and helpful. The hotel has been recently renovated and taking all COVID-related precautions. It is great location. Nice breakfast options. Definitely worth a stay!
Manager Response: Hello Loumgnlz!  Thank you so much for the excellent review!  I'm so glad that you had a wonderful stay and thank you so much for recognizing Devon, Brittney and the entire staff.  It's a different time we're living in, but one thing that hasn't changed is our service level.  Thank you for taking the time to put in this review and we look forward to your next visit.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: Very nice hotel for a weekend getaway and it was clean. Only 20 minutes from Huntington Beach and A lot great restaurants to choose from. Also Luis down at the bar gave us great service during happy hour I would 10/10 recommend.
Manager Response: Hello Nz2491,  Thank you so much for the excellent review!  We appreciate your feedback and thank you so much for recognizing Luis.  He's awesome and makes amazing cocktails.  I'm so glad that you had an enjoyable stay.  Please think of us when you plan to visit Orange County again.    Best Regards,

Summary: Hotel was clean and conveniently located. My issue is the parking charge. I get the impression they do a lot of business travel so companies have no issue with the parking charge but as a leisure traveler on a budget it was a shock(not easily seen on the Hilton site). Front desk and manager refused to drop the charge as "they would get in trouble with the owners".  I checked out and went to a different Hampton Inn 5 mins away. Angry and disappointed customer and wont go back to this property.
Manager Response: hi Jeff,  Thank you for your feedback.  I'm sorry that we couldn't make your stay a 5 star experience.  We are an airport property and we charge for parking and it's in par if not lower than the other airport properties.  We don't hide any charges for parking and I'm sorry that it was a negative experience for you.  Thank you again for your feedback and we hope you change your mind when you're in this area again.    Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Long delayed review--on the eve of the pandemic shutdown, the hospitality was fantastic
Summary: HGI OC Airport provided my typical excellent experience ...  property is in fantastic condition, clean and well cared for, front desk service was prompt, courteous and efficient and as usual, the room was very crisp, immaculate and properly appointed with all the standard amenities...however, what made this stay unusual was that my arrival night (1 night stay) was on eve the California pandemic shutdown order which occurred while I was in the air...airport, rental car lot and streets of Irvine were eerily empty and quiet.   But the hotel was open and taking all the appropriate safety precautions as they had been articulated in the governor's order.   The meeting I had flown into town for  had been change to a video conference and I had planned to go to my company's HQ to
Manager Response: Hello CWCwanderer,  Thank you for the review and I apologize that this response is so late.  It was an unprecedented time, something that we're still going through right now and I'm glad the level of service we pride ourselves on was displayed with Heart.  I hope you're doing well and are able to hopefully join us sooner than later.  Thank you again for your amazing review and thank you for choosing Hilton.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great hotel, lovely staff, great service. Ideal location for Orange County airport. Having an airport shuttle free of charge was very handy. It was easy to arrange pick-up, you just need to know the pick-up point. The staff are very friendly and go above and beyond. The room was great and well cleaned, as was the bathroom.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I had to book reservations for a yearly work event and like always it was such a great experience. The entire team helped with all of my questions and helped contribute to the success of our event. We will continue to book with them in the future.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms were modern, clean, and quiet.  There are numerous restaurants off Jamboree and the location had easy access parking. Service was very good and the internet connection on the 3rd floor was quite good. I did not use the workout room (open 24hr) but plan on trying it out. The breakfast has bacon, sausage, hash browns, grapefruit, pineapple, oatmeal, and assortment of breads.  Check in was really friendly, fast, and efficient. Great value compared to other hotels I have stayed at in Irvine.
Manager Response: Greetings Freedom57104100822,  Thank you so much for the wonderful and detailed review!  We're so glad that we could make an impression.  We pride ourselves on our service of staff and delicious food so it's music to our ears when our guest voices that back to us.  Thank you so much for not only staying with us, but choosing to stay with us with so many options available to you.  Thank you and we can't wait to have you visit us again.  Warmest regards,

Summary: The staff is very friendly. The hotel is well kept, room was very clean, odor free. Great amenities. I stayed for 4 nights and appreciated the food variety, it was delicious. I’d definitely go back and recommend this place.
Manager Response: Hello Xtianoel,  We really appreciate that you took the time to give us your feedback and to top it off, a great review!  We're so glad that you had a fantastic experience and enjoyed the various food and beverage options while staying 4 nights with us.  Thank you so much for the positive reviews and we can't wait to have you visit us again.    Warmest regards,

Summary: Thank you Lavell for serving/accommodating our group of 15 for Dinner Saturday and the breakfast service staff this morning was awesome.  Everyone was so helpful and friendly...thank you.  Our rooms were very clean and comfortable, our stay was very enjoyable and we would definitely do this again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much DEvans495 for your wonderful review and for recognizing Lavell and the food and beverage team!  We're so glad that you had a great stay and our housekeeping team will be delighted to hear about your review!  Thank you again so much for your feedback and we can't wait to have you visit us again.    Warmest regards,

Summary: I stay here often and I have to say the bartender service is amazing. Luis and team always insure service are top notch. Everyone does an excellent job here and thought I'd post a review to let you all know. Thank you!
Manager Response: Good day F1569CAdavem!  Thank you for taking the time to recognize Luis and the team for being the best at what they do.  We appreciate your loyalty to the brand and us and we can't wait to see you again.  Thank you!  Warmest regards,

Summary: The hotel was nice and clean, very convenient location, everything you need is within 15 minutes.  Kat and Jorge were very friendly and welcoming while I ate dinner at the bar.  I will be staying here for my next work trip.
Manager Response: Hello RNapper86,  Thank you so much for the great review!  I'm so glad that you were able to meet Kat and Jorge.  We're lucky to have them be apart of our team and not only are they amazing team members,  they're just good and genuine human beings.  Thank you so much for recognizing them and we can't wait to have you stay with us again on your next work trip.  Until then...  Warmest regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel - great food - great price
Summary: Awesome beds, clean room - great service. Breakfast was awesome! Staff were courteous and friendly. Wasn't noisy even though was close proximity to the highway. Will be back for sure. Parking was plentiful too!
Manager Response: Thank you paulr1582020!  What a great review! Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and I'm so glad that we were able to make an impression on you.  We enjoyed having you with us and we can't wait to hopefully have you back again sooner than later.  Awesome review from an awesome guest.  Thank you!  Warmest regards,

Summary: We travel a lot and the hospitality at this hotel has been one of the best.  Donna at the front desk, Eric, Rheanna, and Levell in the hotel restaurant, were all phenomenal and offered excellent service.  The rooms were spacious and clean, and the breakfast was delicious-amazing customized omelets.  Highly recommend this hotel for anyone going to Irvine.  Located close to the airport, ballparks, grocery stores and restaurants.
Manager Response: Wow!    Thank you lol9296!  What an excellent review!  Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize Donna, Reanna, Lavelle and the entire staff in.  We're so happy that you had an excellent stay and I'm even more glad that our team was able to make an impression on you.  We hope that you come and see us again and thank you again for the excellent review!  Warmest regards,

Summary: Great experience from booking the room to checking out!  All staff were genuinely nice, professional and helpful.  Rooms were clean and beds were comfortable.  I would recommend this hotel any time for any reason!
Manager Response: Hello 4yelmrap!  Thank you for the 5 star review!  I'm so glad that you had a wonderful experience and it's always great to hear about our service of staff.  We pride ourselves in being present, genuine and doing a little bit of extra.  I'm glad that you had a wonderful experience and thank you again for the amazing review.  Please come see us again.   Warmest Regards,

Summary: Terrible location, higher than average parking fee for terrible parking facilities, tiny rooms, no Hilton happy hour, expensive below average breakfast (better off going to McDonald’s) and within walking distance to .....NOTHING
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Garcia,  Thank you for taking the time to fill out our survey. I'm sorry that your experience was not up to your expectations. We take great pride in customer service and aim to please our guests, make them feel welcomed and comfortable. Unfortunately, as an airport property that provides transportation to and from the airport, there is a daily overnight charge that is actually lower than the surrounding hotels that offer the same. I'm sorry that you missed out on our daily happy hour provided from 4:30pm to 6pm and I'm sorry that the breakfast buffet and a la carte options weren't to your liking. We would have gladly offered some great recommendations to near by restaurants that might have been more to your taste. We always want to make sure that our guests leave satisfied and I'm sorry we missed the mark. Thank you again for your comments and thank you for choosing Hilton.

Summary Heading: Amazing Service- Donna Cares about Hilton Customers
Summary: I travel often and it’s rare that someone surprises me with great service but the person at the front desk named Donna is absolutely amazing. She went above and beyond to help me by making arrangements to have a package shipped back to my office. Our UPS number wasn’t being accepted so Donna called to make other arrangements. She went to the UPS store well after I flew home. That is spectacular. I am amazed how incredible Donna’s follow up was. Thank you so much.
Manager Response: Hello Kelvin!  Thank you so much for the amazing review and for taking the time to recognize Donna for making sure that you received your package.  Our goals is to make sure that we go the extra mile to make wonderful experiences for our guests and I'm so glad that she did that for you.  Thank you again for the amazing review and thank you for choosing to stay with us.   Warmest regards,

Summary: Stayed two nights here. Close to airport, great staff, quick check in. Hotel clean throughout, clean room, comfy bed. They have an airport shuttle as well, but I didn’t use it. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Hi TravelGuy72!  We really appreciate that you took the time to give us your feedback.  We're even more ecstatic that we were able to provide you a 5 star experience to make it memorable.  Thank you again for the wonderful review and we can't wait for your next visit.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: When in Irvine I always stay at this hotel.  It is very clean, the staff are very nice.  The breakfast is always fresh and best is that you can special order items.  Morning dining crew are very friendly and remember you each time you come.
Manager Response: Hello 25wendyp!  Thank you so much for the 5 star review!  We're so glad that you took the time to give us your feedback and even more glad that your experience was a great one.  We appreciate the positive comments about the staff and we hope that your next visit comes sooner than later.  Thank you!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This nondescript business hotel is pretty poor. On the plus side, the staff at reception were friendly and my bed was comfortable.  On the down side?  - limited choice at breakfast, involving poor quality ingredients. - reactive, not proactive staff at breakfast. Want a coffee? (by the way, only undrinkable black/white filter (?) coffee is available, no cappuccino or espresso here). Get it yourself, the staff won't be looking out for you. - negligible water pressure in the bathroom. My shower was a dribble, it did not make for a good start to the day. - housekeeping left a dirty rag in my bathroom sink. Yuck. - my burger at dinner was marginally better than a fast food one, but given that the USA invented burgers, I expected to have better quality than I can get down any local
Manager Response: Hello Merops,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  Good or bad, we want to hear from you and I'm sorry that this experience was not a great one.  The level of service that you received is not indicative of the level of service that we pride ourselves on and for that, I apologize.  If you see yourself back in Orange County, please contact me directly at the hotel.  Thank you.

Summary: The property is located close to John Wayne airport with has great access to both Newport Beach and Anaheim. The staff was very friendly and hotel is well equipped. Breakfast was great and had a great chat with Luis while enjoying a couple of cocktails in the lobby lounge. Would recommend the hotel to anyone looking for a centrally located hotel with all of the comforts of the Hilton brand.
Manager Response: Hello Adrian!  Thank you so much for the excellent review!  We appreciate your feedback and recognizing the staff, especially taking the time to mention Luis.  He's awesome and we're glad that you were able to relax and enjoy a couple cocktails and conversation with Luis.  Thank you again for the excellent review and we'll see you in the near future!  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Very nice experience at this hotel
Summary: The hotel staff are great the restaurant service is excellent. Front desk is amazing very helpful. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Overall facilities are beautiful.The pool area is very nice especially with the heated pool in the winter time makes for a nice swim
Manager Response: Hi Mark!  Thanks for the perfect review!  We appreciate that you took the time to give us your feedback and we couldn't be more delighted that you had a great experience.  We know that you travel quite often and if and when you decide to come back down this way, we'd love to see you again.  Thanks again for the review see you next time.     Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great facility and friendly staff. The breakfast is good. The bar is nice. I like the fresh water in the lobby. Had the steak for dinner and it was excellent.  Mattress could be a little better, but can deal with it.
Manager Response: Hi Just4lewis!  Thank you for the wonderful score and comments about the hotel and the service of staff.  We're always striving to be the best and I'm glad that we were able to make an impression.  Let us know next time if you feel that the mattress could be better.  We can always look at options for you like flipping the mattress or having you try out other rooms with different mattresses.  We want to make sure that you have a restful night.  Thank you again for the wonderful review and hope to see you soon.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: 3.5 stars - Pretty Good but Noisy Rooms
Summary: First time staying here. I’d give 3.5 stars if I could. Hotel staff was very nice. Checked in early due to morning flight arrival and they happily were able to accommodate. Bar/restaurant staff were all very genuine and interested people being easy to chit chat with. One mention is no free breakfast unless you are an established rewards members, although I forget the level requirements...diamond and platinum I think. Not a big deal.    Rooms noise was not the best. Fairly easy to hear door slamming and hallways conversations particularly at night. I would hear my neighbor walking around and the hum of their voice when conversing also...not ideal. Rooms were clean although a bit cramped for the style and price. Rooms were made up promptly after checked out were rooms were
Manager Response: Hello Big Minnie,  Thank you for your review.  I'm so sorry that you experience was just pretty good and not great.  We strive to be more than just good so I hope we're able to exceed your expectations the next time you're in the area.  I am glad that you were able to enjoy the facilities and experience the great service from our team.  When it comes to the perks of earning privileges, please consider joining the Hilton Honors Loyalty program.  It's a great was for you to earn points for free amenities and hotel stays.  Thank you again for your feedback and I hope that you'll consider us again for your next visit.    Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: I’m a Hilton honors member so when traveling on business I love and enjoy my Hilton locations.
Summary: I visit this hotel a lot when I have to be in the area. I find it a nice hotel it’s quite peaceful. I like the happy hour and the bartender Luis is so kind and nice. He’s very respectful knows his ppl skills! Which I happen to be huge on it. The room is nice. Some of the ladies at the front aren’t so kind. After visiting for many visits you would think they would be a bit more respectful but a few times I got a real bad vibe with them. I didn’t like it at all made me totally uncomfortable 😣. But Overall nice place , cool location bar food is good too!
Manager Response: Hello Bridgetw409,  Thank you for your review and most importantly, thank you for being a Hilton Honors member.  We know that there are a lot of options our there and we appreciate your loyalty to the brand and to us.  I'll also make sure to pass on the great comments to Luis.  He's a superstar as is a lot of our team members, but I also wanted to apologize that you weren't feeling the positive vibes from the front desk.  I'll make sure to review these comments with the team and make sure that we do only give positive vibes and the best service possible.  Thank you again for the wonderful review and until next time.  Have a Happy New Year!  Warmest regards,

Summary: Staff efficient, helpful and friendly, breakfast fantastic, good variety! Rich omlett, kids had fun decorating their waffel. Nice location, beautiful lobby, and restaurant. Only 20mnts away from Disney.
Manager Response: Hello ShariflHassan2409,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and for the wonderful comments regarding your stay.  We strive to be great and we're glad the our service of staff and breakfast options were to your liking.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future and thank you again for the wonderful review.  Have a Happy New Year.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: Icl came from Michigan for couple of days to attend my neice reception. The place was very close by my brother house. Very clean, friendly staff, the check-in was a breeze, and I loved the cook to order breakfast. Highly recommend! Would definitely come back.
Manager Response: Happy Holidays Krastakh!  Thank you for the 5 star review!  We appreciate that you took the time to give us your feedback and we're so glad that you were able to experience the wonderful service from the team and enjoy the delicious breakfast.  Thank you so much for choosing us while you visit your brother and we look forward to welcoming you back for future visits.  Happy Holidays and have a Happy New Year!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Staff is not know anything about hoteling. They don’t solve your problem. You can’t ask something from them because when you do they can make you angry with their talking styles. I don’t recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Zengin,  I'm sorry to hear that your stay was not to your expectations.  We pride ourselves on our service levels and our ability to go the extra mile so it was disappointing to hear that you didn't feel or experience that.  The comments you stated are very vague so I would greatly appreciate if you would go into more details regarding your stay and experience with us.  Looking at your check in experience, it looked like it was very pleasant and interaction with the agents.  I look forward to your reply.  Thank you.

Summary: everything was perfect, very comfortable, clean, nice location walking distance to the airport but you don't hear the noise from it. Breakfast is good also, the normal casual breakfast that you find in any hotel with similar rating.
Manager Response: Dear Ahmad,  Thank you for the awesome review!  Perfect is something we strive for and we're so glad that you were able to feel that.  Success!  We're so glad that you chose to stay with us and we hope your next visit to the area brings you back to us for another perfect stay.  Happy Holidays and have a Happy New Year!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This was my graduation night and the beds were smaller than queens so my husband slept in another bed. Up until midnight I heard someone stopping on the floor above me which wasn't necessarily the fault of hotel, but was a disappointment. We were promised snacks delivered for not having the upgrade that was promised, but never showed up. All small issues, but a disappointment. The facility was clean and beautiful though.
Manager Response: Hello Cortnay D,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  I must apologize that the little things you mentioned fell through during such a special time.  We should have done a better job.  I see your reservation and if you would like to discuss this further, please contact me directly at the hotel.
