I hope you were able to celebrate your special occasion.  Thank you.   Warmest Regards,

Summary: I stayed here for business, and it was a ok hotel. The check in service was good, and check out was very fast. It's in a convenient location to the airport. The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful. The only downside were, there was an awful smell of mold/mildew in the bathroom. I had to keep the bathroom door closed at all times during my stay. Also be careful of all room service charges before you order. There are fees and taxes for the room service TRAY! Besides that it was a cool stay.
Manager Response: Hello reek007,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and for the wonderful comments about the service of staff.  We pride ourselves on our service levels and I'm glad that you were able to feel what we preach and train on a daily basis.  I must apologize for the bathroom smell.  Please let us know next time if there is anything that might contribute to not experiencing a pleasant stay and we'll make sure to make it right.  Thank you for staying with us and I hope that we'll get to see you again.   Warmest Regards,

Summary: While the property is nice and clean, it is not a good value. The location is close to the airport and the 405. But, there is no hot tub and breakfast is not included unless you opt for the pricing schedule that is even higher than the high price I paid. You can find someplace better to stay.
Manager Response: Hello Wamplersusan,  Thank you for giving us your feedback.  We have many options you can choose from that include breakfast and what I would recommend is to join the Hilton Honors program to earn the privilege of choosing the breakfast or the points when you reach the Gold or Diamond status.  We also do not advertise having a hot tub, but offer a heated indoor pool with outdoor access which is a great feature that most hotels do not have.  We offer many other options that add value and also add value with our quality of service that those "value" hotels do not.  I'm sorry we couldn't meet your expectations this time. Thank you again for your feedback and if your travels brings you back to this area, please keep us in mind.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This Hampton property is in a good location and has excellent staff. Breakfast was quite good. I do a lot of business with Tesla and it is five minutes away. I was also surprised that there was not too much noise from the highway.
Manager Response: Hello ddecorte,   We're a Hilton Garden Inn, but I'll let it pass this time. :)  Mr. Decorte, thank you for choosing to stay with us and thank you for being a Hilton Honors member.  We know it was a quick trip from Michigan, but we appreciate that you chose us to rest for the night.  We hope your meetings went well and we hope to see you for future stays.  Thank you for your review and happy holidays to you and your family.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: This Garden Inn facility is a must stay.  Supported by an extremely efficient and friendly staff, the hotel is well located near OC Airport, restaurants, shopping and entertainment, yet sits in a quiet neighborhood.  Enjoy the hotel and its first-rate amenities.
Manager Response: Greetings Gsemery!  Thank you for the amazing review!  We're so glad that you were able to enjoy your stay with us and thank you for the great compliments about the service of staff.  We pride ourselves on doing that little bit of extra in what we deliver and I'm so glad you felt that with our service levels.  We can't wait for your next stay and thank you again for the amazing review!    Warmest Regards,

Summary: I only stayed one night on a quick business trip and the quick mobile checking and keyless features with the app were the best part of the travel after landing at 3am. I was able to walk right in and go straight to my room.
Manager Response: Dear dbest41,  We really appreciate the amazing review and I'm so glad that you were able to take advantage of the digital key and check in.  It pays to be a Hilton Honors member and thank you so much for your loyalty and for choosing us to be your resting place after a long day.  Please keep us in mind for your future business needs and we look forward to your next stay.  Thank you.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This hotel was chosen as a stay and play site for our daughters softball team.  This is close to John Wayne Airport. The rooms are very nice, clean, and quiet hotel. Breakfast was great and is served a little later in the weekend,  which was awesome!! We will stay here again!!!
Manager Response: Hi Mary!  Thank you so much for the wonderful review!  The softball team was awesome and I hope the results on the field were as positive as your stay with us.  The field's not going anywhere and we're not going anywhere so we can't wait to host your next tournament when in the area.  Thanks again for being great guests and hope you had a wonderful Thanksgiving.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: nice hotel, very clean and the breakfast was good. My only complaint was the price point, I fealt it was a little high for an HGI compared to other properties in the area. If you're looking for close to the airport, clean and curteous, this ia a solid choice.
Manager Response: Hi genndprice,   Thank you for the solid review.  I wish we could have made the experience a 5 star experience.  We're always very competitive with our competition so those lower rates that you saw might not have given you the type of service, attention, and care we pride ourselves on.  If you see something higher next time, please contact me directly and we can discuss our availability.  Thanks again for the solid review.  Hope you had a wonderful Thanksgiving.   Warmest Regards,

Summary: I LOVE Digital Key!  Makes checking in and out so much easier.  This hotel was super clean (I think it's a new hotel).  Good breakfast, lots of choices.  Great bar.  Great service.  Oh and super comfy beds :)  Just great overall.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Thanks for the excellent review JDarcy27!  Hilton does a wonderful job with technology and the digital key is a great perk for being a Hilton Honors member.  Thank you for your kind words on the service of staff.  Please keep us in mind for your next visit to Orange County.  Until next time.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: The hotel room was very clean, the airport shuttle driver was friendly and informative.  The pool and gym were also very nice.  The breakfast was great but they only gave me 1 voucher for my room with 3 guests so we would have to pay $17 each additional guest so I did not use my voucher. I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hello gc00012019!  Wonderful review from a wonderful guest.  Thank you so much for your kind words on the service of staff and our facility.  We can't wait for your next visit and contact me next time and I'll see what I can do about those breakfast vouchers.  Hope you had a wonderful Thanksgiving.    Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel for my business stay
Summary: From being able to work with a digital key, having a restaurant on site for dinner and amazing clean rooms I was completely satisfied with my stay. I requested a late check out because of late client meetings before my flight and had enough time to go up to my room freshen up and then grabbing lunch in the restaurant before heading to the airport. Quiet, convenient, comfortable.
Manager Response: Hello Ms. W!  Thanks for the awesome review!  I'm so glad that you were able to have an excellent experience during your time with us.  We strive for excellence and I'm glad that you felt what we strive for on a daily basis.  Thank you for the amazing review and we can't wait to see you again.   Warmest Regards,

Summary: The hotel feels like it is new. It is all clean and in nice condition.  They had DirecTV with is a big plus. Hotel is reasonably priced.  Nothing glamours but definitely for for business travel. Parking feels secure.
Manager Response: Dear Joe_Rabbitt,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  We're always striving to give 5 star reviews, but I'm glad that you felt the hotel was clean and new.  Our maintenance staff along with our housekeeping staff do a great job in the cleanliness of the 4 year old hotel.  We hope that you're able to visit us again and thank you again for the wonderful review.  Hope we can make it a 5 star experience next time.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: Stayed four nights at the Irvine Hilton Garden Inn for work.  Overall this is an excellent Hotel.   Upon arrival the check in was very quick and easy.  The lobby is the Typical HGI layout.  This was a newer hotel so everything seemed very clean and fresh.    I was on the 5th floor room 544.  My only issue was this room was very far form the elevators, but other than that it was very good.  The room has a typical closet with ironing board and iron.  There was a sink, with small refrigerator and microwave.  Coffee maker and bolted water.    This room had two beds and they were very comfortable.  There was a large desk to work at and the internet was very fast.   Bathroom was large and very clean.  We met at the bar each night before going to dinner.  Service was very good and
Manager Response: Greetings MJRLdal,  What a great review!  Thank you so much for the compliments and for mentioning Robert.  Robert is amazing and I'm so glad that he was able to connect with you and provide excellent service as he does to all of our patrons.  Let us know when you'll be back.  We'd love to see you again and I'm sure Robert will have one of his special cocktails waiting for you.  Thank you again!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: AC didn't work and was not fixed after i reported. All i received as a fix was a large loud fan and compensation was some Hilton Rewards points...woohoo. The visual part of room was clean, but under bed was dirty. The furniture was outdated, but worked ok. The fridge was actually one of best i've had at a hotel. So good it froze our drinks becuase we had it too high.
Manager Response: Dear TrailBlazer556338,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We really appreciate your comments and we're very sorry for the condition of your room. We will address your comments with our maintenance and housekeeping teams as we work to improve our guest experience. Your feedback is genuinely appreciated as it is the first step in helping us improve our services. We hope you will come visit us in the future.

Summary: A perfect location, close to the Santa Ana Airport and close to the Aikido dojo (the location of the seminar).  There were many places in the area to get a variety of prepared foods while staying in the area.  The weekend traffic was light and getting around with a rental car and Google Maps was easy.
Manager Response: Hello Donn G!  Thank you so much for the wonderful review!  I'm so glad that you had a great stay attending the Aikido seminar.  I hope future travels brings you back to us.  We would love to host you again.  Thank you again for the great review!  Until next time.    Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Stay away! Horrendous staff and housekeeping.
Summary: Staff, housekeeping are oarticipants of gang stalking. no airconditioning. Very rude, atrocious, obmoxious, horrible people. Very bad customer service. These people should not be in the hotel service industry. Housekeeping is horrendous.
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Estillore,  Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay.  We're disappointed that your expectations were not met, but I have to disagree with you regarding our housekeeping staff.  They are the most kind, hard working and very service oriented team I have ever worked with and I thank them everyday for being the best at what they do.  I don't understand your comment about gang stalking.  Either way, thank you for your feedback.

Summary: This is a fairly new hotel and the quality of our stay was HORRIBLE! 1st we asked for a room with a view and were given a room over looking the Fwy and just below the AC units for the entire hotel which we didn't realize till we tried to go to bed. After a couple of hrs.of trying to sleep we went and complained to staff and they looked at us like we were bothering them. The gave us a different room, didn't send anyone up or a cart to help us. We get our belongings switched get settled in for the night pull the covers up and we are laying there and my husband says what is that? On the bedding was BLOOD, are you kidding me? We pulled them off us as disgustingly as you can imagine, and not only was there blood on the bedding touching us but the other end had grease from the
Manager Response: Dear TraveltheOC,  I recently received your response yesterday to the email that was sent to the Front Office Manager after he had responded to you a day after you had sent your survey back in August.  I believe you mentioned that you found the email in your junk email.  The email was to correspond with you to make it right and was it no way in dismissing you or your complaint.  As discussed with the Front Office Manager, we're here to make it right and we will reach out to you privately to do so.  Thank you.

Summary: I like the cleanliness of this hotel. The staff members are professional and accommodating. I have stayed here often over the last three years and it is superior to other hotel properties in the area, because it is newer.
Manager Response: Dear muynn2019,  Thank you for the amazing review!  We have an amazing team that prides itself on the quality and condition of service.  I'm so glad that we have the pleasure of hosting your stay over and over again and we feel privileged to do so.  We cannot wait for your next visit and thank you again for the amazing review!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This hotel is one of the cleanest I've stayed at in years.  The accommodations were a bang for the buck.  Slightly off the beaten path and quiet which was okay with me. Location was convenient for my needs.
Manager Response: Hello CaDreamr,  Thank you for the awesome review!  Our housekeeping team is one of the best and they work their hearts out to make sure our guests have a great experience.  Thank you for recognizing them!  We hope your next trip to brings you back to us.  We'll be waiting.  Thank you!

Summary: Hotel was nice and clean. Room was nice. Bed was nice, a little firm, but could have used extra pillow. I asked for extra pillows and was told it one only one extra allowed per room. Seemed like a weird policy to me. Also we had a group rate for a wedding and the desk was very confused how to charge us for the cheaper group rate parking. Had to talk to the desk 3 different times before it was correct on our bill. Breakfast was nice and the breakfast staff was very helpful. Probably would not stay here again even though the hotel was nice. Service and policy was off.
Manager Response: Dear nwahl173,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback regarding your recent stay. We are happy to hear you liked your accommodations, yet we regret if we were unable to fully meet your requests. We value our guests and their feedback and we will review your comments with the team. We appreciate your patronage and hope you will stay with us again.

Summary: Great hotel with a friendly and knowledgeable staff! I stay there almost weekly and feel welcome every time. I am recognized as a frequent guest and enjoy the quality rooms, food and staff. Robert at the bar is great and I appreciate the helpful front desk staff.
Manager Response: Hi Jason!   Thanks so much for the wonderful review!  I don't think 57 stays so far at this hotel is nothing to sneeze at.  WOW!We love having you here and thank you so much for the wonderful comments about Robert, the Front Desk staff and overall comments about the hotel.  We'll see you next week and I'm sure Robert will be happy to serve you up some of his special cocktails and talk to you about tennis.  Thanks again!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Really loved my time at the hotel. Breakfast is amazing and staff will bend backwards to provide care! Staff is very friendly and willing accommodate various situations. Clean rooms and top notch customer service will surely bring me back!
Manager Response: Thank you ctzb23!  We love hearing about the great and friendly service that you received while visiting us on business.  That's what we strive for and I'm glad that we hit the mark!  I'm so glad you enjoyed the breakfast and we can't wait for you to visit us again.  Thank you!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I have to admit I keep trying to come back to this hotel when in the area just so I could have a chance to swim in the unique pool. It is actually an outdoor pool but it is on the 2nd floor with a roof over it So it feels like an indoor pool. However you have a view of the city and its peaceful and tranquil and the pool is very clean and well maintained. For me, when I have the time this is a special destination. Other than that, this hotel has a few issues but it is clean, close to Orange County airport, The rooms are well maintained and quiet. I don't have a picture of the pool because I do not take my phone with me for swimming. However, as others have mentioned, they charge for parking,  breakfast is rather expensive but very fresh and well made.
Manager Response: Hello TripGypsi,  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your feedback.  I'm sorry that we couldn't give you a five star experience this time, but we're going to sure well try the next time you're back.  Thank you for the glowing comments about the pool and we'll have the sunscreen and fresh towels waiting for you.  Thank you!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: When you have issues with your hotel smelling like sewage backup why isn’t anyone fixing it? The smell was so bad after 3 days staying the smell from the elevators went up into the hallways. After the second day I came down with a sinus infection. Wondering if what I was breathing was harmful and caused it?
Manager Response: Dear Sightseer314190,  Thank you for taking your time to give us your feedback.  Our apologies that we did not meet your expectations and we are and were aware of the situation mentioned and taken care of the issue.  We strive to give excellent service and our apologies that we were not able to meet that expectation.  Please let us know if you would like to return and we'll make sure that your next stay is a great one.  Thank you.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: This property was Very clean and quiet . It had easy access to freeways. We liked that it was only ten min from the concert venue. The room was nice and cool, which was perfect because it was quite warm outside.Would defiantly stay here again.
Manager Response: Greetings Babythron1!  Thank you for the great review and comments.  I'm so glad that you were able to enjoy your stay along with the concert.  I'm guessing the concert was at Five Points which is an awesome venue.  Hope your next concert brings you back to us or if you just want to cool off, you know where we are.  Thank you again for the review and have a great week!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Very nice and clean, staff very friendly. Nice location. Charge $20.00 a night for parking, overall ok place to stay. Not many places around the hotel to eat. Close to airport. I would recommend this hotel to family and friends.
Manager Response: Greetings Larryr969,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and nice compliments about the staff.  We're here to provide a 5 star experience and I'm sorry that we fell a little short in giving that experience.  We appreciate that you'd recommend to family and friends and we hope that you'll be able to visit us again.  Thank you again for your review.   Warmest Regards,

Summary: This was an AWESOME stay!!! Sofia...the front desk associate was courteous and very helpful!! Eddie’s omelette was delightfully delicious!! The pool was relaxing...crystal clear and a quiet place to read and enjoy my morning.
Manager Response: Hi Samitha!   We think you're AWESOME for mentioning Sofia!  We think she's awesome too and we're so glad that you had a great stay.  We'll have the Eddie's omelette waiting for you for your so come visit us again.  Thank you again for the AWESOME review and have a safe and happy Labor Day weekend!   Warmest Regards,

Summary: I cannot complain. The room was nice, the cleaning staff cleaned my job exceptionally everyday I was gone and the staff around the hotel was very nice. I had a wonderful few days in this hotel. I try and always choose Hilton whenever I travel.
Manager Response: Dear tmoala,  Thank you so much for the wonderful comments and review!  We're so glad that the staff was able to leave an impression of being friendly and giving great service.  We strive to be great and we hope that we were able to achieve that.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we can't wait for you to stay with us again.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: Housekeeping staff attempted to enter my room (on more than one occasion) without announcing themselves as employees -  isn't this common? The Mgr. NEVER called me to resolve the issue. Last time @ HGI
Manager Response: Dear Tee1170,  My apologies for the delayed response to your review and the service that you received.  It looks like the Front Office Manager had replied back to you on the 13th.  If you see yourself, back in Irvine, please contact me directly and I'll make sure your next stay is a wonderful one.  Thank you.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: I thought the value of the hotel stay was very poor.  I felt I was nickel and dimed for every service. i.e. breakfast, parking.  I feel I could get a comparable stay at a different hotel for a cheaper price.
Manager Response: Hello Bri8492,  I'm sorry that your experience was not to your expectations.  We advertise our amenities whether they are complimentary or have a fee so I'm sorry that you felt nickeled and dimed.  It is not our intention to make anyone feel that way and I hope that we were at least able to service your needs with great service.  Thank you for your feedback and thank you for choosing to stay with us.    Best Regards,

Summary Heading: Sofia at the front desk is super nice and really went the extra mile
Summary: TIred from a 3am wake up to get to the airport and I arrived early in OC. Sofia was Soooo accommodating and pleasant. I am a Hilton Garden Inn fan (big fan) so I was so happy to be taken care of. The staff is all amazing and the place feels really clean and well maintained. Its going to be a great relief to stay here this week given my busy work schedule!
Manager Response: Dear JerseyMikeNowOR,  Thank you so much for the amazing review and for the outstanding comments about the service of staff and for recognizing Sofia.  She was thrilled when she read your review and we're excited that we were able to make your stay a great one.  We hope that your work brings you back down to us.  Thank you again for the wonderful review and until next time.    Best Regards,

Summary: I had business in Irvine and recently stayed at this hotel. The hotel is located within 15 minutes of everything in the area that I needed. The hotel looks recently renovated. The rooms are large and nicely appointed. The bed was very comfortable. I appreciated the Keurig coffee maker in the room. Breakfast is not included and is $17/person. This seems to be the going rate for breakfast in the area, including iHop. There were nice options at the breakfast buffet including made-to-order eggs, choices of dry cereal and yogurts, fresh fruit, and much more. Parking is $18/day for self-park. The hotel charges everyone’s credit cards $25/day for incidentals but patrons do not get a full-refund from the hotel for 3-5 business days after check-out. I found this very annoying. I did like
Manager Response: Dear Shampeu,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and thank you for the wonderful review.  It doesn't seem like we checked all the boxes, but hopefully next time, we can give you a five star experience.  We'll have some cookies waiting for you next time and thank you again for your review.    Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Electricity black out spoiled my stay!
Summary: Nice Hotel, but the electricity went out and that spoiled my stay there. No refund no apologies. Horrible customer service! Skip this hotel if you value great customer service! Other than that it was ok.
Manager Response: Dear Jerry,  We apologize for the inconvenience that you experienced.  As you know, the city had a major power outage that cut power not only to the airport, but to 25 thousand residents and businesses as well.  We tried to make the experience as comfortable as possible for our guests while the city worked diligently to get the power back up. Again, our apologies for the inconveniences that was experienced and we hope that you'll consider us in the future.  Thank you.

Summary: We really liked the location being close to the airport and various shopping centers. The elevators were a bit slow, however the room made up for it. It was clean, large with lots of extra towels. We did not see a safe. Restaurant was great with excellent service.
Manager Response: Hello Tokyo92!  Thank you for the great review!  We're so glad that you enjoyed your accommodations and enjoyed your meals in the restaurant.  We apologize that the elevators were slower than normal, but I'm glad that experience didn't overshadow your stay.  Thank you again for the great review and we hope to see you again.  Thank you!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful. Check in and check out was easy. The rooms were clean and good size. The beds were comfortable. Breakfast items were varied and all tasted good. The dinner menu was good and the servers were nice.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review 216dk1!  We appreciate your feedback and we're so glad that you had an enjoyable stay.  We hope to welcome you back in the near future.  Until then, have a great summer and thank you again for the excellent review!    Warmest Regards,

Summary: Front desk staff was very helpful beds were oh so comfortable. Hotel has free airport shuttle service and its only five minutes from the airport. Wal-Mart is only minutes away as well. Not to mention the event was a huge success.
Manager Response: We loved having you stay with us!  The energy, the incredible music/singing and amazing smiles that we saw with your attendees were infectious.  Thank you so much for staying with us.  We hope that your future event brings you back to us.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: I had a nice experience at the Hilton for a recent 2-night stay. The front desk was able to accommodate me for a late check out on the last day! So grateful. Pool was open until 10pm, which was a bonus.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler2367,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review.  I'm so glad that we were able to accommodate your request and make your experience a great one.  We appreciate your time for putting in this great review and we can't wait to host you again.  Thank you!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great stay at this Hilton, will definitely return here next time I'm in town. The staff were very friendly and the facility was in great order and clean. Location is great as well, near airport and highways.
Manager Response: Hello Beth!  Thank you so much for the wonderful review!  We're so glad that we were able to make an impression with our service of staff and make your stay enjoyable.  We look forward to your return stay when back in Irvine.  Thank you!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Upon visiting myriads of Hilton Garden Inn’s, It was really great to have my personal house-keeper, who allowed me to get that “extra” few hours of napping before tidying my room.  The linen was as white as snow, and I enjoyed every minute of my stay.  The breakfast was nothing short of elegant, not to mention the un-matched freshness of the food ordered through room service!  Thank you Alejandra for making my sleep soooo peaceful and relaxing!
Manager Response: Hello Mama Goose!  Thank you for a lovely review and for mentioning our room attendant Alejandra!  Housekeeping never gets the credit they deserve and I'm so glad that you were able to recognize her for her efforts.  Thank you so much for doing that and for taking the time to give us feedback on our quality of food.  Please come back and stay with us again!    Warmest Regards,

Summary: Beware of overnight parking charge !!! I was charged $18 per night for overnight parking while the reservation did not state any charges for parking. If I ever HAVE to stay at a Hilton again I will call the location and check what hidden charges they have before making a reservation.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Abouabdo,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. I looked at your reservation and noticed it was booked through booking.com. The site does indicate the parking charge of $18 under where the amenities are listed. I don't understand where the hidden charges were and with us being an airport property, we have the lowest parking fee in the area. I'm sorry that this experience put a negative experience for you. If you would have mentioned your frustrations, we would have happily worked with you to make sure you had a great stay. Again, we appreciate your feedback and thank you for choosing Hilton.

Summary: Our stay was great. Hotel was nice and clean. Comfortable rooms. Staff was pleasant. The hotel was nice and new and always being cleaned by staff. Front desk staff was very pleasant. Devon was courteous and helpful.
Manager Response: Hi Tiffany!  Thank you so much for the great review and the great compliments about our hotel, staff and especially Devon!  We strive to be great and we're so glad that we were able to make a positive impression.  Thank you again for the review and we hope we get to see you again.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: We were arriving for a tournament. The staff was able was accommodate us with a very early check in. Housekeeping promptly delivered rollaway bed and extra toiletries. Bar/ Restaurant staff were extremely friendly. Great rates, very clean, friendly staff. Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Hello GrandTour!  Thank you for this amazing review!  We loved hosting your team and we're so glad that we could make an impression on you.  We hope that you had a successful tournament and we'll see you again next year!  Thanks again for the great review!

Summary: Beautiful property , too 3 in my last two years of extensive travel. Quiet, great little courtyard, and super close to the airport. Staff was very accommodating getting me a room far from elevators. Restaurant and bar is a nice setting as well.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review Crosscheck90!  We're so glad that you had great stay and the team was able to make it a top notch experience.  Come back and visit us again.  Thanks again for the great review!

Summary: I spent one night at the Hilton Garden Inn before flying out the next day to ATL.  I enjoyed my short stay. The hotel is only 4 years old, very nice and clean. Staff were amazing.  In house restaurant was great to have on site.  Free shuttle to the airport.  I would go back to stay at this hotel in a heartbeat
Manager Response: Hi terrysandra 32!  Thank you so much for the amazing review!  We really appreciate that you took the time to give us your feedback and we loved having you stay with us!  Please come back and see us again and thank you again for the great compliments.  Take care and have a great weekend!  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Not the best Hilton I've stayed at
Summary: Customer Service was standard. Nothing over the top. Room was clean, but had a slight stale aroma to it. A/c meter was difficult operate, even one of the workers couldn't explain how to properly use it. While the power went out momentarily, the room never seemed to feel right again. Room was hot, and just didn't feel like the best Hilton Experience I've come to know
Manager Response: Hi Lawrence,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  I'm disappointed that we couldn't wow you with service as we strive to make sure that all of our guests have a great stay.  My apologies that we fell short on giving you that experience.  We hope that this experience hasn't deterred you from staying with us and we hope that your future travels brings you back.  Thank you.  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Great hotel near John Wayne Airport
Summary: There was a convention going on inside of the hotel which made it a little louder but they had hotel employees there to make sure it did not get too crazy. Breakfast is pricy if you are wanting to eat it every day. other than that I had no issues.
Manager Response: Hello Kevin,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and thank you for the good review.  We hoped it would be a 5 star experience, but we'll make sure to do a better job next time on your return visit.  We hope to see you soon and thank you again for your review.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: Convenient parking, quick check in. Rooms are nice and modern feeling, fridge and microwave, big shower, lots of movie channels.  Also pretty large and comfortable, I need thirty more characters. Nice.
Manager Response: Hello Markymoto!  Thank you for the 5 star rating and the great review!  We're glad that you had an enjoyable and comfortable stay.  We appreciate that you took the time and thank you again for the great review!  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Favorite Hotel Near John Wayne Orange County Airport
Summary: I’m in Irvine frequently for work - this hotel is very convenient to/from the airport. It gets fewer kids/teams compared to the Embassy Suites and is just more convenient than the Hilton. Staff is always friendly and helpful. This is my “go-to” hotel in the area.
Manager Response: Dr. Talbott,  Thank you for the wonderful review!  We think you're pretty great too and thank you so much for being a Diamond Hilton Honors member.  We're so glad that we've made this hotel your go-to hotel and we can't wait to host you again for your next trip.  Thank you again for the wonderful review and we'll see you soon.   Warmest Regards,

Summary: I stay here often with it being conveniently close to my work. I am always greeted by the friendly agents at the front desk. Devon at the desk always remembers me by name which is amazing considering how many people she probably encounters. Luis and Robert are always a pleasure to chat with at the restaurant. This place knows how to get great staff that will treat you right every time. They do charge 18 for parking but for California its not a bad price.
Manager Response: Hello Buinessman0885,  Thank you so much for an amazing review and for recognizing Devon, Luis and Robert.  We think they're pretty special and we're glad that they were able to make an impression.  They'll be thrilled to see this review and we look forward to hosting you again for a return stay.  Thank you again for an amazing review!    Warmest Regards,

Summary: If you just want somewhere to go and sleep this is a perfect place specially if you get points or deal. There was tons of large vehicles taking up more than their share of room in the parking which is very limited anyways so that kind of sucked. I guess there was a baseball tournament with families and kids so the pool was filthy probably from all the kids don't know if that's the norm or just this particular.  Of the three hotels I was considering I picked this one because the pool area that was folded on the website seemed relaxing and a little nicer than the others it is very deceiving. There's no skyline view.
Manager Response: Hello Trek13344156663,  Thank you for the review and we apologize that the stay was just ok.  We cater to business travelers and families alike and during your stay, we had a softball tournament group staying with us.  We apologize that the pool was not in order and we can imagine by that experience, it can have a negative impact on your stay.  We apologize for the inconveniences that you experienced and we hope that you give us another try.  Thank you for your review and we hope to see you again.    Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Not family friendly, poor food quality
Summary: It is a small hotel for business travelers.  It is not staffed to service families.  The eating area was dirty, the food was extremely poor, rotten, stale, burnt and in my opinion could have gotten people sick.  The staff seemed irritated by children.
Manager Response: Hello Excursion3425904673,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback.  Our apologies for the poor quality of food and service that you received.  It's not indicative of the level of service and product that we pride ourselves on.  If you see yourself back in this area again, please contact me directly.  I'll make sure your next stay is excellent.  Thank you.   Warmest Regards,

Summary: The hotel is convenient to get to, rooms are quiet, clean and spacious. The hotel staff listens and will address your concerns.  Easy safe parking. I got there around 11 pm, didn't have to worry unloading outdoors.
Manager Response: Hi TraveltipKIT!  Thank you so much for the great review!  We're so glad that you had a great stay and we love that we were able to make you a happy customer.  We hope that you'll be able to stay with us again in the near future.  Thank you again for the wonderful review!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I stayed at this location when in town for an American Bar Association conference. The conference was not at the hotel but most of the attendees were staying at hotel. The service was stellar. Specifically, Rosa in housekeeping and Vincent and Devon at reception—but everyone was great. Also, the food at the restaurant was great and room service was very prompt. One of the best burgers I’ve had, and the pizza is good as well. Zero complaints about this hotel.
Manager Response: Hi Summerann86!  Thanks for being so fantastic and giving us a great review!  We loved having you and your group stay with us and thank you so much for recognizing Rosa, Vincent, Devon and the rest of the team.  If you see yourself back in Southern California, we'd love to see you again.  Thanks again for the fantastic review!  Warmest regards,

Summary: Super friendly staff and newness everywhere in the middle of Irvine business parks. Very clean and pleasant. They should have made the  lounge larger as it was packed and lively! It was the NBA Finals, so everyone was full of spirit. A nicer vibe than most business hotels.
Manager Response: Greetings Bryon!  Thank you for the great review and for the great comments about the service of staff.  We aim to go above and beyond and I'm glad that we were able to make it a great stay.  Please come back and visit us again!   Warmest Regards,

Summary: The rooms were clean. I really like the pool. It is covered and mostly indoor but has an open wall to let in fresh air and I was still able to lay out in the sun for a bit to relax. The staff was awesome but I wanted to point out that one employee went above and beyond. Devon said hello and asked how I was doing each time I walked through the lobby and wanted to make sure I was doing okay and would just have a conversation with me. Other employees said hello or smiled but she made me feel important and more than just a guest in a hotel but I felt as if I was at a home away from home. Overall it was an awesome stay thanks to Devon!
Manager Response: Greetings!   Thank you so much for the awesome review!  I'm so glad that you had a wonderful time and got to use the pool and soak in some sun!  We love Devon and I'm so glad Devon connected with you and made you feel at home.  Thank you for taking the time to recognize her and thank you again for this amazing review.  Please come back and visit us again.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: The staff here was amazing, great hospitality and friendly.  A giant shout out to Luis Asension, our bartender who went above and beyond, and makes the best margaritas in the world, thanks for the wonderful visit!!
Manager Response: Hello Therock55!  Thank you for the great review on your good visit and thank you so much for mentioning the service of Luis!  He's a superstar and we're so glad that you had the honor and priviledge of tasting one of his margaritas.  Thank you again for the great review on the service of staff and we can't wait for you to visit again.  We'll have a margarita waiting for you at the bar.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: Travelling for work. I love staying at the Hilton Garden Inn, its in a great location and close to John Wayne Airport. The rooms are very clean and a perfect size.  The staff on every occasion are friendly and go out of their way to make sure you're happy. I would recommend this hotel to any business travellers looking for a comfortable and quiet stay
Manager Response: Hello Cappa012,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback and for choosing to stay with us.  I'm so glad that you had a comfortable and quiet stay and the team was able to make an impression.  We hope to have you visit us again and give you a five star experience.  Thank you.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Here for a work conference and have been very pleased with this hotel.  Friendly, quick check in, easy parking, easy access from SNA aiport.  Just off the freeway, but not loud at all.  Our housekeeper Alejandra did a superb job everyday, room was spotless and well cared for.    Would certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi Tawnyyyy!  Thank you for the superb review and for recognizing Alejandra in Housekeeping.  We think she's amazing and she's going to be thrilled that you took the time to write this review.  I'm so glad that you had a great stay and we can't wait to have you visit us again.  Until next time.    Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Fantastic staff, brand new hotel very conveniently located
Summary: The hotel is new and everything is well kept up nicely. They have easy parking, local restaurants, near the airport and the food and drink are great.   The Restaurant/Bar staff are fabulous. Luis, the bartender, is really helpful and makes great drinks.   The front desk crew are especially helpful and have handled every requests quickly an efficiently.  Can't say enough good about this place.
Manager Response: Hello Mommymouse1,  We can't say enough of how awesome this review is.  Thank you so much for taking the time to give us your wonderful feedback and for recognizing Luis and the Front Desk crew for their service levels.  I'm so glad that you were able to have a great stay.   We can't wait to see you again.  Luis will have a drink waiting for you at the bar.  Have a great day!  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: perfect location for Irvine business travelers
Summary: Great hotel close to JWAirport @ OC .. looks and feels new, everything from lobby and bar / dining to rooms and amenities. Devon at the front desk makes you feel welcome and all of the staff are friendly and there to help make your stay the best it can be. Variety of choices for hot cooked breakfast as well as good bar and dining choices after a hard day at the office. When in the area, this is clearly my hotel of choice.
Manager Response: Dear Jay,  Amazing review!  Thank you so much for the great comments about the hotel, the staff and really taking the time to recognize one of our superstars, Devon.  I'm so glad that we were able to make your stay enjoyable and we can't wait to see you again.  Thank you!

Summary: My experience at this hotel was great! The staff was friendly and attentive from check-in to check-out. Breakfast was until 11:00am and served your usual eggs, meat, waffles, pastries, cereal, fruit, yogurt etc. They also have made to order options. The servers come around frequently to attend and refill coffees, juice, get more syrup whatever you need.   I would recommend and will be back!
Manager Response: Hi Shanez G,  Thank you for the great review and the wonderful comments about the service of staff.  I'm so glad that you were able to take part in the breakfast that we offer.  We think it's pretty great and I'm so glad that the team was able to take care of your needs.  Thank you again for the great review and we can't wait to have you visit us again.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: This is a great hotel to get in and out if you have business in or around the area. The people are are great in the hotel. When we landed we called the front desk to request shuttle and the was told they stop running at 9:30 pm but the lady at the front desk would drive over to get us herself, that is excellent service!! Thank you Devon at the front desk, you made the stay a wonderful one.
Manager Response: Hello Sugar1971,   Thank you so much for taking the time to put in a wonderful review and for recognizing Devon!  She's going to be thrilled to see this and I'm so glad that she was able to make a difference in your stay.  Thank you again for the wonderful review and we can't wait to host you again.   Warmest Regards,

Summary: Staff was friendly and easy to work with.  The night manager Devon was the very accommodating. She even remembered my name.  Hotel had easy parking and a welcoming front entrance. If I am in the area will stay again.
Manager Response: Dear DayTrip,  Thank you so much for the excellent review and for coming back to stay with us again.  Devon is awesome and we're so glad that she was able to make your stay that much better.  Thank you for recognizing her and the service of staff from the team.  We can't wait to have you stay with us again.  Thank you!   Warmest Regards,

Summary: From the check in to the check out this place has it together.  Everyone very professional and willing to help and get you going as quickly as possible.  Luis the Bartender was the best.  I was hear for business and I highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: Hello Mark!  Thank you so much for the amazing review and for recognizing the service of staff from the team and Luis!  We think he's the best too and we really appreciate that you took the time to put in a review and recognize him.  We look forward to your return trip.  Thank you!    Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: Our "Go to Hilton" when in Irvine/ the OC area
Summary: We come to town every year for the annual Highland Gathering at the OC fairgrounds, and this is our favorite hotel!  This Hilton is clean, has a nice pool and restaurant/bar area, is close to the airport and the local attractions and is KID FRIENDLY.      We just got back from our most resent visit and wanted to recognize Luis in the bar, on a rainy Sunday, he kept everyone happy!  Luis was running tables in the restaurant while simultaneously keeping a pack of travel ball parents at the bar well taken care of.  Kudos!  Excellent customer service and kept his cool.
Manager Response: Amber!   Thank you so much for making our hotel your go to Hilton and also making it your favorite.  I'm so glad that Luis was able to take care of you and everyone else at the bar.  He's a great human being and I'm so glad that you took the time to recognize him.  Thank you so much for doing that.  We can't wait to have you visit us again.  Take care and see you soon.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Check-in was fine (most hotels charge a deposit upon check-in but this hotel charged my card for the whole stay - 2 nights plus parking, etc.).  This hotel is decent looking. The best thing about this hotel was the shower pressure!  However, breakfast was absolutely awful ($16.95 buffet).  The entire breakfast staff was very rude (except one lady that brought me some ice).  I asked for some bacon at the order area and was told by the man that they don't take orders...I was at the order lane where you place orders!!!!!!!!! I then asked another server for some silverware and more napkins and then was pointed out and talked about in another language! For the price of this hotel including the parking ($18 a night) and buffet I will be sure to stay elsewhere!
Manager Response: Dear DF BayBee,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay.  I'm sorry that we weren't able to provide the 5 star experience that we're known for.  The service levels that you experienced is not indicative of the service that we provide and I apologize that it was just okay.  If you ever change your mind and decide to give us another try, please let us know. Thank you for your review and your time.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: Great location, very close to the airport, very convenient for business travel. Devin at the front desk was fantastic, friendly and professional, you can tell she takes pride in her work.  Comfy beds, clean rooms, will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kathy,  Thank you for the 5 star review and for the wonderful comments about Devon!  She's going to be thrilled when she see's that she's made a difference in your stay.  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and thank you so much for the excellent review!    Warmest Regards,

Summary: What can I say! Great staff, spacious rooms, quiet rooms, beds are so comfortable, I sleep like a log on these beds. Ample parking. Best cookies served in the evening!  The staff goes out of their way to help you.   This has become my favorite hotel in Irvine now.   I would recommend this hotel very highly.   Thanks to Devon for making my stay a great stay!!!!
Manager Response: Dear sadhananarasimhan,  I'm so glad that we've become your favorite hotel!  Thank you for the amazing review and I'm so glad that Devon was able to enhance your stay.  As you can tell by the numerous comments about Devon, she's pretty amazing.  Thank you again for the GREAT REVIEW and we can't wait to see you again.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: My five stars is for the amazing staff! I have never had such outstanding customer service like I had here. When I arrived I was greeted by their amazing manager Devon. WOW!!!! She is the sweetest person I came across my whole trip! She made checking in easy and she was very helpful. I am not familiar with the area so I asked her about what there is near by that I should look at or visit and I was so impressed by her knowledge. Without her advice and recommendations I would be lost! She was genuinely happy to help me and answer any questions I had which made me feel so comfortable and truly at home here. Thank you Devon and Hilton for making my trip that much more amazing and I can't wait to visit again!
Manager Response: Samantha!   Thank you so much for the wonderful review!  We're so glad you had a wonderful time and Devon was able to enhance your experience.  We think she's amazing too and we're so glad that she was able to make a difference.  Thank you so much and hope to see you again.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I'm still trying to find the benefit of being a Hilton Honors member. We've been members for several years. The Hilton Honors website lost my reservation with the low rate. SO I called their reservation number. I told them the website lost my reservation so they asked me for the confirmation number. I repeated the website lost my reservation, I don't have a confirmation number. They would not honor the rate I booked through their website. They charged me $23 per night more to get the same room. Then they charged $18 per night to park. I couldn't find a spot on the property to park and payed $18 per night for that. My profile shows my preference for low floor room. I was assigned a room on the 5th floor. More benefits. I usually receive 2000-3000 points per stay when I book
Manager Response: Tom,  Thank you for your feedback.  When booking a reservation, you should have received a confirmation email with all the details to your reservation.  Anything that is modified would also be notified to person on the reservation.  Being a HHonors member has many benefits and I'm sorry that it wasn't what you expected.  With your request for a low floor, we try our best to accommodate your request as provided during your past stays with us.  We'll try to do better next time so there is less frustration.  Please give us a call for your next reservation so we can make sure these hiccups don't happen again.  Thank you for being a loyal Hilton Honors member.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: When I stayed there with my 2 kids and husband... we got 2 queen beds kids were happy to get a bed instead of a sofa bed. Me and husband had an amazing time there bathroom as great too. Overall great experience.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review!  I'm so glad that we were able to accommodate your needs and have a great experience.  Please come back and visit us again!  Thank you!  Warmest Regards,

Summary Heading: One of the best and most enjoyable stays
Summary: One of the best Hotels we have stayed at in a long time.  Vincent at the Front Desk was amazing.  He went above and beyond and is one of the reasons we will be returning. Robert and Luis at the bar made us feel so comfortable that we stayed away the hotel and enjoyed the fun staff great food and yummy drinks. I really can't wait to return.
Manager Response: PNBishop19,  What a great review!  Thank you so much for recognizing Vincent, Robert and Luis!  We think they're pretty amazing and I'm so glad that they were able to make an impact on your stay.  We can't wait to have you back and thank you so much for the great review.   Warmest Regards,

Summary: Robert and Luis are the best bartenders ever!! They made our trip so much more enjoyable with their excellent customer service and great chats at the bar. The big cheese brulee was most excellent which was highly recommended by Robert
Manager Response: Jenny!  Thank you so much for the amazing review and for mentioning Robert and Luis!  They're pretty amazing and I'm so glad that they were able to enhance your experience with their service.  We think they're pretty amazing as well and I'm so glad you got to see that.  We can't wait to have you back and thank you again for the amazing review!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: I can hardly put into words the exemplary service my family received when Luis, Ascencion, and Robert helped us unwind from a less than spectacular day. Prompt and quick service all 3 were a treat to share our evening with! Devon and Evan seemed to enjoy the fact their names rhymed and it was nice to have a smooth check in. I will be sure to reccomend this location to all my associates!
Manager Response: DCMoney420,  Best Review Ever!  Thank you so much for your kind words for Luis, Ascencion, Robert, Evan and Devon!  We're lucky to have them be apart of this family and we're so glad that they were able to enhance your stay.  We can't wait to have you back and try to top your last stay.  Thank you again for the best review and we'll see you soon.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed for 3 days 2 nights this past weekend. The staff was one of the best I've seen so far. Check in was smooth and very fast, very very helpful. The best part of the stay was coming back every night to our room and it being spotless. The housekeeper INEZ did a phenomenal job with the cleaning of the room. I would definitely come back again.
Manager Response: Mr. Shaffer,  Thank you so much for the amazing review!  We thought you were pretty amazing as well!  Thank you so much for recognizing Inez in Housekeeping.  She was thrilled to hear that you made the effort to write a great review of her and we're so thrilled that your stay went well.  Please come and see us again soon.  Thank you!  Warmest Regards,

Summary: Enjoyed my stay here for the time. I believe it was Vincent who helped me out at the front desk, the whole staff made my stay more enjoyable. It is also located 10 minutes away from just about anything you’d want to see here in Irvine.
Manager Response: Sheen12345,  Thank you so much for the great review and recognition of Vincent and the entire staff.  I'm glad Vincent was able to leave a mark and also grateful that you took the time to give us this fantastic review!  Thank you so much and we hope to see you again soon.    Warmest Regards,

Summary: I want to put a shout out to MARY at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine.  I was stuck in CA on 4/10/19 due to a snow storm in CO.  I had nothing with me and I had just experienced on of the hardest things I have ever had to do as a parent.  She was so very KIND, listened to me bawl and bought me some Advil for my pounding headache.  She directed me to lunch, Walmart and dinner.  She was so kind to me when I was all alone and stuck in a different state.  Keep up the awesome hospitality and kindness Mary.
Manager Response: Dear 52796531,  We are so sorry to hear that you got stuck due to a snowstorm and are glad that Mary was there for you in your time of need.  Hopefully you are safe and back with your family now and do visit when back in this area.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Excellent Banquet space and friendly staff!
Summary: I am an athletics coach who has a LARGE roster.  We decided to host our banquet at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine.  What a GREAT decision it was!  Everyone from the sales staff, to the event planning team, to the day of staff were excellent!  We had a banquet with 200 people in attendance and everything went great!  The staff had our food prepared and hot when we wanted it and took care of all the little details!  I can't recommend this place enough!  If you have a large group and want a beautiful venue with even better people in central Orange County this is the spot!  Thanks Hilton Garden Inn!
Manager Response: Dear CoachIrvine,  Thank you for this amazing review and recap of your event.  Love the enthusiasm and do hope to see you back for your next tournament in the area.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: I've stayed at this location on a few occasions and like it due to the proximity of my work when I have to visit.  Usually the service and cleanliness are top notch with never an issue but on this occasion there were just a few issues that made it less than five.  First was the requested room service that I had made.  I was assured that someone would respond to clean my room but it was never attended to until the following day and the second was, all of the treadmills were out of service in the fitness center.  I was there for a week and this issue was never resolved.  I would still recommend the hotel but hope that this isn't a new trend.
Manager Response: Dear 1Germaican,   I do apologize that your room was not cleaned and that the treadmills were down.  We have addressed the same with the Houskeeping Manager and the engineer was waiting on parts for the treadmills and have since been fixed.  We do appreciate your loyalty.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel was very clean, comfortable, friendly and the food was really good. This price for food was a bit high if you didn’t have status, but that’s pretty normal. The rooms were really comfortable and had good amenities.
Manager Response: Dear 466marcieh,  We do thank you for your 5 star review.  Please do visit again.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: The location of this hotel in relation to the the airport was ideal.  In addition, the rooms and service, plus the options in regard to the food and bar was a great adder.  I would recommend this as a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Roam34435043574,  Thank you for taking the time to write a fantastic review.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: It seems this hotel is focused on business clientele as it is situated near the airport, but it served just fine for our family visit.  Hotel staff was pretty courteous and accommodating. First, we had two cars (and two rooms), so parking should have been $18 x 2, but they waived the parking charge for the second car. Second, we didn't realize we booked an accessible room by mistake, and they switched it for us despite informing us that we had booked a cheaper room class.  Otherwise the stay was just overall very pleasant - room was clean and quiet, and our stay was uneventful in a good way.
Manager Response: Dear SunnyCaliforniaDays,  Yes we do have a lot of business guests as well as families and thank you for an amazing review.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: My husband and I had an excellent stay at this hotel. It was extremely clean and very comfortable. Service was outstanding and Adrienne went out of her way to ensure that our stay was as good as could be.   Some noise could be heard from the adjoining room through the connecting door, but as that was in the living room area of our suite, it wasn't a big concern. Also, although the windows are triple glazed, because you are so close to traffic, some noise could be heard from outside as well.   But, this did not impact how much we enjoyed our stay and we are looking forward to a return visit.
Manager Response: Dear iasw2015,  Gratitude for an outstanding review.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: Staff at hotel is extremely polite and helpful. The facility was very clean. The front desk staff was very helpful finding us a location for dinner. Great bartender and a lovely outside area to relax. I will always stay here when I am in town.
Manager Response: Dear Judith H,  We are glad you had a lovely stay and that your experiences with our staff were amazing. We look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Hotel. Adrienne and Vincent were very welcoming and helpful with questions we had. It made our stay very pleasant. Luis was our waiter for dinner and he also was very professional. We recommend your stay at the hotel if you are looking a personal feeling.
Manager Response: Dear Xotil-50,  Thank you for mentioning our staff by name and for your fantastic review.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado.

Summary: The hotel is a good location for business since it near the airport and freeway. And mostly the beach. The property is clean and friendly. There is a restaurant on site. The room is very clean. At one time I call down to the front desk and the manager on duty respond right away.
Manager Response: Dear tonyyee21,  We do appreciate your review and enthusiasm.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Best Hotel Experience I have ever had
Summary: Hotel is in a convenient location in Orange County and the accommodations are newer, spotless, and well maintained. The staff sets this place apart though. They are the friendliest staff from front desk to maintenance. Stay here if you can.
Manager Response: Dear Discover66159592690,  We do appreciate the fantastic comments about our staff and the recommendations.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: Great beds. Clean room from counters to bathroom to microwave and mini fridge! Loved it!  Will be coming back for my 3rd trip! The staff at the front are courteous and very kind with helping you. Definitely recommend anyway in the Irvine area to check it out. Nightly deposit is 25 bucks parking is 18 which they take out of that! Can’t beat it!
Manager Response: Dear Paradise33323422332,  Thank you for your incredible and awesome review.  Much appreciated.  R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Enjoyable stay, close to John Wayne Airport
Summary: A new property in the center of a business park, close to Disneyland, Long Beach, and So Cal sightseeing. Nicely appointed, contemporary design, and a friendly staff make for an enjoyable stay. A  mini parkade allows for car storage although there is an $18 charge. An indoor/ outdoor pool (heated) sits on the second floor with open walls to the outside (regrettably, no hot tub). A small restaurant greets guests on the main floor with a friendly staff and sowm creative food offerings. Beds are comfortable and the room is well designed. An enjoyable stay!!
Manager Response: Dear 976briani,  Thank you very much for your lovely review and we do hope to see you on your next visit.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: Had to be in Irvine for a family member high school competition.   Even though I only live about an hour away, was easier to stay and not drive.  The hotel was very nice.  The check in was quick, professional,  and courteous.   Room was good, typical HGI.  I thought the breakfast was actually better than other HGIs I have been to. The service was very good.  The pool is enclosed on three sides, but open on one and feels better than a fully indoor pool.  The only thing I didn't like was they charge for parking, never had that at a HGI before. The lot is unsecured.  I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear BackSeatPilot,  Thank you for your assessment of our hotel and glad that you enjoyed your stay.  As an airport hotel we do charge for parking and are significantly lower that most hotels in our area.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: Spent a night here with the family. The staff was great and attentive. The location was easy to find and near plenty of restaurants, shopping and entertainment. Definitely a hotel we'll stay in next time.
Manager Response: Dear Culture19915578981,  So glad that the family and you had a wonderful time at our hotel.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great stay. Close to the airport
Summary: I had a great day at this hotel if it is very clean, here’s the really updated, and a great staff.    Surprisingly enough, as close as it was to the airport there were plenty of restaurants and activities nearby.  I would highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear dgordon6122,  Thank you for taking the time to write and give us a glowing review.  Much appreciated.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel was reasonably priced. It was quiet and away from all the action of the cute city of Irvine. Room was really clean and staff was very pleasant! The beds were very comfortable and the free shuttle to and from the airport was a huge bonus!
Manager Response: Dear danamW2084CK,  Thank you very much for a 5 star review.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Updated and true to Hiltin Garden Inn brand
Summary: Good for traveler needing to be close to airport. Great customer service especially Robert in hotel restaurant. Only gave four stars because given room key at check in but room not ready and was still being cleaned when I arrived outside the room and had to return to front desk to get another room assignment.
Manager Response: Dear CWorldTraveler,  Thank you for mentioning Robert in your review and sorry that your room and key was not ready upon check in.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: Excellent service from friendly cheerful staff. Accommodations were excellent (stayed in a suite) and perfectly clean. It is astonishing how quiet this hotel is considering its proximity to the airport and the freeway.
Manager Response: Dear Sherpa61872052007,  Very much appreciate the lovely comments and we do hope to see you on your next visit.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: Awesome hotel for a great price. Rooms clean and comfortable. Restaurant bar set up is great! Breakfast is expensive but good quality. Fitness area is decent. Flavored water is great! Check in staff friendly.
Manager Response: Dear daisydog313,  Thank you for taking the time to write a positive review.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: I stay at HGI every time I travel. I have never had a greeting like I received from Adrienne. Outstanding! Tucked away just a little bit off the beaten track, I found this to be a completely different HGI experience. Started with the amazing greeting, Although I have seen this architecture a 100 times, this location seem to shine like it was brand new, The room was everything I expect from HGI and I always feel home here. With its location close to John Wayne airport, the room was very quite.In the bar at 6:30 was a live musician. Never saw that before. This HGI is my new home when in the OC.
Manager Response: Dear xod442,  Gratitude for an amazing review and thank you for your loyalty.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: Newer hotel with clean rooms, friendly staff and a great location. Many restaurants and stores nearby. We were there for a volleyball tournament. The proximity to the venue was perfect for us. I would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear vegasrcp,  Thank you for a 5 star review.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: Adrienne is fantastic. She remembers everyone she checks in, asked for names of those she didn’t and greeted them by name as well. I hope to see her fast tracked to a GM position as she is absolutely fantastic.
Manager Response: Hello Navigator21988599986'  We appreciate the your lovely post on Trip Advisor.  Much appreciated.  R Dalgado

Summary: The room was very clean and precise. All towels were folded exactly, pillows stacked to perfection. They adjusted the room temperature to outside conditions. All lighting fixtures was properly placed. The food in their cafe was Outstanding with mild pricing in general.You must try a Hilton Garden Inn!
Manager Response: Dear Sajoranoll,  Thank you for a very positive review.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: Have enjoyed a genuine sense of hospitality from all members of the staff that I have met during each of my stays. I have stayed at different hotels in the area, but this I have found preferable in terms of being a good value, up-to-date, clean, comfortable, and conveniently located.
Manager Response: Dear Stephen R,  We appreciate the great feedback.  It's great to see that we were able to hit all of the key components of a great stay for you.  We hope to see you around some more!

Summary: Adrienne made me feel welcome everyday as she greeted me by my name everyday. Every hotel needs a  Adrienne working there cause she really knows how to make your stay enjoyable experience. I stayed in plenty of hotels due to business travel and this one I had wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Dear Enitra E,  We appreciate your review.  We pride ourselves in service and would agree that every hotel needs an Adrienne and that is why we are happy to have her on our team.  We hope that you'll return whenever you're in the area so that you're able to enjoy a wonderful experience again!

Summary Heading: Business Meeting Rented Executive Board Room
Summary: Thank you Aloha and team! This was a great experience and the meeting space was perfect!  I rented the properties Executive Board room for a meeting between my CFO SVP and the key owners of a vendor we work with.  Room was ready ahead of time, staff was very attentive and helpful and the reservation and booking was simple and easy. Flew into SNA, had the meeting, stayed the night, and flew out very convenient and easy all in one property!
Manager Response: Dear devine307,  Thank you for the great feedback!  We're happy to see that you were able to enjoy the meeting space and the services as I definitely believe that Aloha and her team do a great job as well.  We hope to see you again in the future and hopefully it won't be as short of trip next time!

Summary Heading: Friendly Helpful Staff & Management -- Throw in Efficient!
Summary: I flew in late (9:45 pm) with Delta from Atlanta and called the Hotel for a pickup. Adrienne answered and sent someone over right away -- even though the shuttle service stops at 9:30!  I was surprised that Devon, the Hotel Manager was the driver and made a special trip just for me. Wow! -- My "ex" wouldn't even do that... lol She also treated me with great respect and courtesy -- not to mention a great conversation on the way back to the Hotel. The check-in process was then expedited by Adrienne who had all my info and knew how to use it! The room was great and I had a good night's rest -- with no issues! Yay!!!
Manager Response: Dear David G,  We appreciate the great feedback.  Flights from Atlanta can be tiring and am happy to see that Adrienne and Devon were able to make your stay feel great!  And that's why we love having them around instead of having them as an "ex".  Thank you again and hope to see you if you're ever in the area again!

Summary: Hotel life can be lonely, but at this Hilton, I was surrounded by friendly, warm hearted people. Luis was my bartender/server each night. After a long day of work, I looked forward to the welcoming smile and attentive service of Luis. The shuttle bus drivers were engaging and the desk staff was very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear away4MhoM,  Thank you for the great review.  We are happy to see that you were able to enjoy your stay and utilized our shuttles.  Even more, elated that Luis was able to make your stay with us warm and welcoming as traveling on the road can definitely be exhausting.

Summary: We had a wonderful time. The front desk was excellent at meeting our needs. We had a group of 16 people and we had no issues at all. The rooms were clean and so was the hotel itself. When I needed something the staff was right on it.
Manager Response: Dear trav2408,  Thank you for the great feedback.  We are excited to see that we were able to accommodate your whole group and that our cleanliness met your standards.  Thank you again and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Had a one night stay near Irvine and this hotel was the perfect spot. I got in mid afternoon got checked in quickly and came downstairs to try the food and grab a drink. The bartender Luis was very helpful on some tips on his favorites on the menu. Was very pleased with his service!
Manager Response: Dear Maximus_mar,  Thank you for the great review.  Excited to see that you were able to enjoy your stay and definitely agree that Luis does an excellent job.  Hope to see you again if you return to the area!

Summary: Great place and friendly staff. The breakfast was so good and the staff were exceptional.  All the space was such a nice place to just spend time with others. The location was nice and quiet and relaxing.
Manager Response: Dear taricani13,  Thank you for the feedback.  We're happy to see that you were able to enjoy your stay and hope to see you again if you return to the area!

Summary: The customer service was incredible!  The warmth of the hotel staff was so welcoming and our stay was full of moments where they went above and beyond to ensure that we were comfortable and enjoying our time.  The staff is friendly and attentive.  Adrienne, thank you for your encouragement and care!  Highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Lizzybain,  We appreciate the feedback.  I'm elated to see that you were able to experience our customer service and it was executed above and beyond your expectations!  We will pass the kudos along to Adrienne and hope to see you when you return to the area!

Summary: We came for a swim competition at the Woollett Jr Aquatics Center nearby. The hotel was conveniently located near the pool and airport. We chose it for the price and the breakfast since we needed economy and efficiency traveling with the team. We were more than pleasantly surprised by this great hotel. The staff, especially Adrienne, was great and the hotel was as nice as my expensive hotel in Hawaii with upscale rooms and lobby! Definitely will be back and highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear cmdmd1998,  Thank you for the feedback.  We appreciate the commendations and will definitely let Adrienne know that she is doing a great job.  Looking forward to your next trip out to our area!

Summary Heading: I feel like I'm at home, not at a hotel.
Summary: I travel quite a bit for work and I always stay at Hilton hotels. This is the first time that a stay has felt more like I am staying at a "home" than away at a hotel. The staff here has become my extended family  Adrienne at the front desk has greeted me with a smile on her face every single day. She knows my name and even went out of her way to accommodate me when my luggage didn't arrive on time.   Robert at the bar has turned into one of my good friends out here in CA. He has truly gotten to know me on a personal level. I come 'home' from work every day and he will serve me a drink. We chat about my work day and he will give me some very good life advice. He provides such a welcoming atmosphere; not just for me, but for all Hilton guests! There is a reason that everyone in
Manager Response: Dear Fede_Vato,  Thank you for the great feedback.  It's awesome to see multiple names mentioned and will agree that Adrienne and Robert make for a great experience.  After having to travel so much for work, we take great pride knowing that we were able to separate ourselves from the rest.  We look forward to your next stay!

Summary: This HGI is one of my new favorites.  This is my second time here on business and I will stay here again when in town.  Nicely appointed rooms, upgraded bathrooms and great service all provide for a great stay.   I arrived late last night after the last airport shuttle and Devon from the front desk jumped in a van to pick me up.  Great service oriented attitude!  She was also very welcoming when I stayed here last month.  Reanna in the restaurant also remembered me this morning while I was having a great breakfast.  All in all this is one of my favorite HGI properties and I stay in many of them all around the country.  This is my third hotel this week so its great to end the week at a well run and very friendly hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Sean H,  Thank you for the great feedback!  I would agree that Reanna and Devon do an awesome job when it comes to service!  And am happy to see that their service attitude has allowed us to be one of your favorites within your favorite brand.  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We recently hosted a business training meeting with 40 participants and the hotel proved to be an ideal venue. The catering staff were responsive in real time with any requests. The food was certainly very good quality and the room was very spacious.
Manager Response: Dear 947jeffreyl,  Thank you for the great feedback.  I am glad to see that we are both fans of our catering team and am glad that they were able to service your needs.  Thank you again and hope to serve you again soon!

Summary: I am presently staying at this hotel. I usually stay at a nearby property but the website for this location looked good. Look are deceiving. Service wasn’t even attempted in my room until I returned after 4pm today. Thought it was going to be a nice, quiet business location but I couldn’t have been more wrong. Was given an “upgrade” to the 2nd floor over the parking garage as a a Diamond member. Now there are a group of cheerleaders or something in the hall outside my room.   Went down for breakfast yesterday and even though I had told the front desk I’d opt for breakfast vs points, they had it wrong. Today, there wasn’t even anyone there to help.   Now the cable is out.   Never again. What a mistake. Back to a Marriott any Marriott
Manager Response: Dear wordrick,  Thank you for taking time out of your day to give us feedback.  We value your loyalty as a Diamond member and will be speaking with the team in regard to your opting for breakfast to ensure it doesn't happen again in the future.  We hope to retain your loyalty before switching to a different brand so please reach out to us if you're in the area.

Summary Heading: The worst experions of my life.
