Summary: It was very unpleasant please very unprofessional. I will never i my life stay here. They lie to me at the room service and over the phone when I was trying to book the room. Lie to be about the charge or the room loude nocies coming out of the  refrigerator.
Manager Response: Dear GoPlaces20322570330,  We appreciate you taking time out of your day to give us feedback but apologize that you weren't able to enjoy your stay.  We will be looking into your concerns to ensure that these are not recurring problems.

Summary: I’ve stayed at several Hilton properties flying into Santa Ana/Orange Co. airport and always felt valued as a Hilton Honors Diamond member. I decided to try a newer property, closer to the airport and found the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine/Airport.   While the hotel is fresh and newer, the walls between rooms are thin. I had difficulty getting to sleep because I could hear the tv or people talking nearby. No airport or traffic noise however.   The front desk could use some customer service training! Other than Devon, who also drove my shuttle from the airport, the rest of the staff were not cordial or friendly.  When I requested something as a Diamond member, all I heard was, We’re at capacity”.  So you’re telling me all the other people registered are Diamond level & beat me to a
Manager Response: Dear EnjoyLuncher,  We thank you for your time and giving us feedback.  Devon is definitely a rockstar but we believe that we should be able to offer that wholly as a staff and it seems we fell short of that.  I apologize that the experience has  deterred you away from the property but would love for you to give us a second chance so please feel free to reach out to me directly if you're in the area again.

Summary: We were welcomed by Adrienne at the front desk.  Her warm smile and service made us feel comforted. The room was perfect for us.  we enjoyed the sink in the room for making drinks and coffee.  The room was large with a comfortable sitting chair by the window.  The beds were comfortable and the TV positioned so both beds could easily watch.  It was a rainy weekend, so we enjoyed the indoor car park. The fee for parking was reasonable at $18.  We didn't eat because we were busy with a conference somewhere else.  But I was disappointed with the breakfast, since buffet at $16.99 was the only option.  Just wanted some oatmeal that early in the morning. Our bill was accurate. Adrienne was very friendly as we left for home.   Thank you Hilton, you never disappoint.
Manager Response: Dear Line555,  Thank you for the detailed feedback.  We are happy to see that you were able to have a comfortable stay while enjoying drinks and coffee.  Just in case you weren't aware but the breakfast buffet cost also includes cooked to order items such as French toast, omelets and other breakfast items.  We apologize if that wasn't clearly communicated to you but would love for you to enjoy the full aspect of our breakfast if you're ever in the area again!

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay. Room was beautiful, comfortable and clean. Service was great and shuttle from the airport was so convenient. Devon was awesome! she picked me up at the airport and was very friendly! staff catered to me once we arrived at the hotel until check out. I will definitely return and recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Yoli1463,  Thank you for giving us feedback.  We proud ourselves on service and am glad that Devon was able to show that to you with the airport shuttle.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: Stayed here the night before a super early flight out of John Wayne. Clean and quiet even though it’s close to the airport. In the morning the shuttle driver was late, so the desk clerk drove the shuttle herself. Great service!!!
Manager Response: Dear LuckyMommyTraveler,  Thank you for giving us feedback.  It's great to hear that you were able to get some rest before the super early flight (It's a bonus as we have triple paned windows and are out of the flight paths to minimize noise).  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The hotel was in a good location, and the service was with a smile.  Great breakfast and they brought me whatever I needed to the room.  There was a good fitness center, and also a free conference room with a fireplace to go through our presentation.
Manager Response: Dear Nomad66909032094,  We appreciate your feedback and am happy to hear that you were able to enjoy not only your stay but your presentation as well!  We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The room was awesome, the staff was excellent but the price they charge for parking ($18.00) a day was ridiculous!!  I think more hotels today should have a microwave and a fridge in the room, this was a good and unexpected perk.
Manager Response: Dear philbka1,  Thank you for your feedback.  We're glad that you enjoyed the stay outside of the parking but we do our best to remain competitive for the airport area.  We hope this doesn't stray you away from staying with us again and hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Has what you need while surrounded by corporate buildings.
Summary: Even though it might seem it is an island, the amenities they offer make it a one stop shop. The breakfast has a lot of healthy and tasty options. Great cooks keep them in the running when choosing a place to dine.
Manager Response: Dear Carl E,  Thank you for taking time to submit feedback.  We're happy to hear that you were able to enjoy the hotel and the restaurant as well.  While we love for you to dine with us, we are in a great business park area that has a large amount of food options as well within a mile radius so stop by the desk the next time you're in the area.  Hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Amazing staff, clean and comfortable smaller hotel
Summary: This is a clean, comfortable, well laid out hotel.  The biggest standout was the staff, they were incredibly friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. This place really has service nailed. The breakfast was bundled into our team stay, but I would pay for it if it hadn't been because of the quality, selection and convenience of a solid full breakfast right downstairs.  Would recommend
Manager Response: Dear Carolyn921,  We appreciate the great comments!  It might have been in error but if there was anything that could've been improved to increase the overall rating we would appreciate the feedback.  Hope to see you and the team again in the future!

Summary: Stayed one night to catch a flight out of John Wayne airport next morning and chose this hotel for free shuttle and reasonable price.  Was pleasantly surprised at the professionalism and friendliness, thanks for your helpfulness (got to check in a little early) and kindness.
Manager Response: Dear Curiosity648259,  Thank you for your feedback and we are happy to see that you were able to enjoy your stay!  We look forward to serving you again in the future.

Summary: Not sure why there is a parking charge here. As compared to other Hilton properties, parking should be free, just my opinion. Large bar and restaurant. Staff super nice and accommodating, workout room clean and had several machines, weights.  Pool is covered but pretty chilly, no spa unfortunately. The pretty pavilion that is featured online, was not available. It’s off of the conference rooms, maybe they could be opened at request, who knows.  Bring headphones because kids are SUPER noisy in the public areas! I hollered at a couple of them @11pm I think their parents were at the bar downstairs... Bfast is extra, another bummer.  I enjoy Hilton property so I might stay here again in summer, so the pool isn’t frigid.
Manager Response: Dear rusty_fwg,  We appreciate you taking the time to give us feedback.  We want to do our best to ensure that there are parking spaces available for our guests and try to remain competitive in parking rates for the airport area.    We're glad to hear that you enjoyed the property overall and would love for you to join us in the summer.  The partial open air pool is perfect (usually is year round but we had an unfortunate cold spell this winter) and we do have another pavilion area right outside of our lounge on the first floor with its own water feature.  Reach out to us when you come next and we'd be happy to show you!

Summary: We were welcomed immediately by the awesome lady at the reception, Adrienne, she deserves 5 stars alone for her service. We checked in several minutes early and she made sure we were accommodated without hassle. Adrienne always asked if our stay was comfortable and if we needed anything when we passed by the front desk.
Manager Response: Dear caobone,  We appreciate your feedback and definitely agree with the thoughts of Adrienne!  We're happy to hear that she was able to make your stay memorable.  Hope to see you in the future!

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a business meeting
Summary: I recently hosted a meeting at this property for approx. 25 people.  We used the Orchid meeting room which had a fantastic set up.  The room was spacious and had it's own private area outside of the actual meeting room for breaks and meals that also included private bathrooms.    Francisco was assigned to our meeting and made sure everything was on time and ran smoothly.  He was super to work with.   The hotel is conveniently located right near SNA and it was very easy for our group to get to and from the airport.   Overall a 5 Star rating for this hotel and our experience.
Manager Response: Dear 249krisk,  We're glad to see that you were able to host your meeting with us and that our catering team were able to tend to your needs.  We believe that Francisco is super to work with as well!  Thank you again and hope to host you and your attendees again.

Summary Heading: The BEST hotel in Irvine if you want quality for business or pleasure.
Summary: There are not enough great things to say about the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine. From check-in to check-out, our stay was amazing. This was my second stay here and I had to write a review about how wonderful this hotel was. When we first arrived we entered the lobby which was nicely decorated, spotless, and smelled amazing, a very welcoming experience. I was greeted at the front desk by an associate and the manager who remembered us from the month before. We had some small talk and the staff interacted with all three of my girls (my three year old, and a set of twins who are a year and a half) and showed to genuinely care for them. They automatically asked me if I needed anything for the kids, I mentioned that I would like two pack and play’s to sleep in, and extra pillows and
Manager Response: Dear Mistermodern,  On behalf of the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine, I wanted to thank you for not only the kind feedback but of the whole experience you were able to have.  It's awesome that you were able to enjoy the services rendered by all of our staff with the family.  While it is for work and isn't the same as travelling with family, we are excited to see you on your return in June!

Summary: We began staying here a month and a half ago as I come to town on business every couple of weeks....historically we always stayed at the Embassy Suites on Main but decided to try this facility.  The staff is very friendly and the rooms are well appointed and clean .... I find it a little overly expensive for what you get, especially when they add $18 a night for parking....there are certainly lower priced opportunities but they are nice rooms.
Manager Response: Dear davefoshee,  We very much appreciate the feedback and are glad that you are giving us a chance to break away from the norm.  A little saddened that you find the value to be under what's expected but would love to chat some more.  Please feel free to reach out to me directly at Vincent.yi@hilton.com.  Thank you again and have a wonderful day!

Summary Heading: No heat and bad service by Anthony
Summary: Horrible rain and cold and stayed here for daughters waterpolo event only to come back to a room with no heat . When I called the front desk I spoke to Anthony who said maintenance was fixing something it should only be 10 minutes and asked  if I wanted a space heater . I told him no thanks if it’s only going to be 10 minutes that was fine . Well over and hour and 20 min pass and I call down again only to be told I was rude for asking
Manager Response: Dear C1747WYtinas,  It definitely can be uncomfortable trying to get rest in a cold room; especially with the odd cold temperatures that we have been experiencing in Orange County.  I truly believe there might have been a misunderstanding with Anthony as he always attempts to do whatever he can for the guest.  We apologize as you didn't feel that was the case but hope that you will give us a second chance to serve you in the future.  Thank you for the feedback and hope that you have wonderful day!

Summary: Devon and Anthony were very accommodating and a pleasure to talk with.  I was in town on short notice for meetings and walked into the lobby without a reservation .  Devon and Anthony were very welcoming and went above and beyond to locate an available room for me.  I travel frequently for business and sincerely appreciate going above and beyond in order to provide an exceptional client experience.  Devon and Anthony provided an exceptionally high level of customer service. They found me a room in a hotel that was showing booked online.  I'm not someone who frequently writes reviews but I wanted to share my experience and give credit where it is deserved.  Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear Michael M,  It's reviews like these that make me love this industry and am elated that Devon and Anthony were able to assist you find a room in a very busy area.  We hope that you'll be able to enjoy our hotel for your next visit to Irvine!  Thank you for the feedback and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Hilton is always an enjoyable stay but at this particular hotel Adrienne excelled. She went out of her way to remember our correct names and made a point to say hello and ask how our day was every day of our stay
Manager Response: Dear Gina M,  Thank you for the feedback.  Adrienne definitely does an awesome job with guests and am glad to see that you were able to enjoy her company while staying with us!  Thank you again and hope you have a wonderful day!

Summary: We only stayed one night here, but loved it! If you have to be by the airport, this is where you want to stay. Everything is very clean, nicely decorated and the rooms were great with comfy beds! The front desk staff are awesome and personal. My favorite is Adrienne! She and I bonded fast and made what would be a normal boring night, very fun with lots of laughs. Everyone is professional and personable!
Manager Response: Dear NicoleWaugh,  It's awesome to see that you were able to enjoy such a short stay.  I will let the staff know that they did a wonderful job; especially Adrienne!    Thank you for the feedback and hope you have a wonderful day!

Summary: We throughly enjoyed our stay at the Hilton Garden Inn.  The building, interiors, guest rooms, and grounds were very nice.  The staff was wonderful.  I would happily stay there again and recommend it to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear Robert C,  We thank you for your kind feedback and will let our operations team that their job well done is not going unnoticed!  We appreciate the recommendations and hope you have a wonderful day.

Summary: We often are quick to report when something is just “not right”, well this is not one of those. This is reporting what is just OVER THE TOP GREAT - Thank you Norma for your patience as you waited for me to vacate my room in the middle of the day and to my very pleasant surprise, I not only found a very clean room, something expected, but you arranged my bathroom essentials in a manner that I have never seen, but hope to again in the future - THANK YOU. It may seem to the non-traveling reader as a little thing, but it is all about the little things that add up to GREATNESS and Norma that is my definition for you - GREATNESS.
Manager Response: Dear T T,  Thank you for the feedback and am excited to see that Norma was able to offer that next level of service for you!  We will pass on the commendations and hope to serve you again in the future!

Summary: We had a really great stay for 5-nights in the spacious 1 King 1 Bedroom suite with a fold-out couch, which was so perfect and such a nice set-up for us and our two boys.  There was SO much space in our room for our boys to play. It is probably the largest hotel room we've ever stayed in.  The master bed was comfortable.  We were very pleasantly surprised to find out that this room type has 2 bathrooms (we don't recall the online photos and description mentioning this). The master bathroom was SO nice with a separate tub and shower and plenty of space.  The small kitchenette with sink was a nice perk although we only ended up using it once to cook some food.   When we made our reservations, we pre-paid for the breakfasts for each day for the 4 of us, and that was an incredible
Manager Response: Dear mtnhappy,  Thank you for the detailed feedback and we're happy to hear that you and the family were able to enjoy your stay!  We will definitely speak to the staff to see where the communication errors were so that we can be better trained and prepared for your next stay!  We look forward to serving you again and hope you have a wonderful day!

Summary: Very nice place  everything well appointed lots of space around the breakfast buffet in the morning very comfortable beds we were very  Happy staff were friendly And the food for breakfast was decent there were no cooks on the 1st morning because of a medical emergency which left pretty much carbohydrates for breakfast so we had to go out for breakfast on the 1st day as I am a diabetic hopefully they will adjust the price accordingly
Manager Response: Dear nielsh928,  We are glad to hear that you were able to enjoy your stay but apologize for the staffing issues for our breakfast.  This definitely is not of the norm and hope that you give us a second chance when you return to the area.  Please reach out to me directly at Vincent.yi@hilton.com to further discuss the first morning.

Summary: Check-in was slow and the reason was that one computer was down.  Room was clean but other than the essentials not much other stuff.  I had dinner and breakfast at the hotel.  The food was so so and overpriced so I do not recommend eat in the hotel.  You have to pay $20 if you have a car.
Manager Response: Dear Vei C,  We want to apologize for the downed computer as waiting to check-in after a long travel/work day definitely doesn't aid the exhaustion.  We do try to keep our parking rates competitive for the area at $18/night and hope that you will allow us a second chance to better serve you.  Thank you again for the feedback and have a wonderful day!

Summary: Location, Service, Staff, Food, all very good.   In my opinion, the hotel rooms are in need of a refresh. Traveling and staying in a different hotel weekly, my first choice is always Hilton as there is a level of commonality between locations.  The hotel at 7 Hutton Center Dr, Santa Ana has an excellent staff that emulates a level of care for the guest.  However, in my opinion, the hotel is in need of a refresh to the rooms.  The staff has been the reason for my returns, but the room refresh may cause me to choose elsewhere next time.
Manager Response: Dear Steven C,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your honesty as we look for reviews to provide insight and constructive feedback regarding our hotel’s service and amenities to better our guest experience. We welcome any additional comments or suggestions you would like to share. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again.

Summary: Adrienne was the best. She greeted me every time she saw me by name and even remembered my name and room number days later. I was a more needy guest than usual but she took care of everything with a smile. I wound recommend this hotel.  When you come be sure to say hi to Adrienne- I promise she will greet you with a smile.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer S,  I'm elated to hear that Adrienne was able to assist you during your stay and I will definitely have to agree that she will greet anybody with a smile.  Thank you for the wonderful feedback and let us know when you're back in the area!

Summary: Robert took care of me at the bar. Great service. Sara kept the room immaculate  great stsff😊😊 I would highly suggest you stay here and have a wonderful experience! Close to SNA airport.  Convinent to Restaurant and shopping
Manager Response: Dear latonfl,  Thank you for this wonderful review and mentioning our housekeeper by name. Sara does take great pride in her rooms and so does Robert at the bar.  Thank you for recommending us and we do hope to se you again.  Happy New Year  Sincerely,

Summary: The room and staff were okay, but we made the 250 mile trip with our six-year-old who was looking forward to the indoor pool, which was annnounce, by paper on the doorway, "Closed until further notice" after we checked in.
Manager Response: Dear Robert H,  Glad that you liked the room and our staff. I do apologize that the pool was closed as we had to do some work on it.  It is back open and do hope that you try us again.  Sincerely,

Summary: Hotel was super clean new & elegant!! Staff was friendly & very welcoming!! But I am especially grateful for manager Evan Smith...he made our stay extra special!! Such a kind man, he went above & beyond to make sure our stay was great!! I will definitely be using this hotel again!! An also there breakfast is crazy good!! An service employee Humberto was so helpful during breakfast!! Thanks again!!
Manager Response: Dear Snow3302,  We are happy Evan was able to make your stay extra special. Also excited that you loved the breakfast and Humberto stood out with his services.  Please visit again.  Sincerely,

Summary: One of the best trips I’ve had in a long time. Spent Christmas Eve here and then stayed another four nights. The staff is the best. All the rooms were clean and comfortable. Will come back here again.
Manager Response: Dear Cruiser46026514977,  We are very pleased that you spent Christmas with us and enjoyed your time here.  Thank you for taking the time to write this fabulous review.  Sincerely,

Summary: Save your money and go stay at the best western for 50 bucks less and get free parking. The staff is absolutely horrible and rude. The front desk lied telling me that there were no suites available when the Hilton website as well as other websites showed that there were suites available, The staff was unwilling to allow us to upgrade to a suite, mentioning they were completely booked, as odd as that sounds because the parking lot was empty.   Hilton Honors doesnt mean anything to them if they allow you to check out 45 minutes after check in.  The manager didnt even ask me why, he gave an impression that he was not concerned about my issues he actually sat there and did not offer any solutions at all.  I asked him whether or not he was curious why we were leaving he said " Well
Manager Response: Dear NorthStar27312865695,  Thank you for your review of your past stay with us. We always appreciate hearing from our guests - including areas where we haven’t met our guests’ expectations. Our apologies that we let you down. Our front desk department goes through a lengthy process each day to ensure that our guests' requests are met, however, occasionally we are unable due to a variety of factors. Once again, we apologize for the inconvenience and do hope that the next time you travel to the area you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: Really great place to stay, new rooms, Big TV, great bathrooms and quiet! Staff really nice and the food at breakfast and dinner was really good quality for the price. Parking not an issue despite a charge, Suggest use the shuttle to and from the airport
Manager Response: Dear Paul G,  Thank you for your 5 star review and glad that you liked our F&B offerings and our staff.  Have a wonderful New Year.  Sincerely,

Summary: We stayed for 1 night and our room was clean and quiet. When we checked in we were greeted by Adrianne who was amazing. She was prompt, courteous, and absolutely hilarious. Would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear bethsD676,  Thank you for the shout out to Adrianne and for wanting to recommend us.  Happy New Year and safe travels.  Sincerely,

Summary: We had our holiday party at the Hilton Garden Inn in Irvine. We use this hotel to put up most of our traveling staff and nothing but praise for the customer service here. We just had our Holiday party here and the level of service we got was beyond amazing! Britney, Aloha and CJ are a pleasure to deal with. They are caring and super accommodating. This hotel is so clean, and it shows that everyone that works here is happy. It smells great and the meeting rooms are easily accessible. Our holiday party was a hit and the decor was gorgeous! Thank you everyone who helped!
Manager Response: Dear Ai10,  Thank you for posting this superb review. We are glad that our team was able to take care of all your needs and make your event a success.  We do hope to see you again next holidays for your repeat business.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: 2-week visit while spouse recovering from surgery at local hospital
Summary: This hotel is excellent, and Luis D, Bartender and server in the restaurant, is outstanding!  He delivered awesome customer service and dining experience!  All staff were professional and courteous.  Breakfast staff are the best I have seen, and I have stayed in dozens of HGI properties.  Dinner menu is excellent.  Housekeeping are efficienct and on top of everything.  This hotel is the best!
Manager Response: Dear LivLivingtheLife,  So wonderful to see a lovely comment as yours. The whole F&B team will be delighted.  Thank you and glad you had a fabulous stay.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel, excellent staff, delicious food!!
Summary: From the moment we checked in with Adrienne we knew our stay was going to be perfect.  She went above and beyond to welcome us.  And hours later when I walked by the front desk she called me by name and asked if there was anything I needed.  She'd probably checked in dozens more people since us, and she remembered my name! That's good customer service!!  And the wait staff in the restaurant were equally friendly and accommodating.  We just hope to have a reason to be back in the area so we can stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear kseay2015,  Thank you for your wonderful comments and for mentioning Adrienne by name.  We hope that you are back in the area as well.  Safe travels.

Summary: Stayed here for a nephew's wedding and was extremely happy with everyone who helped me beyond the fee to pay for parking I have no complaints everyone mentioned are an excellemt example of the company
Manager Response: Dear Jet18639338147,  We are ecstatic that Rocky's wedding extravaganza went well.  Hope to see you again.  Sincerely,

Summary: A Hotel that provides quality rooms with all the amenities at affordable rates. Plus there’s an on-site Bar and Restaurant where all 3 meals can be ordered. Alas, there’s no free breakfast. Yet with all that is offered including the added bonus that it is livelier than many chains you might not miss it!
Manager Response: Dear Michele,  We do appreciate your feedback and glad you were able to order meals.  Please visit again.  Sincerely

Summary Heading: Great stay at HGI by SNA
Summary: I had a fantastic stay here. The staff members, especially Anthony, were wonderful. Romeo, Rhianna, Adrienne and Tracy all went the extra mile to make our stay great! It is a very nice hotel with a great breakfast and close to many restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Emilyilana,  It was very sweet of you to mention all our team members in your glowing review.  We do appreciate the kind words and do look forward to you visiting in the future.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: The woman who checked us in (Adrienne) was SUPER friendly and helpful.  She always had a smile on her face and seemed genuinely interested in our satisfaction and taking care of us as guests.  She went out of her way to make sure we were happy.  She handled a couple of minor request perfectly, and really was one of the best hotel employees we have interacted with anywhere.  She really made our simple one night stay extraordinary.  The rooms were clean and in good condition.  The breakfast was good.  Our only negative comment was that the breakfast service staff seemed a bit un-interested or reserved.  We never got a refill on our coffee, and they didn't pick up any plates or check on us.  I know it is a buffet, but a small amount of service there would have gone a long way.
Manager Response: Dear mikekA9422DU,  Much gratitude with your lovely post and highlighting Adrienne. She will be thrilled to see her name in print.  Safe travels.  Ronnie D

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, had to pay to park
Summary: I  have stayed at a few Garden Inns and have never had to pay for parking.  This location charges $15 for parking which is ridiculous.  The lobby is modern but the dining area is cramped and the buffet is small and cramped,  it got busy and people had to stand and eat their food because there was not enough seating.  The hotel is a little tricky to find as it is on a side street.  I had to use GPS to find it both days we stayed there.  The rooms are clean, modern and even though the hotel is next to the 405 freeway you can't hear it.  The hotel is less than 5 minutes from the airport as well.
Manager Response: Dear David D,  Thank you for staying with us and for your post. yes we do charge for parking and I am sorry that the breakfast area was busy when you went to the restaurant.  Our windows are quadruple paned and block out all noise and one does not realize we are so close to the freeway.  We do hope you try us again in the future.  Sincerely,  Ronnie D

Summary: Honestly, I was having a really great time here! The staff was friendly, the bartender was great, the food was delicious! Getting to the hotel was a bit weird, but nothing unexpected for a hotel that is close to the airport. But upon check-out, something was off with my bill. I talked to the front desk staff about it, but it still didn't seem right. I asked for a duty manager or someone else to maybe sort it out. The A-GM walked out with an arrogant/tired/annoyed look on his face. Instead of trying to understand what I'm saying, he just looked tired and annoyed and said "that is what it is"...   I was here July 2017, so let's hope the staff changed. Not a good thing if I still remember this encounter after 1+ years.
Manager Response: Hello Ina K,  Thank you for your review. Just so that I am clear, you had an issue with your bill in July 2017 and just posted this review? Please do call me or any hotel GM that you visit in the future, so that we may assist in rectifying the issue. We do not have an AGM and I am concerned that this may not be our hotel. Please feel free to reach out to me. Sincerely, R Dalgado GM 9496568700

Summary Heading: Clean like new and smells and looks great!
Summary: The beds were super comfy. It was very quiet. There was a bar and food down stairs. The pool was a nice touch it was cover with an open patio. The check out time was perfect.  We had no complaints, we will definitely look to say here again.
Manager Response: Dear Culture60977715962,  We do appreciate your 5 star review and all the lovely things you had to say.  Do visit again.  Sincerely,  Ronnie D

Summary: The hotel doesn't recognize Diamond status, no offerings.  All other aspects were great.  The hotel was clean with the exception of the refrigerator which had half eaten food from the previous guest.  The late checkout is only offered until 1 pm, anything additional is charged.
Manager Response: Dear TraveltipKIT,  Thank you for pointing out where we can improve and apologize for your refrigerator not being cleaned.  Please do visit again.  Sincerely,  Ronnie D

Summary: I have had a business project at the University and this has been my goto hotel. It is close to the airport and the University. There is a charge for parking, but if you are lucky you can park in the garage to avoid the heat. There is also outdoor parking. The price for the hotel even with parking is still cheaper than other hotels in the vicinity. I have only had one negative experience with the registration desk. I am just chalking it up to her having a bad day. Normally the staff is very friendly. There is a restaurant which serves breakfast (free depending on your Hilton Honor Status) and dinner. The food and service is good. The hotel roooms are roomy and include a mini-fridge and microwave. The beds are comfy.
Manager Response: Dear CORedTraveler,  Thank you for choosing our hotel to be your home away from home.  Glad that almost everything was okay with your stay and if there is anything specific you wish to share with me I can be reached at 949 6568700  We look forward to seeing you back on your next project.  Sincerely,  Ronnie D

Summary: Just 5 mins from the airport but you won’t hear any airport noise. Located in a business area so you won’t be able to walk to restaurants or shopping. They charge $15 for parking. Price was reasonable and I had no complaints during the stay. Will return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice location. I had a suite and it was very spacious, clean, and comfortable. Loved the separate shower and soaking tub. Everyone I dealt with was very friendly and accommodating. The breakfast was okay, but pricey for typical small buffet fare.
Manager Response: Dear B4387SZmichaelg,  Thank you for a fantastic review.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed at this wonderful hotel this weekend and was pleasantly surprised. The lobby smelled great, the staff was super friendly and the rooms were spacious and emaculently cleaned. Was there during a wedding reception...I thought about crashing because everyone seemed to be having such a good time! I didn’t by the way. I will return and recommend.  Good job!
Manager Response: Dear freejurnee,   We appreciate the thumbs up review.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: Was looking for a one night stay in the OC/Irvine area. Wanted something affordable but that would also offer a pleasant experience. Booking.com offered a deal for a single Hilton room with King Bed and I'm glad I took it. Clean, beautiful room and shower, friendly staff, nice large T.V., plenty of towels (the room even comes with a Keurig and a bunch of coffee packets).Would definitely recommend/stay again.
Manager Response: Dear  wilsonmuzhuthettu,  Thank you for wanting to recommend us and so glad that everything went well with your stay. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel was very clean and seemed to be a newer property.  We didn't take advantage of all the amenities, but the property seemed to be very well equipped and perfect for any business travel.  However I am docking some points due to my specific experience.  I had a 2 night reservation and I requested a quiet room.  I was checked into a room that was right across from one of their meeting rooms.  The next morning around 7:30 am we were awaken due to loud talking/commotion right outside our room.  There was some sort of convention going on in the morning.  I would expect that someone who is requesting a "quiet room", that they would specifically refrain from putting that person right across from a meeting space that has a meeting early the next morning.  Keep in mind, this was
Manager Response: Dear brewsk79, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I do apologize as the room you had was next to an event and that they were loud. Please come and try us again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Excellent service, amazing place to do a business seminar <3
Summary: We had two dinner meetings this year and each one was a huge success, in part due to the banquet team at the hotel.  Aloha and C.J. were a great help booking and detailing the dinners and the banquet staff (Francisco, Anibal, Hector, and Otho) were amazing and very attentive. I did not have to worry about anything. This allowed me to be able to focus on the dinner meetings.  The food was delicious!  The Orchid Ballroom was perfect for our 40-50 people dinners and has a private foyer with restrooms and a private patio to enjoy our cocktails. I would highly recommend this location for future meetings or events.  It was close to the airport, Irvine offices, freeways, and everything was great from start to finish.
Manager Response: Dear JutkaT3, Thank you for mentioning our team members by name and we are very happy that all went well with your meeting. I will share your note with all the staff and they will be thrilled to see theirnames in print. Thank you again. R Dalgado

Summary: Breakfast was $18 a day and it was mediocre at best, parking $15 a day, nothing extra special for the customers for example coffee. Coffee was available in the morning for breakfast only and that is it nothing during the day beds were not great.
Manager Response: Dear Cat0416, I am so sorry that that you did not give us a good rating as yes we do charge for parking and do post it on all our booking sites. We offer a cooked to order breakfast and also offer coffee during our breakfast period as guest love to grab a cup of hot coffee before they head out for the day. We also get many compliments about our beds and am sorry that you did not care for them. We do hope that you will try us out again.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: I'm giving this a 5 for what it is -- an airport-convenient hotel in an office-park-ish neighborhood in Irvine. It is not a honeymoon resort. But the room was clean, comfortable, efficient. The staff was friendly and did their jobs well -- front desk, housekeeping, dining. The location is convenient. Breakfast was good. Parking was no problem. The price was fair. It's near the airport, but also near enough to coffee shops, a supermarket, casual dining, etc. I would definitely go back if I needed an airport hotel for flying in and out of SNA John Wayne.
Manager Response: Dear  WaterEnthusiasts, We do appreciate the 5 star review and all the lovely things ypu had to say about our property. Looking forward to seeing you on your next visit. Much gratitude. R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel is in a great clean part of southern California. The hotel is new and incredibly clean and well maintained. The only negative is the pool on the second floor was a bit murky.   The staff are all incredibly attentive.   The beds/mattress are the normal Hilton Garden inn beds. They are quite firm but not as firm as Doubletree. So if you need good support this is a great choice.   Overall this is one of the cleanest and best kept hotels I've ever stayed at.    The distance from LAX is about 40-50min so choose hotel wisely.   There's great shopping in and around the hotel. Very close to newport beach and Balboa piers.
Manager Response: Dear anonbird, We do appreciate your lovely comments and your excellent review. Thank you, R Dalgado

Summary: Beautiful, clean lobby, nice lounge area.  Room was very clean and nicely decorated. Has coffee maker, microwave, fridge. Bathroom has toiletries. Everything smelled so clean! Stayed there for a wedding and very glad we did.
Manager Response: Dear Patricia E, Ecstatic that all went well with your weekend stay and hoping the wedding went well too. Stay well. R Dalgado

Summary: Still waiting for a call back about why we had no hot water.  Room was nice, front reception was nice.  We arrived at around 11:30 pm.  We were not able to take a hot shower after checking in or before leaving.  Would love a call back that they promised.
Manager Response: Hello David k, So sorry that you did not get hot water and a call back as you were promised. I do apologize as we had a small malfunction which was quickly fixed. I am so glad that you found the staff and the room nice. Please give us another try. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great bang for your buck.  Central to business offices, close to the airport, and a quality hotel for what you pay for.  Front desk has coupons for local restaurants, so make sure you ask for recommendations.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Came with our Soccer Team to participate in a Soccer Tournament.Hotel staff was kind, helpful and very courteous. Room was ready as promised and very clean. Not much to do within walking distance however, LOTS of restaurants and things to do within 5 min of driving.Will definitely stay here again.Thank you,DebbieSalt Lake City, Utah
Manager Response: none

Summary: My business trip was greatly enhanced by the great service I got at the Garden Inn. Even though my room was big, quiet, and comfortable, the best part about the trip was the time I enjoyed at the restaurant bar, eating and drinking with my co-workers and chatting with the bartender Robert. Local knowledge/tips, a good ear, and solid menu recommendations were some of Robert's contributions to a productive work week, but mostly it felt good to be welcome. I hope to be passing through again soon, and to be chowing down at the restaurant bar when I do!.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Ok hotel, staff not so good...
Summary: Room was nice and clean, very thin walls, we could hear people talking/tv’s all night.Worst arrival experience I ever had, no explanation about breakfast, Hilton’s programs or the “special” package I bought (I bought an Snacks and Drinks package, my room was just like any motel 6 room, an empty fridge and nothing else).
Manager Response: Dear Rafael N,  Thank you for your review. We’re sorry we didn’t provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues encountered, and we are working with our team to ensure the situations don’t happen again. Your feedback is genuinely appreciated as it is the first step in helping us improve our services. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again.

Summary: This facility is very clean and attractive, with lots of amenities.  The staff is friendly, helpful and highly competent.  The lobby and the guest rooms are bright and cheerful.  I would highly recommend the Hilton Garden Inn to anyone staying in the Irvine/Newport Beach area, whether for liesure or for business.  I saw a good mix of business travelers and families/groups, and the clientele was a high-end mix.  No noisy, unruly guests.  The restaurant and bar had live music and complimentary wine, which gave it a high-end atmosphere.  It is also conveniently located right off the 405 between Jamboree and MacArthur right in the heart of the Irvine/John Wayne Airport business district.  The hotel is less than 5 minutes from the airport, which I found to be particularly important
Manager Response: Dear lhil2n, Thank you for your wonderful comments and we are glad you enjoyed staying with us. Just a quick clarification is that we do have live music on Wednesday nights and are glad you got to enjoy that, however we do not serve complimentary wine. We hope to see you on your next visit. Sincerely, Ronnie D

Summary: I am a repeat customer because of the location, hospitality and comfort. The bed is extremely comfortable and I always get a great night's sleep. The people are welcoming and there is always fresh water in the clean lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer B, We do appreciate you being a loyal guest and thank you for the comments. With much gratitude, Ronnie D

Summary: Nice and clean. Good parking. Check in staff was friendly. The beds were comfy. Great value and would definitely stay again. Perfect for families or couples. Close to Orange County Airport, yet tucked away.
Manager Response: Dear TCS_MCS, Glad all was well and do visit again. Sincerely, Ronnie D

Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn for 3 nights and had no problems. It was quiet, bed was comfortable and has great amenties including free WiFi, free breakfast and a well equipped fitness center.  I stayed as part of a corporate package, so parking was included. Otherwise parking is $15 per day.
Manager Response: Dear thejordanfour, Thank you for this awesome review. Sincerely, Ronnie D

Summary: The hotel overall was great. Accommodating parking and very nice and clean building. Staff wasn’t the most customer service geared I’ve ever seen but still did well. I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in Irvine as it is near everything.
Manager Response: Dear cardinals52018,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your honesty as we look for reviews to provide insight and constructive feedback regarding our hotel’s service to better our guest experience. We welcome any additional comments or suggestions you would like to share. We look forward to welcoming back the next time you're in Irvine!

Summary: We definitely recommend this hotel. The staff is very polite and professional that makes your stay very welcoming. Wesley checked us in a made us feel right at home. We had great conversation with Robert the bartender and he made the best drinks!!! We would like to say thank you and we will be back soon.
Manager Response: Dear mrdugout, Thank you for mentioning Wesley and Robert by name and you do not have to thank us, but vice versa. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: Loved nearly everything about this nice, clean, quiet, first-class hotel in a nice quiet area.  Loved the convenience of a bar and grill open a lot and offering a range of items.  Employees were very friendly and accommodating.  Rate was good but would have been even better if we had stayed a few days earlier or later.  For some reason the hotel could not get the ice machine fixed on our floor so had to go to another floor for ice, but that is the only complaint--except for the $15 nightly parking fee.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was nice and it was clean. Food was good as well as service. Rooms are fine and we slept well. Fitness room needs work, 1 machine down and other 2 need work. Would recommend for a business trip as it is located in a good area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We visit this location every year with our fastpitch team!  The staff is amazing and we always feel this place is a home away from home.  Very close to the John Wayne airport which is a plus.  We will stay here every time we are in Southern California.  You won't go wrong staying here.  GREAT PLACE!
Manager Response: Dear rondafulmore,  Thank you for your kind words as "home away from home" is music to our ears.  Safe travels.  Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: Ashley waitress/bartender was AMAZING! The best service I’ve ever had! She was very attentive and that memory of our order... we had 7 people!!! The food was also delicious. Well definelty come back to visit Ashley!
Manager Response: Dear ViceandSerena Q, We do appreciate the lovely comments are glad that you pointed out Ashley by name. She will be pleased to see her name in print. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I just wanted to say how much I apprieated Franisco and Sergio our Banquet Captain, He help us with our every need and anticipated our every need. We will be using this location for our next class.Thanks
Manager Response: Dear Diane B, Thank you for posting these lovely comments and mentioning Francisco and Sergio by name. We look forward to hosting your next event. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We were flying out the next day and found this gem near the John Wayne airport.  TripAdvisor showed great reviews stating it was a relatively new hotel.   It is located in a business park so traffic is minimal.  We booked rooms on arrival and thought the rate was very reasonable for location and hotel brand.  Lobby is very nice and modern.  Front desk was very pleasant and we were greeted each time we passed.  There is an undercover pool on 2nd floor.  Hotel most likely caters to business travelers but we enjoyed the clean and updated rooms for our one night.  Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Karen L, We do love getting nice comments such as yours.  With much gratitude. Ronnie Dalgado

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights during our Disneyland trip. The prices for hotels around Disney were outrageous, so we stayed in Irvine. It was only about a 15-20 minute drive, so not bad at all! When we arrived around 11pm on a Saturday night for check in, we noticed that there was no parking left. The front desk employee checked us in quickly and kindly walked us out to the parking lot to show us another place we could park. She definitely went above and beyond by actually showing us where instead of just telling us.  We got a room on the 3rd floor near the elevator. The room was extremely quiet even though the hotel itself seemed quite full. Our room was spotless! We loved the size of the shower and how comfortable the bed was! It was also a bonus that there was a little fridge,
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth N, We do hope you enjoyed Disneyland and look forward to you visiting again and soon. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Open your windows, and talk with a staff of the hotel who is annoying and forced give them a tip for annoyance customers! Ridiculous!!! I could get in to swimming pool, I asked concierge she told me it’s 24 h open, but it’s not, when I feel bad and hyperventilating she said she have another room but it’s booked for people, she just teased me that she might can move me from my room, but after a while she said she can’t and offer to me earlier checked out! Are you guys serious?
Manager Response: Hello zaharovan167, Thank you for posting although I am trying to decipher the issues you had. Our pool is not a 24 hour pool and am sorry if you were told otherwise. Also hoping you have the right hotel as we do not have a concierge. We apologize if it was us and that we did not come up to your standards. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Pros: Room was cleaned and equipped with microwave.  Cons: No Hilton Honors Gold benefit granted: No room upgrade, no 4 pm late check out. After arguing wiyh the front desk, I was initially hiven a 1 pm check out which I did not accept. Finally, I was given a 2 pm check -out, My loyalty to Hilton was niot appreciated in this Hilton Garden Inn Irvine/ Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear Jo S,  Thank you for your review of your past stay at our hotel. We always appreciate hearing from our guests - including items of opportunity. We apologize that we were unable to accommodate your upgrade request. Our front desk department goes through a lengthy process each day to ensure that our guests receive exactly the room expected, however at times we do not have the availability for upgrade requests or late check-out. We apologize for the inconvenience and do hope that the next time you travel to the area you will consider staying with us again.

Summary Heading: Anthony at the front desk was AWESOME!
Summary: Property is very clean, the guestrooms are impeccable and the service is fantastic. Anthony at the front desk made our stay better than expected and was so accommodating and sweet! We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear heiidster75, Thank you for your awesome post and recognizing Anthony. Please do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: First time at this location and what a great stay! Check in was great! The hotel is very nice and comfortable, and conveniently located near the Airport.  Great happy hours drinks and prices!  Outstanding service for breakfast and dinner.  Robert the Bartender was the best!!!!
Manager Response: Dear jahndebbie, We are so glad you had an excellent stay and decided to post. We are fortunate to have Robert as our bartender and am glad he impressed you. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Although I have stayed at several hotels over the years near the John Wayne Airport, this hotel was a pleasant surprise from checking-in to checking-out. I was very pleased with the relaxed, nicely designed feel of the interior, the comfort and amenities of the guest room, the layout of the lobby, and the customer service of the breakfast staff. This is now my hotel of choice when I stay near the airport.
Manager Response: Dear Stephen R, Thank you so much for your 5 star post. Please visit again when in the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Second time that I have stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn in Irvine, CA.  The hotel is conveniently located near the Orange County/John Wayne Airport.  Also located near a freeway interchange to get you any way you need to go, including the Disneyland Resort.  Reasonable prices, clean rooms, friendly staff; what more can you ask for?  I will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for posting and recommending us. We do appreciate the vote of confidence. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great stay near airport and a short distance to several restaurants. I would stay again on business anytime. Great breakfast buffet but it only want a piece of toast or muffin you still must pay $15. Parking was adequate and never had problems finding a space and free.
Manager Response: Dear Mrm2u2004, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Glad you liked the hotel and parking was a breeze for you. Sincerely R Dalgado

Summary Heading: I was there for a convention.
Summary: Our entire group was treated very well.  Most of our meals were included with the convention package.  The hotel staff treated all of us very well, the food was delicious and presented beautifully.  I would highly recommend anyone looking for group accommodations to consider Hilton Garden Inn.....anywhere.  Our group has used this chain of hotels in several locations and were never disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Lyn L, Thank you for giving us your business and glad that all went well with your convention. We look forward to hosting your next event. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Decent hotel in a good location
Summary: Hotel was in a good location close to freeway.  Restaurants close by but walkable in a few minutes. Rooms were decent and beds were ok. Bathroom required some additional cleaning.  Getting in and out of the property was convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Ram S, Thank you for your review and glad the hotel was good for your stay. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Chris and Robert are 2 of the finest bartenders u will ever have. I visit this hotel at least once a month on business. These guys are friendly and knowledgeable of things to do in the area.  Food is good conversation is better.
Manager Response: Dear Joe S, We appreciate the comments and mentioning our bartenders by name. Cheers. R Dalgado

Summary: I spent 3 days at the Hilton Garden Inn for a convention I was attending, and during those 3 days, everything was flawless.  The wait staff led by Sergio the waiter captain were superb.  I have special dietary concerns and with proper notice, the hotel accommodated me at every meal.  A big thumbs up to CJ for making my special meals happen. I like the hotel room, and it was very quiet no big noise from any of the rooms around me.
Manager Response: Dear Spencer T, Thank you for your 5 star review and I am glad Sergio and CJ were able to stand out in our delivery of service. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Robert, the bartender was very personable and was extremely helpful. He took our orders quickly. The food was great. We definitely look forward to the next couple nights stay. He is definitely great for the hospitality industry. Thank you Robert!
Manager Response: Dear Mr.. Hansen, Thank you for your kind words and recognizing Robert. He will be delighted to see your remarks, Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: My family arrived at the Hilton Garden Inn late in the evening after a long road trip. We were greeted by Cody, and helped us quickly check in without any issues. He was helpful in locating a local convenience store so we could have a late night snack. It was a painless, quick check-in process. We appreciate it, thank you again Cody.
Manager Response: Dear Javier D, We do thank you for your kinds words and review. Cody will be thrilled. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great location, staff are very helpful, onsite restaurant and bar with healthy and fresh food choices.  and
Summary: Stayed here before early flight at John Wayne.  Staff booked my early morning shuttle as I checked in. Room was clean, spacious and quiet. Restaurant food was fresh and had healthy options.  It's nice that there is a bar and plenty of seating in the restaurant.  Coffee was ready early the next morning and shuttle was on time.
Manager Response: Dear malinda396, Glad to know that you enjoyed all aspects of your stay. Safe travels. R dalgado

Summary: In general, this is a very nice/sleek hotel. The lobby and room are contemporary. However, as a Diamond member, I didn't receive complimentary breakfast and got charged with this service. Not sure what went wrong.
Manager Response: Dear acroding, Thank you for being a Diamond member and stating that you liked the hotel. Looking at your reservation as Diamond member, in your profile that you set up, you have a an option of choosing between 750 Honor points or hot cooked to order breakfast for yourself and one guest. The option that you had chosen was points, that you wanted added to your account. You have the option of switching between these two choices on any stay, as long as it is done 24 hours prior to your arrival date and Hilton guidelines state that it cannot be switched at the front desk on the day of. Please let me know if you have any questions and I will be glad to assist. Once again thank you for your loyalty and we look forward to serving you in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Ashley was an excellent bartender and provided wonderful suggestions for dinner.  Ultimately, I enjoyed the seared Tuna from the hotel restaurant. Delicious.  Paired with a rice and grilled vegetables that were seasoned perfectly.
Manager Response: Dear Wayne P, Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for experiencing our Food and beverage offerings. Ashley will be pleased to see her name in print. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel was the friendliest and cleanest I have been to. The staff was always a step ahead of me. Any questions or help needed was eagerly answered. From arrival to departure this was an extremely great experience!
Manager Response: Dear kerridwen63, I just loved your comments and thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The rooms were super clean and beautiful. Breakfast was amazing! The staff were polite and courteous. We had a suite with two bathrooms… The king mattress as well as the sofa bed mattress could’ve been better.
Manager Response: Dear lobna76, Loved your peaceful bliss comment and that you enjoyed your breakfast. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: My go to hotel when in the area for business or pleasure. Typical Hilton Garden Inn quality. Easy parking (free if you tell them you didn't drive). Good location. Lack of free breakfast removes morning chaotic scrum. Fast shuttle.   Wish the windows opened.
Manager Response: Dear  G2147RVmarkp,  Thank you for being a regular and an advocate. You do make a good point, as with a charged breakfast, breakfast is not chaotic in the morning.  Till you next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: About 2 miles from John Wayne Airport, close by malls and great restaurants, beaches within a few miles and near Disneyland.  Clean and modern new property.  Nice, clean rooms and reasonably priced for the location and time year.  Great staff and a good restaurant featuring a nightly happy hour.  If you are having a business meeting the catering and banquet facilities are really good.  The food served for continental breakfast breaks and lunch was excellent.  The Banquet Captain, Sergio, is so accommodating, friendly and efficient.  Can't say enough about him except that he is wonderful.
Manager Response: Dear David M, We do appreciate the feedback and detailed description of your stay. Thank you for mentioning Serio by name as he and all the banquet staff will be thrilled to hear your comment. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The Bartender Robert..! mad me some great drinks and recommended some great food. Very attentive and polite. The staff around him are very professional and helpful. The rooms are cleaned and maintained on a daily bases. Love the fact they have DirecTV. Super soft pillows (which I like). Had a great experience and made my stay very pleasant and relaxed.
Manager Response: Dear Alex O, So glad you had a wonderful stay and were taken care of by our housekeepers and Robert. Please do visit again, Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This place couldn’t have been in a better location for me, but the pillow was actually TOO soft! A statement I thought I’d never mutter. That, however, is no deal breaker. I forgot some toiletries and the staff was great with replacements. Did not eat or drink, though there was a bar (like all Garden Inns).   I’d stay here again - and check my pillow situation before laying down.
Manager Response: Dear drwooley06, We so appreciate the time taken to write this review and your intent to visit again. I have forwarded your message to our Housekeeping Manager so that she can check all our pillows and change the ones that need changing. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We stayed one night and the hotel was excellent the staff very helpful friendly and outgoing.  The room was wonderful,and well worth the value and the food in the restaurant was very tasty.  The location was not was not convenient and little tough to find but all in all I can highly recommend this facility.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great staff- awful rooms- hard beds -dated
Summary: The service was great. The staff was very nice, professional and welcoming. The lobby is a typical Hilton Lobby we all expect- inviting , smells great and refreshments. the rooms were awful- they are cramped (there were 3 of us with 2 beds) we felt closed in. The toilet didn't flush- had to hold handle down. the beds were something from a Flintstones episode- ROCK HARD. Limited towels (constantly had to request more) The breakfast was good (but they never replenished the hot items) The waffle bar was my favorite but my poor husband could never get any bacon.
Manager Response: Hello michellesymonette208,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are glad that you enjoyed the staff, service and the waffles at breakfast. We are a relatively new hotel with new beds and so far have had nothing but compliments in regards to our beds.  I will personally check the room you stayed in.  Thank you again for your feedback. Ronnie Dalgado

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel near Orange County Airport
Summary: This is one of the nicest Hilton Garden Inns that I have stayed in. The bathrooms have been upgraded glassed-in shower stalls. Very easy to get to the airport (no freeways). I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice rooms, potential challenging parking situation
Summary: As a Diamond, stayed overnight for an event by the beach.  The hotel itself looked pretty decent inside, and the room was certainly comfortable.  Staff was pleasant.  Excellent wait staff at the breakfast restaurant.  I can see how some folks complain about the parking situation here.  Luckily I found a spot in the garage (though the space is very narrow) - had to check that I could indeed park there as it seems some spots may be reserved for other tenants other than guests.  Also didn't seem to have enough parking spots for all the potential guests who could be driving out to stay here.
Manager Response: Dear ydrone, Thank you for being a Diamond member and for saying all the lovely things about our hotel. Glad you were able to visit the beach while on your trip. All the parking spaces are at code and all our spaces are for guests and not for tenants as we do not have any. Thank you for visiting and please do so again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: No Parking, POOR Customer Service, No HH Diamond Benefits - AVOID!!
Summary: Came back and there was no parking. Had to wait in the lobby for a while before Denice acknowledged my presence, although I was standing right in front of him. Informed him that there were no parking spots available, he then said I never informed the hotel I had a car. Okay, well somehow I miraculously was handed a pass earlier today and was also told parking was complimentary for Diamond HH members. He then advised me to park next door at Abbott’s parking lot after I informed him I received a red parking pass for parking. They even asked for the Make and Model of my car! I also made him aware that the earlier shift had indicated that parking was complimentary for Diamond HH. At this point, I was pretty confused. I thought perhaps I was so tired I was at the wrong hotel lobby! I
Manager Response: Dear Julie W, I sincerely apologize for the parking issues that you had while at our property, as well as the fire door which does drop down, as per fire code if there is a fire alarm.  Please feel free to call me as I would like to discuss your experience in person. We do value you being a Diamond Member and am sorry for your experience. Sincerely, R Dalgado  9496568700

Summary Heading: Big Group - Excellent Stay - First Class all the Way
Summary: This hotel was fantastic for our big group of 30+ patron.  Everything was fresh and clean.  The staff was amazing to work with and the hotel is in excellent condition.  Clean rooms every day, comfortable beds, excellent TV service, and a warm and hot breakfast every morning made our stay awesome.  The only drawback was the slow elevators because there are only two but that doesn't mean we cannot take the stairs either.  The breakfast was fresh and served cook to order each morning (although a little variety would have been nice other than eggs every morning) but still was worth every penny we spent.  The water infusion dispenser in the lobby was a fan favorite for our group.  Excellent Job!
Manager Response: Dear Coach B, We do appreciate your group business and your glowing comments. Thank you for choosing us. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great hotel for meeting and vacation!
Summary: Our meeting was huge success, in part due to the staff at the hotel.  I did not have to worry about anything, the staff was there when they were supposed to be, extremely accommodating to our last minute requests. Sergio was so helpful!  This allowed me to be able to focus on the meeting.   Little touches like the custom cookies that made the meeting even better.  The food was amazing both the catering and in the restaurant.  The atmosphere of the hotel was inviting, modern yet comfortable and soft (if that make sense).   The meeting room was perfect for 30 people and had large windows and a patio where we could get some fresh air and much needed sunshine.    Each guest had a hot coco set up complete with mini marshmallow in their room and a letter letting them know the times
Manager Response: Dear vwiegele, We do appreciate your 5 star review and are glad we were able to pamper you and your group with hot chocolate and marshmallows!!! Glad you combined business and pleasure on your trip. Sergio thanks you for mentioning his name. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Spent two nights here while in Irvine for business. Great location off the 405, clean, safe, and nice staff! Couldn’t hear any noise at all from the freeway and got a great night’s sleep. Also have a good bar and restaurant with really tasty food and an awesome wait staff. Enjoyed my stay!
Manager Response: Dear cjenk060300, Happy that you had a great stay and enjoyed the food and bar. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Location and rooms were great. Rooms were clean and beds are very comfortable. My only issue is they didn’t not honor our Gold Member. Complimentary breakfast benefit. Wasn’t too happy about my has been having to pay $16 for a bagel.
Manager Response: Dear Dbschaf10, So glad you enjoyed the rooms and your stay. You are welcome to update your preference to breakfast in your status and we will gladly oblige with your choice. Please do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Kudos to CJ, Sergio, and the entire staff for a fantastic experience for our business meeting. All facilities are clean and well maintained. We conducted a 2 1/2 day meeting in their boardroom. CJ and the event staff was very attentive and friendly. Sergio and team were fantastic as well.   In general, HGIs are consistently nice but this one was a step above in every aspect.
Manager Response: Dear Scott J, very sweet of you to mention CJ and Sergio and are glad that you had a wonderful meeting. Do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel stay was wonderful! We've been traveling a lot recently for cheer competitions and this has been, by far, the best hotel stay we've experienced in a very long time! The premises are clean and modern, the rooms are clean and modern, the hotel is super quiet even though it is located next to the 405 freeway, and the air conditioner doesn't keep you up all night! Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear soozespino, Glad that this was the best hotel you have stayed in for a while. We do appreciate the business. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great customer service at restaurant/bar, comfortable stay
Summary: Business travel on a friday night isn't preferred but the restaurant/bar staff made my stay and evening exceptional.  the friendly and professional robert helped by sharing his expertise of the menu, the hotel and travel destinations within the area. hotel room was clean/comfortable and close to the airport for an early flight.  gym had great options for an early morning workout.  will definitely return, especially to say hello to robert and david (mon-friday) in the restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear cake843, I am ecstatic that Robert and David were able to make your experience an excellent one. Will definitely say hello to them. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Really nice hotel with professional staff
Summary: I love staying here - it's centrally located, has a restaurant/bar, and the staff are extremely friendly and professional.  Room was nicely sized and clean, really like that it had a refrigerator.  The TV was HUGE and the bed was very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Linda K, Thank you for your lovely compliments. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel was really nice for the price. I just didnt like how you have to pay extra for parking and the pool was much smaller than shown in pictures. Also breakfast is $15 extra per person, would have been nice if it was included in the price.
Manager Response: Dear ggutierrez826, Thank you for your review and glad you liked out hotel. You are welcome to book our bed and breakfast package the next time. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed here with son on a 3-day visit.  Hotel is close and easy to get to from John Wayne Airport. Plenty of parking. Modern design throughout.  Greeted warmly at front desk. Room clean, Kuerig greatly appreciated! Only negative is had to hunt for elevators when first going up to the room.  We hadn’t asked a check-in, left to get lunch then came back to go to room. Staff was not at desk, so we wandered a bit.  Hint - Walk left from reception, turn right and go to the back of the building! Only 20-25 mins from Disney in one direction Corona Del Mar Beach in the other (at non-peak traffic times!
Manager Response: Dear Mike C, Thank you for your review. Yes we are in between Disney and the lovely beaches south of the 5 freeway. Glad you liked the hotel and do visit us again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We stayed here last year with my daughter's robotics team and we did again for this year's competition at UCI. We got the Jasmine suite on the 5th floor this year and we're very happy. Large two room suite with pull out sofa bed. The mattress in the bedroom was in the Goldie Locks Zone (not too soft, not too hard...just right). Plenty of towels, good coffee service (cup at a time), clean and quiet. Desk service was terrific at check in and for all your needs. (They called after I got some extras from housekeeping just to be sure I was taken care of). The staff really cares about their guests and it shows. Breakfast can be included with room price (that's what my daughter's team did) and it was pre-made eggs, bacon,etc. or make your own waffles, toast, etc., with fresh fruit,
Manager Response: Dear HappyTraveler0109, Thank you for a very detailed and favorable review. Your comment about the staff caring for our guests was my favorite. Thank you. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Halfway through my stay here and I have to write a review. Robert behind the bar convinced me to have the Juicy Lucy burger. He didn’t know it at the time but he was about to redeem his kitchen. Juicy Lucy may very well be the best Hotel burger I have ever had the pleasure of eating.  Now that I’m writing this review I’d also like to say that Rajim was an excellent shuttle driver and he checked me in as well, good guy. He was the first interaction I had and made an excellent first impression for the hotel.  Robert and Rajim both went out of their way to make my stay better than expected and I recognized it immediately.  But that burger was the real MVP...
Manager Response: Dear Noah M. So glad that Robert talked you into the Juicy Lucy. That is my favorite as well. Thank you for mentioning our staff by name. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The staff and breakfast were great. The amenities were nice. The pool was especially nice and it had equipment available to help handicap people get into the pool. I went in it one night and walked a good 1/2 mile or so without hurting much. The exercise room looked amazing but I wasn’t able to use it this time. They have nightly specials and entertainment and so much more
Manager Response: Dear Cindy A, We are happy you got the whole experience. Thank you for your review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Welcoming and clean with great service, nice rooms. Comfy. Food was very good, fresh coffee in the morning. Attentive staff and easy access in the area. Welcomed by the front desk upon returning daily.
Manager Response: Dear  A1428SFamberh, Thank you for a 5 star review and all the superb things you had to say about our hotel. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: First of many trips to this area.  I will always book at this Hilton Garden Inn Property.  Check in staff were very friendly and courteous.  The hotel lobby set up, from bar, waiting area to pantry is very warm and inviting.  The rooms were very well laid out and comfortable.  I returned from an nice dinner that I had with family that lived in the area, to find a nice welcome package of water, hot chocolate, marshmallows and cookies waiting for me .... a very nice personal touch.  Much appreciated from a person that spends over 125 nights a year in hotel rooms!  Hilton continues to keep their properties upgraded and modern.
Manager Response: Dear  TheoRamsFan, Coming from a guest who spends 125 nights on the road we are humbled to get such a glowing and excellent review fro you. Thank you. Ronnie Dalgado

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel In Orange County Airport Area
Summary: I spent two nights in this hotel for a business trip, it is very close to John Wayne Airport, close by many nice restaurants, cafes, bars and shopping centers. Also you are 20 minutes from Huntington Beach and New port Beach both are incredible. The hotel has a good size business center, the internet was very good, the rooms are beautiful and very clean. But the main thing is the whole staff is very friendly helpful and they give you an excellent customer services with a nice smile!
Manager Response: Dear Mohamed E, We do appreciate your lovely review and kind words. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Spent 6 days here presenting for a training conference in the Orchid rooms.  Excellent staff took care of us.  Sergio from staff was on top of everything.  Hotel rooms in excellent shape with a modern look.  Breakfast staff was friendly and made us feel welcome, especially Rocio.  Very comfortable.  Halls were noisy at night with voices and door slams.  Disappointed on only one extra hour for late check out.
Manager Response: Dear mauimike2015, Thank you for  fantastic review and glad everything at your conference went well. We do appreciate you mentioning Sergio and Rocio by name. With late checkouts, we base it on occupancy and staffing and are sorry that one hour was not sufficient. Do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stay here whenever in this area.  Like the modern contemporary look of the hotel with all the benefits of Hilton Garden Inn.  Restaurants walking distance or short Uber, Irvine spectrum shopping about 15 minute drive (non rush hour of course).  Robert takes good care of guests at the bar, and gets a A+ for having large ice cube/ball for a bourbon  after dinner😉
Manager Response: Dear Tom C, Thank you for your brief and concise description of our property and for calling out Robert by name. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Excellent venue to have an event!
Summary: I have been an event planner for close to 30 years, and I have found  the Hilton Garden Hotel in Irvine to be a great place to have a special event, and I especially love working with Cj & Aloha and their staff. Everyone is so nice and accommodating and they were both so kind to our vendors and clients. Their professional follow up and planning helped to make the event even more successful.  Our Dj said that he enjoyed performing there and is happy to work at their venue again soon! The client also mentioned that he was extremely happy with Cj and Aloha and the service that he received at this beautiful venue. They give everyone the VIP treatment! We have them on our preferred Venue list, and I would highly recommend them and this wonderful venue to any of our clients as well.
Manager Response: Dear Karen T, This is such a beautiful review and we do thank you for it. Appreciate the shout out to our team members and we are ecstatic that your event went off well. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel was fantastic! The double queen bed room was amazing, staff was friendly helpful and courteous, priced reasonable, and close to the Jiu Jitsu competition. We had a total of 5 people in the room and the hotel room was sufficiently sized to suit all of our needs and space.
Manager Response: Dear Sherry C,  Thank you so very much for a lovely review. Please do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Close to airport, 5 minute hotel shuttle ride.    Clean and modern hotel.   Staff were friendly and helpful, I didn't encounter any issues.   There are not a lot of restaurants or shops in the immediate vicinity if you don't have a car.   Large retail complex about 30 minute walk from hotel, or 5 minute drive away.   Looked like a safe area, surrounded by  offices and commercial buildings.
Manager Response: Dear Mark R, Thank you for your comments. We do have a hotel shuttle that can drop you off at a variety of local restaurants, Safe travels, Sincerely, R Dalgado
