Summary: Fairly new hotel in a great location.  Clean lobby and rooms, friendly staff all wanting to make sure I was happy and had everything I needed.  Made to order breakfast + buffet, Restaurant and Bar open until 10pm.  Large business office, beautiful pool, great workout room.  Plenty of restaurants and shopping nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Michael T, We do appreciate the business and taking the time to write a review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I stayed at the Hilton inn for a business trip for 3 days and had a great experience. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. We received excellent service from our amazing bartender, Chris and he gave the best resteraunt reccomendations. Thanks all!
Manager Response: Dear desiree m, Thank you for an awesome review and appreciating Chris's service and recommendations. Do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We use the Hilton Garden Inn every year for lodging business guests. Each year the level of personalized attention given to our transportation, dining, and additional options has been exemplary. The communication from hosting staff was always timely and clear. Thank you Hilton Garden Inn for always exceeding our expectations!
Manager Response: Dear cd0wney, Thank you for being a loyal Hilton member for your business travel. We are glad everything went well with your meeting and we do hope to see you at your future events. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: It all started with a smile!
Summary: Upon arriving,  myself and my husband struggled with the Digital Key with all of our bags in our arms and we were greeted with a friendly smile from Mary.  She saw our struggle, quickly ran to open the door for us and said with a smile " Let me get that for you, welcome to the Hilton Garden Inn".  That was a great way to own the welcome!  We later stopped at the front desk to obtain some information and found Even to be very helpful,  he made sure we were enjoying our stay and thanked us for being Hilton Honor members.  Breakfast was well stocked and very clean,  I enjoyed the cook to order items.  I had to ask the staff if they had just opened because our room was spotless and in perfect shape,  the whole hotel looked brand new.  We have already booked a few other stays for the
Manager Response: Dear RobMnky, , Thank you very much for your 5 star review and for naming Mary and Evan by name. Aprreciate your business and do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We tried to use the digital check in and it wouldn’t work so we had to go to the front desk for check in, which wasn’t too big of a deal. At check in there wasn’t any bottled water, greeting etc.  we had to pay $15 a day for parking but there wasn’t a space on the second night of our stay, we still had to pay the fee. They had a dental convention going on and it made the place feel crowded. The hotel was clean and the housekeeping staff was nice. The bartender was kind enough to pour a drink 5 minutes after they closed. I just don’t think it would be my first choice to go back to.
Manager Response: Hello 449mandib, We do thank you for your review as we do strive to better our services. With the Digital Key feature, the accounts are tied to a credit card on file. You may want to update your information, as we were not able to complete the Digital Key transaction. I do apologize that you were not given your bottled water at check in and that the hotel was busy during your stay. We do hope that you do give us another chance to earn your business. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, but no hot tub
Summary: Rooms were nice, front desk helpful, breakfast was good and so was dinner.  They packed a lot into this lobby and it functions very well  and is efficient.  Close to airport, freeway and business park.  My only issue was no hot tub and the pool on 2nd floor was kinda odd.
Manager Response: Hello Thomas_Travels11, So glad that you enjoyed our staff and your dinner. yes you are correct, w do not have a hot tub, but hoping you enjoyed our unique pool on the second level which is indoors, with an outdoor feel. sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Highly recommend this hotel!  Last weekend we had our churches married couples retreat at this hotel. We were so pleased with the excellent service by all the staff. C.J., Bianca, Hannah, Sergio, Francisco and Anibel were all amazing! So attentive and helpful! The hotel is clean, the food is great and the service exceptional. We wouldn’t hesitate to do it again here and highly recommend it!
Manager Response: Hello, It was very sweet of you to mention our staff by their names . Much appreciated. We are ecstatic that you loved your retreat and experience. Sincrely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Wonderful Four Night Stay at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine / Orange County Airport
Summary: I enjoyed an outstanding four night stay at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine / Orange County Airport while attending a music conference! The hotel's facilities are very impressive, and every member of the hotel staff is friendly and helpful. The spacious guest rooms feature a wide range of luxurious amenities, and the beds are very comfortable. The wifi is excellent, and the in-room kitchenette is very convenient. I also enjoyed many wonderful meals at the hotel restaurant, and the service was excellent. The fruit-flavored waters in the lobby are an added bonus. I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Jonathan A, Thank you for this lovely comment. Glad you enjoyed the music conference which I will assume was the annual NAMM event in Anaheim. We look forward to you staying with us next year, same time, same place!!! Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Works well for our monthly group events
Summary: We run events where we need lodging every month and the team at Hilton Garden Inn Irvine make it very easy for us. Not only do they deliver on all our expectations and take great care of our guests, they are also very responsive to questions and sending out the invoices for our stays which are important to me as the person who books these events.
Manager Response: Dear John M, We do thank you for your compliments, which I will be forwarding to our Director of Catering, and her entire team, that loves to please. Till your next meeting.... Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel, its staff, its facilities, are outstanding! I had close to 70 guests booked here for a conference in the area and can say it was the best booking I could have made. Everyone was thrilled. The Hilton Garden Inn is remarkable!
Manager Response: Dear Stephen T, We do appreciate the shout out!!!! Thank you so much and we look forward to seeing you again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Clean place, great staff. Mediocre on price for value.
Summary: Good, clean place with great staff.  The hotel is not close to much other than many office complexes.  Great airport shuttle. For purchase breakfast is a bit pricey but good food. Nice room set up. Helpful and friendly, knowledgeable staff.
Manager Response: Dear C S, Thank you for your compliments and that you liked the hotel, staff and food. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: My department hosted a 2 day off-site meeting in Southern California.  Not being too familiar with the area, Hilton Garden Inn was highly recommended by our Irvine team.  The meeting room, catering, and hotel accommodations were a perfect match for our event.  With close proximity to SNA, it's a great location for the frequent business traveler.  Thank you Hilton Garden Inn, for making my department's off-site meeting a success.
Manager Response: Hello, We are so glad that your department held their meetings at our hotel and that everything went as planned and was perfect for your event We look forward to hosting your future events. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel is convenient to the freeway yet far enough that you don’t hear.  Grounds, common area and rooms were very clean.  Hotel is nicely appointed and great for the business traveler or a couple staying for a few days.   Live entertainment in the bar area was a great touch too.  Service was good at the bar and front desk and I would recommend to anyone going to  Irvine and will make this my first choice next time in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Macnlv, Thank you for the recommendations. Much appreecitaed. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: A very pleasant stay. Well done!
Summary: Spent four days here while on a conference. This is a very comfortable hotel, with exceptional staff. Conference room rates were very fair. I have every intention of staying here again when I'm in the area.
Manager Response: Dear hmdpa, We do appreciate the visit and comments, and look forward to seeing you back. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Prefer room service available especially over weekend.  Room service dinner just okay.  Should have snacks available in room.  Did not understand how to rent movie on demand.   I was looking for more of a luxury weekend for my daughter and I that attennds uci.  I was not familiar with area.  Friends said should go into Newport Beach or Aneheim.
Manager Response: Dear 378deidrah, Thank you for your comments. Congratulations on your daughter attending UCI. We are a preferred hotel. Yes, if your preferences are 24 room service, a mini bar and movies on demand, a select few hotels in the Newport Beach do offer those luxuries that you are accustomed to. Safe travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Hilton Garden Inn was a home run in standards and cleanliness. The location was smack dab in the heart of Irvine and the staff was above and beyond. The F&B staff was on par to making sure patrons are satisfied and leaving with a smile.
Manager Response: Dear Z8998BZrobertl,  Thank you for the "home Run" comment. Love it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn for a 3-day writer conference. What a pleasure. From the prompt airport shuttle to the complimentary toothpaste when I ran out to the offer to the fresh breakfast omelet - each Hilton employee always greeted me with a smile and proactive offers to help. Good fitness lounge, easy commute to the airport, comfortable room... I absolutely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear JoanCF, Thank you for a detailed review and for recommending our hotel. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary: If you want to be treated poorly then ask for Nigel. He will let you know with immediacy how wrong you are and gonthe extra mile to prove his point rendering the guest feeling like garbage and wondering why you are being treated with so much disdain.
Manager Response: Dear ProfeasionalTravelor, Thank you for your review and I do apologize if you did not get the service you so deserve. We do hope you will give us another try.  Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Robert is a great. Service is exceptional and very professional! Makes you feel at home and is always “up selling”. Very friendly bar atmosphere especially when they have live music. Again, the key is always the bartender.
Manager Response: Dear gmaida, We thank you for mentioning Robert by name as he will be thrilled seeing his name in print. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: Centrally located and easy to find. Nice and quiet.  The front desk staff is very friendly and helpful.  The lobby is beautiful. We had a room with double queen beds.  It was clean, spacious and well decorated.
Manager Response: Dear D7200UIcrystalr, Thank you for your wonderful comments. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Poor!  Need to check-out early and change to another hotel
Summary: My original plan is to stay in this new Hilton property (about 2 years old) for 8 days.   But, at the end, I decide to check-out early and move to another hotel near-by because of multiple issues:  1.  The digital key of my room CAN'T work - After my check-in on Friday evening, I find that the digital key only works for fitness center, guest laundry and others but NOT my room.   I go back to the staff who checks me in and she tells me she will ask technical support to sort it out. - On Saturday evening, I still find that my digital key for my room does not work.   I visited the front desk again and it seems that no one is actually calling technical support to address my issue.   OK, Denice is so kind to regenerate the key but can't work, and he asks a technician to come to my
Manager Response: Dear Edward-A A, Thank you for bringing this to our attention. Yes we did need to change the lock on your door as it was malfunctioning and it just so happened at the same time as one of our two elevators was being repaired. We were not aware of the treadmills, as they are working now but will check on them. Mr. Edwards I do hope that I can get you to come back and experience what we are truly all about. My direct line is 9496568700 and I would be more than happy to help with your future stays. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Love Hilton hotels  The staff very nice  Super clean the hotel smelled very nice and fresh, all the staff was very friendly.  the breakfast was delicious I would definitely recommend to my friends and family
Manager Response: Dear Alma R, Thank you for a 5 star rating. Much gratitude. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great place to stay while on business in Orange County.  Convenient to John Wayne airport with free shuttle if needed.  Very clean modern hotel with friendly staff that make you feel welcome.  I would recommend this hotel if you need one near the airport in Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear Steven , Thank you so very much for your excellent rating, as we do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great place to stay, modern, spacious, clean and comfortable.  Will stay here again. Restaurant on site. Great breakfast. Easy parking and access on site.  My only complaint is that parking should be free.
Manager Response: Dear  jamescO3731MA, Thank you for the top rating and your comments. Yes we do charge for parking and are one of the most reasonable, in the Irvine area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I've stayed here a couple times for business travel, and will come back here if Irvine and the vicinity is where I need to be.  Courteous front desk, nice rooms with microwave/refrigerator/sink.  Easy self parking right downstairs with daily fees.  Quiet location away from freeway noises often encountered with many other Orange County Hotels. One drawback is that the lobby bar is small and the restaurant service is limited.  However this is not the hotel for that type of arrangements.  There are nice dining establishments nearby, or you can drive into Irvine for tons of choices for food.
Manager Response: Dear EveryChanceToTravel, Thank you for the awesome comments and your repeat business. We do hope to see you on your return trips. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Difficult check in the staff was a little rude and i had tons of bags I wish Someone would have l helped me with them. The room was nice, quiet and very clean. Check out was easy. The locations is nice out of the way of traffic.
Manager Response: Dear 58makaylam, So sorry we were not able to help you with your bags at check in. I will be speaking to the team. Thank you for the rest of your lovely comments. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We are members of Hilton Honors and have stayed at multiple Hilton's in Irvine/Anaheim. Majority of which we have had horrible experiences. However, this particular Garden Inn was exceptional in their customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Jimboalfredo, We are so glad to know that we are one of the better hotels you have stayed at, in this area. Gratitude for the comments. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I am an event planner at a local university, and I have partnered with the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine for the last couple of years. When people are coming from out of town, I send them to the Hilton Garden Inn because I know they will be taken care of and made to feel welcome. I am in constant communication with Bianca, who is excellent. She works extra hard to make sure that the guests feel special as soon as they walk through the doors. The hotel was an "easy sell" as each room has everything a guest needs to feel comfortable and the common areas are extremely nice. I would recommend this hotel to my friends and family and would recommend Bianca to anyone looking to make group bookings!
Manager Response: Dear swhitehair, Thank you for a lovely 5 star review and mentinoning Bianca by name. We do appreciate the details in your comments. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for one night during Christmas time! The hotel was the cheapest in price between all of the Hilton’s in Irvine. We have a very pleasant experience very clean and modern inside. It did the job! Also used the gym which was great 👍🏽
Manager Response: Dear lex503, Thank you for choosing our hotel and for the lovely comments. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights around Christmas while in the area. The hotel is pretty central to anywhere you need to be in Orange County. Our room was clean and our stay was good. My only real complaint was that our room wasn’t cleaned and we had to go ask for towels and coffee after the first night. Then on the morning we were leaving the maid knocked on our door at least 2x before checkout time. Ironic from our experience the day before. Otherwise good stay. Cheap. Nice. Would stay again if in the area.
Manager Response: Dear alison f, We do thank you for taking the time to write this review. I apologoize that we did not get you towels and coffee in a timely manner and will share your comments to our housekeeping team. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Ok Value. Parking fees high. It would be best if the daily parking fee would be part of the daily room rate. Also, there is no complimentary free Breakfast or even a continental breakfast offered. be prepared to pay more than the room rate. Stale or hard cookies sometimes served in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear rolandob224, We are so sorry that the cookies were not to your standard. I will bring this matter up with our food and beverage team. Yes you are correct, we do charge for parking, and breakfast is not included in the rate, which we do mention on our website. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We stayed 12/17 through 12/19.  The rooms were comfortable and clean and the restaurant area was very nice, but the outstanding quality of this hotel was two particular staff that stood out.  I am sorry that I can't remember the name of the exceptional waiter, possibly the manager, who treated my ailing parent like a queen, remade and customized her dinner when there was something she could not have on her original order.  The restaurant appears to take great pride in their food preparation and service.  The night staff, Sean, helped us with an urgent need in the middle of the night and took us personally to the airport at 5 AM when the shuttle driver was not available.  It was a difficult trip due to medical issues and we were treated with exceptional kindness and
Manager Response: Dear Traveler12345678, We are so glad to know that our team was able to give you the service that made your stay exceptional. I will send your recap to the Food and Beverage team and to Sean. Thank you. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Fit the bill for what I was looking for
Summary: This hotel was exactly what I was looking for during a recent stay in Orange County. When I needed to extend my stay an additional two days, they were able to help me without hesitation. I would stay here again on a future trip.
Manager Response: Dear 818juliol, We are ecstatic that you loved our hotel and staff. Thank you. R Dalgado

Summary: Just had a meeting event in this property weeks ago. Great service. the hotel team is very helpful and made my event management work much easier. Good food. Perfect floor plan for meeting rooms. High performance of A/V equipment. Close to SNA and main Irvine office parks. Great location for business meetings.
Manager Response: Dear lyang65, We do appreciate the shout out from a meeting and business perspective and glad that all went well with yours. Sinceely, R Dalgado

Summary: Clean! Comfortable! Courteous! I always enjoy staying at Hilton establishments and this one did not disappoint!  I especially liked the close proximity of the hotel to the Orange County Airport and important highways!
Manager Response: Dear paularwilson, We are stoked that the proximity of the airport and freeways were your highlight as it does save one a lot of time. Thank you for your comments. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great service, amenities, breakfast buffet and restaurant. I was on a business trip so the location was excellent. I used Lyft for transportation, I would recommend this hotel to anyone without hesitation and I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 168terriea, Thank you for your vote of confidence and recommendation. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Expect to pay another $31 per day to park and make yourself a waffle.
Summary: I stayed here for a business trip.  Chose the wrong Hilton Garden Inn and paid $80 more per night to stay at a place further away from our meeting.  Not the hotel’s fault, just paid more for less convenience. But the reason for the review was the $15 per day to park and over $16 for breakfast.  Seriously, make your own waffle and say yes to a cup of coffee and you will be handed a bill for the Adult Buffet. I was so irritated I cut my trip short by a day and checked out early.
Manager Response: Dear 575danf, We thank you for taking the time to write the review and sorry that you were not able to get the hotel of your choice closer to where you needed to. We do charge for parking and have a wide variety of choices for breakfast, to include our chefs cooking "made to order eggs/omelets" We do wish you the best on your travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We stayed in Hilton Garden Inn and it was a very good choice!  The hotel is easy to get to, the lobby was very light and bright, the staff were friendly and very eager to help, our room was extremely clean and quiet!  We would definitely come back!
Manager Response: Dear noelj1222, Thank you for your 5 star review and all the lovely things you had to say about our hotel. Sincerely R Dalgado

Summary Heading: One of the BEST Hotel Front Desk Staffs I've ever encountered
Summary: My wife and I stayed here (on and off) during a 2 week stay in Sep-Oct 2017 following the death of a family member.  Aleeza and Anthony at the front desk were extremely helpful, professional, and definitely "went the extra mile" in helping me personally with numerous time sensitive actions I had to accomplish.  Aleeza especially exhibited a high degree of customer service and both she and Anthony were always smiling and helping my wife and I keep up our spirits.  I will soon be staying here again and look forward to another great stay at this hotel.  One of the best hotels and Hilton Garden Inns I've ever stayed at.
Manager Response: Dear jwheel1, It is very kind of you to mention our staff by names and we do appreciate the awesome review. We are sorry about your loss of a family member and do look forward to seeing you back on a happier occasion. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Ok, first the “Pros”—conveniently located, clean, stylish, comfortable bed and well-equipped.  Then the Con and a “note to self”: once we arrived and parked in their nearly empty parking lot, the poor night manager had to deliver the bad news: there was a $15 parking surcharge on top of the room rate. You could tell it had caused problems because the registration form had a SPECIFIC item I was required to initial acknowledging the parking surcharge. The note to self? ALWAYS check the “free parking” amenities filter box in your hotel search engine so you can weed out hotels like this with “gotcha” extra fees.
Manager Response: Dear Mark P, Thank you for all the Pro's and that you liked the hotel. Yes we do charge fr parking and do have it posted on all our booking channels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Hilton Garden Inns have excellent breakfasts. Very clean hotel. Well run hotel chain. Down side, they always charge for parking. The complimentary wifi works very well. The staff was very helpful. This location has a very small parking lot and structure. Sometimes you have to park next door.
Manager Response: Dear Tom Hu, Glad to hear that you liked the hotel and enjoyed breakfast. Do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: lovely hotel with amazing customer service!
Summary: Close to UCI, this new hotel was nice and spotless, with free parking. Denice at the front desk checked us in and he was polite, helpful and full of smiles. he made us feel at home. you'll be the first on my list, next time im back in Irvine. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear jjstarsj, We do appreciate your 5 star review and thank you for mentioning Denice by name. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great Irvine Hotel Close to the Airport and Businesses
Summary: I've tried many hotels in the Irvine/Newport/Santa Ana area when in the area on business, and this is one of the best yet.  The property is 2 years old and built on the new concept of Garden Inn's with an open lobby, bar and limited service restaurant.  While they only promote the buffet, you can ask for a single item at a reduced cost.  The flavored water, cookies and free coffee in the lobby are great.  The rooms are modern, clean and quiet.  Water pressure is good, the functionality of the space useful and plentiful of power outlets for the device burdened frequent traveler.  Be aware that there is a $15/night parking charge even if the lot is not gated.  If you're a Hilton Honors member, this property has the mobile device enabled electronic key.  It works although not a big
Manager Response: Dear dlscps, Thank you for a very detailed and wonderful review. It does look like you are a frequent traveler as you hit all the major touch points frequent travelers would most likely touch upon. We look forward to your next visit to the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: One of the best stays I have had in a long time. As a Chief Engineer at an Embassy Suites, I was not able to find any maintenance issues. Good job team. I will be back to this property and recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear mjcart, Wow, such an awesome compliment from someone in the business!!! Our engineering team will be ecstatic to see your review. Thank you for spending your vacation with us, and for the superb review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The staff was excellent, both the front desk & the event staff. Everyone was welcoming, easy to work with & provided great service for some very last minute changes we had to make for our workshop-seminar for our company.
Manager Response: Dear dominiqueloberg, We are so glad we were able to accommodate your last minute changes, so that your event was able to go smoothly. Till your next meeting. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Found this hotel to be very nice. Very professional staff, clean rooms, quiet, reasonably priced, easy to get to from the highway. I would recommend this   hotel and would stay here again should we be in the area.
Manager Response: Dear C9304THtammyl, Thank you for the recommendations and we are ecstatic that you had chose our hotel for your vacation. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Nice place,  good location, medium value
Summary: Property is very well maintained and/or new.  The layout of the room was thoughtful and worked well.   Room was quiet and comfortable. Staff was courteous and professional.   Parking additional $15 per day was not disclosed on their website!   Note to Hilton,  as a guest I expect to have a parking spot on your property without paying an additional fee!   Breakfast was also $15, but was worth about $7. Not a good value.
Manager Response: Dear mccauleymr, We do thank you for your lovely comments about our hotel, staff and service. I am sorry that you did not see our parking mentioned as we do have it listed on all sites. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: This Hilton Garden Inn has everything a business traveler could hope for.  Great service, clean and spacious rooms, and all the amenities to make you feel like you are home.  Close to the airport, restaurants, and shopping.  This was my first visit to the hotel  When I walked into the hotel it felt like I was walking into the Ritz Carlton; beautiful lobby, large restaurant, and a very gracious and engaging staff.  Felt like I had been there a 100 times but this was my first visit.  Room was beautiful, perfectly appointed, and most importantly for me, very quiet.  Typically when I travel, I run outside but not here.. the fitness room had everything, free weights, ellipticals , treadmills, etc. Best of all there were multiple of each and probably the largest room I've ever seen in
Manager Response: Dear 3kidsrenuf, These awesome comments coming from a lifetime Platinum Marriott member such as yourself, is making me blush, and smile from cheek to cheek. Thank you very much for the compliments and we do look forward to being your choice of hotels when you are in the area again. Safe travels and gratitude. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This Hilton Garden Inn is a wonderful hotel with clean, well manicured rooms, free parking and a hospitable staff.  Not far from SNA airport and very close to some important businesses. It was very close to Fashion Island and resorts in that area.  The cookies were warm and a bottle of water was given. Safe, clean and quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Wanderlust H, We do thank you for taking the time, to give us a shout out. Safe travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Exceptional Hotel with the best Bartender Robert!
Summary: I am at this Hotel 3 weeks a month and highly recommend this property!  Extremely clean and new, staff is excellent, location is great, fitness room awesome and Robert at the Bar redefines customer service....he is professional, friendly and always greets you with a smile.  This is my home away from home and would recommend this hotel for anyone....you will not be disappointed!  Be sure to enjoy some great food, a drink and great conversation with Robert during your stay!
Manager Response: Dear ChrisFAZ, We do appreciate you naming us as, your home away from home, and for the lovely shout out to Robert. We did have a conversation today and he did mention that I had not gotten down to responding to your review. Thank you for the heads up, and we do thank you for the lovely comments. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Staff offers excellent customer service, lovely decor and good food. Try a purple cosmopolitan, it's a delight!  Good location close to all major business locations within Irvine.  My only complaint is the pillows, they need to upgrade.
Manager Response: Dear 389donns, Thank you for our first comment on our "Purple Cosmo's" We do have new pillows, but will have our staff check the quality. Do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This Hilton property is a great value with easy access and convenience. Airport, shopping and dining are just minutes away. The staff is friendly and helpful. I would especially recommend this for business travelers.
Manager Response: Dear debrahB178ZH, This lovely comment coming from a business traveler such as yourself, thank you!!! Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Our company had a recent event at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine and thanks to the staff and crew, our event was a success.  Everything from the initial inquiry to the day of the event, they did an awesome job in accommodating our group and providing us with excellent service.  We look forward to working with them on our next company event.
Manager Response: Dear Melissa405oc, We are stoked that you had a lovely company event and thank you for all the kudos. Till your next event. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel was very nice and the rooms were very clean and comfortable the housekeepers where very nice the only part I didn't like was that when I booked on the internet that I would have to pay for parking that's the only downside or breakfast
Manager Response: Dear mariselao652, Thank you for your post and we are gad that you liked the hotel and the staff. Yes we do charge for parking and breakfast is served dialed in our restaurant. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: Didn't use too many of the facilities, but the room was really clean, the bathroom as well. No scuff marks, etc. I liked that the room (2 queen bed hotel room) had microwave, mini-fridge and a sink.  The place looked very clean and modern and they had an outdoor patio area from the restaurant that was great. Will definitely consider coming back here since I found a good price for it on TripAdvisor.
Manager Response: Dear Eunice E, We are ecstatic that you had a wonderful stay and everything was to your liking. Please visit again. R Dalgado

Summary: Great location, great staff, clean hotel!  We were in the area for a softball tournament and this hotel was chosen by our travel team.  If we are ever in the area for a family trip, we will use this hotel again!
Manager Response: Dear skygal90, Thank you so very much for your 5 star review. Glad that your team travel went well and looking forward to you coming over with your family. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great place and staff, extremely helpful and friendly
Summary: We stayed for 4 difficult days while we moved my disabled brother who lives nearby. We were SO grateful to have a great breakfast in a relaxing, well-decorated area, comfortable room and bed, and especially ALWAYS helpful, friendly staff. On the day of checkout we had last-minute UPS mailing to do to take care of remaining items for my brother, and the staff was EXTREMELY helpful. As we started running out of time for our flight, one of the staff took my wife to the airport (SNA) with the one huge bag we had to check while I was dealing with shipping 6 large UPS boxes. Melissa and Aleeza were particularly helpful. We would definitely stay here again. And it is REALLY close to SNA airport, yet does not have the sterile, business-ey "airport hotel' feel.
Manager Response: Dear tomandchrismorse, We do appreciate this very touching post and am glad that our team was able to help you in your time of need. Thank you for all the lovely mentions and we do hope to see you again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed here for business meetings... great location and good shuttle service....  Seems to focus on business travelers... so not a resort style vacation... but very nice hotel.  The hotel is nice, staff is friendly and it is reasonably priced... would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Dear paul30, Thank you for a lovely post. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Used shuttle service to and from office meetings.  Drivers were courteous and always on time.  Front desk manager Denise was helpful and professional.  The beds, linens ans towels were good quality and always clean.  Housekeeping staff, "Jenny" did a good job.
Manager Response: Dear Charles C, Thank you so much for this wonderful post. It is seldom that our guests mention our staff by names, especially our housekeeping staff, who are the backbone of our hotel. We do appreciate that you did so. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The pictures they have are accurate and the rooms are very nice. The fitness center is surprisingly good for a hotel. Very empty on the weekends since it’s in a business park. Very close to the John Wayne Airport and close highway access.
Manager Response: Dear AC26178689, We do appreciate your 5 star post and all the lovely things you had to say. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great Service from Nigel and Robert
Summary: This place has got it all close to the airport. Has restaurant,bar,gym, washer and dryer,pool. Nigel at the front desk is awesome and kind. Robert works at the bar and he knows his stuff. For nice evening evening join Robert at the bar and he tell what is best on the menu.
Manager Response: Dear Susie C, We appreciate the 5 star review and giving a shout out to Nigel and Robert. Much appreciated. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We needed a room for one night while traveling from San Francisco to San Diego.  This one was convenient and was familiar with the brand.  It was late at night and I called to see if they had a room.  I got the last one available!  I arrived 10 minutes later and they had my room keys and water bottles all set for me.  Very clean rooms.
Manager Response: Dear H1627QHjanep, We do appreciate you choosing our hotel for your travels and thank you for the nice comments. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Located in a business park area of Irvine, the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine is the perfect hotel for a business traveler or a family looking for a less expensive option for a Disneyland visit.   The hotel is new and has the cleanliness and sparkle of a recently built accommodation. The rooms are modern, clean and comfortable. The location - next to the highway - makes for easy accessibility; and, somehow the noise from the vehicle traffic is not distracting.   Overall, the hotel is a good bet and can be a nice weekend getaway if a family is looking to use the hotel as a place to sleep only. However, if you want a place in closer proximity to the southern California attractions - better look for another spot.
Manager Response: Dear Wayne C, Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review. With quadruple paned windows, all highway noise is blocked out.  We are glad that you had a good getaway. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: HUGE shout out to Anthony, Aleeza & Melissa...they were beyond FANTASTIC!! From the moment I stepped in the shuttle they were welcoming and helpful! They found out that I was traveling from across the country and hooked me up with all the local apps and places to check out! They TRULY "made" my visit! They are an asset to the Hilton Company.
Manager Response: Dear Heidi S, Our team will be ecstatic to read your post and see their names mentioned. Thank you for the thumbs up!!! Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I have back pain after I stayed for 2 nights.  The bed is not comfortable.   It may be too soft.  It has parking fee and $15/day.  I paid $30 for my stayed.  In summary, the hotel staff are very nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear dalanchong9394, Thank you for commending the services of our staff. Yes, we do charge for parking and we have it posted on all our booking sites. Being a newer hotel, all our beds are brand new and per brand standards. We normally do get nice comments about our beds and apologize if you felt it was too soft. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: In great shape quiet and easy in and out -  one left then a right, and straight into the airport - with zero traffic. At some large hotels it can take longer just getting out - Will always stay here before flights !
Manager Response: Dear N6202XXscottc, We are so glad you posted your comments, as we too believe the convenience of the proximity of our travelers is excellent, from a distance and traffic standpoint. See you again soon. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Hotel was clean and quiet. The staff was helpful. However, the pool is small and there is no jacuzzi. The snacks from the pantry were expensive. I recommend bringing your own. Overall good experience.
Manager Response: Dear wendymK3026HI, Thank you for your 4 star rating and publishing your overall good experience. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: The shuttle arrived at the airport within 15 minutes after I called. The shuttle driver, registration staff and bartender were all awesome! I had also called for early check-in and had no problem getting into my room upon my arrival. Also asked for late checkout and my request was met with a “no problem” attitude. My room accommodations were wonderful — very comfortable bed, nice large TV, immaculately clean room. Having an on-site restaurant and bar was a nice feature too.
Manager Response: Dear cocowood, This is a fantastic review and we are so glad that you were able to experience our customer service at various touch points. Thank you for this post. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel room was good but the staff made the visit run smoothly.  Denice at the front desk helped me throughout my time there for two different business trips.  He made good recommendations and remembered my name throughout my stays.  Denice and Raajn also helped me package up several items to ship and made arrangements for them to be picked up and shipped.  They went above and beyond, thanks!
Manager Response: Dear 2017_BKB_2017, We do appreciate your awesome post and mentioning our team members by name. They will be very appreciative. Do visit again soon. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: I love this hotel! I love how clean it is and the food!
Summary: Great experience! I will keep coming back! I have no complaints at all. They have really good food and a gorgeous pool! They also have a cool gym and coffee making machine inside he hotel. It is so amazing?
Manager Response: Dear madisonr2, Thank you for this lovely post and mentioning our quality of food and your experience. We love that you will be coming back and thank you for your business and support!!! Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: What a nice experience we had! The feedback I received from our team was very positive: the staff was great, the contemporary decor in the meeting room & foyer was perfect, the property was pleasant and the service was right on time!   My event manager, C.J., was very responsive during the entire process (from reservation through to the event day) and at the property, Aloha was very accommodating with requests before and during our event.   We had a group of 120 attendees seated at round tables which required active participation; the room was a little tight but it met the need. Parking was included at no additional charge - which was great! - though if planning for a large group, make sure to understand and outline parking logistics.   Overall, our event was successful in part
Manager Response: Dear rolanbryant, Thank you for this lovely post. Aloha and CJ will be very appreciative of their names names being mentioned. We do look forward to hosting your events in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great location. Nice and clean hotel. Friendly and courteous staff.Good breakfast menu and buffet choices as well. Would highly recommend it!! A+++  Beautiful clean and inviting outdoor swimmimg pool.Centrally located, but still quiet.
Manager Response: Dear 565luisaa, We just loved your A++ rating and your descriptions of our hotel. We do hope to see you back soon. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Smaller, beautifully done.  Great staff.  Welcoming and accommodating.  Close to freeways and airport. It is comfortable, with the lobby open and inviting, and the casual restaurant.  The feeling is lovely and easy.
Manager Response: Dear 221janelld, Thank you very much for describing our hotel succinctly, we do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Rooms were clean/well maintained and current.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  Found the room to be around 85 degrees Fahrenheit and complained to the front desk.  They sent maintenance and he seemed to act as if he could help and then said that there was nothing that could be done.  Offered me a fan, see attached picture of the fan.  It took about 3 hours to cool the room.  The next day, due to some mixup they made me move to a standard room.  I mentioned that the suite was hot all now got and the person helping me to move mentioned that the AC in every Suite had this problem.  It was an undersized AC unit and the smaller room would be much cooler.  He was correct, in about 20 minutes it was fine in the smaller room.    2 tips for this hotel; go .3 miles and stay at the
Manager Response: Dear lb36067, Thank you for taking the time to write a post and do apologize that your AC in the room was not working. It has since been fixed and the room cools to the appropriate temperatures. We appreciate your comments about the hotel being nicely kept and well maintained. We do hope you will visit again and give us another chance. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This is a business hotel. It knows it and does it's job very well. Comfortable rooms and decent breakfast. Helps u out the door and on with your way.  Was surprised there is an overnight parking fee for a hotel not in the city. Not unreasonable but surprising.
Manager Response: Dear sharky852, Thank you for the post and mentioning our breakfast and comfortable rooms. Yes we do charge for parking. We do hope to see you again on your future travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Beautiful room, light, airy, spacious, high quality furnishings, amenities. Personal a/c & heat - very, very quiet and works perfectly! Lots of pillows on the beds - there was even one just right for picky me. Personnel were gracious, pleasant, extra helpful, patient. Aleeza, at the Front Desk, was terrific!!! She always went "the extra mile."
Manager Response: Dear 1corinth Thank you for this lovely reviw and for acknowledging Aleeza. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary: I was visiting Orange County from San Diego. While I wish there was a location a little further South, the property was nice and the room was clean and modern. I also purchased the Premium internet and it delivered perfectly. Hilton did very well. I love the Garden properties!
Manager Response: Dear Eric G, Thank you for the "Thumbs Up" given to the internet, brand and the hotel. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: The hot el was great, it was clean and very modern. With that being said the room had two annoying features, 1. the bathroom door automatically closes, so it makes it very difficult to hold a conversation while getting ready for the day or evening, luckily I had an old pair of beat of seakers with me and I was able to wedge one of the shoes between the door frame and the door's edge by the hinges and prop it open. the #2 annoyance is a motion detector that is wired into the room making "Green" assuring occupancy, if all the light are off and you are restless in bed and trying to sleep every little movment you make this thing lights up and flashes up on the ceiling, it was a huge annoyance. Breakfast left much to be desired, my first morning I went down solo, and there were only
Manager Response: Dear RMGRMG1979, Thank you for complimenting the hotel. It looks like you did catch us during a busy breakfast time and am glad you were able to seat yourself and have breakfast. Thank you, R Dalgado

Summary: From Nigel at the front desk to housekeeping everything and everyone was super. The room was exceptionally clean, the bathroom also. The fitness center was very complete. The lobby was friendly and comfortable. Other guests encountered were friendly and everyone was happy, smiling, and enjoying their stay.
Manager Response: Dear Jack L, We do appreciate your 5 star review and acknowledging Nigel by name. Thank you so much, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Convenient to Airport - Room Motion Detectors ?
Summary: This is a nice hotel close to SNA. Excellent early morning front desk staff. Very nice.   My only quibble was the room temperature regulation system.  There's a (super creepy) red light that comes on whenever you move in the room.  That's supposed to be linked to the heating and a/c. (Unless you believe the paranoid postings on the internet that say these things are spying on us all.) I prefer to think this is actually supposed to be some sort of temperature control regulation system.  Soooo. I'm apparently a sound sleeper (not moving to indicate a need for a/c) so I woke up at 3am in an uncomfortably hot room despite (I thought) setting the temperature to 68.    Other than that, nice stay.
Manager Response: Dear CarolineMcMuffin, We thank you for your feedback on our heating/cooling sensors, and had a good laugh at where your imagination took you. Glad you enjoyed your stay overall. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The staff was very welcoming and accommodating. It is in a great location, close to the 405. Exceptionally clean, phenomenal breakfast, and helpful staff.  I was there with my group for four nights and I had no trouble sleeping or if I needed extra amenities in my room.  I would recommend this hotel for large groups, business, or pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear nicolettes795, We do appreciate the thumbs up you gave our hotel and services and now need to consider hiring you as part of our sales team. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: Clean & modern hotel with very nice people behind the front desk! Anthony,Denice & Tahira all went out of their way to welcome us & make our stay a joy !           The room, gym, dining area & hotel in general is very clean & organized. I would recommend this hotel to any of my friends !
Manager Response: Dear Paul d, Thank you for an awesome review and for recommending us to your friends. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We love this Garden Hilton, and we stay here every time we are traveling to Orange County.  The numerous times we have been here we have found it to be just as clean, friendly and inviting as when they first opened.  This visit we had a little confusion on my part with a room for my 90 year old aunt, who had broken her foot that day. Nigel at the front desk was so helpful as was Tahira!  I tell everyone I know whether they are going to Disneyland or visiting kids at UCI this is the place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear srk559, We do thank you for this lovely shout out to our hotel, services and team members. We will be here the next time you and your friends are visiting Disney or UCI. Thanks again. R Dalgado

Summary: Clean, efficient, friendly,  quiet hotel.  I missed the 10pm cut off for the restaurant so I cannot comment on the food.  The gym was clean and all equipment was in good working order. The fruit infused water and night time treat were a bonus.
Manager Response: Dear srovito, We do thank you for writing this lovely recap of your trip. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary: I really enjoy this hotel, so much that I have not ventured out in the Irvine area or surrounding cities to find another location. Easy access to the interstate, easy to airport and road noise is non-existent. Very quiet and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear lorcac568, We do thank you for your loyalty to our quiet and clean hotel. Much gratitude. R Dalgado

Summary: Just want to mention Robert is the best Bartender I ever meet, Very professional, very friendly .I'm staying in the hotel for 7 days and every time I see this guy he is so nice and professional, I really want him to get credit for his amazing customer service .
Manager Response: Dear Sepideh M, We are so glad you were able to visit the bar on your stay and encounter the calm, happy and gracious Robert. He will be thrilled to see this review. Thank you for taking the time to write one!!! R Dalgado

Summary: Thank you Tahira and Shilpi for accommodating my request regarding the room. I really appreciate it, it made a huge difference for us.   Besides being very nice, staff is also very professional. ...  Haik
Manager Response: Dear hsargsian, Thank you for a lovely review and recognizing our staff by name. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: First you find out you are paying $15 a day to park.  Then you realize that the water from sprinklers is coming into parking garage and you have spots that won't come off all over your new car.  Further research shows that with special chemicals and work the stains can be removed.  Unfortunately my husband and I are handicapped.  I asked at front desk and was told manager would call.  Never heard from him!  This is not the treatment I'm used to as a Hilton Honors member.  I'll be checking for this parking rip off in the future.
Manager Response: Dear kactus55, We do apologize that your car got sprinkled with water. Yes we do charge for parking and we have it listed as such on our website. We do hope you have wonderful travels in your future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The staff went above and beyond to accommodate us during our stay.  Courteous and professional.  Can not compliment them all enough!!  Saturday our soccer team and another were able to stream the fight.  There were about 50 - 75 people in the bar area.  The staff that evening made sure everyone was taking care!!!
Manager Response: Hello I5538EFrichardd, I am so thrilled that you got to watch the fight with your entire group. Thank you ever so much for the wonderful post ad congrats on making it to the finals. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Very clean, flexible, close to airport, lots of eating places, great weather with many accommodations.  I used my rewards for this stay and it was very easy.  Great for business, or personal travel. Looks and feels like a new facility with a fresh smell in the rooms which I think is important.  Non Smoking
Manager Response: Dear doreanc738, We do appreciate the shout out and thank you for choosing our hotel for your stay in Irvine. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: My family and I weee referred to this hotel by our daughter's new college (CUI). What a fantastic spot! Tahira greeted us with a friendly smile. The entire staff was friendly and accommodating. Breakfast was great, rooms were clean. We will stay here going forward.
Manager Response: Dear ReneeScott, Congratulations on your daughters new college acceptance and we are sure we will see you again, on your future visits. Thank you for pointing out Tahira by name, and she will be thrilled to see her name in print. Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: Booked a group block of 9 rooms.  Staff and facilities were excellent.  Clean, bright, and comfortable.  Location is close to John Wayne Airport, Irvine Spectrum, OC Great Park, and orange county beaches.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location, service and facilities for business meetings
Summary: We booked the hotel for a small training event for our company and used one of the Orchid rooms. The hotel is decorated with great style and the service of all the staff were great. It was an ideal site for our event
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great experience at this hotel. I had a horrible experience at embassy suite in ontario which is part of hilton group, and I was hastened to come here, but hilton garden is a great hotel, great staff and I highly recommend them.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Front desk service was lousy. They were not helpful and were unapologetic when my room was not available, when they wouldn't accept digital payment, and when my digital key didn't work. Worst part was their attitude. Property is great.
Manager Response: Dear Kent D, I do apologize that the Front Desk was not able to accept your digital payment when your key did not work. With the rise in fraud with electronic forms of payment and bookings the hotel does need to safeguard itself for such. We apologize for the inconvenience. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We had a two day training here. Everything was very nice and the employees were super accommodating, making for a smooth and enjoyable experience. To top it off, Lory and Tijara were extremely helpful with a small video we shot for training. Their personalities and constant smiles were lovely and contagious! Thank you, ladies!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is fairly new and had at least three major problems. Pulled into the parking garage when I arrived but soon discovered that the entrance requires a room key. I dragged my luggage around to the front to get to the lobby. A sign out front warning to park in front would have been helpful. Second... we stayed 4 nights- no maid service. After returning from being out all day the room hadn't been touched. Asked for fresh towels. Second day, the same story. Left on the 3rd morning. Lots of apologies but no solution. The third flaw is the location. It is near the airport but tucked away. Other nearby Hilton properties much more accessible. Breakfast was good. Front desk help nice but ineffective.
Manager Response: Dear DeepInTheWoodsMike, We do apologize that you had to lug your luggage to the front of the hotel and that you did not get maid service. Our staff is very diligent in making sure they attend all rooms and will only not enter a "Do not Disturb" room for a day, after which for security reasons they do need to check the rooms. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We coordinated the full soccer team and their families to stay for a recent tournament.   Thank you for spoiling the soccer team and all of our families with a great property and yummy breakfast!    Happy campers all around!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This past weekend my daughter's soccer team was in town for a tournament and the staff (Lory Espinos and Bianca Gilman) went above and beyond to accommodate everyone. They ensured the reservations were intact and rooms were ready upon check in. The facility and accommodations were a two thumbs up for my family. After long days at the field, it is so important to have a place to stay where you feel comfortable and relaxed. The staff at this facility is incredible. Thank you!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: As someone who has stayed in many Garden inns, I was very impressed by this place. Seemingly brand new, the lobby felt fresh and welcoming even when I checked in around 9pm. The rooms were updated and had quiet AC units (my biggest pet peeve when they are loud).   Getting there late and when they were full I was a little worried about parking, but found a spot right away. They do make you pay for parking which looses a star.   The room was very quiet, especially for being near the highway and airport. Didn't hear a sound. One issue is the bathroom door has a spring close, which I don't prefer.
Manager Response: none

Summary: From a Hilton Honors member. We arrived, staff very friendly and we have stayed there in the past Unfortunately when I went into the bed there was dried blood on the sheets UGH!!! I called the manager who looked and examined the blood, never apologized . I told him it was unacceptable. He offered some Hilton Honors points which I declined. He ended up adjusting our room rate and then we were given another room. However, the room was a downgrade as we no longer had a wonderful walk in shower. Instead we got a tub with shower where we had to put down a towel in the tub so we did not fall in the slippery tub Lastly , the box the mattress was on is larger than the mattress by about three inches on each side My scores are low due to the above issues I hit my leg on it as walking
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Tremendous service and nice updated CLEAN hotel!
Summary: We had a large group come into town for a sports tournament at the end of July 2017 and the staff was incredible. Very helpful and attentive to all our needs. My hat goes off to Bianca Gilman and her team for doing such a GREAT job and understanding what true customer service is! Would not hesitate to stay here at this hotel for future business, pleasure or group trips.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hilton Garden Inn Irvine/Orange County Airport
Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine/Orange County Airport on business for a week and was extremely satisfied with the hotel amenities, service, staff and location.  Should I fly back to Irvine will definitely be staying again at that location.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was a very nice, modern and clean hotel. I had no issues whatsoever and I'm pretty picky. The digital key worked just as expected allowing me to unlock a few steps before getting to the door so all I had to do was turn the handle when I got there.   Rooms felt new with modern decor. Bathroom was a bit small. Shower didn't take long to heat up. Had a small bar sink with quiet fridge and microwave.  Sitting areas were nice, but bartender walked away when I wanted a drink and never came back (while I was there).
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here on my Birth-Day, and this was absolutely the WORST hotel I've ever experienced, especially in regards to service and noise level. This reflects not only the location quality, but the company as a whole.  1.) They were rude at the front desk (there was already someone there complaining to the manager while we were just checking in). 2.) When we asked why it was so noisy we weren't offered to change rooms, and they advised it was just the air conditioner. Unless the A/C plays loud music and runs around with feet, it wasn't the A/C. 3.) The walls were so thin, we could hear the people next to us on BOTH sides, and the people above us. Fortunately the noise below us was possibly muffled by the bed. 4.) We had a horrible nights sleep too. The music was blaring loud
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed for an overnight business trip and this hotel met my needs extremely well.   The staff was great, the Bartender gave us great dining suggestions,   The lobby was  just the right balance between business appropriate and fun.  Most importantly, my room was clean and I slept well and was refreshed for my important meeting.
Manager Response: Dear E3411OJdavidw, Thank you for a lovely review. We truly appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Close to John Wayne Airport, Business District
Summary: First, not sure why this hotel has such a high rating. The hotel is fine, literally one mile from the John Wayne - Orange County airport. Has shuttle service to the hotel, but get the pickup location, because it is NOT immediately curbside. It is at a center island opposite United Airlines, Terminal B. So you have to walk there if at another airline. Hotel room was fine, with microwave and refrigerator. Mini-Frig should be a requirement in any business - family stay hotel, certainly from the Brand Name hotel franchises. Good size bath room and with toiletries the appropriate size - larger than one ounce. Pleasant lobby, restaurant and bar in the lobby. Appeared popular when I passed through.  Even a small "mini-mart" in the lobby. Neighborhood is all high-rise offices, so there
Manager Response: Dear Jnjtiger, Thank you for a very detailed review and for complimenting the hotel and amenities. We do pride ourselves on a proper greeting and explanation of our hotel services upon check in, but it looks like we did not do so and I do apologize for the fact that we did not. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Hotel is typical Garden Inn The staff and the food at this restaurant make it stand out!  Location is off the main road so it is quiet. No road noise head at all. The rooms are cleaned the same everyday, not just a make of the beds but a very good cleaning!  Missing executive lounge.
Manager Response: Dear Zorba0032, Thank you for the compliments and will share the same with our Food and Beverage team and our Housekeeping team. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Very late with our room when we arrived at 3pm.  It wasn't ready til about 4:15pm.  This would not have been a problem but this cause a delay in our wedding reception that same day.  Our reception was at 5:30pm.  This delayed us in being on time to our wedding reception.  After, that everything was fine.  It is a good hotel.  But just a bad check in experience.
Manager Response: Dear Emilio H, We do apologize that your room was not ready. I will bring this up our housekeeping department and make sure we do improve in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Hotel is very basic and they charge for parking (and breakfast). If you see the location, you'd wonder WHY do they charge for parking? It's not downtown, it's in an industrial park. Benefit is it's close to the airport and they have a free shuttle.   I won't stay here again. For $300 a night I expect more.
Manager Response: Dear Bauble123i3, We do appreciate you taking the time to write your review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Nice place for short business trip
Summary: Checking in was easy, friendly staff. Spacious room on second floor pretty close to the elevator. The breakfast is pricey, esp if they convince you to have the buffet (you can Oder individually but they have to up-sell the buffet).   Very comfortable room, roomy bed, nice large tv. Parking is hit or miss; either you luck out and find a great covered space in the garage or you're stuck outside with your car heating in the sun.
Manager Response: Dear Peter H We do appreciate the review and we do appreciate the business. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel was very clean and comfortable. The room was really nice and I would definitely stay here again. Parking was not complimentary though, it cost $15.00 per night. The location was very accessible to the freeways, ect.
Manager Response: Dear Crunky1, Thank you for your 5 star review. We do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Brand new hotel , nice and clean , a lot of amenities in room fridge , microwave ,staffs are friendly and nice . Good value for your money .AC system is nice and quiet no odor , parking is convinently located underneath the hotel .
Manager Response: Dear ericcB8970BM, Thank you for a delightful review. Sincerely, R Dalagdo

Summary: the front desk people should not have english as their 2nd language  when you can' understand them and have to ask them to repeat themselves it is very annoying.  paying for the room should also cover parking. if $250 a night is not enough for this then charge more, but do not add it to the bill as a line item, it's like charging for towels
Manager Response: Dear paulwR941NB, Thank you for taking the time to post. Yes we do have staff that speak several languages. I do apologize if you had to repeat yourself.  We do wish you well on your travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Nice newer property but HORRIBLE service! Stay somewhere else
Summary: We stay in hotels all over the world from 3 to 5 star and have never had such bad service as we had here.  When the air conditioning wouldn't work, and the maintenance guy couldn't fix it,  we were offered another room but could not get back to the hotel to move at the time that they wanted us to, although all along we were told it was not a problem. We got a call from the On Duty Manage who told us "We won't guarantee that we will move you because we need you to move now so we can clean it for the next guest as we are sold out". They were going to put someone else in our room with the broken air conditioning and it was a very hot weekend! The manager on duty was very rude and very unprofessional.  I had booked 10 rooms for 2 nights at this hotel for our "group" but she didn't
Manager Response: Dear rayanna, Thank you for writing this review. You are correct as we did have a few of our rooms affected by an AC unit that was acting up. Due to the high demands on AC repair companies this summer, it took a few days to get fixed.  I do apologize that there was any miscommunication with the Keurig machine and you wanting me to call you back. I would love to further discuss the customer service issues you encountered. I can be reached at 9492243900. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Breakfast vouchers should be eliminated and a free breakfast should be offered to all guests. It was awkward with only certain people eating for free and others having to pay. A staff member questioned me about the voucher and checked with front desk to verify that I did have a voucher even though I offered to show it to her.
Manager Response: Dear sandrasambarrios, We do  thank you for choosing our hotel for your stay and do hope that all went well with your water polo tournament. Our staff is required to collect a method of payment for breakfast, be it vouchers which could possibly be negotiated into the rate at the time of booking, or where the  guest pays on their own. We thank you for your understanding. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Business Stay at Hilton Garden Inn
Summary: I think the staff was really good and friendly, and their amenities were up to date and clean.  The rooms were well maintained and  and the plumbing provided really hot water, which I liked.  The breakfast buffet was really good too!  I wish they had some non pork meat products, but they more than made up for it with everything else.   I like how it's close to the airport as well.
Manager Response: Dear 873omarih, Thank you so much for the 5 star review and all the lovely things you had to say about the hotel. We do look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: It looks nice, but service was horrible. Didn't make up the room and there are strange young girls trying to open my car door when I enter the parking lot. Then there is no parking space available, had to stop, enter the lobby and ask, then parked off property. Horrible experience, will never stay here again
Manager Response: Dear alexstay, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. I would like to further discuss your review as to find out more about your comments. Please do reach out and my number is 9492243900 Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Fast Shuttle Pick Up. Very close to the Airport. Experienced front desk staff. Rooms are very clean.On Site Restaurant. This is the TOP preforming hotel in the SNA area.Easy to find on my phone GPS. The Hotel gave me a nice sense of security and safety.
Manager Response: Dear rd400, Thank you for taking the time to write a lovely comment. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Although we live in the Inland Empire, we needed to be closer to family as we prepared for a memorial service. This hotel was a perfect location. The staff made us feel very welcomed and handled all our needs personally and professionally. Our room was very neat, clean and comfortable. It was great waking up to go downstairs and be greeted by the breakfast staff. Great food and great service by all. Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear thealphatek, Thank you for the glowing review and comments. We do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: A Great Place for a Comfortable Stay!
Summary: We were in Irvine to attend a marriage and stayed here for two nights. The hotel is strategically located in a business district and very near to the John Wayne Airport.There is onsite parking, both covered and in open areas. The front office and other staff were friendly and helpful. The room was of good size and neat & clean with adequate furniture such as work table, sofa and television, coffee/tea maker. The bathroom was clean and with standard toiletries. The breakfast had an omelette and pancake station and a variety of cereals plus adequate variety of other breakfast items. There was Free WiFi. We had a comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Dear Traveler-O-World, Love the screen name and thank you for a lovely post. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Hotel being refurbished. Looks nice. Staff helpful. Close to airport. They do offer shuttle to airport. Only takes a few minutes. Typical Garden Inn breakfast. My room had a walk-in shower with no tub, which I like.
Manager Response: Dear Charles S, Glad you liked your room and services, and thank you for the post. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel is in a Nice location. It is only minutes from shopping and eateries. Although it is in a business district and more catered toward visiting professionals, our family still found it pleasant. It is Close to airport. The rooms are very clean.
Manager Response: Dear monacam2017, We do appreciate you taking the time to post a review and giving us a thumbs up. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel is only a couple of years old and was clean and modern.  Our Exchange Convention was very successful and the food and service was outstanding. Sergio was our Banquet Captain and he and his staff did an amazing job of taking care of our every dining need.  I personally have never had that kind of attention from the  dining staff at any hotel that I have stayed at.
Manager Response: Dear Lesleedell, Thank you for your awesome review and mentioning Sergio by name. He will be thrilled to see his name in print.  Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Very Close and convenient to LaGuna, Balboa, Newport beaches etc.
Summary: Just minutes from John Wayne, Orange County Airport. Accommodations with reservations were ready.  The room was large, clean and comfortable.  King Bed, mini-frig, Kuerig Coffee maker and coffee as well as tea.  Sink area.  TV.  The indoor pool was low on PH as it was very cloudy.  This needs to be addressed.  Breakfasts were great, to order omelettes, pancakes and waffles, fresh fruit and juices.   Note:  there is a $15/day charge for parking.  They will reduce to $7.50 upon request.  If you have a disability parking placard,  Check on Calif Handicap parking. (check for yourself on line)  Many places are free or substantially discounted at state parks.
Manager Response: Dear hgwilk1, Thank you very much for your 5 star review. I will keep the engineer abreast of the pool, as they do check it every morning.  Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I really like this hotel.  Very accessible from the airport (SNA), clean, modern and all staff are friendly and helpful.  Good breakfast buffet, and the food at lunch and dinner is unexpectedly good.  I always enjoy a beverage and snack (or supper) on the patio.  The rooms have a small fridge and microwave, which is really nice.
Manager Response: Dear Stacey H, We do appreciate the thumbs up and all the positivity. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Hotel was a very pleasant surprise. Made the visit much more enjoyable. Not a fancy hotel but a great casual ambience. Rooms were very nice and spacious! And the breakfast was really something we looked forward too as it was substantive.
Manager Response: Dear priyojyotim, Thank you for a lovely review and we are glad you enjoyed the breakfast. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great hotel, close distance to everything
Summary: Location was great. Very close to the airport, close to Diamond Jamboree for many dining options. Quiet stay. Also a very clean hotel, with very friendly staff. I would highly recommend this hotel to people.
Manager Response: Dear kristinf170, Thank you for the shout out to our location, hotel and staff. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I hosted a four-day conference at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine/Orange County and was so appreciative to all their event staff for their help and support, both leading up to and during the event. Our event manager, C.J., and our catering manager, Aloha, were communicative and accommodating, and their efforts ensured that the event ran smoothly. Our banquet server, Ricky, was also extremely attentive and went above and beyond to make sure that all our participants and staff had everything we could ask for, checking in on us frequently and immediately taking care of all our needs. Front desk and shuttle staff were helpful and courteous. Excellent customer service on all ends - we were so grateful to everyone for all their work to ensure that our event went well!
Manager Response: Dear eeraanddall, Thank you for a fantastic post and mentioning our team by their names. We do thank you for your business and hope to see you back soon. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This very isolated hotel is near the airport and a lot of business headquarters, but not much else.  If you don't have a car, you will hate it.  By the way, parking that car is going to cost you about $15 per night extra.  Breakfast is another $15 per morning.  Quality Internet Access is an additional $5 per night.  The rooms are large and comfortable, and very quiet.
Manager Response: Dear IllinoisSusan, Thank you so very much for your post. We do hope to see you again, on your future visits. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel offers a lot for the money and lives up to its excellent reputation.  posjfoiqaerkljqnkarng.kqjbargkarnanglrwbgnuibarkjuibgli luirhbqui3h3uihgqui53hgqui3h43gfuqh;ui34gh;iquh4gq;iu3h4;iuqh;3ui4hq;ui3h4fqu34hgqui3h4uih3g;oqh3;4uhq;uih
Manager Response: Dear Michael, Thank you for your post and the statement you made. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I love this hotel!  It is small enough to feel really cozy but large enough to accommodate our needs.  Because I was there for a convention, I did not use all that was offered.  The food was wonderful and the staff exceptionally friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear slashmett, Thank you for a lovey post and glad you liked the food and the staff.

Summary: When I travel I chose to stay a Hilton brands, I can always look forward to a excellent stay, great staff and quality rooms. I would recommend this Hilton Garden Inn for any body coming to the area for work or pleasure, close to the airport and shops. Excellent dining inn, a great bar.
Manager Response: Dear rickym735, Thank you for the thumbs up review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Our team was in town for a short time to host a demonstration for our customers working in Irvine. Aloha, CJ, Sergio, and Francisco all helped make sure our event went off without a hitch! Aloha and CJ really made it easy and comfortable for me to plan this event from another state. Thank you all so much!
Manager Response: Dear jrkelly22, Thank you for your lovely post and naming our team members.  We do appreciate your business. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: had just one night stay here and very positive and peaceful stay and a wonderful breakfast before i left. the staff was very helpful and professional. i would highly recommend this hotel. the only downside is the location which is in a business park area so you cannot walk to any shops
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel. Clean and friendly. Plus those oat cookies are always delish. It's Irvine so everything feels a bit pricey. At least with this Garden Inn I felt like I was getting my money's worth. I will definitely be staying here moving forward.
Manager Response: Dear V4311Rcarlos, We do appreciate a 5 star review and all your kind words. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I  had a great visit. The food was excellent. Robert at the bar was knowledgeable,  pleasant and made great recommendations for dinner. I will definitely be back next time I am in town.  Was on town for two nights, had the tuna steak it was wonderful.  I highly recommend staying here.
Manager Response: Dear Carolyn S, We look forward to your next visit and appreciate your post. Robert will be thrilled to see his name in print. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Visiting daughter from UCI ...I've been here before so I know quality and area. Lots of surrounding amenities as well as close proximity to Newport Beach as well as Irvine to get together with friends and family ❣️❣️
Manager Response: Dear angelacN3740KO, Thank you for returning to our property and enjoying our hospitality. Aprreciate the post. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We spent 3 nights here while doing college tours. It was a great hotel and easy access to college visits as well as shopping. We would definitely stay here again. I was surprised we had a microwave and refrigerator! I didn't recall seeing that on the room features.
Manager Response: Hello Linda S, Thank you for your lovely review and glad you liked our microwaves and refrigerators which we have in our rooms. All the best in your college selection process. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I've stayed at a lot of Hilton Garden Inn's for business travel over the years, and I've got to say this was one of my favorites.
