The hotel was pretty modern and clean, the staff was super nice, and the rooms seemed pretty new.  There was a larger than usual shower in the bathroom, it had a microwave, mini fridge, Kurig coffee maker, and not a bad view either.  I would absolutely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Gerard V, We do appreciate your 5 star review and a recap of our rooms and view. We look forward to your future stays. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I love Hilton properties. This location was close the office I visited for work. It met all my expectations and really did exceed them as well. The shuttle service from the airport was quick, friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Hello Tawni J, We are so glad tat you loved our property and that we were able to meet your expectations. We look forward to your stays in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The 2 room King Suite was ENORMOUS for the rate! A large living room area with bathroom in front of larger sized King bedroom and Oversized step in tub , seperate shower. All updated interior. Comfortable furniture. Very clean.
Manager Response: Hello 665kimberlig, That was a "suite" review and we do appreciate you taking the time to do so. We do wish you safe travels and hope that they bring you our way in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I had a very nice stay at this hotel.  It is about 1 mile or so from the airport, and they have a free shuttle to get you back and forth.  The pool was warm and nicely maintained and the lobby was spacious with comfortable seating.  The front desk was nice to work with before,during and after my stay.  I did not eat the breakfast buffet as it was too much food for a business morning and the price was a little high @ $15.  It looked great and was most tempting!  I think on the weekend, I would definitely consider it.  All in all...a great place to stay (and I am typically a Marriott traveler).
Manager Response: Dear Carl V, Thank you for an awesome review. A Hilton conversion possibility coming from a Marriott traveler is a nice compliment, that we will gladly accept. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary: Good stay, all clean and perfect.  One CON was that I was double charged, 2 weeks later no refund yet ... I will need to call again and request my refund again.  But all else was fine. Would stay here again, but request to not to double charge me
Manager Response: Dear X9412LSaliciam, Thank you for the 5 star review and the wonderful comments. I do apologize if there was an accounting error and will gladly rectify the same. Please feel free to reach out to me with the confirmation number at 9496568700 Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: New near SNA and free shuttle.
Summary: Like most Hilton properties very clean With quite a nice design to boot.   Choose to be close to SNA for early Sunday departure.  Less than ten minutes door to door on shuttle.  Shuttle leaves on half hour and best to reserve at front desk at check in.  There is a $15 parking fee which will be waved depending on HHonors level.   Room service, comfy bedding as all Hiltons a indoor pool with outdoor feel, executive office, coffee, tea and ice water in lobby.  Heads up they do not have wireless printing.
Manager Response: Dear charleshP1560LC, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Beautiful hotel--very modern and clean. Staff was very helpful. We utilized the airport shuttle with no problem. Eating at the bar, the bartender was very personable and cheerful. All the way around, a great experience.
Manager Response: Dear Rory W, We do appreciate you lovely review and the nice comments about our hotel, services and staff. Do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Terrible management, poor food service, horrible internet service, poor parking places, poor and very terrible solver of problems and horrible attitude towards long staying high paying guests… WILL NEVER go there again and DO NOT recommend anyone who likes himself to go there ever...
Manager Response: Dear bahaaf2017, It is upsetting to hear that you were not treated to the standards that we so stress on having, and giving each of our guests the stay they so deserve. Please feel free to reach out to me at 9496563700 so that we may discuss the matter. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Excellent hotel.  Well recommended!  New facility with all the comforts you would expect while on travel.  Was able to exercise and rest for some important marathon type meetings.  Will definitely choose this location when back in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Eggy1975, We do appreciate the 5 star review and the thumbs up. Much appreciated. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn to attend a weekend seminar in May, 2017.  The rooms are very clean, staff very welcoming and efficient.  Location is easy for nearby shops and beach towns without being in the center of things.  Quiet location and the staff were very helpful with check-in and with our whole weekend event.
Manager Response: Dear Z6323DTjulieb, We do hope you enjoyed your seminar and thank you for choosing our hotel. We do appreciate the lovely post and do come back to visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great service from the time we checked in to the time we checked out. Room was the cleanish of any hotel room we have stayed in and we have stayed in a lot of hotels. Room and bed very comfortable. Breakfast was excellent with great choices. The front desk,housekeeping and dinning room staff were extremely friendly and helpful
Manager Response: Dear Larry 5, Thank you so very much for the awesome comments and the post. Much appreciated. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Why be a Hilton honors member? It's against their policy's
Summary: It does not do any good to be a Hilton Diamond. It's against their policy's to give you your points! Don't drop your bags off early, they will charge you! Also play favoreds with guests, we were told we had to wait 20 minutes to eat next guest came down and was served. What a crock!
Manager Response: Dear Y6828MYdaver, Thank you for being a Diamond member and for taking the time to post your review. We are more than happy to give you points and as a diamond member you do get additional points for your loyalty. However, we do so when the booking is through the brand and brand website. If you did book through an independent website or third party website, your diamond status or membership is not included through that booking channel. If we did make a mistake I will be ecstatic if you give me the opportunity to rectify our error. Please feel free to reach out to me with your confirmation number at 9496568700. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I'm impressed with this hotel and how nice, clean, spacious and comfortable the room was. We had a great night of sleep! The lobby area is inviting, evething looks fresh and new. Check-in was fast and easy. The location is very practical close to the airport and freeways. I think we got a great deal for this hotel. The only reason I'm not giving a 5 is because of the breakfast staff is not attentive compared to other locations we have stayed at Hillton Garden Inn. I like when I get coffee asap and don't have to go ask for it. Still I will try this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Kaety F, Thank you for all your lovely comments about our staff and services. We will make sure to get your coffee refilled pronto on your future visits. I did speak to our F&B Director and he has instructed his staff to leave a coffee carafe on tables that need their coffee "pick me up" in the AM. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel looks to be recently updated. The front desk was very friendly, the rooms were clean, Parking was easy and close to airport. I would recommend staying here. They do not have a complimentary breakfast which is a shame, but they have a restaurant for all meals for those arriving on a flight and do not want to bother with traffic to find somewhere to dine.
Manager Response: Dear Stacy60056, Thank you for the 5 star review and the recommendations. We do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Staff was friendly but rooms were dull and dirty. The location is convenient, being close to John Wayne/Orange County airport but the hotel itself falls below expectations. I would not recommend this facility.
Manager Response: Hello 541marissah, Thank you for the post and for the kind words about our friendly staff. We are sorry that you did not find your room clean as our staff takes great pride in keeping the rooms clean. I would love to hear more about your stay and can be reached at 9496568700 Sincerely. R Dalgado

Summary: The place was clean and the staff was so helpful. We were there for our daughter's graduation. We enjoyed our stay and will use this hotel again for our next daughter going to the same college. Try the breakfast it's awesome
Manager Response: Dear Grad05017, Congratulations on the graduation of your daughter and thank you for your vote of confidence. We do look forward to your next big event in the family and being able to host you again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great Value for Price, but No Breakfast
Summary: I went with a group on a business trip. The hotel was lovely, clean and modern, and the staff was helpful, kind, and friendly. It has a convenient little business center with free printing, nice pool and gym, and plenty of cafe area for events/working/meeting. Food at the cafe if decent, but there's no complimentary continental breakfast or anything. They just have a $15 breakfast buffet, which I guess is nice if you're really hungry, but if you just want a coffee and a piece of fruit and a muffin it's a bit much.
Manager Response: Dear 83brentr, Thank you for your detailed comments about our hotel.  Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary: Experienced the best of every marker of a quality hotel and the only downfalls was the amount of parking spaces and location of the hotel. Although, everything I needed was a 10min drive away! My family enjoyed their stay and we were traveling with our 1 and 3year old children!
Manager Response: Dear Tee_Amor, We are so glad you ejoyed your stay with the family. Do visit again. R Dalgado

Summary: The lobby was beautiful with water awaiting. Loved the atmosphere of this hotel. The rooms were very clean and nice.  Overall the experience was very pleasant. The services provided were excellent. I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear 622mollyh, Thank you so much for the 5 star rating and all the lovely things you had to say. Love the recommendation. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: A great place to stay in Irvine
Summary: We have stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn several times now and each time it has exceeded our expectations.  When down in that area I'd stay there again.  Staff is always helpful and cordial and the accommodations are very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Arthur W, Thank you for acknowledging our staff and for staying with us when in the area. We do appreciate the business. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: The best bang for the buck!
Summary: Rooms and facility first class in every category.  Rooms were so nice and clean, and fully equipped.  Breakfast was phenomenal. So impressed! Hilton Garden Breakfast was incredible, every hot item and cold you could;d possibly think  of.  Very accoomodating
Manager Response: Dear 756randye, We are thrilled with your enthusiastic review and the lovely compliments. We are glad to be of service!!! Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: My last review said my family would stay again if we were in the area.....so we did
Summary: We stayed here less than 6 months ago and I wrote a review saying that we would return if we found ourselves in the need of a hotel near SNA Airport again. Well that happened this past week! Once again my family was very pleased with our stay at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine / Orange County Airport.   - Parking is still less expensive than most hotels in the area, and more importantly...easy!! - Location...location...location: this is as good as it gets when flying in/out of John Wayne Airport. It's 4 minutes away from the airport!! - The hotel is clean and nicely appointed.  - The staff is great (and I wasn't called "boss" this time!). - The bed was comfy, although not quite as comfy as I remembered.  - I still LOVE that they have DirecTV.  - It's < 20 minutes from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Lake_Golf_Pro, Love the commitment to come back again and actually doing it. We do appreciate the vote of confidence and we are glad to serve you. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: 30 minutes calling front desk no answer at 3 pm weekday, long line at check in, 1 attendant, manager missing in action, phone ringing off the hook, of course nobody to pick up front desk phone. Painful and long check in
Manager Response: Dear MartialMaitam, I do apologise that you had to wait to check in and do hope the rest of your stay was pleasant. Please do visit again and give us another try. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Excellent facility - wish services had more availability
Summary: I stayed in the Lilac Suite, which happens to be the room picture on the website for the King Suite. Gorgeous room, deep tub, very comfortable! However, room service is ONLY available from 5-9 PM and the on-site restaurant has limited hours as well. Very difficult to eat when I needed to. Thankful for the snack shop on site, but lunchables aren't what I normally prefer eating!
Manager Response: Dear tamis214, Thank you so very much for the 5 star review and your description of our Lilac Suite. We do serve breakfast lunch and dinner Monday through Friday as well as breakfast and dinner on the weekends. we are glad you were able to avail of our pantry that is open 24/7. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Only stay here if 6 am flight fromJohn Wayne
Summary: The only reason to stay here is if you have a 6 am flight from John Wayne. Otherwise do not stay here!!!! Pool is tiny No free breakfast Pay parking only  No hot tub This place was so bad I can't say anything else
Manager Response: Dear DingoLethbridge, We do appreciate you taking the time to write a review. We are disappointed that we did not meet your expectations. Please do call me when you get a moment as I would like to further discuss with you. We normally do get wonderful comments about our staff and levels of service and wanted to see how we dropped the ball with your stay as your review did not mention specifics. I can be reached at 9496568700 Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, convenient location, friendly staff.
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for one night for a business trip.  My business was in Irvine, so this was a convenient location.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  The room was clean and quiet.  I would definitely stay here again if in the area.
Manager Response: Dear windycityjp, Thank you very much for your excellent review. We do appreciate the comments and your intent to return. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Enjoyed my night there. Staff was extremely helpful.  There was an issue with my reservation but manager was able to offer me comp meals during my stay.  My room was amazing, and they offer Direct TV cable movie channels.
Manager Response: Dear 609chereep, We do appreciate your lovely review and taking the time to do so. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Super convenient to the airport, nice pool area, updated rooms and decor
Summary: Very nice overall.  Updated rooms and overall decor, nice pool area, and technology works pretty well.  Small bar and dining area but good enough.  Plenty of nearby places at which to dine.  Friendly staff.  Daily parking charge is steep for hotel guests, and the spaces are limited to the rear of the hotel.  Recommend.
Manager Response: Dear David F, Thank you for recommending the hotel and for all the lovely things you had to say about us. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Very clean rooms- good mattress- friendly people- good breakfast - excellent stay.  Hotel in good location for going to the beach and starting our vacation from here.  Will come again.  Reasons enough to come again.
Manager Response: Dear Henk R, Thank you so much for an awesome review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Central to everything in the OC and amazing service
Summary: The staff is extremely friendly and willing to go out of their way to help.  The hotel is located close to the airport and they have a shuttle that can come pick you up. They even waited for me even though it took me longer to come out.  Also, the major attractions of the OC are nearby, not more than 10 mins away (I ubered around easily).
Manager Response: Dear Evaristo-Lopez, We are so glad you had a lovely stay and that our staff was able to wait for you at arrivals. Please do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Everybody was very helpful and friendly, all the personnel was very professional. We attended an event from my company and the conference room as well as the room have easy access and employees were aware of the information and guided us to the proper location.
Manager Response: Dear Q59155SOvictorf, We do thank you for a 5 star review and the lovely things you had to say about our staff and hotel. Thank you for letting us host your meeting. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Easy Access To Everywhere In O.C.
Summary: We upgraded to a suite and the extra room with a sofabed was terrific. Plus, an extra half bath meant we didn't have to take turns. The mattress was very supportive and we got a good nights' rest. It was a very quiet hotel, at least, where we were on the fifth floor. We were with a large group of high school students, but there was plenty to eat at the breakfast buffet. Price was good, not as high as other Hilton properties, but just as good. It is within 5 minutes of UCI and John Wayne Airport. Plus, just a minute from the freeway so you have access to Disneyland and all the other attractions of O.C. I think this is a good property and I'd go back.
Manager Response: Dear HappyTraveler0109, Thank you for a detailed breakdown of our hotel and we are excited that you and your group had a wonderful time. Do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights on a business trip in CA. Rooms are very spacious and have a microwave, frig, and Keurig machine!  Rooms were clean and hotel is in a very safe location. Would definitely stay here again!!!  Food in restaurant was also very good!!!!
Manager Response: Dear GreatFamilyTime5, Thank you for an awesome review and glad you had a great family time!!! Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Hilton Garden Inn at orange county airport.  The staff was very accommodating him and we utilize the shuttle service from the hotel to the airport. Our driver was prompt leaving at the time he noted  at 5 AM.   Overall it was a good experience
Manager Response: Dear MPRM1009, We do appreciate the excellent review and glad you enjoyed your stay. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel close to John Wayne Airport
Summary: The Hilton Garden Inn is a new property within 5 minutes of the John Wayne Airport.  The property has a welcoming lobby including a tasteful bar, conference room for meetings, and a fireplace.  The rooms are tastefully decorated and the bed was very comfortable.  Rooms include a refrigerator.  Hotel also provides shuttle service starting at 6:00 AM for pick up and delivery to the Airport.
Manager Response: Dear Shannon M, We are so glad that you had a wonderful stay and loved your review. Much appreciated. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Can't go wrong with this hotel.  The staff are very professional and attentive!  The rooms are very well maintained.  The best part of my stay was the excellent breakfast the next morning.  $15 for a buffet which includes freshly made waffles, french toast and omelets!
Manager Response: Dear briong2017, Thank you for this lovely review and we are happy you got to experience our breakfast and staff. We look forward to your future visits. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Worst night I ever spent in a hotel
Summary: I asked for a quiet room away from noise sources such as vending machines, elevators, and ventilation systems. I was put in a room on 5th floor, which was noisy. I asked for another room and i was placed again on 5th floor. This was worse than the first one so I decided to stay. The noise from the ventilation system - heating/air conditioning was on almost continuously. It was loud and I couldn't sleep at all. Ironically I saw a sign in the room stating 100% satisfaction or you don't pay. When I checked out and asked about how I liked my stay I told the clerk it was awful. Her response was that they would call room maintenance. Absolutely no concern about my stay and no effort made to make amends. I am not happy with my experience and resent paying for such an experience.
Manager Response: Hello barrinst, We are so sorry that you did not get a good nights sleep even after our staff changed your room. I request my Front Office Manager to reach out to you to apologize personally and do hope that you give us another chance to gain your confidence. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Went to Disneyland and had an early flight out. Took an uber from airport to this hotel. It has free shuttle to the airport. Super quick to the airport. Clean and accommodating. Staff was friendly. Rooms are clean and nice. Good hot coffee in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear jillw926, Thank you for the wonderful review. We do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great out of the way, smaller Hilton. Close to OC airport great parking, in a side business district, quiet even though on a frontal street by Fwy. No room service only breakfast & dinner in bar/restaurant
Manager Response: Dear Terry F, Thank you for the 5 star review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We stayed here a couple days before flying out of John Wayne airport.  The location to the airport was very convenient and they offer free shuttle service.  The rooms were very nice and clean.  The beds and pillows were extremely comfortable.  The price of the room was very reasonable.  The front desk was courteous and professional.  The pool was clean and inviting.  The website shows a hot tub, but I didn't see one. Nice workout room too.
Manager Response: Hello Shawn M, Thank you so much for an excellent rating. We are glad that you enjoyed our staff, services and amenities. I did go through all our digital media and was not able to find the picture of a hot tub that you found. If you are talking about bath tubs we do have them in our double queen rooms only. Our kings are equipped with showers. If you would not mind sending me the wecbsite you are referring to, that would be great. I can be reached at rdalgado@s3hotelgroup.com Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Second time around..just as great as the first
Summary: My second time staying here and it was just as great. Blown away by the consistently great service from the staff at this Hilton Garden Inn. I didn't have breakfast last time I stayed but I tried it this time and it was very good. I always look forward to staying here whenever I fly into Irvine for business.
Manager Response: Dear pwinchester76, Thank you so much for the sincere comments about our staff and services. We do thank you for taking the time to put thoughts into words. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I was a little concerned being so close to the airport, but I slept like a baby!  The front desk staff was beyond amazing and helpful!  The room attendants made sure my room was in great shape.  I strongly recommend this hotel if you're in the area.
Manager Response: Dear amysW5170UO, We are stoked that you slept like a baby. With our quadrupled paned windows, all noise is kept out. We look forward to your future visits. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: No frills and fancies .. basic hotel, but a good hotel and is worth the money.   The onsite hotel provides basic, but good and healthy options. The hot breakfast available in the hotel is excellent in terms of the options available, the quality.   I would like to focus on the friendliness of the staff in the restaurant area - the bar, the dinner, the breakfast .. very cordial, very polite and very efficient.
Manager Response: Dear Daisy H, Thank you for highlighting our breakfast team and we are glad you had a wonderful experience. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I arrived to a disinterested front desk staffer. Was not offer water as per my other experiences at Hilton brand hotels. They charge for parking, which I find ridiculous. AND worst of all there was, omg, dried mucous on a pillowcase of the bed I was suppose to occupy!  The response from the front desk to this was to ask ME to call housekeeping. I was offer a discounted rate by the day manager. But when I checked out I had to remind them of this offer. Pretty terrible.
Manager Response: Dear jaqriv, Thank you for taking the time to write your comments. Yes we do charge for parking and display the same charge on all our booking engines. In regards to your pillowcase, we have an excellent team that strives to give our guests the perfect room. Please be assured our high cleanliness scores encourages our teams to strive to do a better job and placing used or dirty linen in clean rooms is definitely not on the agenda. We do hope that you will try us out again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We were a group of teenage basketball players and parents, in town for a tournament.  We were able to get a block of rooms at a very good rate.  The hotel was welcoming, clean, the food was good, the rooms nice.  All around a very pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear WarriorBabe1996, Thank you for choosing our hotel for your travel and hope that you had a great tournament. Do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado.

Summary: I always stay at this Hilton Garden.  The staff is very good, breakfast is excellent and the facility is very clean. My room was prepared and ready to go when I arrived and the front desk staff had everything ready.
Manager Response: Dear Grant E. D, Thank you for a very nice review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Best hotel I've stayed at for such a cheap price! Everything was clean and up to date. The beds were comfortable. I loved the interior decor of the rooms as well. The shower was roomy and so nice for a hotel shower. Very pleased with everything.
Manager Response: Dear Sarina M, Thank you for the top notch review. We do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Loud A/C in the suite - had to leave it off. Horrible coffee for breakfast - no espresso. Asked Front Desk for Keurig, she insisted on charging me $3.5. Same thing is free in my room. Very poor handling of a small request.  Parking fee for not gated property. Very cold ambiance in the room.  Will never stay there again. Better choices around.
Manager Response: Dear Calmhawk, We are sorry that your stay was not a pleasant one. Unfortunately we do not serve espresso and you are correct we do have Keurig Machines in your rooms for your convenience. Safe travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel is on the "high" end of the reliable Garden Inn chain. Professional and courteous staff make check in/out easy, especially helpful after a long day of flight delays.  Clean rooms with great linens help give you that "ready to flop" feeling.  I especially like the bar/restaurant with friendly but unobtrusive staff for a quick beer and salad after a day of meetings. Parking is $15/night. Nice looking pool and gym, but I didn't use them this trip. Comfortable lounge with fireplace and free coffee for reading the morning paper.  Shuttle to airport.  My choice for business in Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear MailcolmandSirrius, Than you for your glowing review and a beautiful description of our services and offerings. We do look forward to your future stays. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Last night we stayed at this hotel and was very impressed with our stay.  The people were extremely courteous and the breakfast was excellent.  The rooms were very nice and clean but a major mistake was made with the bathroom door.  When opened, it was impossible to open the door.  They should have had a "pocket" door setup instead.
Manager Response: Dear tomcarterprod2016, Thank you very much for your five star review and the compliments to ur staff and services. Will pass on your comments to our design team on the bathroom door design. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Very Clean and would recommend anyone to stay there.  New Property! Staffing very polite.  I don't have any complaints.  I would highly recommend anyone to stay there.   The drawback is you have to pay for parking.
Manager Response: Dear Angela M, Thank you for the praise and high score rating. We do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Looks better than in the pictures
Summary: Quiet, clean, comfy, cool.  I stayed here for one night on March 4, 2017.  Great price on the website.  Good service.  Microwave, mini-fridge, keurig.  Great shower head if you're into that sort of thing.  I didn't hear any noise from the airport (the windows must be double-paned but I can't confirm that).  They offer a buffet breakfast for $14.95 which I did not partake of.  They are close to a Whole Foods (probably one of the best Whole Foods I have ever seen and I have seen many).  I would definitely stay here again.  I was told it is only a few years old so everything is modern and nice.  Covered parking but there is a $15.00 fee.
Manager Response: Dear victoryliberty, Thank you for your wonderful comments. Yes we do have a Quadrupled paned window that keeps all outside noise "out" We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great hotel with a modern flair and off the beaten path. Next to airport but was not disturbed by the noise of the airport. Super customer service, clean rooms, plentiful parking, and easy access to the airport.
Manager Response: Dear emilysA5045CZ, We do appreciate the lovely post. Thank you, R Dalgado

Summary: I stayed one night on business, had the typical (excellent) HGI experience. Room is comfy, wifi worked (I still wonder if I am getting "premium" wifi...it seems slow, and doesn't tell me I am getting anything special), and the breakfast was fresh, hot, and tasty. Staff was friendly and helpful as well.  I left my bag there for the day while I took care of business, then returned and took the shuttle to the airport...it took like 3-5 minutes, super close and easy. I will definitely be here again if the price is right. There are also a few good dinner places within a short walk, so that's handy.
Manager Response: Dear squirrelpaws, Love the pseudo name and thank you for a lovely post. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel was efficient and clean, would recommend for anyone in need of a short stay. It is close to the freeway and John Wayne airport for quick travel access. The facilities were sufficient and the complementary wifi was very good.
Manager Response: Dear 413garretts, Thank you for the thumbs up!!!! Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: So much about the Hilton Garden Inn/Irvine (near OC airport) was really nice--that is, cleanliness, spacious room with kitchenette, helpful staff, on-site dining with reasonable pricing, proximity to airport yet very quiet.  My only gripe is that the hotel should include parking and/or a free meal with the room rate.  It is very comparable to other chain hotels I have stayed at that always include a free breakfast buffet and parking.  This location charged a la carte for $15 daily parking and any meals.
Manager Response: Dear Rosesor, Thank you for posting and liking our staff and property. Yes we do charge for parking and breakfast and do make our guests aware of that on our website. We do hope you will stay with us in the future Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel is very new, only a little over a year old and they are #1 on Trip Advisor for a reason. From the value and ease of booking to the friendly desk staff, I completely loved this stay. The desk clerk Denese was so friendly and very proud of this property. Asked for additional towels which were delivered to our room in under 3 minutes. Check out was a breeze. Quiet, clean and feels new. The only comment is the decor which I found a bit over the top stark and clearly it is meant for the business traveller. It felt a little "cold" and masculine for my tastes, as I prefer a more warm and comfortable/cozy feel. But that's it. Other than the decor it is a lovely hotel and I would certainly choose to stay here again. Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear Renee S, Thank you for confirming our #1 on Trip Advisor spot. It is because of you and guests like you, that appreciate our staff and facilities, that has managed to keep us in this top position. Thank you!!! I will share your compliments about Denice to the team. We look forward to your future stays with us. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great location, there was a shuttle from the airport. I met very friendly and helpful staff. The accommodations were excellent. The food service was very good, workout room was more than adequate and they were accommodating to special requests.
Manager Response: Dear R1060YQrandys, Thank you for you 5 star review. We do appreciate your business. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Hotel is newer and is next to freeway so pros and cons.  I had the 2nd closest room to the freeway and did not hear a thing.  It is in a older business area with not much close right by it.  Pool is very small and same with gym.  Breakfast staff was not helpful with not very many people being served.  Clean room.  Happy hour for dinner was incredible deals and great staff.  I think from 4:30 to 6:30, that was great.
Manager Response: Hello Michael I, Thank you for your review. Yes we do have quadrupled paned windows that protect our guests from outside noise. We are also glad that you were able to enjoy our happy hour. I apoligise if you did not get the best service at breakfast and will bring up your remark with my food and beverage team. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This is an excellent hotel within close proximity to the airport and the interstate. We were in town for business and were able to receive helpful directions to our destination and the staff was friendly and eager to help.
Manager Response: Dear N3157MZjustinb, Thank you so much for your excellent review. We do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We hosted a corporate meeting here recently and the entire experience was great!  The event managers were prompt and professional and quickly accommodated last minute requests.  The guest rooms were clean and nice, meeting space was great and even the food was good!  Definitely recommend staying here and hosting a meeting here as well.
Manager Response: Dear Jessica N, We are very happy that you had a great meeting at our hotel and you found everything to your satisfaction. We do hope to see you at your next event. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This place could care less about your comfort.   Housekeeping started knocking on my door at 8:10 am. Although I told the housekeeper I would need the room a few more hours, they then  came to my room at 8:20 am and then again at 8:30 am. Ridiculous. They finally stopped harassing me when I yelled thru the door to leave me  alone. There was not a do not disturb sign on the door to hang either. It was obvious they just wanted me out of the hotel.   Internet was slow and kicked me off several times. It is very obvious the hotel knows about this issue as they asked me specifically about the internet in a survey.
Manager Response: Dear John K, I do apologize as our over enthusiastic staff wanted to clean your room. You are correct, a simple DND sign outside your door would have avoided your experience altogether and I am sorry we did not have one in your room. We are a newer hotel and we have three times the brand standard required for internet speed. We do hope you will give us another try and experience our friendly staff. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great Service by Anthony and Aleeza
Summary: Anthony and Aleeza were so special and amazing. They went above and beyond to make my stay fabulous.  I was early and they found a great room for me and were very accommodating.  In the future when I come to Irvine I hope to stay at the same Hotel and hope that Anthony and Aleeza will be there.  Thank you so much!
Manager Response: Dear jffranklin, We truly appreciate your lovely post and especially for mentioning our staff by their names. Aleeza and Anthony will be thrilled to see their name in print. We do look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This is probably one of the best of the Hilton Garden Inn hotels, and for that matter of all of the Hilton hotels I have stayed in.  It is definitely at the top of the list of my past stays.  The staff is friendly and helpful and generally reflect what one would expect and hope to recieve as a guest.  The property, building, and rooms are clean and in good repair.  The restaurant serves good food, and the people associated with it actually show that they care for your experience to be satisfactory. I travel the country and stay at many Hilton properties and this one deserves a good review.
Manager Response: Dear Don S, We are ecstatic that you put us in an elite Hilton bracket. We do appreciate it and safe travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Close to the airport and shops
Summary: While i try not to book my hotel near the airport since it is usually not in the citycenter, this hotel came with   excellent reviews. They have a free shuttle that picked us up from the airport which was convenient . The staff was friendly and efficient. Denice  was exceptional and was an excellent resource on where to sightsee, shop and Dine. It is located near a  business complex so it was quiet and restful at night. And only a few minutes from Southcoast Plaza an upscale mall with a wide choice of dining options.
Manager Response: Dear AngieB234, Thank you for the excellent review and glad that you had an excellent stay. Denice will be thrilled to see his name in print. Do come visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Our experience was wonderful in every way but the standout was Chasen, the bartender in the hotel lounge. He was great at his job and made us feel like family from the first minute we arrived. Plus he makes a great "dirty" Martini! Patricia and Jack
Manager Response: Dear js325is, Thank you for your excellent review and for recognizing Chasen. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel in a great location
Summary: I had overlooked reviewing this hotel on our road trip last September; I wanted to comment on a couple of things about this hotel.  First, it is in the best location ever for the Orange County airport.  That was one of my top priorities when looking for a hotel for this last night of vacation.  It is about 5 minutes away which was so nice for a very early flight.  The lobby is very clean and modern, and the staff top notch and efficient.  Our room was spacious and clean.  There is a charge for parking but it was only around $12 a night which is not expensive for this area.  There is a also breakfast offered for a fee but we did not partake as we left extremely early.  I would definitely stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear tyspritey, Having stayed here in September and remembering to write about us a few months later is a treat for us and is very much appreciated. Thank you for doing so. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Average hotel close to John Wayne airport. Located in business area not close to restaurants or other attractions. Charges for parking in small covered area. Close to 405 freeway. Newer building , nice rooms but nothing special.
Manager Response: Dear Cyndi S, We do thank you for writing a review about us and hope that you stay with us again in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great hotel.  Clean rooms and very friendly staff
Summary: We had to book a room at the last minute due to a cancelled flight and selected this hotel.  This Hilton ended up being the only bright spot on a frustrating day of cancelled flights.  The clean rooms, friendly staff and convenient dining options were just what we needed.  The even took us back to the hotel via their free shuttle which was icing on the cake.  Can't recommend this hotel enough.
Manager Response: Dear timgS8844NC, So sorry you had a flight cancellation and glad you loved your stay with us. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great property. Clean comfortable room. Quick to resolve my issues with the TV remote. Folks very friendly. Must stay here if traveling for business. Easy access to airport and business district. Luis at the breakfast buffet went above and below to help with my dietary needs.
Manager Response: Dear ericrZ7994RC, We are very appreciative of your five star review and recognizing Luis. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel is far above what you may expect from the brand. Very clean and modern with friendly staff and a surprisingly good restaurant and room service menu. In a perfect business location and very near the airport.
Manager Response: Dear Chantell S, We are so happy that you experienced our menu and restaurant and loved it. Thank you for taking time to write this five star review. Sincerely, RDalgado

Summary: Located close to a business park. Convenient access to the offices. I was on a business trip and the experience was exceptional starting with the front desk staff to all other employees at the hotel. Give it a try you won't regret!
Manager Response: Dear Aslan A, Thank you for the shout out!!! We do appreciate it. Do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: stayed on the 5th floor, no complaints on noise. rooms and restrooms are a little small, our restroom door would not stay open. pool pictures are deceiving. pool is small and on the 2nd floor.  covered parking and close access to elevators
Manager Response: Dear 281lynn, Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I thought this hotel was going to be a typical experience of a mid-range hotel but I've clearly seen it's definitely not, and that's a great thing.    The front desk was warm and welcoming, and they had no problem with me checking in early - at no charge.  And while the view isn't great - it's in a business park - my room is impeccably clean (I checked everything, and I will be leaving a tip for the woman who cleaned it).  Also, i can't place it specifically but there's a clean, very light and citrusy scent throughout the hotel that is just delightful.  It definitely doesn't smell like other hotels!     I'll be traveling to this area on business at least a few times a year, and look forward to staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear misalarie, Thank you for noticing the cleanliness and the scented aroma in the lobby. Please visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Spotless beautiful hotel ,food was fantastic service was great,Denice the front desk attendant was an absolute star ,i had some issues with my reservations/check in and Denice went out of his way to help me out.
Manager Response: Dear scottyrerrier2017 Thank you for a fantastic review and for a shout out to Denice  Have a wonderful new year  Sincerely  R Dalgado

Summary: Needed hotel by airport.  Very nice, amazing staff will use this hotel going forward.  Easy to get to and from airport without running into LA traffic.  Great if you are using John Wayne Airport.  Five star for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Rhonda B, Thank you so much for the awesome review We do look forward to your future visits  Sincerely  R Dalgado

Summary: I stayed here with my husband for a weekend trip to theme parks in the area. I recommend staying here over hotels in Anaheim or Buena Park because rates are lower and there's more availability. However, be aware there's a $15/night parking fee and breakfast is $14.95 each.   Our stay was great- the room was very neat and clean, and the furniture/fixtures all looked new and contemporary. The restaurant/bar has great food and drinks.  The only thing we didn't like about our stay was there was no tub in the bathroom, and the shower head needed replacing...It was like pins and needles shooting out at you. There's also no jacuzzi at this hotel, just a slightly heated small, shallow pool. So if you're looking for a hotel where you and your significant other can relax and enjoy
Manager Response: Dear Melissa H Thank you for a very detailed review Our king rooms have a shower and all our rooms with queens have bath tubs Sincerely  R Dalgado

Summary: i attend pepperdine's graduate business school and stay here when class is in irvine.  the price is much better than the adjacent hotel, and is not much farther away from the campus.  the lobby is welcoming and bright, and the staff is always very friendly.  rooms are good, beds are comfortable.  not much to complain about!
Manager Response: Dear bktrish, We do appreciate the positive review and look forward to you making our hotel your home away from home in the future  Sincerely  R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great Orange County location for Airport and Disneyland
Summary: My family and I stayed recently for access to the airport and Disneyland. Terrific location! The hotel is very nice, clean, lovely service and wonderful breakfast.  We were lucky to have encountered two terrific employees. We checked in with Anthony at The Front Desk and he was so friendly and greeted us each time he saw us.  When we returned back after a long day at Disneyland we were fortunate to be greeted by Chasen at the bar/restaurant.  Wow he is a super guy, so attentive to our needs and made our evening enjoyable.  These employees are super stars, we will definitely be back to this hotel.  Thank You Hilton Garden Inn!
Manager Response: Dear Kerry M, Thank you for a fantastic review and for mentioning our staff by name. They will be ecstatic to see their name in print. We look forward to seeing you again on your next Disneyland visit. Sincerely  R Dalgado

Summary: Great place! Let's start with the staff who were great and friendly. The breakfast is fantastic, made to order. The room was clean and the bed was very  comfortable. We used the pool everyday for a workout. The gym even has free weights! Perfect location with easy close freeway access. If your there Friday morning the breakfast tostada is the special and should not be missed. The wifi worked great and streamed well. We are looking toward to our next stay in the spring or summer.
Manager Response: Dear Sandy S We do appreciate a lovely review and thank you for that Sincerely  R Dalgado

Summary: I love this Hilton property and stay here whenever we are in the So Cal area. The rooms and lobby are extremely clean. The staff is always helpful and friendly, and they keep the lobby very inviting with fresh cucumber water and also complimentary coffee in the morning and oat bars in the evening. Parking is convenient with a daily charge.
Manager Response: Dear srk559, Thank you for a 5 star review and all the nice things you had to say Sincerely  R Dalgado

Summary: Awesome clean smaller quaint hotel. Great staff and friendly. Decorated very nice rooms were updated and neutral colors. Very user friendly and accommodating features in the room. Has everything you need and more.
Manager Response: Dear desireef2017, We do appreciate the lovely review you wrote and look forward to your next stay with us Sincerely  R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Just what we needed at 30 hours coming back to USA
Summary: Sometimes you just need a quiet, clean and a comfortable bed after a long excursion, drive, & flight.  Being away about 30 hours with a nap here and there we were finally back in the US.  Leaving Chile to Buenos Aires at midnight was a start of a long multi-stop flight to Los Angeles.  Anyway, we were greeted by Denice (spelling?) and he was very helpful.  We told him how long we have been up and accommodated our needs by putting us in a room that was out of the way (2nd floor) and quiet.  We checked in after 9:00PM and had a little conversation and off to the room we went.  The room was great, clean and the bed extremely comfortable; just what my wife and I needed.  Pillows were nice, big and fluffy, bed sheets, coverings were nice and again had that fluffy feel to it.  The
Manager Response: Dear Archie A, Welcome back to the USofA and so glad we were the hotel you chose to stay with. Thank you for the lovely comments you had about the hotel and we look forward to hosting you again. Sincerely  R Dalgado

Summary: We stayed here for 8 days and it was stellar! The rooms were always clean, the staff was friendly, and the food was priced right. They do have a parking charge but that was expected. They also have a pool, no hot tub, and a really nice workout room that has free weights, etc. The restaurant was nice and made things easy when we didn't want to go anywhere.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Chad R, Thank you so much for that lovely shout out and we are glad that you had a wonderful visit Sincerely  R Dalgado

Summary: We had arrived at the property very late at night around 12:30 am after having a hard time getting into a room as we had lost all of our luggage earlier that evening including all of our credit cards, etc. After two other HIlton properties basically said "that's YOUR problem" & wouldn't let us check in , we decided to try one last time at the Hilton Garden Inn in Irvine. Dennis was at the front desk & his sunshiny demeanor, go-out-of-his way helpfulness was exactly what we needed after such a stressful day! Dennis treated us like he WANTED us to stay there, not like he couldn't wait to get rid of us. We had issues in redeeming our points that night & indeed were on the verge of homelessness that night but Dennis handled everything, from helping us talking to Hilton, to telling
Manager Response: Dear Jazzmin J, We are so glad that Denice was able to smoothen everything out for you and thank you for the lovely comments you had about our staff and our hotel. We do look forward to your next visit and thank your for being loyal Hilton Honors members. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: very nice new hotel in Irvine
Summary: I was two nights short of making diamond for next year, so decided to stay here for one night.  I booked the reservation the night before and checked-in online, and showed up the next morning to see the room and have breakfast  What I liked  1. As most Garden Inns I have been to, the breakfast was very elaborate, including hot to order eggs 2. the hotel is new, and it feels new 3. Nice coffee machine, and microwave in the room, and the bed is very comfortable  What I did not like 1. I had checked into a room on the 4th floor.  When I checked in, they gave me a different room (room 235).  the room was ok, except for the view, whcih was a view of the fenced AC unit on the roof top.  As a Diamond member, I am used to getting upgraded, not downgraded.  To be fair, I showed up the
Manager Response: Dear Sean J, Thank you for your review and congratulations on becoming a Diamond member next year. We are sorry that we did not upgrade you to a higher floor and based on your comments, with a late check in, we may not have had the rooms available. Yes we do charge for parking, as most airport hotels and quite a few west coast Hilton Garden Inns. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Our flight home; very convenient to Orange County Airport.  Welcoming staff, very comfortable rooms & beds.  Stayed on the 5th floor-didn't gave a problem with airport noise. Available bar, restaurant...breakfast buffet was adequate
Manager Response: Dear onygo12, Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review and rate us. We do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: nicest to front desk works I've ever dealt with
Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn in Irvine orange county airport and I had the pleasure of meeting Dennis the night front desk work and Sean and wouldn't you know two nights in a row I had a problem and two nights in a row it was handled professionally by Dennis and Sean and I was just so happy that they can take care of these pretty substantially serious problems they are just professionals😀
Manager Response: Dear Herb S, Thank you for your kind words and recognizing our staff. Much appreciated. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great stay, great hotel - With few minor issues (but I'm being picky)
Summary: My wife and I stayed for four days at this hotel.  The best part of our stay is probably the helpful staff (Kat is great!) The room is spacious, HDTV with tons of channels, the bed is comfortable, and the place where most hotels usually fail - The Wifi is fast and stable (we got it for free - part of HHonors?).  Even though it was rather cold, the heated pool is nice, but only for the brave - The pool is located in an open area. Next to the pool there is a small gym like room, but I had enough  We never tried the breakfast, and I agree with the previous comments that $15 for basic breakfast is a bit too much. However, we did try few of the dinner dishes, and they were surprisingly good!  Usually, hotel food feels very... bland, I guess, but the ribs we had were delicious, and
Manager Response: Dear IlanB, We do thank you for your 5 star review and recognizing our staff by name. We do look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, but small beds and pricey breakfast
Summary: The rooms were nice and clean, but the beds seemed smaller than queen beds.  The breakfast in the restaurant was way overpriced at $15 per person, which is essentially the same FREE hot breakfast at many other hotels.
Manager Response: Dear 397geneb, We thank you for taking the time to write a review. Yes we do charge for breakfast and we are glad that you were able to avail of it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Love the staff at this hotel. They still know what service is. My housekeeper was friendly. The front desk was knowledgeable. The restaurant was convenient. The pool area was clean and comfortable. While I didn't eat breakfast or use the shuttle it was nice to know I could.
Manager Response: Dear sarahnV6501UA, Thank you so very much for the 5 star rating. Appreciate it. R Dalgado

Summary: This is a fairly new location. It is clean and has that branded Hilton Garden Inn smell which is fresh and inviting.  I love the flavored with fruit or citrus water that is available in the lobby and cookies too.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie M, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and a lovely one at that. The flavored water is liked by all. We use the Scent Air companies White Tea and Fig aroma, and so glad you noticed. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: All in all great property for the price, location and of course it's Irvine so it is safe. We always stay we Hilton Hotels property and when in OC we always stay in Irvine our former hometown for 20 years.
Manager Response: Dear santis322, We do appreciate you staying with us and writing a positive review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Very short drive from SNA. Hotel is beautiful, clean, and modern. Comfortable rooms. The complimentary shuttle to the airport was convenient. I can't say enough great things about the hotel team. I was on the 5 am shuttle and received a 4 am wake up call even though I'd forgotten to request for one. Very helpful! Can't go wrong with the food at the restaurant; Angelica at the bar has a great personality.
Manager Response: Dear c8615, Thank you for the very nice comments and especially for recognizing Angelica by name. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We enjoyed our beautiful suite. Shower was nice and hot. The beds and pillows were soft and comfortable. The hotel was clean and staff was friendly. Easy to find parking and really good rates. We had to add and change rooms for other people in our group and your front desk staff was very accommodating. Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear independent1_noa, We thank you for your comments and look forward to your next stay. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: From check with the fellow Canadian desk staff to the generous bartender, very friendly and fun Hilton Garden team.  But I must highlight Tracy Bell who was able to get my documents left shipped overnight. Saved my bacon. Thanks, Tracy. Very much appreciated.  Keep up the good work.
Manager Response: Dear Babic072, Thank you for the lovely review and commenting on our staff. Tracy et al will be excited to see that they were mentioned. Safe travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Very nice hotel, fairly new but feels BRAND NEW.  Employees very pleasant, room was very clean.  Location of hotel has quick access to many great restaurants.  The hotel has a nice bar, good food and a seating area outside.
Manager Response: Dear dmerg2016, We just love the "Top Notch" name you gave us. Much appreciated. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Fine Hotel, great staff particularly Chasen the Barman. Clean and modern property with good access to Orange County businesses and SNA airport. This was my second stay and I will use this hotel again when in this area.
Manager Response: Dear William F, Thank you for your repeat business and for recognizing Chasen. He will be thrilled to see his name in print. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel was one of the cleanest hotel I ever stayed with very comfortable bed.  I recommend this place for business or vacation but please don't stay on 5th floor.  The machine on the roof makes very large noise and it bothered me all night long.  Other than that, very nice!
Manager Response: Dear qrios403, Thank you for your lovely comments and so sorry that you were disturbed. we are looking into what noise factor you brought up as we do not get any complaints for our 5th floor guests otherwise. Thank you again. R Dalgado

Summary: Staff were courteous, lobby was welcoming, room was clean, breakfast was delicious, and I had a great swim in the pool (which is on a sort of covered balcony--so you aren't exposed to the elements, but you can see and enjoy the elements! It's also heated).
Manager Response: Dear kathrynf160, Loved your explanation of our pool which is spot on. Thank you and do visit again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great place to stay but parking…
Summary: Great place to stay, hip, clean, quiet, comfortable but $12 for parking  is completely ridiculous.   Honestly, brand-new place with great accommodations but when you factor in the money for parking, I could've stayed a little closer to where I was working in a slightly better hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Adam C, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and stating that the hotel was clean and that you like it. Yes we do charge for parking and have it posted on all our web pages. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Thank you Bianca,Lory,Aloha and all their staff including Francisco who kept all our guest staying at the hotel very happy. We all felt welcome and we'll taking care off. We are looking forward to our next stay with you guys again. Thank you for being so attentive will all of us.
Manager Response: Dear Abraham Nieto, We are ecstatic that you and your guests all had a wonderful stay and experience. We would like to thank you for the 5 star rating and mainly for acknowledging our team members by name. They will be thrilled to see their names in print. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I repeatedly stay at this hotel, because it is very clean & quiet (surprising being so close to the airport).  The staff is above par.  They are all so warm and friendly and genuinely care about your stay.  My only dislike is that they NEVER have enough parking.  You find bigger parking lots at grocery stores.  You pay for parking, that you may not get. There's only like 60? spaces. The hotel is large and very nice. Their breakfast, I've contemplated 1x.. It's pretty standard, not what I would consider impressive more like Best Western level.  Their bar is nice as is their sitting areas in the lobby.  Its funny, as I stay at the Four Seasons allot and this specific hotel is right up there with them, with exception to no honor bar (which I'm fine with), no adequate parking, and
Manager Response: Dear kristinc499, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and giving us a top rating. We are so glad that you mentioned our warm and caring staff and that does mean a lot to us. As with parking we do have 90% of parking spots based on the number of rooms and as per city code. Being close to the airport with guests using our hotel shuttles and Uber, we have been able to please our guests. This must have been a one off night. Apologies. R Dalgado

Summary: The location of the hotel has a bit of an industrial feel, but that is more than overcome by the warmth of the staff and the business-like appointments.  The breakfast is a flat fee for the buffet, but the waitstaff made for it all. Omelets, French toast, waffles all made to order, was an exceptional touch.   Full bar with a fine menu, just a bit pricey, but again, excellent service.   Comfy bed and room. Who needs more?
Manager Response: Dear chinesesun, We do thank you for the glowing remarks in regards to our staff, food and beverage offerings and service. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: My wife, two year old daughter, and I stayed the night before flying out of John Wayne Airport. There are A LOT of hotels in this area and each one has its own pluses and minuses. Soooo.....what does the Hilton Garden Inn offer?  First and foremost it was conveniently located to the airport while being very clean and comfortable. The beds and pillows were some of the best I've had a hotel. This obviously varies from person to person, but for me they were great. The location was 2 minutes from the airport. This is HUGE in this area because of what Southern California traffic can offer on any given day. It was nice to know that we were 3-4 turns from the airport and didn't have to mess with the highway traffic jams that are synonymous with SoCal.   The room had a refrigerator,
Manager Response: Dear Lake_Golf_Pro, Thank you for taking the time to write a very detailed and helpful review. We are pleased that you had many positive views on our hotel. Yes we do have some newer and over enthusiastic team members that lean towards the casual side and that will be addressed. We do have a 24/7 well stocked Pavilion Pantry that I am positive you would find something for your two year old girl and yourself. We do look forward to your next visit in the area. Happy golfing. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: This is my new Irvine hotel for business
Summary: This lovely, newer hotel is convenient to the airport but without the runway noise of hotels closer to SNA. The hotel is fresh, clean and modern.  Their service levels are out of this world! The front desk and the grill staff alike are friendly and attentive.   I was eating lunch at the grill before a meeting and mentioned casually that it would be great if my room became available so I could change in my room (not he public women's room) before my meeting. Soon a desk clerk arrived, addressed me as Ms. S---- and informed me my room was, indeed ready.  That is service. That is a great customer experience. I'm finished hotel shopping in Irvine - this is where I stay for future visits to the area!
Manager Response: Dear COLadyRoadWarrior, Thank you so much for sharing your experience. I will personally thank the wait staff who overheard you and took the initiative to make your wish possible. We are glad to be of service and your hotel of choice. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great hotel even if there's not much around
Summary: I was traveling with my sales reps through southern CA for a few days and choose the Hilton Garden Inn due to its proximity to the airport and accessibility for my reps. The young lady who drove the airport shuttle van was incredibly nice & friendly. She even greeted me by name when she picked me up at the airport.   Hotel is relatively new so it has all the updated Garden Inn furnishings. Staff is very friendly although the breakfast staff was a bit overwhelmed one morning and was kind of grumpy. No biggie.  One thing to know is that if you don't have a car, there's not too many restaurants or attractions within walking distance. There's a McCormick & Schmick's across the street in an office complex and a Mexican restaurant close also. Both are about a 10 minute walk from the
Manager Response: Dear ScooterRed71, Thank you for the review and for a descriptive one, at that. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Room is very clean, stylish, great view, friendly staff, has a small microwave and small fridge. Modern shower heads , you feel like you are taking a shower under a water fall in the Hawaiian gardens.
Manager Response: Dear Cecelia M, Thank you for the 5 star review and glad you enjoyed your shower and stay. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: A large group stayed here for a local wedding.  The hotel staff was excellent to work with and the breakfast was amazing.  The facility was clean and the location was perfect since it was so close to John Wayne Airport.
Manager Response: Dear Lynne M, We do appreciate the thumbs up and glad all went well. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Positive: Really clean.  Customer service very pleasant, close to good mall, have activities for family- today was painting.  Decent gym.  Bartender / waiter and front desk. Staff-  super awesome.  Food is good at restaurant.  Negative: small pool and no jacuzzi
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Awesome location for early morning flight out of Orange County / John Wayne Airport
Summary: Great location for flights out of Orange County airport. Just a 2 min drive and they also have a shuttle. Really nice, modern decor. Great breakfast and nice rooms with comfortable beds. Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Giddyupandgogirl, Love the name and thank you for the lovey remarks. We look forward to you next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Fantastic place for wedding guests to stay
Summary: We booked a group of rooms for many out of town guests to stay for our son's wedding.  It worked out great in so many ways.  The hotel is beautiful, clean and spacious.  The staff was excellent to work with and gave us a great value for the money.  The breakfast staff were especially gracious to our group.  Many extended family members that are separated by miles enjoyed reconnecting.  We got to know the bride's side of the family well also.
Manager Response: Dear Laurie H, We are thrilled to know that al went well with the wedding, your stay, and that it was a family reunion of sorts. Do visit us again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Everything was great accept for customer service
Summary: Everything was great except for the customer service.  Rocio who works at the kitchen was very helpful and her customer service was excellent.  But the rest was not good.  The front desk clerk Denice told me that breakfast was complimentary but it was not so the employees need to know and share that information with the customers.  I spoke with the manager Tracy and all she did was apologize and continued to work on her computer.  I did not have her full attention and I felt ignored.  Customer service means a lot to me and I will never stay here again.  I also wanted to spread the word so this will not happen to someone else.  Being a veteran and serving my community as a police officer I don't deserve this and either does anyone else.  The room was wonderful and if the customer
Manager Response: Dear johnwayne27, Thank you for your review and your lovely comments at the end of your review. We are disappointed that there was a miscommunication with our services.  Rocio did speak to me about your experience and you had checked out before I could reach you. I would like to take this opportunity to apologize for your dissatisfaction and miscommunication. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: A very pleasant experience.  The accommodations where very nice.  The entry way you knew you where going to LOVE this place.  Great Location.  The staff was Great!  The breakfast buffet was 2 remember.  It was very busy but they knew how things "should" be done.  Recommend this Hotel to any one that wants Great Service!
Manager Response: Dear David C, Thank you so very much for the glowing review. We do appreciate the time, thought and effort with your review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We were at the is location for a wedding which was very convenient to the airport and surrounding area. We took advantage of the hotel shuttle service to and from the airport. Our room (king suite) was large, comfortable and clean.  The pull out bed on the sofa is not too comfortable unless perhaps you have small children. The entire staff throughout the hotel was friendly, helpful and professional. The lobby is beautiful and open, and a great place to meet or relax. Breakfast was delicious with anything you want.  Food/Restaurant and bar staff were excellent.
Manager Response: Dear lynnfH4213XQ, We do appreciate you taking the time to post a lovely review and all the nice things you had to say about our staff and services. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I was traveling for sports with my daughter. I was supposed to be part of a water polo group in a tournament. They refused to give me the group rate and told me it was too late to go somewhere else because I would be charged anyway. They seemed amused by that. I stayed one night and checked out early and stayed somewhere else. So rude and condescending!
Manager Response: Dear Patricia S, I do thank you for taking the time to write a review. We do apologize as you were not able to avail of the group rate as we did have a reserved block for your team, with a two week cut off from the date of arrival. Since you did book through another channel, we did reserve your room and held it for your arrival. same day cancellations clauses would apply, if you did wish to cancel on the day off. I do apologize on behalf of my staff, if you felt that the guest service staff was rude and condescending, as that is not how we wish to do business. We do hope that you will give us another chance to earn your business in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Enjoy my stay at Hilton Garden Inn.  This was a business trip.  The only disappointing thing was that there was no room service or any food available for 4 hours during the day.  The first day we arrived we had not had lunch -and were unable to get anything from hotel- and they didn't have any take out menus available at all either.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy P, Thank you for your 5 star review. Unfortunately you are correct as we do not have room service in the afternoon. We do however have a good selection of frozen microwaveable meals, as well as some cold items and an array of alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages available 24/7  We do hope to see you again on your future business trips. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Loved this excellent business hotel located close to John Wayne Airport and right off the 405 freeway. Ideal location near shopping centers, restaurants, and entertainment venues. One drawback is the parking charge of $12 per day; most of the other Hilton hotels in the OC have free parking. Very modern facilities suitable for both business and leisure stays.
Manager Response: Dear LavaLegs, Thank you for the thumbs up and all the lovely things you had to say about the hotel. Being a hotel close to the airport, securing parking spots for our guests, is of prime focus for us. All Hilton hotels, as well all other branded hotels and independent hotels, in an immediate radius of the airport, do charge for parking. We do look forward to you making us, your home away from home, on your future visits to the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: My stay here is always great. Pillows are heaven. However I was waken at 7am with the housekeeper next door, allowing the door to SLAM shut over and over while cleaning. Perhaps she thought "well if i'm up at 7am cleaning, so is the rest of the floor!". The bar needs a happy hour like the other Hilton's, and I'm sure it will soon.  And the room T.V needs more channels like the other Hilton's. other than this, the staff is always eager to please and I will be a loyal Hilton client.
Manager Response: Hello James S, Thank you for giving us a 5 Star rating. Looking at your comments however, I am confused and wondering if you are mistaking us for another one of your stays/hotel. Our housekeeping staff start their day at 8:00 am with a huddle, breakfast and stocking up, and only head to the rooms at 8:30 am. We do have a lovely happy hour every day with multiple selection's of libations and appetizers. We have more than 250 plus TV channels to select from, as we partner with Direct TV, also offering you many High Definition channels. We do look forward to offering you these experiences on your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Unexpected expenses, good food and service.
Summary: The hotel lobby and rooms were nicely decorated and very clean. I would recommend staying here. Be advised however that there is a $12 daily parking fee and breakfast is not included in the price of the room. Breakfast is available for $14.  The food and service are both good, but I wish I could have grabbed a danish and go. The next morning I drove through Carl's Jr. Around the corner on my way tthe office.
Manager Response: Dear 718bbarrieb, Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We do appreciate you staying with us and look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We had an overall great experience as a group! We travelled to Irvine for work with a group of about 15 people. The sales staff was wonderful to work with and created a custom package and experience for our group. The hotel staff were attentive and friendly. The breakfast and restaurant were better than average for hotel establishments and had friendly staff as well. The hotel itself was nice and clean and new. Facilities and amenities were a nice value add, though because of the nature of our trip we didn't get to use very many. The airport shuttle was a nice perk and allowed us to rent fewer cars.   The only two opportunities for improvement were not the fault of the staff, but with the facility itself. The stairwells all exit to outside the building on floor 1, so you can't
Manager Response: Dear 247hello, Thank you for your detailed experience and comments. We do appreciate the positivity and that you would stay with us again. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary: Have stayed here on business a couple of times and this is a great option to stay when in Orange County.  New, clean and great staff.  Has always been a great experience.  Breakfast is also good and service was very good.
Manager Response: Dear rodjan5, Thank you for the high rating and your lovely comments. We thank you. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Torrance High School 60th Year Class Reunion
Summary: The service we received across the board was OUTSTANDING!  The personal attention to detail given us by the staff was world class.  The rooms were perfect and a delight.  The banquet room we utilized was a perfect fit & perfectly staffed for our events.  Many of our classmates flew into John Wayne Airport and did not need to rent a car given the hotel is less than one mile from the airport and offers shuttle service.  100% of our classmates rated both the hotel and their staff 5 star+.    We cannot say enough about the hotel staff...they were ALL just wonderful.  Who knows we may be doing an encore at some point in the future.  Try it you'll love it!!!
Manager Response: Dear t0nytime, We are ecstatic that your group and you had a wonderful time and we do hope you plan an encore. It was a pleasure meeting you and some of your attendees. Our staff were delighted to be of service. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Your are not their guest; you are a target for their accounting office.
Summary: Hilton Garden Inn Irvine/John Wayne Airport.  •	When I arrived I was told “your room rate has changed since you made your reservation”. (add $20) •	I arrived at 1:30PM and asked to check in (I know it was not 3:00PM) and they had a room ready. Early check in fee (add $25)  •	Are you parking a car? Guests pay $12 a day.   FYI, my room had a missing fire alarm, normally I would not mention this in a public forum however, after being nickeled and dimed be them at every turn I’m sure they won’t mind me sharing this information.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Dennis B, Thank you for your review. Once you make a reservation the rates are not subject to change. If you could kindly send me your confirmation, I would like to look into your booking, . This will also allow me to see what day and time you arrived. We do have a reasonable early check in time based on occupancy and our existing guests leaving in a timely manner. Yes we do charge $12 for parking. More importantly, our fire alarms are connected to a main panel and these were just tested 2 weeks ago. I am curious as to how the alarm is missing, without it triggering the main panel. I do thank you for this information and do need to address this matter urgently. I can be reached at rdalgado@s3hotelgroup.com. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Beautiful hotel, great room accommodations, great prices. I received a special "UCI" room rate. There were several area hotels that provided a UCI room rate, however, this was the most competitive price. When I arrived, I was delighted by the appearance of the lobby and I immediately felt good about my decision to stay at Hilton Garden Inn. The front desk staff was friendly and check-in was quick and easy and all of my questions about what to expect with regard to credit card charges were answered completely.  The room had great decor and color choices. The pillows, sheets and comforter were extremely comfortable and did not give me that gross feeling that most hotel bedding gives me--you know, the feeling that makes you wonder when the last time the comforter was washed. The
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was very nice and super clean. I would definitely stay there again. The front desk staff was so bland and lacked a "can do" spirit. I didnt walk through  the lobby after we checked in just to avoid the tension and bad vibe that surrounded them. They were worst part of our stay. Management needs to give them a refresher class on customer service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent stay overall! Pleasant staff, great location, nice room, comfy bed and bedding. Good coffee! I like the 12 noon checkout, easy parking. I would stay here again, for sure. Breakfast was great too. Close to office, shopping and airport.
Manager Response: Dear Gail P, Thanl you for the lovely revew. We do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great Staff on board, consistent good service throughout the hotel.  We really enjoy the refreshing flavoured water available in the lobby.  Very clean rooms and good overall building maintenance.  Very good breakfast with personalize entrees and fantastic service.
