I would recommend this hotel to friends and would stay in this hotel on my next visit in the neighbourhood.
Manager Response: Dear Jenny L, Thank you for taking the time to write this awesome review of our staff and hotel. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Perfect location! Cheap Uber ride to Irvine Meadows.  Rooms were super clean and my fiancé loved the bar before we left for the concert – the bartender, Chasen was awesome.  Not sure if we will be back since Irvine Meadows is closing, bummer.   This hotel is a MUST if in he area!!
Manager Response: Dear Brittney D, Thank you for this is lovely post on Trip advisor. I am positive there will be other activities in the area that will make you come back to stay with us.  I hear the shopping at South Coast Plaza is amazing especially as the Thanksgiving and Christmas holidays approaches. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: In town to visit our local office. I had to book the room last minute and found it on the HHonors app. Hotel was modern and very clean. Restaurant was good and a great happy hour. The Front Desk manager Tracy was very helpful in arranging my shuttle to/from the John Wayne Airport. It was nice to come back to a peaceful hotel after a long day of meetings. Would definitely recommend and stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear dc4452016, We do appreciate you choosing our hotel to stay at, during your visit and for the 5 star review. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary: I was in town for a conference and this was a recommended hotel. We had a discounted parking price but I was kind of annoyed that I had to pay parking anyway especially since I was here for a conference. Other than that, the hotel was so nice and I liked that it was modern. Super different from other Hilton Garden Inns I've stayed at. The room I stayed in was clean and I loved that it came with a Keurig! Oh and the fitness center was huge and spacious!
Manager Response: Dear pwinchester76, Thank you for all the lovely remarks you made about our hotel and for appreciating the large fitness center. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Fine For A Quick Business Trip and Close to John Wayne Airport
Summary: No surprises here… Which is sometimes good, I suppose. Staff was somewhat removed and patronizing, but the hotel is fairly new and clean—and very close to SNA airport. Rate is high for what you get, but I suppose you have to factor in the location to justify it.
Manager Response: Dear Jack H, We do appreciate your business and for having taken the time to write a positive review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Upon my original reservation request (I was in town for a conference which endorsed this hotel that offered a special rate) - I was transferred to sales, where I left a voicemail that was never returned. After not receiving a call back to confirm my reservation, I called again, and the reservation system was down. When I was finally able to reserve my room, the rate was no longer offered, the sales staff told me that they had no record of my request and the hotel was unwilling to honour the rate. The hotel was nice, all other staff were very approachable, helpful and apologetic when it came to my issue.   Will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear matthewpM6178TQ, We do thank you for writing a review and stating your experience. Being part of a group, your group was offered a discounted rate with a 2 week booking deadline, to your date of arrival. We do apologize if you were not able to book within this time frame. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Really liked the hotel. Food at the hotel Was good.  Rooms were nice. We had the two queen room. Nothing fancy about it but it was nice. Would have given a 4 star review but there is no hot tub at the hotel. That is the only reason for the 3 stars. Customer service was great. Perfect location for our needs but a business area. A little drive i.e. Required to get to other restaurants and things to see.
Manager Response: Dear Stbjek21, Thank you for all the lovely comments you made about our hotel and we do appreciate it. You are correct we do not have a hot tub and apologize, as that was what was lacking in your visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Highly Recommend this hotel, clean, modern, beautiful.  Rooms are updated, bright, clean, nice size.  Dinner was excellent.  Staff was helpful and friendly. Hotel is in a good location,convenient to highway.
Manager Response: Dear Denise C, Thank you so very much for your 5 star review and compliments. We do look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Responsive and friendly hotel with casual comforts for bar, dining, business, exercise & swimming.  Clean and quiet with attentive staff.  Location is convenient to SNA and Irvine/Newport Beach corporate offices.
Manager Response: Dear james H, Thank you so very much for taking the time to give us a top notch review. Much Appreciated, R Dalgado

Summary: Bianca was absolutely wonderful helping me book our team into the hotel.  She was able to match a competitors rate as well as offer us breakfast and parking!  She also agreed that the hotel could receive an on-line grocery order. I accidently ordered it to arrive a day too soon. Bianca contacted me to let me know that they had looked after all the refrigerated items and that everything would be in my room upon arrival...so helpful and much appreciated!  From the minute we all arrived (21 of us!) until we departed everything and everyone working there was excellent.  They offered a free shuttle to and from the airport which  was on time and super easy to organize.  One night the team ordered in pizza...the evening dining room staff offered us space in the restaurant, cutlery and
Manager Response: Dear Lisa C, Thank you for the glowing review and all the wonderful things you had to say about Bianca. She did make sure that you and your team were well taken care off and thank you for noticing the details. We do appreciate your business and thank you for choosing us. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Have stayed here before in 2015. Breakfast is fantastic, has a great buffet with a large selection and the cook to order items are the best. Hotel staff are friendly and helpful. Hotel is always clean
Manager Response: Dear H3258ALrichards, Thank you choosing to stay with again this year. We are thrilled about your wonderful comments. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: My husband and I had to make a mad dash to southern CA and this hotel was the perfect choice for our running about. Close to The District and Irvine Spectrum for shopping and dining fun. Easy access to the freeways. It's a bit tricky to find the first time, so do use your GPS to get there.
Manager Response: Dear LOBRADNO2015, Thank you for your review and for choosing us as your first choice in hospitality. We look forward to seeing you again on future trips. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great experience! My boyfriend and I made a reservation for a little get-away for his Birthday. We reserved one of the lilac suites and it completely exceeded all expectations. Really love the Hilton Garden Inn standards. 🙂
Manager Response: Dear Enthiss, We are ecstatic that you chose our hotel to celebrate your birthday. Belated Happy Birthday. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I was so happy with this hotel. We had a 1 1/2 meeting for 13 with overnight stays. Food was great, accommodations were fine, and the staff was very customer service focused. Pricing was reasonable. All expectations were met. We will use them again for sure. They also have shuttle service from John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The tittle says it all.  When you're away from home, you just want to stay at a place where it's clean and refreshing.  This is the one!.  It's a fairly new building so they have an advantage vs the nearby competitors but they manage to keep it well maintained.  The hotel itself is contemporary, nice and bright as soon as you walk in.  The room is bright, with nice clean white sheets. Decent sized room and it's more than enough. The bathroom is great, nice glass shower with solid walls.  I don't care for those bath tubs with shower curtains.  The bathroom is not as big but it works for us. The staff is great, shout out to Denice, the manager on duty when we checked in on Friday night.  Very friendly and took care of all our needs.  Only a couple of comments that I can think of,
Manager Response: Dear Vlad_Vee, We do thank you for taking time to post a very detailed review and thank you for all the wonderful things you had to say. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We held our sorority retreat here and everyone I worked with was AWESOME!!  Bianca, Rina, CJ, Aloha and Francisco is who I worked with.  They were available anytime I reached them, they are all super friendly and it's genuine.  I will definitely use the Hilton Garden Inn for my future room and meeting needs.
Manager Response: Dear cali1 13, Thank you recognizing our staff by name as it does mean a lot to them and to us. We are glad your retreat was a success and we look forward to hosting your next event. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Hotel was extremely clean and staff was great. Rooms were very comfortable. I am very particular about my pillows and this hotel did not disappoint.  This is a great brand for business travel.   I did have a hamburger in the restaurant that was excellent quality and did exceed my expectations.
Manager Response: Dear Marcia A, We are glad that our pillows and room met your standards. Thank you for the shout out to our Brand as well. Our culinary team will be pleased about your dining comments. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel at a reasonable price
Summary: Would definitely stay here again when I visit Orange County. My friend and I (separate rooms) were attending the Laguna Beach Arts Festival and Pageant of the Masters.   It is only a 20 minute drive from this hotel and it was very convenient.
Manager Response: Hello Jolie31, Thank you so much for your vote of confidence. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: It's not really convenient to many restaraunt and the one that is somewhat nearby is a somewhat expensive Italian place. The building smells nice and the shuttle to the airport is very helpful. $12 to park overnight when you're already staying there is ridiculous. I slept well and felt good in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Tucker2Tucker, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We do have multiple choices of restaurant in a one mile radius with different price ranges and cuisines. I do apologize if you felt that our parking fee was high, as we are one of the lowest priced hotels for this service in the Irvine area. We are ecstatic that you had a wonderful nights sleep. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We stayed on the sixth floor and our room was very nice. We stayed eight nights and the maid service was very good. The only two negatives were checking in and horable wifi. They had my reservation at one pm but they would not let us check in until 3:30. At 3:30 the line was long and they had a hard time finding my reservation. It did not matter if you were Hilton Honors or using another type of promotion the wifi was nonexistent. We enjoyed staying near the John Wayne airport.
Manager Response: Hello Cabanaboy3, We were wondering if you got the correct hotel, for your review. Our hotel has 5 floors and our check in time is 3:00 pm. We do have a new and high speed internet bandwidth that is much higher than brand standard. We do appreciate you being an honored HHonors member and do hope that you stay with us in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Pleasant stay at Hilton Garden Inn
Summary: I stayed for only one night while on a business trip. The hotel looks brand new. The room was nice and I had no problem with parking at the hotel. As a Hilton Honors Gold member breakfast was complimentary and was very good. I would definitely stay here again if I was in the area.
Manager Response: Dear CAtraveler56, Thank you ever so much for your 5 star review. Much appreciated. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Beautiful Rooms! Breakfast is worth the stay!
Summary: The rooms were very clean and spacious! Everything was very modern and clean! The breakfast buffet was worth every penny! Hot breakfast and many choices to fill your tummy! The staff was very friendly and helpful!
Manager Response: Dear barryswatz1, Thank you immensely for your extremely positive review. We do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Good, clean and new hotel. The bed linen has not been changed even once in seven days, no tooth paste, no vacuum cleaning of the room. We moved the trash can under the sink from the original place next to the table - and it was ignored for three days by cleaning staff after we moved it back where it was standing..
Manager Response: Dear Vadim T, I do apologize at the lack of service you so described. I will definitely look into the matter as that is not how we treat our longer staying guests. I am hoping you were able to call out front desk to report your situation, as we do carry toothpaste for our travelers that need the same and also to make sure that you do get the service, you so deserve. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel has a nice restaurant with good food, the beds are super comfortable and clean, great a/c. New and updated, and Uber can find it. They also offer a shuttle service to the nearby SNA airport. It didn't start off well when we called the hotel to request the shuttle. It seemed nobody knew how to accurately describe the pickup location of the van until we had waited for an hour which is unacceptable. When the van did arrive, the front desk attendant said we needed to be at column 5 in order for it to pick us up, such information was not conveyed in the previous 3 phone conversations when we called for an update on the car. Actually, the first person I spoke with when originally requesting the van said to cross the street and go to the taxi lines. Upon exiting the baggage
Manager Response: Dear dallassiteonbusiness, Thank you for informing us about your shuttle pick up. We do apologize as you were not given the correct information at the get go, and I will follow up as it is a training issue. We do appreciate your business. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great hotel for staying close to Orange County Airport
Summary: Great room for work / extended weekend vacation with my wife. Room was always clean, staff was great.  Pillow option was a little rough, but we made it work. Also sound carried between rooms easily with families and their kids. One night it was rough, the others not bad.  Parking does cost but they have plenty of spaces covered and uncovered for the same fee.
Manager Response: Dear Zachary M, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary: This was my first time with a new company and first time in Irvine, so the thought of dealing with the weeks task was daunting.  I had the great pleasure of meeting Shilpi V. At the front desk, Heather Modispacher bartender,  and Delilah Kaihewalu food service and Roy Garcia my  Driver. They were unbelievable, my stay has been great. Extremely helpful and friendly service. They are and we're the reason why my stay was so great. I am in sales and service,  so customer service is a HUGE DEAL to me, I would come back to stay with them working or not. AMAZING JOB TO ALL OF YOU!! Thanks.
Manager Response: Dear Texaslonghorns199, Congratulations on your job with the new company. Thank you for recognizing by names, our staff that were able to make your stay AMAZING!!! We do appreciate the feedback. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The staff were great! The room I first checked into had an empty water bottle on the nightstand, so I got a new room. The manager gave me a complimentary breakfast for the in-convenience of changing rooms. Nice staff, great work out area and hot breakfast was.awesome!
Manager Response: Dear Rona D, Thank you for the review and your understanding. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great Experience for our group at this hotel
Summary: Our group was in need of a hotel centrally located in Orange County.  This hotel was perfect!  Like other reviews, the hotel is clean, modern and has newer rooms with kitchenette area.  Also, they have a large comfortable lobby with a nice restaurant and bar area, but primarily I want to talk about the service.  As I said, I was booking for a group trip and from the start, I received great service from their sales staff.  Group bookings can be difficult, but Bianca was amazing and made it so easy!  So responsive to all our questions and needs.  When we arrived, we received good service from the front desk too and it kept going all week long from the hotel staff.  Even after we left - there was follow up to make sure there were not any issues with any of the guests.  We would
Manager Response: Dear jjew88, Thank you for your most wonderful comments and recognizing Bianca. We do appreciate the feedback. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Hilton Garden Inn is the place to stay
Summary: The hotel is easy to get to, close to restaurants, close to the freeway.  It's clean and the beds are comfortable.  I was there with my son and felt safe.  Parking is so easy, it's right there.  The staff is great and most helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Laura B, Thank you for your 5 star review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great clean hotel with great service & staff.  All the rooms have microwaves, small refrigerators and Keurigs in them. The rooms are very spacious too. It's kinda of in an industrial area but food and amenities are close to the hotel. I would definitely stay here again. Close to John Wayne airport too.
Manager Response: Dear Mark, We do appreciate the shout out and thank you. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The staff here was lovely. But this is just an average hotel near the airport. I thought because it was brand-new it would be very clean and nice. It was clean, but the lobby was pumping in some horrible scented perfume thing which was odd.  Bed was comfortable but the room certainly had thin walls and I could hear everything around me.  The price for this room was very high considering the very averageness of this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear AAGATL, Thank you so much for your positive comments about our staff and cleanliness. We do have a "White Tea and Fig" scent that permeates our lobby area. This is a brand standard for Hilton Garden Inns and have gotten many good reviews about the same. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Directly across the street from the John Wayne airport. Close to great shopping and restaurants! He only thing I didn't like is the entrance from self parking lot... I had to haul my bags through the middle of the restaurant / bar. My favorite thing was that they provided a free easy to arrange shuttle to area restaurants. Also staff was friendly and attentive.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa H, Thank you for taking the time to write a comment and all the good things you had to say about the hotel. I apologize that you decided to go through the restaurant to get to the elevator as we do have a clear path from the entrance to the front desk and then to the elevators. Safe travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Best hotel I have seen in CA
Summary: Brand new remodeled No other words Perfect perfect perfect I do recommend with two hands;) There is mini kitchen in the room with mini sink,microwave,mini fridge,coffee maker,ice bowl etc. Everything smells new Too clean. Omg I would go back in a heartbeat!!!
Manager Response: Dear Mislinka, Thank you so much for the "Best Comment". We do appreciate your two hands thumbs up!!!! We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This property is less than a year old and very modern. Friendly staff and nice facilities. The rooms are a good size. The lobby area is very bright. Full bar and large breakfast area. The fitness center is nice as well.   It's just a couple of minutes off the 405 in a corporate park. Not a lot within walking distance but lots of options just a short drive away.   Would stay here again if in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Emily S, thank you very much for all the lovely things you had to sa about our hotel. Much appreciated. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Very nice Hilton Garden Inn, OK service
Summary: The other reviews are correct, this is a very nice Hilton Garden Inn.  Very nice lobby area.  Our room was not ready when we arrived after check-in time.  We were told they sold out the night before and were behind.  So we left and they called us around 45 minutes later.  The lobby person wasn't overly friendly and didn't understand our frustration after a 6 hour flight.  We booked a suite and I would not recommend it.  The suite is spacious and has 1.5 baths, but the furnishings are just OK.  Regular rooms were the better deal.  Again, nice property and I can see why the reviews are so strong.
Manager Response: Dear dave9956, Thank you very much for confirming our pat reviews. I do apologize as you had to wait to check-in. We do hope that you make us your first choice of hotels for future stays. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel exceeded our expectations. The hotel is new, clean and smells great! The pool and gym areas were always clean. The property is close to airport, but nothing really else. Great for business travelers. Rooms were modern, clean and very comfortable. Linens and towels were of good quality with comfortable beds & pillows. Only complaint is the front desk staff. Check in was ok, but the interactions I had throughout our stay were poor. They seemed uninterested/unfriendly in answering questions. No smiles or greeting as you walk through the property. The hotel is great! The staff could work on better customer service.
Manager Response: Dear Y_in_Vegas, Thank you for all the lovely things you had to say about our hotel. I will definitely share your comment with our Front Desk team as we take your comment seriously. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Wonderful new hotel that kept very well. Awesome place. From the check in to the check out it was flawless. If I had to critique one thing it would be minor and that's the fact there is no hot tub. I still loved this hotel. Great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Thomas M, Thank you for the lovely comments. Much appreciated. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but a couple of complaints
Summary: Overall the property is beautiful, the staff very professional and I love the lobby and common areas at this hotel. My complaint is that we could not turn the A/C below 70 degrees in the room and it felt much warmer than 70 degrees. Another thing was housekeeping knocking on the door at 8:30am!!
Manager Response: Hello Gina B, Thank you so very much for your feedback. I do apologize if you felt your room was warm and will definitely talk to the Housekeeping Supervisor and share your comment. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Upon arrival the two male reps did not even look up let alone greet or welcome my family nor anyone else who walked in I was next in line yet it took over 30minutes and me opening my mouth and asking if one of them can just check me in my 5yo has to use restroom. At that point one of the staff acknowledged me and said just a moment  There was no parking at all for customers and people were waiting for spots including myself. Finally got checked in and as soon as we entered room I immediately called front desk and said this room is too small had a smell and not what was described. Rep said sorry no other rooms I asked to at least upgrade he said no sorry again and ended call. If we weren't so tired I would have left. Meanwhile still waiting for parking I couldnt go sleep til
Manager Response: Dear laylah555, I do sincerely apologize for the lack of professionalism from our staff. We do try and accommodate late check outs based on our occupancy and being a busy month the housekeeping staff may have needed access to your room. Please do give me a call to further discuss when you get a moment. My direct line is 9496561889 Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Modern hotel with great amenities! Every area including the lobby was just like new. The staff were very friendly and courteous, breakfast was great and the room was very clean! We will definitely be coming back! :)

Summary: My experience was not really good. I like the hotel but I had a couple of problems. The AC doesn't work, the bathroom was broken, I bought my dinner and when I arrived to the room the waiter gave me the wrong order.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is an amazing hotel.  The price was right, the staff was amazing, helpful and friendly.  They are a 10!  I used the gym everyday and it was a nice clean and well appointed gym.  The location was great.  I highly recommend it.  Close to the airport too!  5 minutes away!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the best hotel in the area everything is in perfect condition the housekeeper Rosario Quintana offer me a great service the staff at the restaurant very attentive front desk very helpful and the condition of the hotel is immaculate I will definitely recommend this hotel

Summary: There was a $12 parking fee per day added to the room charge. Also inadequate parking, one night had to park in business lot next to hotel. The handicapped parking is very limited, and usually taken early each night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great Front Desk team, that are always ready to help. Comfortable bed and good room size, clean room, little or no corridor noise. Best of all parking is only $3 per hour or $11 overnight. Shuttle to John Wayne Airporr.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here for 19 nights and it was great!  The staff is quick to address your needs. The place is very clean.  The restaurant offers an extensive menu and a full bar.  What more could you want!?  The bartender, Chasen, was awesome! He always had food suggestions and offered up tips on the local spots to visit.   The manager,  Scott, always made a point to say hello and make sure my visit was going well.   It's hard to find a staff of this size without one to complain about but honestly,  I have nothing bad to say about them or the property.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The people are friendly, the rooms are small, but very nice and cozy. The Hilton Garden Inn has a very nice indoor pool, and a resturaunt open almost all the time. Its located near a lot of great resturaunts and stores. Its really convient, and overall, one of the best hotel's i have been to!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great place to stay near John Wayne Airport.  It is a quiet convenient property with easy access to the 405 Freeway.  this will be my hotel of choice anytime I am in the area.  The staff was knowledgable about restaurants in the area as well as shopping centers.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Convenient location to visit Irvine and Orange County
Summary: Spent two days at this hotel while visiting friends in Irvine at the end of June.  We booked two rooms, a suite and a single king size room.  The previous reviews regarding the hotel being modern and clean were all spot on.  I would like to comment on a few other items: 1.  The 1 bedroom suite was well equipped, very spacious, had 1.5 bathrooms, and a sofa bed in the living room.  However, the bedroom was quite dark and the lighting was inadequate.  We did not book the two rooms at the same time, but it would have been much better if we could have the suite and the adjoining guest room.  However, the hotel did accommodate our needs by placing all of us on the same floor. 2.  They made the fluffiest omelette at the restaurant!  Humberto was so attentive that he remembered my
Manager Response: none

Summary: Standard Hilton expectation...in area of industrial and business within airport distance. Clean, efficient with room service offered. Not a family type of experience. Only for business travelers so that you won't be disappointed.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location, quiet and clean hotel.
Summary: This was a perfect location for being close to the airport. This is a newly built hotel. It's quiet and clean. Not the cheapest in town but worth it for a comfortable night's stay. We didn't have the breakfast buffet, but looked good from afar. The pool is covered but open to outdoors.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent hotel with a very well trained and knowledgeable staff. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a quality hotel in the Irvine area. It is close to everything, easy to get to and worth the price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff are competent and polite. Hotel spotless. $12/day parking. Bar & Restaurant is expensive,food ok. Closes at 10 p.m. Breakfast, nothing special,food in warming pans was cold. A tiny lemon drop cocktail was $10. Sundries "store" very expensive. Pool, no jacuzzi.
Manager Response: Dear Debbie Gonzalez, Thank you for a glowing review. We do appreciate the time and effort spent to write a review. I will bring up the quality of breakfast items and the size of the martini's, with our F&F Director.  Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Having stayed at this property I can see why it is ranked as the number one hotel in the Irvine area,  Very clean and inviting property, excellent staff and service.  Working in the hospitality business myself I would highly recommend this property to anyone traveling in the area.  Clean rooms and facility, friendly outgoing staff, wonderful bar and breakfast. Management is very active in the day to day operations and it shows.  We had a large group ourselves there were softball teams and a wedding party no one missed a beat. Thank you all for providing myself and my family a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Dear Matt B, Thank you for recognizing our #1 ranking status and validating it, with your comments. As you mentioned that you are in the hospitality business, you do recognize all the nuances needed to maintain that position. Gratitude for your lovely comments. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great location for both business or pleasure. The hotel is really nice inside everything is modern and the staff is outstanding.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone looking to stay for business or with family. The restaurant and bar were extreamly nice.
Manager Response: Dear bvdtravel3, Thnak you for your 5 star rating and the lovely comments about our restaurant and bar. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Close to SNA and numerous business locations in Irvine.  Nice gym to start the day and a bar to end the day.  24hr and LA Fitness near by as well.  Helpful staff and nice size conference room which can be reserved 2hrs at a time.  Good place to work from w excellent wi-fi coverage and access.
Manager Response: Dear jimlE9408CG, We appreciate your positive review and mentioning the excellent Wi-Fi coverage you received, as well as our gym. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Best Experience and super sharp hotel

Manager Response: Dear Deena M, Thank you for your very positive review. We do appreciate you making us your hotel of choice. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I really like this Hilton Garden Inn. It's very convenient for me when I need a last minute room. The beds are comfortable and it's still a newer property. I really think the front desk staff and mod could use a refresher on great customer service. Out of the times I've been here, Edgar was the most friendliest and approachable. But other than that I enjoy it here. Oh and I really enjoy the hot tea in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Missalygee, Thank you very much for the review. I will forward your comments to our front office manager and thank you for pointing out Edgar and the wonderful service he was able to give you. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Would love to stay again when we go down to Oc Had a very enjoyable time and staff was friendly  Close to where we were going. Food at the restaurant was great and staff there was very friendly and help

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel with top notch customer service!
Summary: This was our best hotel stay to date! The 2 room suite was HUGE! It also has 1 1/2 baths, which I have never seen before. The room was clean, the a/c was already at a nice cool temperature and guest services was at our door with a roll-away bed (not cot...bed) about 15 mins after our arrival. I highly recommend this hotel, you will not be sorry!
Manager Response: Dear dennisr841, Thank you for the excellent review and all that you mentioned in detail. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary: We've used this hotel on several occasions lately in between homes and we have nothing but great things to say about this brand new Hilton Garden Inn. Staff, cleanliness, meals, accommodations are all truly comforting. It's been a respite for sure.
Manager Response: Dear G5435YZdianal, We appreciate the shout out to the team. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel has everything going for it: good breakfast, friendly staff, a good sized gym, clean rooms and a nice pool. The pool to me was one of the highlights on this trip it is situated kind of like on the roof but there is a ceiling above so you feel secluded but it's open with glass to see out.
Manager Response: none

Summary: As soon as we walked in, we where impressed with the hotel cleanliness. My sons really liked the room and the size of the bathroom. I liked that the room had the AC vent in the walls and not the big AC box that makes noice.
Manager Response: Dear 560eveliag, Thank you for the mention of Cleanliness and that you liked the size of our rooms and bathrooms. As summer approaches, we are confident that our AC's will meet your every need as you mentioned. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This is a beautiful hotel, from my understanding it was an office building conversion, which makes this Hilton Garden Inn unique from the rest.  We had a quiet room on the top floor and a nice breakfast in the morning. That said, since we are Gold members we had a coupon for the breakfast. We would definitely not pay the $12 per person otherwise as it was good, not great. The cook had a hard time keeping up. We waited a long time and didn't our food the way we ordered it.  Another $12 charge is the parking. Very insufficient parking available so they charge a $12 fee per car, per night. When the lot is full they contact the neighboring businesses so their overflow will not be towed. Not the best solution, but no room to build out further.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was very clean and the beds were super comfortable. We arrived around 11am to see if we could get early check-in and they accommodated us right away! Our room had a great kitchenette setup: mini fridge, microwave, Keurig, and sink.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Lovely hotel located in Irvine, Ca, purchased on Orbitz and included breakfast which was outstanding. Great selection of items and nicely displayed. Beautifully decorated rooms and very modern and upscale.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great rooms, great lobby, amazing staff!!
Summary: Can't say enough great things about the Hilton Garden Inn Hotel in Irvine. It's conveniently located along the 405 and John Wayne Airport. Their rooms are impeccable - clean, organized, and best of all - CABLE. They have all the shows you can watch plus a fantastic lobby area. They have a full bar, food service, plus on the weekends, you may be able to participate in their paint night. Overall, great experience and I will be back again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place to stay.  We flew into Irvine and this hotel is just minutes from the airport. Staff is very friendly and know how to take care of their guest.  Delecious breakfast and the bar was also nice.  Will be staying there again!
Manager Response: Dear dale K, Thank you for the 5 star review. Much appreciated. R Dagado

Summary: The irony was that I thought I had booked the other Hilton across from the airport only to find all facades look alike ! What a great surprise to find this little gem. The food was amazing and the servers considerate and hard working. Christopher at the front desk was very helpful and accommodating in finding an alternative room for me. I would recommend this Hilton over the other Hilton nearby any time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Spent three nights here and loved it! Lovely hotel. Great location. Very comfortable bed. Extremely clean. Really nice fitness room-loved the elliptical. Friendly and highly professional staff. Daily parking fee-$12.00. I'll soon return.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: An amazing night stay after a long day of travel
Summary: Amazed how friendly the staff was at 11.30 at ight.  They made check in easy and efficient.  The Hotel is new but very nicely furnished.  As a HH member, the price was very good.  The closenest to the Airport was great.   I could not hear the planes.  I love how this hotel was decorated and furnished.  Also very comforable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for 6 nights in April. My daughter and I enjoyed our stay here. The hotel is less than a year old and nice and modern. The suite that we had was very clean and the bathroom was fabulous, one of the nicest we have found in a hotel. The in room coffee maker was very useful and the wifi was excellent. Breakfast was delicious. We found the staff very friendly and helpful and will stay there again when we return to Irvine in 2017.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place to stay.  Very close to airport and UCI.  Stayed here to tour UCI with my son and was easy to get to airport, 5 min., and UCI, 10 min.  If UCI is where my son decides to go to school this is the place we will stay when we come to visit.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel staff here were very pleasant and helpful. We stayed in a suite on the 5th floor and were very happy with the cleanliness of the room.  The room was very quiet too: it was surprisingly hard to hear traffic.  The room had a comfortable bed, a modern bathroom, and was nicely appointed. Breakfast is at an additional cost rather than continental.  They offered to make custom pancakes for the kids, which was very nice. Checking in and out was easy. Parking was an additional cost. The location was very convenient to the Irvine area. We were very happy overall with our stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Normally we stay at Hampton Inn's but there were no rooms available and I thought what could go wrong with a new hotel.  While the property itself was new, clean, had a mini fridge and coffee maker I was so not happy with the noise in our room. We arrived late and had to leave early in the morning.  There was a humming noise I thought was the a/c or the mini refrigerator in the the room.  I didn't think it would be a problem but getting ready for bed I thought I would unplug the fridge, nope that wasn't it.  A/C turned off and I couldn't understand what the humming sound was and the floor as my daughter pointed out to me had a mild vibration. It was just too late to change rooms because we had to leave early the next day.  Let's just say it was the worst sleep I've had in a long
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked this hotel on Hotwire and was quite impressed by the excellent condition of the Hotel along with a very comfortable room with very good amenities. The staff was friendly and helpful. Even though the hole is near a freeway the quadruple pane glass keeps the noise from being a problem.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Perfect place o stay if on business trip or traveling with children. The rooms are spacious and clean. It has microwave and fridge, which is good for long stays. In general a pleasant place to stay at.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Do not venture to room 210 unless you have noise cancelling headphones
Summary: TERRIBLE experience from start to finish.  Very young and inexperienced person at the desk checked me in to a room that had no bath tub and about 4" to stand in for the shower because of a large bench for physically challenged guests.  Very loud, constant noise throughout the room did not cease and made it impossible to sleep.  The person at the desk pretended to look for another room on the computer, admitting that he could hear the noise over the phone and suggesting he did not know what it could be.  Lo!  There are no rooms available (of course, I could have guessed that, as he offered me free parking and put me in a room specifically outfitted for a wheelchair).  It turns out this room is right next to the pool and what I was hearing was a very loud, non-insulated pool pump
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed for two days in this hotel. It is good and convenient for people in business trip. You do not need to go out looking for restaurant because the hotel providing food.   Staying experience in this hotel would be great if the food is better! Thank you ! MH

Summary: The pricing was okay, but once inside and te facility is new and clean, parking options, open area or in the deck. The place was quite at night and the front desk was very helpful. This will be my first choice when I return
Manager Response: Dear UnbreakableCP, Thank you for your 5 star rating and we do look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: My sister and I arived at the John Wayne Airport April 19, 2016.  Our uncle and aunt picked us up and then off to Crystal Cove Cottage for a couple of nights.  We checked into Hilton Garden 4-21 checked out 4-23.  Plans were to spend time at newport beach,  I wasn't feeling well so we just took the bus to the Spectrum Center an outdor mall.  "I loved it".  Transportation on the bus was only 1.50 for SR all day until midnight.  Ride the bus as many times as like. Everyone was so friendly and helpful.  Yes I would stay there again. The hotel had a very nice restaurant,  pool,  gym and buisness center. Very clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I like this hotel and the staff is very friendly. The room is classy, stocked with a keurig coffee machine and lots coffee/tea varieties to choose from. The basic room also has a sink outside of the bathroom, which is also appreciated when traveling with someone that likes to spend a lot of time in the bath. The bed and pillows were great for sleeping. Be aware that the parking is very expensive in my opinion and was unexpected when I booked the room ($30). Just a heads up. The breakfast was also decent. I would stay here again if I didn't have a car to park.
Manager Response: Dear Heather B, Than you so very much for all the lovely things you had to say about our hotel. Our parking is not as expensive as you mentioned, as we are $12 per car, per night, and certainly the lowest in the Irvine area. Please let me know if there has been a mistake with your billing. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We travel quite a bit for our daughter's Softbball travel team. Constantly, looking for a routine hotel...we definitely found it!  The beds were perfect, plenty of towels so we didn't have to call housekeeping, Internet was easy to connect to, a/c was top notch no vents blowing in our faces or noisy units, greeted by friendly staff and extremly clean not just in the room! Only thing was the parking charge was a bit high which is why I marked value at a 4.

Summary: Great breakfast buffet, incl eggs to order.  Friendly service.  Design of everything in the hotel is very thoughtful, practical and elegant. All non-smoking hotel.  Free shuttle from nearby domestic airport (tho not from LAX).

Summary: We frequently visit friends in Newport Beach and have been looking for the "perfect" place to stay ... found it! The hotel is new, clean and has covered parking. The staff is fun and professional. And the rooms are gorgeous. We have been Hilton Honors Diamond Members for years and this is one of Hilton's best properties. Oh, and Caesar in the bar was outstanding! We will be back and are looking forward to another wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Dear BridalVeil_OregonPat, Thank you for the lovely comments and being an honored Diamond Member. Caesar will be ecstatic to see his name in print. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I was due to fly out of John Wayne airport (only 5 min away) this past Sunday night on business when my flight was cancelled and couldn't fly out till the morning. So I checked trip advisor for the best quality hotel nearby and found this gem. I can't say enough great things. From the staff I met, modern and most importantly clean rooms, easy parking, quiet rooms, etc. Aaron who was working the front desk at night was exceptional! Very professional and answered all my questions. Even made sure I got a shuttle back to the airport in the morning. Also, shoutout to Heather at the bar! Given my hectic day, it was great to see a bartender so upbeat and friendly even though the bar was already closed by the hotel's scheduling. If I ever need a hotel by the airport again, I know where

Summary Heading: One of our new favorites in Orange County
Summary: It's a new hotel, so everything is squeeky clean and in working order. The beds are comfortable, the staff is friendly, there is a washer and dryer on the property, and there is a decent restaurant in the lobby.  If you have a car, the location is great as it is centrally located. It's not close to much walking distance, but that's Orange County for ya.  Give it a go! I'm sure you'll love it!

Summary Heading: Our stay was very pleasant the rooms are very clean the beds were a little too firm.the location was amazing we were so
Summary: We were so close to Disneyland the continental breakfast was very good and the workers were amazing as they kept the food coming and the eating area clean.  On our next family vacation to Disneyland we will definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Superb hotel, great location, great value for money
Summary: I travel as part of my job and have stayed in many hotels in the last five years both for business and pleasure.  This is truly one of two or three best hotels out of hundreds in which i have stayed.  This hotel has covered all the bases that a traveler looks for in a hotel:  Location, Bed/Bedding Comfort, Cleanliness of Guest Room, Quality of Bar/Restaurant, Friendliness of Staff (Tracy and Edgar deserve special mention), Extras like Shuttle, Pool, Exercise Room...This hotel does it all very well and for what you get it is a great value.  Believe me i know what it means when you arrive at hotel and it disappoints because of a recommendation that you read on-line, but you will not be disappointed....This is a great hotel!!!
Manager Response: Dear David M, Thank you so very much for all the lovely comments you made about the hotel. We do appreciate you naming our staff who made a difference in your stay. I love your last statement of "Affirmation!!!" Thank you again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great Hotel - gave out cookies whenever our group requested (three kids 16, 20, 22) Rooms were nice.  We were not there long due to Disneyland/CA Adventures shenanigans..  We would stay again.  We walked to Disneyland and CA Adv, then Ubered back to hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is one of the most beautiful Hilton Garden Inn's I've ever stayed at.  The entire facility was sparkling clean, the staff was friendly and helpful, and you can't beat the location if you've got business in the Santa Ana/Irvine/Tustin area, Will definitely stay there next time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: John Wayne would approve of this newest hotel near his namesake airport. He would have enjoyed clicking his cowboy boots into the tiled entry way, swigging some lemon infused ice water from the decanter on the way in and grabbing a cookie, and being greeted at the front desk. This hotel is spacious, clean, bright airy and comfortable. The room and the bed are welcoming and I totally  enjoy staying here.  They have a workout area and outdoor pool, with shuttle service to the airport if needed. The morning buffet, while not free like at the Hamptons, is tasty. (But I would prefer it be included, like at the Hampton!) Anyway, this is a nice, new alternative for the OC Airport area, in a safe and quiet location, walking distance to several restaurants. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Hilton Garden Inn has everything I look for in a hotel stay. The rooms are consistently clean, the staff friendly and helpful. They will take care of every small detail that need attention. I like the easy access to freeways and major landmarks while being on a quiet street.
Manager Response: Dear Ann L, Thank you for your lovely review and words of appreciation. We are happy to be of service. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel is perfect for families - the K suites have two bathrooms and a separate bedroom - lots of space to move about comfortably. Our family stayed two weekends in a row and the hotel and rooms were clean and comfortable both times. The made-to-order breakfast was excellent and the restaurant staff was especially attentive. The front desk was friendly and efficient.
Manager Response: Dear Tatia J, We do thank you for giving us a five star review. Our food and beverage and front desk teams will be very happy to know that you singled them out. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Hotel has 24 hour Guest Text Message Service
Summary: Hotel is a very excellent business travel hotel. 5 minutes from Orange County John Wayne Airport, Its brand new facilities offer state of the heart designs with top notch hospitality services. One of my favorite services at this hotel was the Hilton Honors text message service. You can send a text message 24 hours a day with any question you want and Guest Services will answer your question within minutes; Amazing! I tried this service with a few of my questions at 5AM and they responded within 5 minutes even at that time of day. Breakfast was amazing and my favorite parts were the Orange Juice, Scrambled Eggs, Bagel, Philly Cream Cheese and of course coffee. Make sure to get a room on the 5th or 6th floors for the best views of Irvine's business districts. After checking in at
Manager Response: Dear Jerry Flanagan, Thank you for the fantastic review and especially for using our "Texting" services. We are stoked that you love the design of the hotel and the amenities we have to offer. Thank you for staying with us. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I'm not sure why there are a few bad reviews lately, I thought this hotel was fabulous from start to finish. I thought the lobby was clean and inviting.  The front desk staff was helpful and courteous.  I thought my room was great and even the remote was spotless.  The only thing I didn't like is that I didn't see any restaurants within walking distance and so I decided to eat in the restaurant instead of getting back in my car after a day of driving.  I will say that despite not wanting to eat in the restaurant, it was leaps and bounds better than most.  I had the garden salad and one of the flatbread pizzas and was completely satisfied.  The service was also wonderful.  In the morning I went to the fitness center and thought it was spacious and well equipped.  Overall I really
Manager Response: Dear littled6607, Thank you for your review and pointing out the fact that you were surprised that we had a couple of questionable reviews. We are in the business of pleasing and our hope is that we can get a lot more guests like yourself, that we can please through our service levels and amenities, We do thank you for choosing us and giving us a "high five" review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Lots of noise due to a flood. Even during the weekend. We weren't notified of the repairs and they didn't try to make things right either. The room was very clean and nice, however they need to be more accommodating
Manager Response: Dear ryanmS7539AN, Thank you for your review. Ryan I did send you a separate email hoping to find out more about the flood that you mentioned as our internal reports did not any situation as such. Thank you for mentioning that our rooms were clean. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel stay was okay.  I found the room to be on the small side so it felt a bit cramped. We had 2 adults and 1 teenager in a two queen bed room. Room cleaning did not happen until late afternoon so we returned to find the room on most days to find that the room had not yet been cleaned. The door to bathroom does not stay open unless propped by a suitcase so you could not to discuss plans with family if you were in the bathroom just getting ready (like washing hands or putting on makeup or fixing hair). I know hotels require the bathroom door to be closed but most hotels at least give you the option of keeping it open while in the room. Staff seemed ok too. Not particularly helpful or friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Gingerspice888, Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are surprised that you found our hotel rooms small as our rooms are spacious. We also have a wonderful team and do not have any issues with our bathroom doors, being a new build. We do however get mixed up with another Hilton Garden Inn in East Lake Forest occasionally. Our address is 2381 Morse Ave, Irvine CA 92614. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We had a great experience working with the team from the HGI-Irvine OC Airport this past week.  We visited several area hotels in January and landed on this property for our group. We had a block of 17 rooms and made use of the clean and modern meeting space. It was perfect for our gathering. The catering was awesome and they worked with us to find the perfect meal to fit our group. It was tasty and the attendees commented on the great service and experience.  Impressive considering we had 47 high school students and 17 adults!  The rooms are clean, comfortable and modern.  The lobby space is spacious and inviting for people to meet. The hotel was prepared and had all of our key packets ready to go for us when we arrived. Thank you for all you did to help us have a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Derek N, Thank you very much for your lovely review. We are glad that you and your group enjoyed your stay and everything was to your expectations. We hope that we can house your group on your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Very close to the airport, within minutes of most food places. Love the fitness center and the staff were very nice. The hotel food was ok but given that I only had a salad. I would still recommend you try it.
Manager Response: Dear arkeshias, Thank you for 5 star review. We are glad you had a wonderful stay and we do hope to see you again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Bad pillows.. Bad! Service was goidZ great desk staff and Chelsea was great. Rooms were interesting but fine.
Summary: The bar was great.Chekaea was friendly and took great care of us. The others not so great. Nice new Modern clean hotel. The one thing and I can't stress this enough is bring your own pillow. Myself and the majority of our group of 15 were very disappointed after a long day to not get good sleep. Great staff overall. Chris Rocks!
Manager Response: Dear R3032BDryanl, Thank you so much for giving a shout out to Chelsea and Chris. They will be extremely excited to see their names mentioned. I am disappointed that you did not like our brand new, Hilton Brand Standard pillows.  We do look forward to servicing your group nd please let me know if there is anything we can do to make your stay better. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Diamond member here. I needed to be working in Irvine on early Sunday morning and did not want to make the commute from L.A. in the wee hours to get there. So, I got the hotel room on very short notice (like 11:30 at night when I was coming!).  The Hilton site was down and their customer service (NOT this hotel's) was disappointing. I called the hotel directly and Sean answered the phone and really worked with me to accommodate me.  I got there about 1:15AM. Room was spacious, clean, and quiet. I had a good night's sleep. Too bad I was too late for the pool facility!  The buffet breakfast is above average for HGI properties (and HGI properties have an above average breakfast to begin with). Staff was courteous there also.  The property is also sort of modern/nouveau in its
Manager Response: Dear BJBrew, Thank your for being a Diamond member and for this lovely comment you wrote about the hotel and Sean. He will be thrilled to see his name in print. We do hope to see you again on your future trips while making Irvine your short stop between routes. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel was very clean and the staff was excellent! The pool and fitness area was great, and the rooms were very quiet and relaxing. It's always a plus having a mini refrigerator and microwave in the room. Always love having Neutrogena products as well.
Manager Response: Dear Sandytoes2015, Thank you so very much for a 5 star rating and all the lovely things you had to say about the hotel. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel is very modern with updated decor. Comfortable beds. Relaxing lobby. Very clean. Very friendly staff. Restaurant and bar on premises. Indoor pool is a plus. The fitness center is state of the art.
Manager Response: Dear 78reneek, We love the various adjectives that you used to describe our hotel. Thank you. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Hilton Garden Inn Irvine is great
Summary: I travel for work and have always had great experiences at the Hilton Garden Inns. They are all newer properties, very swanky for the "common folk" - They all have a great breakfast (made to order omelet, french toast, pancakes, etc) The beds are always comfortable too! Always clean and well kept.
Manager Response: Dear DMS0402, To get a lovely comment such as yours from a "Road Warrior" is quite a compliment. Thank you. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We usually stay at Hilton Garden Inns, wherever we go. Unfortunately, someone has influenced the decor of many new hotels and this was no exception.  Black, gray and white is the color theme, everything slick and practical.  We went elsewhere for our breakfasts, because it was going to be more of the same style---modern, slick and impersonal.
Manager Response: Dear R B, Thank you for taking the time to write a review, we do appreciate it. Décor and design is such a personal choice, and we are sorry that our design did not suit your taste. I am hoping that the warmth and friendliness of our staff, was able to shine. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Beautiful and modern spacious suite. The bathroom was very nice and spacious. The pool was decent. I like how is enclosed with hint of outdoorsy. Enjoyed our quick get away. Friendly staffs. Although the bartender could learn the bar menu a bit more. But my overall stay was satisfying.
Manager Response: Dear Solomon M, Thank you for all the wonderful things you had to say about our hotel and services. I will definitely pass on your bartender feed back to our Food and Beverage Director. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This property is located close the SNA and can get there via Uber or cab in a matter of minutes. The property has a pleasant staff.  The food is very well prepared and the lobby bar is fully stocked with a great bar tender that is always smiling and willing to stay open late if need be.
Manager Response: Dear Charles G, We appreciate the very positive review and glad our bartender was of great service to you. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: Very comfortable beds. Came with a mini fridge. Kids enjoyed the heated outdoor pool and spa. Good location off the main highway. Very quiet at night. It came with free wi fi and had friendly staff. Lots of parking spaces. Would stay again without a doubt.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin L, Thank you very much for a 5 star rating. Yes our windows are a 4 panel system which blocks out all outside noise. So glad the kids enjoyed the pool and services. See you again, sometime soon. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The staff was very friendly and made my stay feel more like home. I changed my plans several times and they were very accommodating. The rooms were very clean and modern. The breakfast buffet was a little spendy but had many fresh made options. The only change I would make to the hotel was a basic breakfast option. Maybe for $8 or so just offer fruit and toast.
Manager Response: Dear Abooth85, You have given us one of the best compliments a hotel could get - that we were "your home away from home" Thank you. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: i would like to THANK front desk manager Chris Graham and his staff for my week of staying at Hilton Garden Inn one of my best stays. Chris treated my co-workers and I as if we were his friends instead of as a guest. having microwave and refrigerator in the room made my stay more enjoyable because I was able to keep both of drinks and food cold. It helped me keep my expenses down. I loved their morning breakfast because is just more than just a continental breakfast, they will make you omelette, pancakes or French toast to your specific orders.  The only down side staying here was that there is no stores or other restaurants nearby. The shuttle will take you to airport but taking you other places you are going to need call uber or lyft.
Manager Response: Dear TDawg71, We do thank you for the fantastic review. Chris will be ecstatic with the lovely compliment you paid him. Appreciate all the great comments. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Front desk Staff was rude and condescending. Restraunt staff and breakfast was great. Ask for a package to be FEDEX, staff said they forgot. Delivered package myself the next day. Asked about Hilton hotel in Sacramento area, staff said to look it up online. Guess they were to busy. Gave the impression any questions or request was a bother too them.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony Y, Thank you for commending our restaurant staff. I do apologize that our front desk staff was not more helpful. Our staff usually gets kudos from our guests. I would love to chat with you about your specific interaction. I can be reached at 9496568700 We do hope to see you on your next visit. Sincerely R Dalgado

Summary: Was in town for a family wedding. After an initial snafu with my room reservation, my stay was exceptional. The staff was kind, considerate and helpful (shout out to Tracy!). The breakfast provided was an amazing bonus the hotel offered since my brother reserved a block of rooms for family. The food was great and cooked to order. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The only thing I might suggest is to have the lounge stay open later at night. 10pm is a little early for the libations to end ;) The hotel has a free shuttle to the nearby airport which was extremely helpful for the family! All in all a wonderful oasis to relax in after the hustle and bustle of our busy and chaotic sojourn in Irvine for a wonderful family event! Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear 57Dot, Congratulations on the wedding in the family and thank you for all the nice comments. Tracy will be thrilled at the shout out. Our bartenders usually close later when the bar I busy. We do hope to earn your business the next time you are in town. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Overall very nice; downside was the construction mess
Summary: Stay here was for 2 weeks. Staff was friendly and helpful. Located near shopping, restaurants, movie theater, hiking trails. Room was very clean and well-stocked.  Room service was great.  Workout room was adequate with 2 treadmills, an exercise bike, and a weight bench. Only negative was construction was going on.
Manager Response: Dear Deborah C, Thank you for  lovely review, and especially commenting about our fitness center. Unfortunately I am not aware of any construction in and around the hotel.  Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel should have had a jacuzzi close in the pool area. It is comfortable for a business and a few nights stay. The bed is comfortable but the wifi connection could be much better especially if you are a business person.
Manager Response: Dear Lornette M, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and for your suggestions. Our Wi Fi is a high bandwidth connection and I am hoping your issue was a one off. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Best place to stay in irvine
Summary: I stayed here for 2 months while in town working and have to say one of the best Hiltons I have stayed at. The staff is awesome and will do anything to make your stay as comfortable as possible. Chris at the front desk is the man and will bend over backwards to help you in any way he can. I will definitely be staying here again next time I am in town.
Manager Response: Dear scottbarlow, Thank you so very much for this outstanding review and your vote of confidence. I will definitely pass on your comments about Chris to the rest of the team. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel is clean, very comfortable and in a quiet location.  The breakfast is varied, with something for everyone.  The breakfast staff, in particular the waitress and chef (wore a cloth cap) were very friendly.  I had requested a high floor, quiet room.  After checking in, it was apparent I had been allocated a room on a low floor which had some type of generator humming away right outside the window.  A quick trip back to reception remedied the situation, but why not get it right first time?  Only other gripe is $12.00 per night parking fee.  That irritates.  Nevertheless, I would definitely stay here again and highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear 901wahoo, Thank you for taking the time to write a review and giving us 5 stars. Much appreciated. Occupancy has been pretty high and I apologize that we were not able to get you on a higher floor. I will pleasantly pass on your comments to the breakfast team. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This is a newer hotel.  It has a nice lobby with cookies and drinks available for guests (which I did not eat), and the staff was friendly. This was a very short stay, so I did not explore the hotel's amenities. While my room was reasonably clean, there were handprints and fingerprints on the wood furniture and doors.  Perhaps there is a lack of attention to detail when cleaning. The bed was ok. I would probably stay again if this hotel maintains a good rating.
Manager Response: Dear GoldenMonarch, We are thankful for the detailed and wonderful review you gave us. I will pass on your comments to the housekeeping team. Thank you again. R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed overnight on business.  This is not only a new hotel it is a new design and finish out.  Much more modern and energetic.  The rooms contained several outlets including USB on the night stand lamp.  More hotels are getting these and it's very welcome.  The bed and linens were comfortable.  The temperature of the room was easy to control and relatively quiet.  Didn't wake me up as so many do.  Very clean.  Nice parking garage.  Close and easy to get to from John Wayne Airport (SNA).  Breakfast bar was nicely laid out and easy to navigate.  All interactions with personnel were friendly and very attentive.
Manager Response: Dear Donald P, We are ecstatic that you enjoyed all the facets of the hotel and your attention to detail is commendable. We look forward to your next stay, when in the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed at this location because my daughter who was attending a work related event was staying there on business.  Hotel fresh new and nicely appointed for the limited service hotel it was. Best night's sleep in a long time.  Although within eye sight of the airport rooms very very quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Randall F, We wish to thank you for taking the time to write your review and scoring us well. Glad you liked the comfort of your bed and got a good nights rest. We will be here the next time you need to catch up on sleep. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Hilton Garden Inn at John Wayne
Summary: Great location, great hotel.  The steak I had for dinner on the first night was wonderful.  The bartender was knowledgeable of many different drinks.  There were always Uber around, at all times of the day.
Manager Response: Dear Billy O, Thank you very much for your 5 star review and your lovely comments about the food and the bar. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: It is a great mid-tier hotel.  The room was clean and smelled fresh and the sheets and pillow are all very comfortable.  The room had a Keurig and a microwave which I really appreciate on long business stays.  The bathrooms are a little more modern with a standing glass shower.  The food was surprisingly good.  I would definitely recommend the osso bucco.  The internet(I paid for the premium $5/day connection) however was a bit spotty and makes working frustrating at times. The fitness center was also disappointing. But, overall it was a much better experience than my usual hotel in the area (Hilton Irvine Orange country airport...it doesn't even have minifridges in the rooms!)
Manager Response: Dear Thang V, Thank you for all your wonderful comments about our hotel and services. We do hope that you will make us your home away from home, in your stays to come. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Quiet, close to freeways and amenities it is new and fresh, staff needs training but you cannot beat the location if you are doing business in the North Orange County area.  You do not get any noise from the airport which is amazing. The bar menu is good and the happy hour as well.  They do charge for parking which is unusual for the area.
Manager Response: Dear Mary Jane H, Thank you for the review. Our F&B team will be excited to see your review. Our 4 pane windows do drown out any and al exterior sounds. Yes we do charge for parking and were one of the last few hotels in the area, to do so. Sincerely R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Good Balance - I will stay again
Summary: I enjoyed my stay here especially since every thing looked amazing since the hotel is new.  I enjoyed the location the most, just far enough away from the airport that you don't hear planes all day/night long and sits off from the highway just far enough that you can easily access it but not hear the traffic.  Pros: Staff were extremely friendly and knowledgeable Good location to the local businesses, walking distance Clean room Excellent price  Neutral: Limited room service menu, I would hoping there would be a wider selection of appetizers/finger foods to go along with my entree.  Cons: Scheduling the shuttle from the airport to the hotel was not a smooth process, it took a lot longer than I would have expected given how close the hotel is and I was unable to make contact with
Manager Response: Hello Matt P, Thank you for all the wonderful things you had to say about our hotel. We do appreciate the business and you choosing us as your first preferred hotel. I do apologize for you delayed shuttle pick up. Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary: I Stayed here for 3+ weeks while working in the area it was a awesome hotel with a great staff that makes the entire building feel like home great indoor/outdoor pool and the uber drivers will pick up here within 3 minutes
Manager Response: Dear Forrest B, Your Trip Advisor title "Home" is the best compliment, you can give to a hotel and the staff, that tries to make your stay, "Your home away from home" Thank you for giving us that opportunity and honor. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: This property has met and exceeded my expectations of the Hilton Garden Inn brand.  I've been a Hilton Honors Diamond Member for the past several years now and I try to stay at Garden Inns whenever possible. The Irvine location is my favorite one nation wide by far. So much so that, after past short stays here, our team and I have decided to come back and make this my "home" during an extended stay of over 1 month.   The front desk manager, Chris Graham, and his team have helped tremendously accommodating our teams stay. He has personally taken care of all of our reservation extensions and adjustments, which has allowed for a worry free stay.  I highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: Dear Vegabonder, Thank you so much for your wonderful comments. Being a Diamond member and having travelled all over the country, being your favorite hotel, does make us smile, and gives us a feather in our cap.  I will definitely pass on your compliments to Chris and to all team members. Thank you again. R Dalgado

Summary: We used the hotel as our wedding hub for all of our out of town guests. The hotel staff did a fantastic job accommodating the amount of rooms we needed, upgrading a room to a suite for our groomsmen to get ready in, and helping with parking fees for wedding guests. Rooms were very clean. We couldn't be more happy with how well the staff handled our event and went out of there way to make our stay as pleasant as possible.
Manager Response: Dear Tanner R, Thank you so very much for your 5 star review and your vote of confidence. We are glad all went well with the wedding arrangements. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Had to stay in Irvine for one night before flying out of John Wayne the next day. Complimentary airport shuttle was convenient and Tiffany at the front desk was amazing in helping me schedule that and recommend local dining options. The breakfast price at $14.95 was a little steep, but the food was great. Overall a great stay, would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear aruiz158, Thank you for taking the time to write a glowing review and recognizing Tiffany. She will be ecstatic seeing her name in print. We look forward to your next visit Sincerely. R Dalgado

Summary: Great Hotel ! It's fairly new and the shuttle service they offer is great. The bar is ok but chairs aren't comfortable and there is no where to put your feet at bottom of bar.  The other tables in bar area are great though especially for larger groups 2 or more. The other amenities offered are great. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone traveling on business or family stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Phillip W,  Thank you for highly recommending our hotel. You are correct that the bar itself does not have a foot rail. The bar chairs do have that capability. We look forward to having you stay with us on your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Brought a college athletic team of 60 to this hotel for a quick, one night stay. Everything was great! The staff was easy to work with starting from when we first booked the trip all the way to when we checked out. The hotel was clean and contemporary, the rooms were nice and spacious, and the food was very good as well. The hotel catered a team dinner for us on the night we arrived and we also had the buffet breakfast the following morning. I would definitely stay here again if ever in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Tamarin F, I am ecstatic that we were able to take care of your group of 60 athletes and you found everything to your liking. We do hope that your travels bring you back to the area and that we will be given the opportunity to house you again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Modern, new hotel masking some hidden issues
Summary: This hotel is brand new, only six months old from what the staff told me. The grounds are quite nice and well maintained, the lobby area is nice and modern as are the rooms.  The issues I had with this hotel are the following:  We were given an ADA room, although we have no disabilities.  I had booked this room from a third party (Hotwire) and believe that is the reason why we were given an ADA room.  At check-in I requested a suite and was told one was available, but then upon seeing that I booked from a third party the front desk staff stated she cannot give me that room and then proceeds to give me an ADA room...the hotel parking was only a quarter or so full the four days we were there, so I'm sure plenty of rooms were available.    The water at this hotel doesn't get very
Manager Response: Dear Alwehsh, Thank you for taking the time to write your review. I apologize as we were not able to give you a suite during your stay and had to give you an ADA room. As we are close to the Airport, a lot of our guests do not feel the need to rent cars and we do have a shuttle that they can take advantage of. Besides your hot water experience, we have not had any other complaint in this regards from any of our other guests. I will check with our chief engineer to monitor the temperature. I am extremely glad to hear that you are a Hilton Honor member and booking through the brand will give you added benefits of a guaranteed room type. We do hope you give us another try in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Good location for business but is very close to busy freeway. Hotel is clean but could use a refresh. The daily parking fee is always bothersome but I guess it is typical in CA. Bed was comfortable and overall, room was quiet. Fitness center was adequate and clean.
Manager Response: Hello Jill R, Thank you for your comments as we do appreciate feedback. Being close to the freeway, we have a quadrupled paned window technology which blocks out "all" freeway sounds. We are glad that you found the hotel clean and do please call me, as I would like to understand more about the refresh, that you suggest. Thank you again for taking the time to write your review and giving us a 4 star rating. Sincerely, R Dalgado 9496568700

Summary: Hotel was super clean and in a great location.   They also had an airport shuttle.    It was in a nice business area.  I didn't try the restaurant but they had nice containers of lime/lemon water all the time.
Manager Response: Dear Shauna H, We do appreciate you taking he time to write a lovely review about our hotel. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: All in all, a great experience.
Summary: The HGI worked out very well yesterday.  Our hotel contacts (sales and catering) were all very attentive.  The room was excellent… the right size and dimensions for the training.  The catering was also very good.  Everyone loved the food, plus all catering orders were ready when stated.  All in all, a great experience. We are going to make this property our first choice for So CA classes.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I like that it is close to freeway access, Orange County airport, beaches, many malls and Disneyland. Not a big hotel so it feels more personalized. The room value is good, modern looking and clean (rooms and public spaces). Friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear robertbU4718GC, Than you for taking the time to fill out a Trip Advisor comment and compliment us. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary: This hotel was excellent in all aspects. Of course, it is only 6 months since the opening, but the stay here was very enjoyable. I would definitely return to this hotel or another Garden Inn. I would probably upgrade to the suite next time, but was very comfortable in our room. Got a very good night's sleep.
Manager Response: Dear Gregg N, We thank you for giving us a 5 star review and look forward to your next review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I travel for business to Irvine every other week so I have tried many hotels.  This brand new hotel is just wonderful. Very clean, beautiful bathrooms and stylish furniture.
