It is nice to have both a microwave and min fridge.  Keurig coffee maker is a nice touch. Parking is $12 daily and plenty of spots outside as well as covered garage spaces.  Food in the restaurant is good.  I had breakfast as well as dinner there.  They have Happy Hour specials on beer, wine, cocktails and appetizers.  For being right next to the 405 it is very quiet.  Close to the airport makes it easy to catch early morning flights.  This is my new favorite hotel in Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa R, Thank you so very much for that glowing review, We do appreciate everything you had to say about us. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Best Hilton Property in the OC
Summary: Wow what can't say? I've been a Marriott guy sense 2005 and the staff at this hotel has me drinking a new flavor of Kool-Aid. The hotel staff is simply amazing. Chris one of the managers their has set a new standard in customer service. The hotel is brand new and all up to date. The rooms are always clean and tidy and everything works. I wish they would provide hot chocolate for the Keurig machine that is in every room but, in their defense they have some for me down in the lobby...so that's not really a problem...It's perfectly located for me when I come to the OC for buisness... And less then 10 minutes from the John Wayne Airport. Looks like this JW Marriott guy just found a new standard in Hilton... Hands down the place to stay at wile you are in Orange County..
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for drinking our very special Kool-Aid and we are excited that we received this outstanding review from a Marriott loyalist such as yourself. We look forward to your next visit and we shall keep your Kool - Aid chilled in the meantime. Chris will be ecstatic to see his name mentioned. Cheers, R Dalgado

Summary: My husband had meetings in Orange County and I worked from the hotel. I was able to work comfortably for the 4 days. It is very new and the friendly staff keeps it in great condition. The location was perfect for us. And the housekeeping staff were very helpful when I left my iPad; they contacted me so I would not worry and shipped it to me. I would highly recommend them on many fronts.
Manager Response: Dear emandw, We are so glad you were able to join your husband on his business trip and able to enjoy the comforts of the hotel and the services of our staff. We do hope your travels bring you back to this area in the near future. Thank you, R Dalgado

Summary: Very new, clean, modern hotel.  Great base hotel for the area - easy access to the highway.  We were really only there at night to sleep.  Although it's close to the airport and a highway, you really can't hear any outside noise.  Area around the hotel is a lot of office buildings, but there are quite a few food options within a couple of miles (and a few within walking distance on weekdays).  There is a charge for parking, but it was a lot less than other hotels in the area and the parking was easy.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear CherylS852, Thank you for staying with us and giving us a glowing review. The quadrupled pane windows that were installed work like magic in keeping all the outside noise out. We look forward to your next stay with us. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Hospitality is the name of the game at this wonderful Hilton Garden Inn. We have stayed here many times for both business and pleasure and we are more impressed with each visit.   Thank you HGI-Irvine for making "business travel" pleasant and "pleasure travel" absolutely terrific!  S&P
Manager Response: Dear Opop E, That was such a sweet review, looking at us from a business and leisure perspective. We do appreciate the shout out. Thanks again. R Dalgado

Summary: Overall great experience!  Great venue, friendly staff and amazing attention to detail. Loved their AV set up.  Will definitely recommend this location to anyone hosting a meeting in the area.  The room location was very private and very modern.
Manager Response: Dear Yadira V, We are ecstatic that you were able to have a meeting with us and enjoyed our AV and facilities. Thank you for a 5 star review and future recommendations. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: This IS the place to stay in Irvine or Costa Mesa
Summary: We stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn in Irvine over a weekend.  The hotel is very clean, nicely furnished with just the right amount of furniture.  The bed was very comfortable, complete with down pillows!  I don't know why anyone would rate this anything other than excellent!  I'd definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Arthur W, That was a short, sweet and a very powerful comment, and we thank you for it. Safe travels and we hope to see you again in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Facilities were great. Room wonderful. Front office manager Christopher Graham was exceptionally accommodating. Stayed for two nights before a flight out of SNA, will stay at this HGI whenever we are in the area.
Manager Response: Dear _Travel123er_, That was a lovely review and we thank you for it. Christopher Graham will be thrilled to see his name in print. Thanks again. R Dalgado

Summary: My husband and I use Hotwire a lot as we travel, and TWICE, Hotwire and Hilton had not put any parking fee requirement on Hotwire's page as I determine whether or not I want to pay for an unknown hotel that I am bidding for.  If there IS a parking fee, this should be disclosed at the BEGINNING so I can accept or decline this hotel (remember, they give a broad listing of potential hotels that they pool from).  So, I did accept an unknown hotel offer, and I paid for it right away.  Viola... I am told that I am staying at the Hilton.  Great!  I like the Hilton.  I have, however, TWICE been hit with parking fees that was not disclosed prior to my accepting the terms of the hotel room (first time in St. Louis and the 2nd time was in Orange County), and afterwards I receive the email
Manager Response: Dear sandy25527, Thank you for taking the time to write about your experience and all the wonderful things you said about myself and the hotel. We hope to convert you to being a Hilton Honors member and start building up a lot of points. Yes you are correct, with 3rd party sites, there are additional tabs that state 'see more details" which opens up all the additional charges. Wonderful travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: One night stay for a concert
Summary: My wife and I, and another couple we are friends with, got two rooms here for a concert in the area at the Observatory OC. We only stayed one night so we didn't spend much time there aside from sleeping. This hotel is literally brand new, which is a really good thing. We had a suite as well, which was very large and nicely decorated. The whole hotel has a nice modern clean look to it, and that carries over into the rooms too. The parking was easy, but we used the reserved Diamond parking spaces out front. The location is great and just a quick Uber or Lyft to wherever you want to go in the area. The bed was comfortable, the air conditioning was cold, there were no service problems, and the room we got was well worth the affordable points reward rate. I would absolutely stay here
Manager Response: Dear Engineer91, I do hope your wife and you had a lovely time at the concert. We thank you for your rave review and look forward to having you stay with us again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Don't be turned off by the area of this hotel. (Business/Industrial Park)  This place is great.  The staff is very welcoming and nice.  Family friendly and the breakfast is a great deal.  We would definitely return.
Manager Response: Dear Synthia T, Thank you for your 5 star review. I would also like to add that we are very close to the airport, lots of lovely restaurants, South Coast Plaza and beaches. Glad that you had a great time. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary: Spacious rooms, great location to SNA. Fully functional gym, pool and business area. Great value for the money. Didn't spend much time in the room - but there was a great semi-premium cable package assigned to the room's TV. At the end of a long day - unwinding with a movie can be fun.
Manager Response: Dear Nick S, Thank you for pointing out the semi-premium cable package. We are unlike most hotels with a limited 20 - 50 channels. At the Hilton Garden Inn, Irvine OC Airport you have a choice of 200 plus channels to surf through. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I was booking a block of rooms for 18 rooms for a business meeting.  While I did not stay there myself, my guests raved about the hotel, and enjoying staying here much more than the hotel that we have had a corporate account with for many years.  Bianca was such an incredible help - keeping me sane and being patient with my million requests every step of the way.  The entire staff was incredible, and my guests said the rooms were beautiful and very comfortable.  After this great experience with the Hilton, I will never book my associates in any other hotel ever again!
Manager Response: Dear Molly R, Thank you for your kind words and glad that all your attendees liked the hotel. We are very happy that you singled out Bianca as she has been doing a wonderful job with groups. We look forward to hosting your next meeting. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Excellent hotel with a competitive price.  This hotel is located within easy access to the I-405 and 55 South freeway.  A relatively new hotel with plenty of parking.  The cost of parking degrades this hotel.  The parking area is non-secured (no fence or security guard.  A parking permit (tag) is provided to hang on the automobile rear view mirror.  The entrance door from the covered parking area would not automatically close, must be closed manually.
Manager Response: Dear Norman R, We do appreciate your comments about our hotel and that you like the property. With the hotel being new, and the parking new as well, we have had to implement the parking charge to better monitor the lot and tow away cars that park without permits, thereby inconveniencing our in house guests. Thank you for bringing up the entrance door, it has been fixed. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel was clean and comfortable. The free shuttle to the airport is great! The location was just what I needed when a nearby conference hotel was booked. I'd definitely stay here again. The staff was friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Elise L, Thank you for giving us a 5 star review. We do look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Stay at Hilton Garden Inn in Irvine
Summary: Excellent place to stay for the price. It is a modern hotel with plenty of parking (covered and open) for a very reasonable price. My room was very clean and nicely furnished. The bed was comfy and the bathroom was roomy. As an HHonors member, I had a free internet access. The Staff was friendly and helpful. I had everything that I needed for my trip purposes.
Manager Response: Dear Grace3950, Thank you for your rating and more importantly for your comments. We are happy that you enjoyed the hotel and found our parking charges reasonable, probably an indicator of being a frequent traveler. We thank you for being a Hilton Honors member and keeping you in our family of hotels. Safe travels. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: New hotel very convenient to airport, Friendly Staff
Summary: I stayed at the hotel for a business meeting.  The hotel offers a shuttle to/from the airport.  It was a very short drive and the shuttle staff was very friendly.  We used their meeting room and ate multiple meals at the hotel restaurant.  Overall a great experience!
Manager Response: Dear sonrie767, Than you for your thumbs up rating and mentioning the shuttle staff and the food and beverage operations. We do look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: What a beautiful, clean hotel with very kind, friendly and accommodating staff! We were upgraded to a suite, which was very helpful for us. The breakfast was tasty and fresh with lots of choices and relatively healthy food.
Manager Response: Dear Leroy D, We do thank you for recognizing our staff and mentioning the healthy choices in your breakfast options. We do look forward to you staying with us again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: One of the best Hilton Garden Inns
Summary: This is one of the cleanest hotels I've been in. I'm always a Hilton Garden Inn fan and this may be the nicest one I've stayed in. The restaurant and bar are both really good as well. I was there for a meeting and it was very comfortable. The area around it is beautiful with plenty of restaurants and shopping. I highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: Dear Curtis H, We loved your conviction with the wonderful comments you had about out staff, cleanliness and food and beverage operations. We thank you sincerely for the same. Much gratitude, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Top Notch New Hotel - Good Room Rates
Summary: Pleasantly surprised to find out that this property is only five months old.  Beds are comfortable but a bit tight on space for a two bed setup.  Kept hitting knees on edge of bed each time I get up from the desk. I'm no interior decorator but the gray carpet in the hallways lends to a dreary sort of feel as you head down the hallway. Food service is okay but nothing to shout about.  a limited choice for dinner selections and the breakfast is mostly serve yourself buffet. I like the location and the room rates are some of the most economical that I have found for this area.  Staff is very friendly and work to make you feel welcome and a valued guest.
Manager Response: Dear Ron C, Thank you very much for your 5 star rating. We are thrilled that you found our team members friendly and that you liked the cleanliness at our hotel. We do appreciate your input on the interior decoration tips and will pass them on to the powers that be. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: My company had a 2 day conference at the Hilton Garden Inn with over 50 attendees (49 stayed overnight), and I was responsible for this event.  CJ Williamson and Bianca Gilman did an outstanding job coordinating the event for me.  They made my job a breeze!  Many of the attendees were very happy...with many commenting how nice and clean the hotel was and the food was great. I have to say that everyone I interacted with at the hotel were very professional.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa C, We are ecstatic that your 2 day conference went well. CJ and Bianca were able to assist. I will definitely pass on your comments to our culinary and service teams. Thank you again. R Dalgado

Summary: All of the staff, without exception, was friendly.  Even the maids and laundry workers were friendly.  They were especially helpful with dinner recommendations and overall taking care of our group.  Rooms were comfortable, quiet and the internet worked great.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel H, Thank you for taking the time to give us a lovely 5 star review. We do appreciate it and your business. We are especially glad that you mentioned our housekeeping staff, who are always in the background and are rarely recognized. For that we are truly grateful. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Excellent staff, new facilities, great housekeeping! Even the blackout curtains worked exceptionally well! We couldn't tell if it was day or night. The breakfast buffet was wonderful and our server -- she brought us drinks and cleared our plates -- was very nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Patricia B, Thank you for mentioning our staff from housekeeping and the restaurant. We do appreciate you taking the time to write the review and give us your thumbs up. Thank you. R Dalgado

Summary: The staff members at this hotel do an excellent job making sure all your needs are met.  Beautiful lobby and very nice, comfortable rooms.  I would stay here again in a minute if my travel plans ever have me back this way!
Manager Response: Dear Terri J, Thank you very much for your kind words. We do hope your future travels bring you back to our area. Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary Heading: The Best Place to Stay. Period.
Summary: Apart from being a newer property, the hotel is well maintained in all areas, provides every service a business traveler could need, and most importantly has a staff that is consistently friendly, helpful and eager to please.  There was not a single staff member I encountered, even in passing, who did not greet me with a smile and "hello."  And it started at the top when I checked in with front office manager Chris Graham - he is a true ambassador for this property, warm, welcoming, concerned with the guest's comfort and satisfaction.  He accommodated a room change with cheerful aplomb and engaged in genuine and interested conversation.  A week later when I next saw him he greeted me by name!  The rooms are spacious, thoughtfully laid out, arranged and supplied, and reasonably
Manager Response: Dear cstotter, We are very grateful for the detailed and glowing review. Chris will be very excited to see his name mentioned. We are happy that you had a wonderful stay and do look forward to seeing you back in the near future. Thank you, R Dalgado

Summary: I am a diamond level traveler. The property was fresh and clean. The staff kind and respectful. Shout out to the evening front desk "Chris". Great service and informative. Always a smile and ready to help in any way he could. Thanks for the great stay and enjoy this property.
Manager Response: Dear erictyler1, Thank you very much for your loyalty to the brand and being an esteemed Diamond member. We will give Chris a "shout out" on your behalf. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Clean, new, friendly and fun place to stay just about anywhere you go. I would go back any day of the week. staff bent over backwards to see we were comfortable. I like the Hilton Garden in period! 200 Characters...Realy... ok repeat it duh!Clean, new, friendly and fun place to stay just about anywhere you go. I would go back any day of the week. staff bent over backwards to see we were comfortable. I like the Hilton Garden in period! Clean, new, friendly and fun place to stay just about anywhere you go. I would go back any day of the week. staff bent over backwards to see we were comfortable. I like the Hilton Garden in period! Clean, new, friendly and fun place to stay just about anywhere you go. I would go back any day of the week. staff bent over backwards to see we were
Manager Response: Dear Marilyn C, Loved the unique style of commenting on our hotel. Thank you for the wonderful praises and making sure you got to say it all, in 200 characters !!! We look forward to hosting you again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: A Very Welcome Addition To A Beautiful City
Summary: Recently we had the chance to stay at the Hilton Garden Inn in beautiful Irvine California.  The hotel recently opened and offers accommodations for travelers near the Orange County Airport.  Although surrounded by office complexes, the hotel as easy access to a wide range of amenities ranging from restaurants, convenience stores, fast food locales, and offers very easy access to Newport Beach and Disneyland. Upon entering the hotel I notice just how clean and inviting it looked and the fireplace in the lobby combined with the Christmas decor made for a very inviting welcome.  The lobby was also equipped with gourmet waters such as cucumber water, and in the morning offered hot beverages and cookies in the evening.  Our check-in was very quick and we made our way to the elevator
Manager Response: none

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed staying at the Hilton Garden Inn and could not be happier with our stay! From front desk to servers, all the staff members we encountered were friendly and helpful. The hotel is well decorated, modern but warm, and the furnishings seemed new and of good sturdy quality. The hotel lobby is open airy and light with plenty of seating and a table with fresh lemon water. Our room was large clean and also nicely furnished. The kitchenette was a nice extra touch with a Keurig coffee machine, counter sink, microwave and mini fridge. We chose this hotel for the their heated pool, since our kids were looking forward to swimming in January. The pool is small but heated to a really nice warm temperature for all year swimming. The kids loved it, so we were all happy.
Manager Response: Dear rkung, That was a very well thought out comment about our hotel and we are so glad that you had a wonderful stay as with your family. Thank you for the 5 star review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great Customer Service and Beautiful Hotel
Summary: I booked a block of rooms for our wedding guests at a fantastic rate.  The sales staff was so attentive and kept in touch with me throughout the process.  My guests all commented on what a hotel it was.
Manager Response: Dear Scott G, Thank you for your very positive comments. Our sales team will be very excited to see their team named. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Great Hotel and Hospitality.  Chris at the front desk and the staff have the best unparalleled  hospitality and attitude! The food is excellent, fresh and hot. This hotel is always clean and inviting as well as in an easy accessible location.   Thank You!!
Manager Response: Dear bfischertsc, Thank you for mentioning our team member Chris and for enjoying the wonderful food and beverage experience you had. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Chris at the front desk is simply amazing. He made sure we got food right before they stopped serving. The bartender was great too!! Awesome attitudes all around!!!! The rooms are very clean and the entire hotel is well kept. Highly recommend staying here
Manager Response: Dear joesiano24, Thank you for praising Chris and his services. We do appreciate your top notch review and hope to see you again at our hotel. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We held our regional meeting at this hotel and it was by far the best experience I have ever had.  The staff bent over backwards to accommodate our rather large group with whatever last minute changes we threw at them.  The rooms were fantastic and the hotel as a whole was beautiful.  Thank you for all your help.
Manager Response: Dear Ericka L, Thank you so much for praising our staff and hotel. we are ecstatic that your group and you had a wonderful experience. We look forward to servicing your future travel needs. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I have been on the road a LOT the past 6 months and have consistently revisited this hotel for any work in Orange County. The hotel rooms are comfortable, clean, and well maintained. The staff members are friendly, professional, and helpful. I love the parking garage that makes everything convenient and user friendly. Thank you for providing accommodations that I can count on!
Manager Response: Dear Ann L, We are proud to get these lovely comments from a road warrior such as yourself. We thank you for choosing to stay with us and we hope to continue to earn your business in the new year. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Staff was very welcoming and helpful
Summary: We arrived on New Years Eve.  The lobby was decorated and festive.  The evening cookies looked very healthy, but best of all were very tasty.  The room was very clean; it almost looked like we were the first guests.  We had a very good dinner at the in house restaurant.  I had very tender steak, mashed potatoes, and fresh fruit.  I also had the signature mudslide brownie which was yummy.  The only thing I did not like were that the bed was too soft.  Of course, my husband of 25 years thought the bed was perfect.  Opposites attract.
Manager Response: Dear lorindacbf, I loved all that you had to say about the hotel, décor, and services. More importantly loved your personal comment on "opposite attract" We look forward to you staying with us in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Solid option near John Wayne Airport
Summary: I stayed over the Christmas weekend.  You should know that most restaurants and stores are a short drive or long walk away, but the hotel itself was great.  Solid service around the clock, surprisingly quiet (didn't hear any of the nearby jets), decent small shop to handle food/beverage/laundry needs.  Since I stayed there, they are now charging for parking, but during my visit, I found it to be a solid value for the money (free WiFi, etc.).  I do wish it didn't have the self-closing bathroom door (like some Sheratons also have now), but that wasn't a deal-breaker.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Ethan H, We are pleased that you decided to spend your Christmas at our hotel nd are ecstatic that you loved our hotel and services. Thank you for a five star rating and we wish you a very happy new year. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I stayed in this hotel for 2 nights and it's a very clean hotel.  You will feel that this hotel is either a new one or renovated soon, everything seems to be new.  Like any other Hilton Garden Inn hotels, it has a business center and a meeting room. It has a wide parking in the rear with a door making it very close to the elevators. It also has a coin operated laundry room. It's only 15-20 minutes away from Disneyland parks.
Manager Response: Dear Moh_Samir, Thank you so much for a very positive review. Also appreciate you pointing out our proximity to the Disneyland parks. Safe travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Nice, New Hotel but Beds Are Too Soft
Summary: We chose this hotel because it was reasonably priced for the area, is pretty new and is close to family.  The hotel is comparable to a Marriott Courtyard.  I liked it very much except the king sized bed seemed more like a queen size and the bed was way too soft.  I have hip problems and sleeping on a soft mattress makes me vulnerable to a spondy-condition which is very painful.  The lounge chair in the room was actually firmer than the bed.    The room is well furnished with mini-fridge and microwave with a small sink outside the bathroom.  The room also has a Keurig coffee machine, large desk, good dresser, large screen TV.  I liked the abundance of electrical plugs available on both sides of the bed. The business center has just 2 computers and 2 printers but is easily
Manager Response: Dear Laura T, Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed experience of your stay and all the lovely things you mentioned about the hotel and services. We do thank you for your business. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Got a great rate from Hilton site online. Checked in on Christmas day, the front desk was extremely pleasant despite working on a holiday. The room was ready with clean and nice bedding, nuetrigina products in the bathroom refilled daily, as well as fresh towels and linens daily. The water and cookies in the afternoon and evening were a nice touch. The bartender was cautious about the drinks, but made them to our exact specifications, and was really a very sweet girl.  The only complaint would be the TV could not handle the digital service and thus had a checkerboard pattern while trying to watch it. Parking was a bit limited.   Overall a great experience, would return to that hotel again if I find myself in California.
Manager Response: Dear GaryMiller AZ, We do thank you for a wonderful review and the lovely things you had to say. We did have a faulty Direct TV part that is on back order due to the holidays and will soon be fixed. The good thing is that it is only affecting a few TV;s on a certain floor and the part arrives tomorrow. Looking forward to making our hotel your home away from home in 2016 Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Value engineering is not good engineering
Summary: The staff and amenities were fine, but the building had two elevators for 50 rooms each on four floors and one staircase with access to other floors, but not the lobby and one staircase with access to the outside as a fire escape. One elevator was out of order for our three day stay, resulting in lengthy delays.The room climate control did not alter the temperature of the room, though it indicated that different temperatures were selected. The TV image frequently froze with a message that the weather was affecting reception. This was during typical sunny southern California weather, so that wasn't it. Three of our four devices could not log into the internet. The hotel was new and shiny with cheerful staff, but the design and execution of the technology was pathetic.
Manager Response: Dear Emily V, I am so glad you found our hotel new and shiny and our staff cheerful. Yes, we did have one elevator down on one weekend and that has been duly fixed. You are correct with the TV's as well, with a faulty part that affected a few TV's and is in the process of being fixed. We do however have two safety exits at either end of the corridor's and an additional staircase that leads from the second level indoor/outdoor pool to the lobby entrance. We hope you will give us another chance with our TV's and elevators fixed and experience some more cheerfulness from out staff. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Clean Room with modern updates, friendly and helpful staff, enjoyable stay. Location very near OC airport and our meetings was very convenient.  Had been staying at a competitor down the street at a greater per night cost but was disappointed with their overall experience, this Hilton Garden Inn was a pleasure to stay at.  Great job Hilton.
Manager Response: Dear Richard S, Thank you for all the lovely comments about our hotel. We are thrilled and thank you for your 5 star rating. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, Ronnie

Summary Heading: Very Poorly Engineered and Designed Facility, Unworkable Technology!
Summary: First the good news.  The staff here are friendly, apologetic, and upbeat. That said, I rarely write poor reviews, but this needs to be noted.  This hotel has 5 floors, well over 150 rooms and only two elevators (one of which was not working during our stay).  The stairwell nearest our room was a fire escape which can only be entered but provided no access to other floors, it only dumped you to the outside of the building. The other stairwell allowed access to other floors, but the ground floor was an exit only to the parking lot. With only one elevator working, this made for numerous trips downstairs around the outside of the building and then to enter back through the main entrance. We checked in on a Friday, and by Sunday evening,no elevator repair was made.  The satellite TV
Manager Response: Dear Dan F, I am so glad you found our staff cheerful and upbea. Yes, we did have one elevator down on one weekend and that has been duly fixed. You are correct with the TV's as well, with a faulty part that affected a few TV's and is in the process of being fixed. We do however have two safety exits at either end of the corridor's and an additional staircase that leads from the second level indoor/outdoor pool to the lobby entrance. I do apologize for your keys not working as we do use a very modern technological key that has a 1K cache memory and we very rarely encounter any issues. Your comment was our first in 2 months. We hope you will give us another chance with our TV's and elevators fixed and experience some more cheerfulness from out staff.  Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The good news is this is very close to John Wayne airport. This hotel is located in a business district so there are absolutely no restaurants within a reasonable walking distance. The hotel restaurant left a lot to be desired, it's almost like they know you have no where else to go. The menu descriptions sound fabulous but don't represent what they bring you. 5 chicken wings for $9. Have them shuttle you to a decent restaurant. Breakfast is $12.  Room was clean and nicely decorated, if you like contemporary design. Drove me nuts that the bathroom door will not stay open, had to prop it with a suitcase.
Manager Response: Dear pamelajo1, Thank you for taking the time to write your experiences on Trip Advisor and we are sad that we did not meet your expectations with portion sizes and your bathroom door not staying open. We do hope you have a wonderful holiday season and give us another try in the new year as we hope to win your business back. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Best Company Holiday Party Held Here
Summary: From the fantastic staff, to the beautiful Orchid Ballroom in which our party took place, to the superb food, our company holiday party was a rousing success, thanks in no small part to the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine/Orange County Airport.  I worked with Aloha initially, and then closely with CJ and Sergio, in preparation for our event.  They hosted 3 of us for a food tasting before the event, and we were able to make informed selections.  They did not disappoint!  There are not enough good things I can say about the treatment we received, from top down!  Everyone was accommodating and positive, and it was truly a pleasure working with them.  After our event, several employees said it was the best holiday party we have had in years!  I recommend this hotel and staff for any
Manager Response: Dear Tina B, We do appreciate your glowing comments about the hotel and services. We are glad that your event went well and Aloha and CJ will be very excited to see their names mentioned. We look forward to hosting your future events. Have a wonderful Holiday Season!!! Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Have stayed here twice in the last 30 days. Staff is very friendly starting with the airport shuttle pickup. This is a new property and it looks great!  Airport shuttle starts at 5am which is plenty of time to get the first flight out of SNA. This will be my hotel of choice when flying in/out of SNA.
Manager Response: Dear JUSTING2476, Thank you very for a 5 star review and all the lovely things you had to say about our staff and hotel. Appreciate that you will be making us your 1st choice when you return, and we look forward to having you. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: In the beginning Aloha worked with me for the Company Holiday Luncheon, Aloha brought in CJ to continue with me on the event. Executives had last minute changes or requests and both CJ & Aloha were great in providing both the last minute Exec. Conference room as well as last minute Dinner!  I was very happy, not once did I receive an attitude or an are you kidding me look. I am so very happy, it all went very smooth. Employees happy and Especially Executives Happy Make me Very Happy. I can't thank them both enough and hope to work with both again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear crisis r, We are ecstatic that you decided to host your holiday Luncheon with us and everything went as you planned. Thank you for acknowledging Aloha and CJ as you are correct, they are Superstars and they will be thrilled to see their names mentioned. Thank you again and looking forward to hosting your events in 2016. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I stayed here for one night and was impressed. The bed was very comfortable (none of the sleep number mess that usually keeps me away from HGI) and the air conditioner worked well. Front desk staff was friendly, but not as overly helpful as I'm used to. There are two incidents where I actually felt the staff were making fun of me when I asked questions. Sarcasm doesn't look good at the front desk.  I would stay here again because the also was great, not because of service.
Manager Response: Hello LivesInHotels365, I do love your screen name and hoping you are a Hilton Diamond member, with all the travel you do. Thank you for choosing us as your home away from home and for all the lovely things you had to say. I would appreciate any further feedback on the comment that you made as we constantly want and need, to improve our standards of service. My direct line is 9496568700 Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Operating around John Wayne Airport/Newport Area
Summary: The Garden Inn was completely refurbished in October and had a fresh, new look and feel.Convenient to all area shopping and freeways with easy access, without the area typical.daily $25-type daily parking fees. (Due to start though in January for $15).  Kitchen does not present itself as a full restaurant establishment, but an amazing salmon entree is offered.  The staff was ever available and helpful.  Nearby to Fashion Island and South Coast Plaza and many fine restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Billyboy214, Thank you for your very positive comments and glad that you had a lovely dining experience. Just to keep the record straight, our hotel is a brand new construction and opened July 31, 2015. In regards to parking, you are correct, we will have a daily parking fee of $12 and not $15 as almost all Airport Hotels have. This will begin January 1st, 2016. We look forward to your next visit and do wish you decide to stay with us again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel is very new, and clean in general, but the layout is strange.  The lobby is nice, but the breakfast area is tiny with little food, and the hallway leading to the elevator is so narrow that more than 3 people there will find it crowded.  This is the smallest HGI I have ever seen.  The room, the furniture and everything in the room is decent, but again, the room is small, compared to other HGI.  I stayed in many HGs before, and this is the smallest among all.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent new hotel and superb staff
Summary: Love everything about this hotel, especially the staff.  They are very professional, genuinely very nice!  The hotel room was in excellent condition.  Only thing that I would ask the hotel to modify is the size of the television needs to be bigger.
Manager Response: Hello Terrilyn V, Thank you for your 5 Star review and all the fantastic things you had to say about our staff and hotel. We are sad that our 42 inch screen Television was not up to your liking. As a new hotel, our goal was to provide a better experience choosing the 42 inch screen TV, which was above the brand requirements. We do hope that the Direct TV and 200 plus channels met with your expectations. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel is new, clean and very contemporary. The staff is friendly and helpful. The lobby is inviting. The bar area is nice. We paid extra for breakfast. It was a decent buffet and worth the cost and connivence if not having to drive for breakfast. The room was clean and modern. Having a mini Keurig in the room was a nice touch. It's located in a business park area, but it's only a 5 minute drive to retail and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Tgsd, A very detailed review indeed, and we thank you for all the lovely things you had to say about the hotel and services. We do appreciate it. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Loved it. Everything was brand new and clean. Grand opening celebration was held while we were there. Staff was very nice and accommodating. I did have two issues, the housekeeper didn't vacuum the room every day and an alarm went off in the room at 4:00 am one morning. When I called the front desk they said it's the motion sensor, maintenance doesn't come in until 9:00 so basically just deal with it. Umm very annoying sound. The hotel should have at least one maintenance worker at he hotel overnight. Other than that great stay. I would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear carmendownes01, Thank you for you for the lovely things you had to say about the hotel and our staff. I do apologize for the Housekeeping staff not vacuuming your room and the alarm going off. I will definitely pass on your message to our department heads. Thank you once again and we d look forward to being your home away from home for your future stays. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: A good budget hotel in Irvine
Summary: A clean, modern facility close to Orange County Airport and across the street from St. Jude's Medical Center.  Nothing fancy, but a good spot for the night. Service was friendly and parking and in-room internet were free. My only problem was that once I'd connected my phone I couldn't connect my laptop.  Not a big deal, but someone on business here would need to have fixed this.
Manager Response: Dear Donald Munroe E, We are so glad you chose our hotel for your stay. You are correct, we are right next door to St. Jude's. Mr. Munroe, we are a brand new hotel and with this being our 5th operating moth, we are quite sure we have all the opening kinks, out of the way. Since this is the first I have heard of the issue, of the phone and computer not connecting at the same time, I am hoping you tried to connect with the 24/7 help line we have available. We do look forward to your next visit and we will make sure you will be able to connect multiple gadgets. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Very nice hotel design, very modern. I loved the lobby and my room's bathroom. Beds are comfortable, very close to freeway 405 and airport. it was a good stay. However, no bottles of water were provided in room not even to brew a cup of coffee in the room.
Manager Response: Dear Patricia H. Thank you so much for staying with us and giving us a positive review. I apologize if you did nit get any water for your coffee. please let us know the next time you are here and we will make sure we will have your water ready for you. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We experienced a pleasant and professional stay.  Spacious, clean recently renovated room.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  We forgot an item, pillow, after leaving, the staff located it and shipped it to us immediately. Well done.
Manager Response: Dear Tom R, Thank you for your rave reviews and the shout out on Trip Advisor. We are glad we were able in assisting to get your "Favorite" pillow back to your home in one piece!!! Safe travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I wasn't expecting this hotel to be as nice as it was. It even had a bar. The bartender Heather was so sweet and nice. She was really friendly and easy to talk to. The rooms were really nice and clean. I would definitely stay here again. I wish they offered a free breakfast. The breakfast in the morning is a small buffet for $12.99. The muffin was really old and I couldn't eat it. The rest of the breakfast was good. The staff is super friendly too.
Manager Response: Dear H_JDeering, Thank you so much for your 5 Star response. We do appreciate the fact that you enjoyed your stay and posted it. Heather will be thrilled to see her name mentioned as we make sure that teams members mentioned, are recognized by all. I will definitely bring up the muffin issue with my Food and Beverage Director. We look forward to your next visit to the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: nice room  tv channels sucked, parking great  food good  i stayed a month very nice people  this is new place very good  i will go again i need a room  close to every thing in oc   so go get a room.  easy to find
Manager Response: Dear James K, Thank you so much for being a long staying guest of ours and for all the wonderful things you had to say about our hotel and staff.  I would like to know more about, what was not up to your standards, with 200 plus Direct TV channels that we provide. I can be reached at 9496568700 Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Must stay to appreciate what this brand is about. Excellent staff and service in all areas. Quiet and Modern. Rates tops of four other Hilton Garden Inns we have stayed in this year. Food was above the norm. Nice small bar with excellent hostess,made everyone feel welcome.
Manager Response: Dear Ed P, Thank you so much for the 5 star review and all the fantastic things you had to say about our hotel and staff. We thank you for rating us higher than our peers and hope to see you again on your next visit t the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Booked a single night here while passing through the area. Check-in was a breeze and friendly. The hotel is basically new. You might notice it has already vaulted to #1 here, and it should. Rooms were clean and incredibly quiet. FREE PARKING! The beds were comfortable, and rooms good sized. Like some others, did not have as great an experience in the restaurant as the wait staff seemed like they did not want to leave the counter to provide service. But the meal itself was good. We would return and definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear spade7, Thank you for all the lovely comments about the hotel, services and food. Thank you for bringing to our attention about the lack of attention on the part of our servers. I have shared your comment with our Food and Beverage Director and we will definitely increase our training and levels of attentiveness. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Overall a good place to stay. Easy to get to and close to the airport. Please ensure you ask questions when you check in. I really didnt know about breakfast and dinner until I looked the information up. I believe they assume people stay here all of the time
Manager Response: Dear Latrice B, Thank you for your positive comments about the hotel. Yes we are minutes away from the hotel and do serve breakfast, lunch and dinner. You are correct, our staff should not assume that you have been to the hotel before and we should have provided you with the information you needed. We also do have our Pavilion Pantry that is open 24/7 Safe travels. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We stayed here for a softball tournament. The staff at this property are amazing. From the moment we checked in to breakfast staff, they are great. Curtis at the front desk is so welcoming. I highly recommend this property for any team.
Manager Response: Dear Nani L. Thank you for your great review and all the lovely things you had to say about out hotel. We do hope to see you again on your next visit to the area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Everything was practical, everything felt like brand new and very clean, easy access to the rooms, staff were all smiling and attentive, reasonable pricing, wet bar was a nice touch.  valet would have been good as well as a jacuzzi; other than that I had an overall experience of very satisfied.
Manager Response: Dear Amir R, Thank you for all feedback and the lovely comments you had about our hotel. We look forward to having you as our guest in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We were in town for a wedding and this was a perfect choice. Nice and helpful staff. The breakfast was quick and all that you could want. We walked to an El Torito Grill for dinner one night and passed a coffee shop and bar on the way, so there are a few places to walk to.  It was just right!
Manager Response: Dear travel4fun298, Thank you so much for the thumbs up!!! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and was able to experience our local restaurants. We look forward to you staying with us in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We love this Hilton Garden Inn.  We travel a great deal for business and most always stay at HG Inns. We were here in September and return whenever we have business (or fun events) in this area.   The staff and management are the best. They are professional, accommodating, warm and really know the meaning of the word "hospitality."    Just to drop a couple names:    Chris Graham, Front Desk Supervisor, is terrific. He really sets the tone for quality.   Ronnie Delgado, GM, is also a star.   All and all, this is the place to stay for both business and pleasure whenever you're in the Irvine area.
Manager Response: Dear Opop E, Thank you so much for your excellent review. Chris and I were tickled pink, to see our names mentioned and for that we thank you profusely. We do look forward to being your home away from home, on your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed 3 nights, there a few minor problems, such as - after eating breakfast, a LONG wait all 3 mornings for the waiter to bring the check - I had to go to him. The pool was too cold to bother with. Layout of room was good! Now - the one MAJOR problem - on the 3rd day I had to look for a pen and I opened the night stand and discovered a half used tube of KY Jelly and an unopened condom. I didn't know that Hilton garden provides "party favors"! While this may appear funny, it raises the question of - where else didn't they check, and did they remove the "dirty" sheets before I arrived? On check-out, brought this to the attention of the Manager - and - oh well?
Manager Response: Dear Mark F, Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed comment. I was glad I was able to connect with you and apologize for the lack of service and the attention to detail by our cleaning staff. We do hope to see you again on your future trips to Irvine. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We stayed here 5 nights while visiting family in the area.  So we got to see the hotel both during the week, with mainly business travelers, and on the weekend, with more couples and families.  The hotel was very full and busy at all times, yet the staff and hotel itself ran efficiently.  Breakfast is not free, but it is plentiful.  Plenty of seating in the lobby area and the hotel bar is very nice and open, with friendly bartenders.  The rooms are clean and new so no complaints there.  All in all, I would highly recommend a stay here and will come back again.
Manager Response: Dear sanck6, That was a very nice review and thank you so much for all the points you touched on. Yes we are primarily a business hotel during the week and leisure on the weekend. We do look forward to your next stay in the near future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The property is new, roomy and fresh. The bar area and restaurant area is great. The rooms were atypical and service overall was good. Some decent restaurants to walk too in this primary business area.
Manager Response: Dear Anthony C, Thank you for your lovely comments about the hotel. We do appreciate your thumbs up towards our facility and services. Much appreciated. R Dalgado

Summary: As mentioned several times previously, this is a new construction Hotel so everything is very clean, well laid out and fresh. Very professional staff. Though just off the 405 the rooms are very quiet and the beds very comfortable. A super choice for a business stay.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin C, Thank you for your 5 star review and all the lovely things you had to say. Yes we are a new hotel and although we are right next to the 405 freeway, our quadrupled paned windows, drown out all the outside noise and makes your stay a calm and quiet one.. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: They don't care if you have a problem
Summary: At first the hotel looks great. It looks like it is brand new. I was only staying one night and I ended up checking in late (after midnight.) When I got to the room I saw that there was no bottled water in the room not even to purchase. When I called down to the front desk to inquire the phone rang and rang, I let it ring more than ten times and no one answered. After that I noticed that the room was not cleaned very well. There was coffee spill drops on the desk and someone's old toothpick on the floor. The worst part of my stay was when I woke up in the morning and used the toilet. It would not flush all the way and almost overflowed onto the floor. When I called to report this to the front desk they said there was nothing they could do about it because maintenance wasn't
Manager Response: Dear Photosinger, Thank you so much for posting a recap of your stay. Let me first apologize for not giving you the service and attention you so deserve. We thought we had all toilets covered as we had a few faulty flappers, but I believe we missed one. Please d call me with your room number so that we may attend to the issue. I have spoken to the housekeeping manager and front office manager with the issues that you had. We look forward to make your next stay a better one. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel is quite new (therefore very clean) with simple modern decor.  All of the staff said hello and regularly asked if they could help us with anything.  They were very accommodating.  The rooms are a decent size.  The free wi-fi worked well and there was no charge for parking (versus $25 at many other hotels in the area).  We only ate breakfast there and it was fine- not extraordinary but the buffet was a good value.  They didn't seem to have movies or TV shows on demand which was a bit of a disappointment for my 13 year old daughter.  I would definitely stay there again.  It seems like a great place for business trips.  For family vacations it is close to the 405 and the 55 so you can get places easily.
Manager Response: Dear danielle760, Thank you for your attention to detail and all the lovely things you had to say about the hotel and our staff. We are excited that you like the hotel and will be back. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: The hotel was nice and clean. However, it should be because it's new. Initially the customer service was great. We were greeted and checked in quickly. Upon checking into our room we were surprised by the size of the room. We have small children so we prefer a bathtub. We were told that would be additional. The next morning my husband and oldest went down for breakfast because our youngest was still asleep. He was told he could not bring the food he paid for back up to the room. We woke up our son and took him down for breakfast. Once down there we watched 2 separate guest pay for and take their food to their room. One was allowed to take his food to his room because his wife was taking to long to get ready. Not okay. If those are the rules okay, but make sure you adhere to
Manager Response: Dear Reese 03_41, Firstly please let me apologize for the inconsistency on behalf of the wait staff when adhering to rules. I will definitely work with them to get better. I do thank you for good comments you had about the hotel. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Just stayed four days at the Hilton Garden Inn near John Wayne Airport to see the area and visit friends.  Hotel was clean, attractive and very convenient for exploring from Malibu to San Diego.  Breakfast was wonderful with made to order omelets, French toast, waffles, etc.  Friends were welcome. There was always coffee and water in the lobby and also cookies in the evening for a snack when you returned from a busy day.  Staff was friendly and helpful.  Business center never too busy when you needed to print boarding passes and the other guests were very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Geri G, A very detailed review indeed and we thank you for it and the 5 star review. We are glad that you loved the hotel and we hope that we can become your home away fro home. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Even thought this hotel is new, the staff was superb and very helpful. They went out of your way to make you feel comfortable. Want a great away place to relax this is the place. The outlay of the hotel is very user friendly and easy to use. The business center is very open and not cramped like most.
Manager Response: Dear Robert J, Loved the word awesome, and thank you for the 5 star review. We do hope to see you again in the near future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Nice and clean stay in a brand new place
Summary: After awaiting the opening of this hotel, I finally got to stay there.  It is in the heart of the business district off of Main and Von Karmen.  It's a little close to the freeway, but the noise isn't too bad.  The hotel is clean, and parking is free.  The food and restaurant service were very poor.  Hopefully they will get up to par soon, but neither were worth the time when I was there.  But I am always happy to find a reasonably priced hotel with no parking fees close to Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Texas Travelette, Thank you for your comments and saying that you will be back with us. The windows are Quadrupled Panes and keeps out all and any noise from the freeway. I do apologize if you did not have a good Food and beverage experience. Sincerely,  R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Fantastic value, quiet, close to airport
Summary: I recently stayed here while on a business trip in Orange County. The room rate I paid provided exceptional value for the hotel quality. It was brand new, exceptionally clean, and so quiet, even though it was close to the airport! The breakfast (included in my stay as a Hilton Honors gold member) was served quickly and professionally. The fitness center was more spacious than most and I loved that the pool area was partly open to the outdoors. Really great value in a convenient location. I will always try to stay here on a return to O.C.
Manager Response: Dear cjcolorado, We do appreciate all the lovely comments you made about our hotel. We thank you for being a Hilton Gold member and your loyalty to the brand. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We were told this hotel was only two months old. It looked very nice and very modern. It is located in a business park area and close to the freeways. It is located in an area that is very quiet at night with covered parking. The staff is ready and willing to help. Rooms are modern, clean and well insulated. Bathrooms are clean and very modern. This is a very nice hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Hector B, Thank you so much for the thumbs up and all the good things you had to say about the hotel. We do appreciate the business and look forward to seeing you again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed here the evening before flying out of John Wayne.  My cab driver refused to believe this hotel was here, but it was and it was very, very nice -- as nice as any Hilton  Garden Inn I have ever been to (and I have been at many) and spanking new.  My only complaint is that Hilton refuses to give any stay credit or points if you book through Priceline, which my client did.
Manager Response: Dear De hypnotist, Yes we are a brand new hotel and thank you for all the good things you had to say and the 4 star review. In regards to your Hhonor points, u are correct that your client would need to book through the brand for you to receive the perks you so desire and deserve. Hilton as you know does spend a lot of time in terms of money, training, loyalty and expectations of our Hhonor members that we take pride in. Just a suggestion would be to give your clients your Hhonor number in the future and let them know your expectations. We thank you for your loyalty. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Relatively new property. Close to the airport, and a short drive (5-10 min. w/o traffic) from the District for food and shopping. Decent breakfast with a made-to-order omelettes. Fridge/wet bar in the room, decent internet (netflix streamed fine, Hulu skipped a bit), nice shower with good water pressure and a full bathtub. Didn't have a problem hearing the highway or the airport, both of which are very close. Only complaint was the design of the hotel. The elevators are at one end of the hotel, so the higher your room number, the further away from the elevator you are. No biggie, but it is a long walk if you're lugging a bunch of stuff.
Manager Response: Dear Doophy, Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review and for all the positive things you had to say about the hotel. You are correct, with the freeway and airport so near by, you cannot tell with the design and quality of the windows as they do make the room sound proof. Thank you again. R Dalgado

Summary: Great place to stay! We chose this hotel because of its central location to many places we wanted to visit; beaches, eateries, shopping, amusement parks, and more! Very clean! Great Customer Service! Many great places to eat near by! Close to beaches! Will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Brenda, Thank you very much for the 5 star review and all your lovely comments. Much appreciated. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, Ronnie

Summary: Location is great off the main high way,easy to find by GPS,A cozy and friendly staff,Car park in and out available"may get packed late evenings and week-ends",Loppy is nice with fruit flavoured drinking waters available 24hrs,Breakfast is good"not included with room $13",Rooms are spacious and bed and pillows very good to enjoy sleeping in,Coffee/tea available including Iron/board,Shower very good and clean.
Manager Response: Dear Ali O, Thank you so much for your 5 star review and all the lovely things you had to say about our hotel. We do appreciate it and look forward to having you as our guest in the future. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: At last, a Hilton Garden Inn near OC Airport.  New but familiar, with an excellent friendly staff.  As a business traveler it's always great to be able to stay at a comfortable and familiar hotel.  There were a few bugs (such as trouble connecting to the wi-fi) but no doubt they will get that sorted out.  I would stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Marilyn R, Thank you very much for the great review and the thumbs up. We do appreciate your business and the time taken to write the review. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Great new hotel by OC airport
Summary: Been here many times but have never stayed here.  Very nice new hotel and priced well for what you get.  I will certainly be back.  Staff has been very helpful.  Hard to find but worth it once you find it.
Manager Response: Dear rodjans S, Thank you for taking the time to write a very positive review. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: New and Shiny - Hope It Stays This Way
Summary: I stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn Irvine for 3 nights on a business trip. I will happily return any time I am in the area. The staff was attentive. The room was larger than I expected, spotless and well appointed. The hotel was very quiet each night and the large comfortable king-sized bed allowed me to sleep very well! The location of the hotel is convenient to the airport, my business location and a variety of delicious restaurants. It was close enough to allow me to drive to the beach at Laguna and Newport each evening to catch the sunset. I will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Tawnya M, That was indeed a lovely review touching on all aspects of the hotel to include a quick drive to watch the "Sunset" at Newport beach. Thanks again for all the lovely thing you had to say and we will definitely try and keep the new look going. Sincerely R Dalgado

Summary: This is a new hotel, so naturally it had an advantage. My room was very spacious and comfortable. A couple of things that kept me from giving it a 5- when you walk into the room, there was a section where they left off the trim. Your eye is immediately drawn to where the paint stops and trim is missing. I was a little surprised they left it like that. When I walked in to the bathroom the rag used to clean was still on the counter. Lack of attention to detail will soon cause this hotel not to look new for long. This was a nice hotel and very friendly staff. I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear tgillis39, Thank you for your constructive comments and being a new hotel, it looks like you have found an area in  a room that we need to complete. If you do not mind giving me a call with your room number, we will definitely complete the job. In the meantime my team is on the look out. We look forward to you staying with us when you head back this way. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: What you'd expect from an HGI
Summary: Exactly what you expect from the brand. Clean room, good bed. Front desk staff helpful and welcoming - not fake. Quiet room, Keurig coffee maker (could you provide stronger K-cups please, instead of the weak stuff? Not a complaint). I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Mr. Greg C, Thank you for your lovely comments and we do appreciate the thumbs up. We will definitely look into the "stronger coffee" K Cups. Hoping we see you again when you are back in this area. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: All you need in a business hotel, with great service to boot
Summary: This is a fantastic *NEW* property that is going to be my go-to for trips to Irvine. Everything is tailored for the business road warrior - free reliable wifi, comfortable bed, and a great breakfast buffet with made-to-order omelettes.   And I can't forget the friendly and extremely helpful service. I just had an experience where the manager Christopher and Front Desk Associate Rina quickly and graciously helped me and my colleague out of a jam where we unexpectedly needed an extra night. Needless to say, I will be back...often.
Manager Response: Dear Ed L, Thank you for your rave review and the 5 stars. We do appreciate it. Rina and Christopher will be absolutely thrilled to see your remarks about hem. WE look forward to make our hotel your home away from home. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Convienient, New or newly remodeled and friendly staff
Summary: Very much a business hotel. Very much Hilton garden Inn including the small bathrooms with tp rolls that require a degree of physical flexibility and a long arm to reach. The breakfasts are well above average for hotel breakfasts (but a bit pricey at $13.95 unless your a Hilton Honors Gold or Diamond member). Just a couple of miles from John Wayne Airport and close to a lot of business in the area its a great business travelers hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Johnh S, Thank y0u for taking the time to write a review about your stay. We look forward t your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Bright, Clean, Cheery!  I  was not disappointed at all with any of the elements of my stay!  I was greeted in the halls by staff, served well at bfast and dinner, and felt secure and welcome, start to finish.
Manager Response: Mr. James W, Thanks for a 5 star review and all the good things you had to say about the hotel, services and staff. We look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: From arrival to departure this property excelled!  Clean, fresh and friendly only begins to describe this hotel.  Moments from the airport and yet quiet!  The front desk staff was terrific.  They did everything right and offered a great value.  I highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: Dear James W, Thank you for that short and crisp explanation of our property and services. We do appreciate the 5 star rating and the heart behind your verbiage. Gratitude. R Dalgado

Summary Heading: Brand new hotel, careful to check out details and not rely on pictures.
Summary: My husband and I live only about 25 miles from this hotel.  We decided to treat ourselves to a night out.  This hotel was opened in July, 2015.  Inside is lovely and breakfast was very good with many options.  We are Hilton Diamond members and were upgraded to a suite which is huge, very nice.  Hotel was very quiet.  Our only complaint is that we had looked at their photos on their homepage.  They reflected a swimming pool and Jacuzzi which looked lovely.  We were surprised to find out (after we checked in) that they have only a pool, not a Jacuzzi.  Somehow, this feels like deceptive advertising.  I know we had looked forward to using the Jacuzzi.  Overall, hotel is well kept and all staff members were very friendly.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Kady SanClement, Firstly thank you for being loyal Diamond members and we do appreciate your business. You are correct in stating that the hotel is brand new and had to use generic pictures in the initial phase of the operations and we were still going through contraction and opening. please do take a look at our hotel online as we have taken quite a few pictures of the hotel and outlets. We do have a nice sized pool at 86 degrees with a unique half indoor and half outdoor feature. We however do not have a Jacuzzi. I am glad we were able to upgrade you to a suite and that the room was to your liking. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary Heading: I wanted to love this hotel but instead I was dissappointed every step of the way
Summary: This is a brand new hotel so it looks great, and I can see from the reviews that many have had an enjoyable stay here, but for us it was terrible. First our room was next to construction going on. All day, for three days, we had to hear hammering, drilling, and other noises making it very unbearable to even sit in our room. I have three kids, so we were in our room a lot and it was not enjoyable. On top of this they had to turn off our water for the construction in the middle of the day. When they called and told me they knew I was upset but did nothing to help us. After this we had a worker knock on our door to see if it was on, then another worked got mad at him for bothering us. Honestly it was a little uncomfortable. The next day we had no maid service, so I called to ask
Manager Response: Dear Travellingmeand3, Thank you for taking the time to write about all your experiences. You are correct that we are new and you did get us in our final stages of touching up the hotel and for that I apologize. The showerheads have been fixed, the pool is now at 86 degrees and all construction work is complete!!!! Thank you for pointing out the cleanliness, fitness room and services. We look forward to having you back to a new and improved product. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: I highly recommend this new Irvine hotel! Brand new, very well-appointed rooms! Friendly, helpful staff! Fruit infused water, cookies and free coffee in lobby! Central, convenient location! Must stay if you are traveling to the Irvine area!
Manager Response: Dear Mrs_Brady0519, We do appreciate telling all travelers visiting Irvine to come stay with us. You are our #1 ambassador and we absolutely love it. Thank you for all your detailed experiences of the hotel and we look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for visit to Irvine.  Location was good with easy access to freeways.  Hotel was new and rooms were very clean and staff was personable and professional.  Pool is quasi covered / inside with more shade than sun.  Nothing to really walk to as to restaurants etc.  Was a good value overall
Manager Response: Dear Louis 1ma, Thank you so much for a very positive review. We do appreciate you taking the time to write it. We look forward to you staying at our hotel on future visits. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We were on a overnight here , in town seeing a concert at Irvine meadows. The draw to this place was that it was new, free parking, and convenient! It was all of that And more! Easy access right off the freeway, and brand new stylish lobby greets you as you walk in. And the free parking! Others charge $22 close by in Irvine. Beautiful bar and lounge area with happy hour. Free coffee , and cookies were a nice touch! Comfy beds, and quiet rooms, wish there was a door stop for the bathroom to let a bit of air in, it got a bit stuffy in there( it has those doors that don't stay open) the front desk was friendly and welcoming. I do agree with the breakfast being a bit overpriced and no discounts for hilton members. It was good though, but your only option for breakfast unless you
Manager Response: Dear elizacass, We are so glad you were able to stay at our hotel and notice the differences that have the ability to make your stay better. The breakfast menu includes "made to order omelets" that a lot of our guests have come to appreciate. Thank you for all the lovely things you had t say and for the 5 star review. We sure do appreciate. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: We were delivering some merchandise as well as visiting friends in Newport Beach and wanted to stay near by so we could go out to dinner with them. Most everything in Newport Beach was quite spendy, even the old, worn places. (We spend 60-75 nights a year in motels and really won't spend over $100 if we can possibly help it. $60 would be better, but I'm fussy and want clean, with a comfortable bed.) Then we happened upon this place in TripAdvisor. Technically it's in Irvine, but feels like the north side of Newport Beach.  It's also close to the I405 which we needed to get on the next morning to go to Westwood. And the price was right: $94. Plus tax. And it's downright elegant. Gorgeous subtle muted colors in greys (okay, grey isn't technically a color) I want to take the shower
Manager Response: Dear Nancy R, Thank you for all your wonderful comments. Your attention to detail is amazing and we absolutely appreciate it. We look forward to having you as our guest again. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Being new, the hotel is nice. The rooms are on the small side but not too bad.   My main issue with HGI is the cost of breakfast. They charge $13.00 at this location (seems in line with other locations). The breakfast looked good but I just can't bring myself to spend that on breakfast. I usually stay at Hampton Inn which provides free breakfast and I feel a comparable level of service and amenities. My fault as I don't know why I book stays at HGI's.
Manager Response: Dear Mrider28, Thank you for your comments about our new hotel and that you enjoyed your stay. Yes we do charge a nominal fee for breakfast and the choices are varied to include cooked to order omelets. Thank you for being our guest. Sincerely, R Dalgado

Summary: Very helpful and friendly staff with clean updated rooms with comfortable quiet heating/cooling. This was my first time here but will return. Shuttle picked me up from the John Wayne airport and back as requested.
Manager Response: Dear Sam M, Thank you for your 5 star review. We do appreciate the confidence you have placed in your stay with us and will definitely look forward to your next visit. Sincerely, R Dalgado
